story:
Hashtagger:  noun \'hash-ta-gr\

A drop-in replacement for your existing
light switch that wirelessly charges phones, 
monitors and secures your home... even on the go!

Patents pending.






"...promises to revolutionize the way the average person looks at phone chargers in their home."  - Daily Herald

"...turns the average house into a state-of-the-art smart home."  - Minyanville

"...charges devices without mountains of cumbersome wires."  - Power Engineering

"...streams audio and video utilizing an infra-red motion detection and video capture alarm system, and much more."  - Wall Street Select





Can you relate to this?

No more hunting for cable chargers.
Every light switch can be its own charger!









We know you are an influencer!  Directly refer at least 3 people that pledge for a Hashtagger Plug-In or above and we'll credit $10 for each towards your own at the end of the Indiegogo campaign.

After pledging, we'll email you simple instructions on how to track your influencer progress.  Get creative... blogs, Buzzfeed, Reddit, Stumble Upon, etc., along with FB and Twitter can help tremendously! 


Hashtagger.

Where ingenuity and proven technology meet.

Patents pending.


Available soon on:   


Hashtagger Light Switch

  • Charging Distance:  4 - 10mm
  • AC Input:  15A, 120V
  • DC Output: >1500mA, 5V
  • Frequency:  60-200KHz
  • Double switch controls two separate fixtures (non-Bluetooth use)
  • Double pole controls fixtures from one or two locations (non-Bluetooth use)
  • Component thermal / charging shutoff:  In-board controller
  • Height:  14.5cm
  • Width:  11.8cm
  • Wall Plate Depth:  0.7cm
  • Assembled Depth:  4.8cm
  • Color:  White 
  Hashtagger Plug-In
  • Height:  14.5cm
  • Width:  11.8cm
  • Depth:  4.0cm (AC prongs retracted) 

(Final product dimensions are subject to change)


While we've spent almost three years developing the technology and methodology behind our Hashtagger platform we also became fanatical about simplifying its use. 

We are a start-up firm based in Austin, Texas (Longhorns, SXSW, state capital, live music capital of the world, world's largest urban bat colony, etc.) whose singular mission as a FAAS (feedback-as-a-service) is to facilitate more effective communication modalities.  The STATUUS development team has direct design, manufacturing, coding and testing experience with some of the largest tech companies in the world, including Texas Instruments, BMC Software, Freescale Semiconductor (previously a division of Motorola), and others.  We have a growing IP portfolio and patents pending.


Unlike Austin's bats, we're not fly-by-night.  In case we do not reach our Indiegogo funding goals we are still moving fast ahead building out our platform.  This platform we believe will disrupt several widely-known industries while making it easier for consumers, organizations, and businesses to do what they do.  Your support today will help:

  • Complete fast prototyping, firmware, and testing
  • Further API and OPEN platform SDK development
  • Oversee PCB/component manufacturing and supply chain
  • Gain applicable certifications such as FCC, UL, BLE, & CE 
  • Purchase the tooling for scale production of our products
  • Increase domestic jobs by being assembled in the U.S.
  • Fund materials, production, marketing, and fulfillment



A huge plus in crowdfunding is that YOU get to participate in the development process. Have an idea to enhance one of our designs or include a specific feature? Just let us know and we'll determine if it's feasible.  STATUUS invites all soccer moms, techies, professionals, and the entire community of supporters to visit our developer's forum, Hashtagger Geeks, to voice your opinions, post technical solutions, make suggestions, and network ideas and resources.

 

We're assembling an amazing team of industry professionals at STATUUS however there is always the potential for unforeseen factors that may cause setbacks or delays in our plans.  Any delay such as in gaining certain required certifications, lack of component availability, prototype changes or additions, etc. will be tackled expeditiously and transparently so that our user-community and supporters will always be informed.   Some components such as the SmartHub and window/door sensors are ready to be OEM-packaged and shipped once we include the finalized versions of firmware and application interface.  


We've built the cost of U.S. domestic ground shipping* into the price of our Indiegogo perks. As with all Indiegogo projects, this price does not include any customs fees, duties and/or taxes you might incur when importing products into your state or country.  Any additional or international shipping charges, VAT taxes, etc. are the responsibility of the purchaser.



How Hashtagger's wireless induction/resonance charging system works...

 

(Rendered to highlight charging method only.  Shown in watermark background is cradle [see 3/4],
user control panel [see 7/8], plug-in adapter [see 24-29], and wall receptacle option [Fig.3] )


Q1: Will Hashtagger work on a iPhone, Samsung, LG or Windows phone?

A1: Hashtagger is compatible with Android, Tizen, and Windows Qi-compliant phones right out the box. Qi (pronounced "Chee") is the global wireless charging standard. iPhones 4, 5, and 6 will require a receiver- widely available as a charging sleeve and protective cover (also see iPhone wireless charging). Click [ here ] to find out if your smart phone is Qi-enabled or requires a charging cover.



Q2: How does the Hashtagger charger work?
A2: Hashtagger delivers up to 5 volts of power to your phone, tablet, or phablet and supports both Qi version 1.1 induction design and the newly-announced version 1.2 resonance design. Smart functions such as turning off/on your stereo, tv, perimeter, motion and fire detection, adjusting your home's heating and cooling temperature settings and more can be controlled from anywhere in the world with available WiFi via the Hashtagger mobile app.


Q3: What does 'hashtagger' mean?

A3: The 'Hashtagger' trademark refers to our proprietary method of using personal hashtag keywords to display a specific color of alert someone's Hashtagger wall unit or phone. The colors- red, blue, green, and yellow, may represent a priority, a person, or both!


Q4: Do I need to buy a Hashtagger before I can send prioritized texts?

A4: Nope.  Just download our FREE Hashtagger app and you're off to the races.  Of course, your intended receiver must have either the Hashtagger app or Hashtagger charger to see the priority. 


Q5: Can Hashtagger save me money on my utility bills?
A5: Yes, definitely.

Q6: Do all my light switches need to be replaced to use Hashtagger?
A6:  No, just replace the receptacle that's conducive for your lifestyle.  Simples.

Q7: Will I still be able to use my outlets or light switch?

A7: Yes.  With Hashtagger Plug-Ins and its two-socket configuration, one socket will be available for your normal use while the other socket is needed to supply AC power to the Hashtagger unit and provide stability.  All wall-mounted Hashtaggers have light-switch functions (on/off/dimmer) built in.  With SmartHub, you'll have the freedom and flexibility to control lights, appliances and electronics in your home from anywhere in the world!  


Q8: What's a smart hub and do I need one for Hashtagger to work?
A8: While the Hashtaggers are your "eyes and ears" around your home, SmartHub is the "brains" of the operation connecting all of the different sensors and beacons around your home.  If you're only looking at using the "brawn" and convenience of the basic charging and notification functions of Hashtagger then no- you won't need a hub.  Anyone with WiFi can plug in and set up the SmartHub in about 10 minutes- including beer or snack time!

Q9: Will it work with iBeacons and smart home hub I already have?
A9: Hashtagger will work with any Wi-Fi enabled open-source smart home product including motion sensors, security cams, even IoT coffee makers.

Q10: Do I need an electrician to install the Hashtagger?
A10: It's optional to use the Hashtagger Plug-in with or without your existing outlet faceplate.  If you plan on locating the Hashtagger Plug-In in a high use location- we'd suggest replacing your existing outlet faceplate which normally is attached by one external screw to help ensure unit stability. If you're not comfortable replacing a light switch receptacle, a licensed electrician can easily install the wall-mounted Hashtagger for you.

Q11: What happens if you don't meet your funding goal?
A11: We welcome each and every dollar, mention, and referral from our supporters- yet since we so strongly believe in our platform and our products as do many others, we are totally committed to bringing the Hashtagger to market.  Your support today will help us do it that much quicker and lock in the lowest price as first adopters.

Q12: Will the Hashtagger Plug-In work on UK and Canadian type outlets?
A12: Yes, international adapters will be available for UK, HK, and Canadian style sockets?

Q13: Will my custom settings be lost if my home's power goes out?
A13: No, Hashtagger utilizes flash memory and will still maintain your custom settings when power is restored.

Q14: What prevents others from using or controlling my Hashtagger?
A14: Hashtagger utilizes link codes and 256-bit encryption that only authorize devices you select so that control functions are not compromised. 

Q15: Great idea.  Is it patented?
A15: We have multiple patents pending on file with the USPTO and other entities. If ever you do spot a similar product popping up somewhere, please email us and include a link if possible so that we may take the proper legal measures to prevent infringement.  Our loyal supporters are our best eyes, ears, and spokespersons!

Q16: When can I expect delivery of my Hashtagger?
A16: We plan Early Bird delivery for the latter part of Q4 2015.  That's a few weeks longer than 1 year following our successful IGG campaign.

Q17: What warranty applies to the Hashtagger?
A17: All Hashtagger devices will carry a one-year limited warranty.

Q18: LMAO @ toon!!!  But did Sly really have a love child?
A18: Uhm, we'll get back to you on THAT one...  

In the meantime folks, your help is needed so post, tweet, pin, and share, Share, SHARE the news about our IGG campaign using the campaign share links above.

Every light switch can be its own charger!






























We know you are an influencer!  Directly refer at least 3 people that pledge for a Hashtagger Plug-In or above and we'll credit $10 for each towards your own at the end of the Indiegogo campaign.



After pledging, we'll email you simple instructions on how to track your influencer progress.  Get creative... blogs, Buzzfeed, Reddit, Stumble Upon, etc., along with FB and Twitter can help tremendously! 






Hashtagger.
Where ingenuity and proven technology meet.
Patents pending.


Available soon on:   


Hashtagger Light Switch


Charging Distance:  4 - 10mm
AC Input:  15A, 120V
DC Output: >1500mA, 5V
Frequency:  60-200KHz
Double switch controls two separate fixtures (non-Bluetooth use)
Double pole controls fixtures from one or two locations (non-Bluetooth use)
Component thermal / charging shutoff:  In-board controller
Height:  14.5cm
Width:  11.8cm
Wall Plate Depth:  0.7cm
Assembled Depth:  4.8cm
Color:  White 

  Hashtagger Plug-In
Height:  14.5cm
Width:  11.8cm
Depth:  4.0cm (AC prongs retracted) 



(Final product dimensions are subject to change)





While we've spent almost three years developing the technology and methodology behind our Hashtagger platform we also became fanatical about simplifying its use.  
We are a start-up firm based in Austin, Texas (Longhorns, SXSW, state capital, live music capital of the world, world's largest urban bat colony, etc.) whose singular mission as a FAAS (feedback-as-a-service) is to facilitate more effective communication modalities.  The STATUUS development team has direct design, manufacturing, coding and testing experience with some of the largest tech companies in the world, including Texas Instruments, BMC Software, Freescale Semiconductor (previously a division of Motorola), and others.  We have a growing IP portfolio and patents pending.




Unlike Austin's bats, we're not fly-by-night.  In case we do not reach our Indiegogo funding goals we are still moving fast ahead building out our platform.  This platform we believe will disrupt several widely-known industries while making it easier for consumers, organizations, and businesses to do what they do.  Your support today will help:


Complete fast prototyping, firmware, and testing


Further API and OPEN platform SDK development

Oversee PCB/component manufacturing and supply chain

Gain applicable certifications such as FCC, UL, BLE, & CE 

Purchase the tooling for scale production of our products

Increase domestic jobs by being assembled in the U.S.
Fund materials, production, marketing, and fulfillment










A huge plus in crowdfunding is that YOU get to participate in the development process. Have an idea to enhance one of our designs or include a specific feature? Just let us know and we'll determine if it's feasible.  STATUUS invites all soccer moms, techies, professionals, and the entire community of supporters to visit our developer's forum, Hashtagger Geeks, to voice your opinions, post technical solutions, make suggestions, and network ideas and resources.





 




We're assembling an amazing team of industry professionals at STATUUS however there is always the potential for unforeseen factors that may cause setbacks or delays in our plans.  Any delay such as in gaining certain required certifications, lack of component availability, prototype changes or additions, etc. will be tackled expeditiously and transparently so that our user-community and supporters will always be informed.   Some components such as the SmartHub and window/door sensors are ready to be OEM-packaged and shipped once we include the finalized versions of firmware and application interface.  




We've built the cost of U.S. domestic ground shipping* into the price of our Indiegogo perks. As with all Indiegogo projects, this price does not include any customs fees, duties and/or taxes you might incur when importing products into your state or country.  Any additional or international shipping charges, VAT taxes, etc. are the responsibility of the purchaser.





How Hashtagger's wireless induction/resonance charging system works... 







(Rendered to highlight charging method only.  Shown in watermark background is cradle [see 3/4],user control panel [see 7/8], plug-in adapter [see 24-29], and wall receptacle option [Fig.3] )




Q1: Will Hashtagger work on a iPhone, Samsung, LG or Windows phone?
A1: Hashtagger is compatible with Android, Tizen, and Windows Qi-compliant phones right out the box. Qi (pronounced "Chee") is the global wireless charging standard. iPhones 4, 5, and 6 will require a receiver- widely available as a charging sleeve and protective cover (also see iPhone wireless charging). Click [ here ] to find out if your smart phone is Qi-enabled or requires a charging cover.







Q2: How does the Hashtagger charger work?A2: Hashtagger delivers up to 5 volts of power to your phone, tablet, or phablet and supports both Qi version 1.1 induction design and the newly-announced version 1.2 resonance design. Smart functions such as turning off/on your stereo, tv, perimeter, motion and fire detection, adjusting your home's heating and cooling temperature settings and more can be controlled from anywhere in the world with available WiFi via the Hashtagger mobile app.




Q3: What does 'hashtagger' mean?


A3: The 'Hashtagger' trademark refers to our proprietary method of using personal hashtag keywords to display a specific color of alert someone's Hashtagger wall unit or phone. The colors- red, blue, green, and yellow, may represent a priority, a person, or both!


Q4: Do I need to buy a Hashtagger before I can send prioritized texts?

A4: Nope.  Just download our FREE Hashtagger app and you're off to the races.  Of course, your intended receiver must have either the Hashtagger app or Hashtagger charger to see the priority. 

Q5: Can Hashtagger save me money on my utility bills?
A5: Yes, definitely.



Q6: Do all my light switches need to be replaced to use Hashtagger?


A6:  No, just replace the receptacle that's conducive for your lifestyle.  Simples.


Q7: Will I still be able to use my outlets or light switch?
A7: Yes.  With Hashtagger Plug-Ins and its two-socket configuration, one socket will be available for your normal use while the other socket is needed to supply AC power to the Hashtagger unit and provide stability.  All wall-mounted Hashtaggers have light-switch functions (on/off/dimmer) built in.  With SmartHub, you'll have the freedom and flexibility to control lights, appliances and electronics in your home from anywhere in the world!  






Q8: What's a smart hub and do I need one for Hashtagger to work?


A8: While the Hashtaggers are your "eyes and ears" around your home, SmartHub is the "brains" of the operation connecting all of the different sensors and beacons around your home.  If you're only looking at using the "brawn" and convenience of the basic charging and notification functions of Hashtagger then no- you won't need a hub.  Anyone with WiFi can plug in and set up the SmartHub in about 10 minutes- including beer or snack time!



Q9: Will it work with iBeacons and smart home hub I already have?A9: Hashtagger will work with any Wi-Fi enabled open-source smart home product including motion sensors, security cams, even IoT coffee makers.



Q10: Do I need an electrician to install the Hashtagger?


A10: It's optional to use the Hashtagger Plug-in with or without your existing outlet faceplate.  If you plan on locating the Hashtagger Plug-In in a high use location- we'd suggest replacing your existing outlet faceplate which normally is attached by one external screw to help ensure unit stability. If you're not comfortable replacing a light switch receptacle, a licensed electrician can easily install the wall-mounted Hashtagger for you.



Q11: What happens if you don't meet your funding goal?A11: We welcome each and every dollar, mention, and referral from our supporters- yet since we so strongly believe in our platform and our products as do many others, we are totally committed to bringing the Hashtagger to market.  Your support today will help us do it that much quicker and lock in the lowest price as first adopters.



Q12: Will the Hashtagger Plug-In work on UK and Canadian type outlets?A12: Yes, international adapters will be available for UK, HK, and Canadian style sockets?



Q13: Will my custom settings be lost if my home's power goes out?


A13: No, Hashtagger utilizes flash memory and will still maintain your custom settings when power is restored.



Q14: What prevents others from using or controlling my Hashtagger?A14: Hashtagger utilizes link codes and 256-bit encryption that only authorize devices you select so that control functions are not compromised. 



Q15: Great idea.  Is it patented?A15: We have multiple patents pending on file with the USPTO and other entities. If ever you do spot a similar product popping up somewhere, please email us and include a link if possible so that we may take the proper legal measures to prevent infringement.  Our loyal supporters are our best eyes, ears, and spokespersons!



Q16: When can I expect delivery of my Hashtagger?

A16: We plan Early Bird delivery for the latter part of Q4 2015.  That's a few weeks longer than 1 year following our successful IGG campaign.


Q17: What warranty applies to the Hashtagger?A17: All Hashtagger devices will carry a one-year limited warranty.



Q18: LMAO @ toon!!!  But did Sly really have a love child?


A18: Uhm, we'll get back to you on THAT one...  


In the meantime folks, your help is needed so post, tweet, pin, and share, Share, SHARE the news about our IGG campaign using the campaign share links above.

story:
CARBON Ticker.


Ron's appearance on Global News 07/03/14

Canada's Leading IDLE-FREE Campaign needs $99,999

  • To develop a simple, fun app.
  • To clear the air on IDLE-myths CLEAR ACROSS CANADA.
  • To build a lasting movement.

We've run our campaign on a shoestring since 2006. Now, we need YOU.

Get a perk. Let's make this work, CLEAR ACROSS CANADA.

We can save $Billions in emissions when we're parked. Let's put this money in our pocket books, our economy.

Navigate the page using the links provided.

Why this will make a difference
What will happen on the drive ?
Where is the money going?
What are we offering as perks.
Other Ways to Help.
Thanks.

Why this will make a difference

Our fun app, our DRIVE, our movement will:

  • Inspire Canadians to save $Millions fuel when parked
  • Reduce greenhouse gas
  • Improve air quality

We IDLE mostly for two simple reasons:

We're not thinking about it.

We believe in old IDLE-Myths:

  • IDLING is good for our engine.
  • Long warm-ups are needed.
  • Re-starts are bad for our starter.

Our fun app, our DRIVE, our movement can:

Save $Millions fuel

10 minutes IDLE-FREE time a day can save $200 a year.

5,000 drivers can save $1 Million a year.

We can put this money into our pocket books, our economy.

Save tons of emissions

10 minutes IDLE-FREE time a day can save 1/2 ton CO2 a year.

5,000 drivers can save 2,500 tons of CO2 a year.

We can save TONS of greenhouse gas, with real action on climate change.

Improve air quality

Childhood asthma rates have shot up 400% across North America since 2006.

We can improve air quality and fight the asthma epidemic.


Rachel IDLE FREE Sign as featured in the perks.

Why is our campaign different?

Real kids, real car guys, real stories are really 'sticky.'

Our kids get our attention.

Car guys get us with the facts on IDLE-time.

It’s a powerful one-two.

Since 2006, few have said no, 80% buy-in.

  • The Vancouver Olympics liked our IDLE-FREE bus; it carried the men’s hockey teams.
  • Our IDLE-FREE Pace Car was embraced at the largest race track in Atlantic Canada.
  • The largest shopping mall in Atlantic Canada co-branded our campaign.
  • The largest newspaper in Atlantic Canada has promoted us since 2007.
  • We’ve been endorsed by car guys, bus guys, schools, doctors, and environment groups.

Real Stories

Rachel Hood has been our real-life poster girl since 2007.


Rachel with IDLE FREE Pace Car. Al MacPhee's generous contribution.

Al MacPhee has been Honourary Chair of our campaign since 2011.

He's one of Canada's top car guys.

See Three Generations of MacPhees.

'IDLE-FREE for our kids' was created by hockey dad Ron Zima at his kids school in Halifax.

Where he used to be the Canadian IDLER.

See A Father's Story.

We've run our campaign on a shoestring since 2006. Now, we need YOU.

Get a perk. Let's make this work, CLEAR ACROSS CANADA.

We can save $Billions in emissions when we're parked. Let's put this money in our pocket books, our economy.

Go back to the top of the page or continue reading

What will happen on the drive?

We'll be promoting our IDLE-FREE App for thousands of downloads.
Fans will be able to track their savings, and we'll be sharing how much it all adds up to from city-to-city.

We'll have CLEAN AIR FLASH MOBS just like this one.

We'll build a 'green social snowball' rolling East from Vancouver May 1, to Halifax June 4, National Clean Air Day.
And then on to St. John's.

We'll have FUN.
We'll CLEAR THE AIR on IDLE-Myths.
We'll record our FLASH MOBS and share them with the world.
We'll ask kids to send us artwork which, we'll add to our eBook: 'WHY I LOVE CLEAN AIR.'
We'll ask for Facebook LIKES and give away GoGreen Gear like our biodegradable bamboo CARBON CAPS.
We'll be asking Canadian drivers to pledge to go 'IDLE-FREE for our kids' on our Facebook page.

We're building a 'green social SNOWBALL.'
10,000 IDLE-FREE App downloads after we start our DRIVE, May 1.
5,000 FLASH MOBSTERS (attendees) at our stops CLEAR ACROSS CANADA.
50,000 Facebook pledges = to $10 Million in fuel and 12,500 to 25,000 tons of emissions saved ANNUALLY.
5,000 pieces of kids artwork 'WHY I LOVE CLEAN AIR.'
10,000 new followers on Twitter.

And, we want to raise money to give back to health and community groups that LOVE CLEAN AIR.
We'll update that for you here on indiegogo.

But, we can't do this without YOU.


Our CARBON and crayon eBook. (see perks)


WHY Evan Landry LOVES CLEAN AIR, now own the T-Shirt! (see Perks)

We've run our campaign on a shoestring since 2006. Now, we need YOU.

Get a perk. Let's make this work, CLEAR ACROSS CANADA.

We can save $Billions in emissions when we're parked. Let's put this money in our pocket books, our economy.

Go back to the top of the page or continue reading

What we'll do with the money.

We're driving to raise a minimum of $99,999 here on indiegogo.

We'll develop a fun IDLE-FREE App, and make it better and better.

The app can inspire Canadians and Americans to save $Billions in fuel and emissions year after year.

We'll develop and roll out our CLEAR ACROSS CANADA Drive.

We'll build a sustainable organization that supports 'IDLE-FREE for our kids' this year and every year thereafter.

With your help, we'll build our movement across Canada, the U.S., around the world.

We've run our campaign on a shoestring since 2006. Now, we need YOU.

Get a perk. Let's make this work, CLEAR ACROSS CANADA.

We can save $Billions in emissions when we're parked. Let's put this money in our pocket books, our economy.

Go back to the top of the page or continue reading

What are we offering as perks.

We've run our campaign on a shoestring since 2006. Now, we need YOU.

Get a perk. Let's make this work, CLEAR ACROSS CANADA.

We can save $Billions in emissions when we're parked. Let's put this money in our pocket books, our economy.

Go back to the top of the page or continue reading

Other ways to help.

Like our Facebook page

Follow us on Twitter

We've run our campaign on a shoestring since 2006. Now, we need YOU.

The Children's Clean Air Network

The 'IDLE FREE Guy'

Google map of the CLEAR ACROSS CANADA Route

Blue Spurs, our app developer.

Get a perk. Let's make this work, CLEAR ACROSS CANADA.

We can save $Billions in emissions when we're parked. Let's put this money in our pocket books, our economy.

Go back to the top of the page or continue reading

IDLE-FREE Team Thanks and Closing Statement.

The Children's Clean Air Network / GoGreen Guys

The Children's Clean Air Network began as a grassroots campaign in 2006 at Kingswood Elementary School, near Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada.

It became a non-profit network of schools, business and community leaders dedicated to reducing vehicle emissions across North America.

Today its mission is served by GoGreen Communications, the 'go green agency.'

GoGreen Guys:

Ron Zima, hockey dad, 'IDLE-FREE Guy', founder of The Children's Clean Air Network and 'IDLE-FREE for our kids', Canada's Leading IDLE-FREE Campaign.

Ron says, "In 2005, I made a promise to my kids to do something big for the environment."

Tom Nicolle, 'Numbers Nicolle', chief financial wizard. Tom is a passionate dad who wants everybody to 'go green for our kids.'

Tom says, "These numbers really add up."

David Heath, 'chief creative carbon cutter'. Dave's creative and technical genius helps cut carbon in fun ways, for the enormous benefit of all.

Dave loves thinking about 'people, planet, and partnerships.'

A PERSONAL THANK YOU FROM 'IDLE-FREE Guy'

We've run our campaign on a shoestring since 2006. Now, we need YOU.

Get a perk. Let's make this work, CLEAR ACROSS CANADA.

We can save $Billions in emissions when we're parked. Let's put this money in our pocket books, our economy.

Go back to the top of the page.

story:
Short Summary

If you could make one wish, what would it be?

If it's humanly possible, it can be accomplished with Verse.

Verse is an open source and publicly viewable system for distributing and delegating requests across social networks. Users of Verse can make requests of each other, as well as forward those requests or split them into subrequests to send to other users. The chain of requests can be viewed by each participant in graph form, allowing for participants at different parts of the request tree to directly contact each other.

Small-scale requests such as "run a theatre production of Hamlet" can be delegated to friends to "cast actors," "acquire costumes," "design stage makeup," and "design sets."

Large-scale requests such as "deal with global warming" can be passed through academic circles in the form of "research global warming effects," "design sustainable transportation technologies" and "design sustainable agricultural methods," and forwarded to associations who have connections with manufacturers, farmers and politicians.

Verse works because openly viewable social networks allow people to collaborate and get things done better.


Release Priorities

Our first priority is to make Verse as a website. Once the website proves to be stable and functional, we'll shift focus toward making it feasible to share requests through email, mobile devices, and social media. If we surpass our fundraising goal, we will increase our team size to accomplish these goals sooner and work on extra features.


What We Need & What You Get

We need money so we can work on this full-time. The more money we get, the more people we can get on board to work on making Verse integrate with current webservices as soon as possible.

People who throw money at us will get the first requests to join Verse, to share and play with however they like.


The Impact

This project has the potential to facilitate human needs on a global scale. With every adaptation to new mediums, people using Verse will have more power to make large requests of their social network. From hosting spontaneous raves in the streets, to developing a more streamlined food distribution system for your city, Verse is capable of radically altering functions of society.


Other Ways You Can Help

Whether or not you can provide monetary support, spreading the word on social media is a great way to help us out. If you have resources you would like to share with us, contact Leela.

story:
Meet Zex! A fun new device that you will enjoy with your family and friends.


Zex is a High Definition LED projector that fits anywhere and has great battery life, which makes it perfect for long trips. Take Zex anywhere, from campsites, to house parties, to the pool with friends, or just make your own drive in theatre.


Zex’s great lens displays amazing images of 100 inches from just 10 feet away.


Connect your phone directly to Zex through the HDMI cable and start using it immediately. Wirelessly connect to Android and Windows devices via Miracast/Screen Mirroring and DLNA. Connect Apple devices and any HDMI enabled devices (Blu-Ray, gaming devices, etc.) directly to Zex via HDMI cable and Lighting Digital AV adapter (not included) .Watch your favourite shows and movies straight from your smart phones and other HDMI compatible devices.



Use Zex when you have a presentation at work, or school by easily putting all your files on your device.


You don’t have to huddle around to show everyone your photos from your trip. Just use Zex and project it on a nearby wall.


Make Skype calls a lot more comfortable by not having to look at a small screen, especially when having group calls.


A great way to spend an evening with your significant other by putting Zex on your car and linking to your cars stereo system, you have your own drive-in theatre.


Have fun at parties by hooking Zex to the audio system and watching music video clips, or just different light effects while dancing.


How we got this idea.

The team here at Zex is made up of friends with different backgrounds, from designers to engineers and we think that it’s important that you know how we came up with this projector idea. We were having a meeting once and half of our team was abroad, so we needed to have a group call to let everyone in on the meeting. This one meeting made us realize that we can design something that can help solve this problem and also a great way to make presentations. After that meeting we rounded up the team and got started straight away. We hope this project becomes a reality and we thank you all for your support!

Hopefully this Indiegogo campaign will help give birth to a new company and product.

Don’t forget to support us further by sharing the campaign via social media!

Take a first look at Zex's UI:



Tech Specs:


Timeline:


Accessories:

1.Zex case

2.USA plug adapter

3. Car adapter

4. USB 3.0 cable

5. EU plug adapter

6. HDMI cable


Perks:


Frequently asked questions:

Q: Does Zex work with all devices?

A: Yes, Zex can connect with all devices that can use a USB, or HDMI cable. The list is long, starting from smart phones, tablets, laptops, media players.

Q: Can I watch movies, series, TV shows on Zex?

A: Zex does not provide content, but rather gives you a new and easy way of viewing it. What it does is make your screen way bigger and more fun to watch.

Q: Where is Zex shipped to?

A: Zex will be shipped for free inside the USA and Canada. For all other countries a shipping fee will be applied.

Q: What if I made a mistake while contributing to the campaign?

A: Just contact us via email and we will sort out the problem together with you. This applies to wrong details, addresses, or anything else that might come up.

Q: Does Zex need to be plugged in to a power outlet to work?

A: No, Zex has a built in battery that lets you use it anywhere, at any time.

Q: Can I use more than one device on Zex?

A: No, you can only use one device at a time on Zex.

Q: Is Zex shock proof?

A: Yes, Zex is built in such a way to make it shock proof, just in case it is dropped while using it.

Q:When will I receive the Zex device?

A: Indiegogo is not like Ebay, or Amazon where you purchase goods. We are a startup and your contributions will fund all of the steps like testing, app development, engeneering, manucaturing etc. The estimated shipping date is indicated in the timeline and perks section.

Q:How will I know the progress so far after the campaign ends?

A:Updates will be made on a monthly basis after the campaign ends

Q: What if I have changed my address before the perk was shipped?

A: No worries, you have the possibility to change the mailing address anytime, and we will ask everyone again via email before shipping anything out.

Throughout the campaign we will add the most frequently asked questions here!

story:
Omnicharge's power experts put consumers first from concept design all the way to the finished product. All of Omnicharge's products come equipped with intelligent charging management technology to bring portable power to the next level and beyond. It's products are designed to be more than just another power bank - Omnicharge provides an uncompromising power experience for today's digital nomadic lifestyle.

FREE YOURSELF FROM THE WALL WITH THESE ON-THE-GO POWER SOLUTIONS:

The Omni 20 USB-C brings you one step closer to a world where a single power bank can be used to charge laptops, tablets, gaming devices and more. Provides rapid safe power charging and data transfer without juggling multiple accessories.

To learn more about Omni 20 USB-C, click here!

The Omni 20 powers devices with an internal smart system, all at the same time without overpowering itself or the plugged in items. Equipped with fast-charging USB ports, a 100W AC outlet, and a high quality 20,400 mAh battery, the Omni 20 keeps you powered on the go. It also provides real-time power management capabilities so each of your devices will always reach the optimal charge.

To learn more about Omni 20, click here!

FAQ

When is my Omnicharge expected to ship?

Delivery time will vary from region to region. In North America and Europe we expect to have about a two week delivery time. In Asia we expect to have a 2-3 week delivery time.

Can I take my Omnicharge on an airplane?

Yes, it can be with you in your carry-on luggage. The capacity of the Omni 20 (72.3Wh) falls within the Federal Aviation Administration's (FAA) guidelines for air travel (100Wh). Please click this link for more detailed information: https://www.faa.gov/about/initiatives/hazmat_safety/more_info/?hazmat=7

RETURN/REFUND POLICY

For In Demand campaigns IndieGoGo can offer a refund within 10 days of backing the campaign. You can read more about IndieGoGo's refund policy HERE.

Beyond this, refunds will need to be processed through paypal. Reach out to us at support@omnicharge.co for more information.

WARRANTY

Omnicharge comes with a 1-year limited warranty and lifetime customer support. Click HERE to read our product warranty information.

story:
Innerexile is excited to unveil a new generation of magnetic power adaptor ThunderMag, a Thunderbolt3’s best companion. ThunderMag is the world’s fastest data transmission design, which operates at 40Gbps transmission speed and provides the most stable and secure data exchange environment.

ThunderMag introduces you a portable, safe, and high speed charging and data transmission design. The detachable magnetic adaptor is easily fitted to devices and the cable simply snaps on. 

ThunderMag makes plugging easy and gives you access to the emerging standard for charging and transferring data. It also gives seamless distraction when the power cable is pulled from its socket.
 

THUNDERMAG™
X
PRO DISPLAY XDR​
 

ThunderMag™ a Thunderbolt3 & 100W power MagSafe, a two-piece attachment that connects to USB-C/Thunderbolt 3 port on your Macs.

A magnetic shaping patent allows ThunderMag to provide transmission speeds up to 40Gbps, an efficient power supply of 100W and carry its own magnetic absorption function. With a Retina 6K display, Pro Display XDR gives you nearly 40 percent more screen real estate than a 5K display. Faster Retina 6K video & audio data transmission are expected, which is also our goal, to ensure the high frequency signal provides the most stable and secure data exchange environment.


Coming This Fall




Innerexile® is committed to providing products that make our life easier. ThunderMag™ is constantly optimized to provide more a portable, safe, and convenient design for all type-C or Thunderbolt 3 users.


 

 

 

 

 2017 January USB3.1 Gen2 10Gbps 

 

  2019 February Thunderbolt 3 40Gbps 

 

 

  • Strong magnetic adsorption 
  • Supports 100W fast power charge 
  • 4K/5K video & audio transmission  
  • Up to 40G/bps data transfer
  • Reversible 24 pin plug design
  • Dust resistant and yank-safe 
  • Short circuit and over-current protection
  • Suitable for USB-C MacBook Pro and other Type C devices 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

The detachable magnetic adaptor is easily fitted to devices and the cable simply snaps on. Portable, compact and high speed design, make it an ideal product for all users. Its metallic finish fits perfectly with the Apple aesthetics.

 

 

 Protect your devices sockets from wear-and-tear of daily use. Eliminate excessive scratches of USB socket and short circuit. Designed for adaptability, ThunderMag has the perfect balance of shape and magnetic power, remaining attached for various uses.

 

 

 ThunderMag increases maximum power delivery up to 100W, safety is the top consideration. Each pin of the ThunderMag is tested by an electric heating test, which leaves no danger to charging devices. It also provides stable and safe power charging without device being over-heated.

 

 

 Strong magnet, blind suction connection, and automatic alignment, making charging more stable and convenient. The ThunderMag can be attached with one hand, easily charging your devices. The cord gently disconnects when disturbed, in accordance with the MagSafe design. Protect your charging port from dust or wear.

 

ThunderMag is compatible with all devices that have a USB-C connector, from smartphones through USB-C Hubs & Docks to the latest MacBooks Pro and MacBook. 

 

 

Strong magnetic adsorption, a low-profile connector with a reversible 24 pin design simplifies the connection. 

Supports 100W fast power charge. 

High speed 4K/5K video & audio data transmission of up to 40 Gb/s.  

Blu-ray Disc write speed

 

 

 

 

Solo, all-in-one hub, is designed for Type-C device to be easily connected to MacBook and 2016 Mac book Pro  

It comes with both micro SD and SD card slots; no need to exchange cards when retrieving data from card reader/camera. In addition, USB 3.1Gen 1 technology significantly reduces queue time. Solo hub is well-designed to fit in your daily usage with great mobility.


 

Interface:      USB C (male USB 3.0 compliant)

  • Ports/Slots:
  • USB A X 3 (female)
  • USB C X 1（female）
  • HDMI port X 1 (ver 1.4, supports up to 4K)
  • Ethernet port X 1 (10BASE-T, 100BASE-TX, 1000BASE-T)
  • SD card slot X 1
  • micro SD card slot X 1

Compatibility

  • MacBook 12-inch
  • MacBook Pro 13-inch (Late 2016)
  • MacBook Pro 15-inch (Late 2016)

OS Compatibility

  • OS X El Capitan
  • macOS Sierra

*Apple SuperDrive is not supported.

 

The Team

We hold ourselves accountable for making ThunderMag meet the highest standards of production. Our suppliers and design collaborators bring their professional experience working with Apple to ensure ThunderMag achieves the best quality and meets the highest safety standards. Make a pledge to help us make ThunderMag a reality. 

Thanks for your support!

 

About innerexile

innerexile Industry Consumer Electronics Accessories Founders Liming Hu, Area served International Products Screen protectors, Mobile phone accessories Website innerexile. com innerexile is a company that manufactures accessories.The company uses technology and techniques to design phone accessories that protect mobile devices from cracks and scratches.

Before the designed mobile accessories are sold to the public, the company offers a mock up to establish the suitability of the product to potential customers.

Before 2013, innerexile self-healing protective cases were made using the in-mold decoration, IMD process.The application of this technology was costly since it necessitated the use of a membrane that was attached to a film. The film was placed on the phone’s screen to protect the screen. Therefore, buying protective cases was expensive at that time.

In 2013, a new panel coating technology, geared to offer both screen and back panel protection, was discovered. The technology enabled protective cases to withstand a scratching force of up to 750 grams. Besides, the protective cases would only take three minutes to self-heal from the scratching force.In 2014, spray coating technology was discovered and later improved through research to form a transparent coat that prevented scratches. This technology brought the invention of the instant self-repair case.

The instant self-repair technology has led to the production of protective cases that has an improved aesthetic value. The quick self-repair of the protective case allows the surface of the phone to remain intact even after a relatively high scratch force. innerexile has won design awards, leading to a market footprint in more than thirty countries worldwide. Awards include Good Design award from 2012 to 2014,Golden Pin Design award, Taiwan Excellence award in 2014 and Computex d&I award in 2014 for their products.

story:
What is Galaxy hub?

Galaxy hub is a smart Presentation device that supports smart apps!

Show Presentations slides, Play Games, Apps, Movies, Music, and also Photos on any Screen or a Projector!

 

___________________________________________________________________________

Press Coverage:

Techli: Galaxy Hub Brings Android Apps To The Big Screen

 

More press coverage coming soon...

___________________________________________________________________________

 

What can Galaxy hub be used for?

Professional Work:

Present your PowerPoint Slides on any Projector by directly connecting Galaxy hub to an HDMI input. No need to take your laptop with you anymore! Plus, you get to have the coolest presentation remote in your hand!
Do video conferencing, edit documents, read PDFs, review PowerPoints, and even send and receive emails. Oh! and don't forget the cloud apps that you can use to transfer data everywhere on the go.

 

 

Video Calls:

You can easily connect a webcam to Galaxy hub, and do a video call on a Big TV screen with your family and friends on the other side of the world!
There are many apps available for this purpose including Skype, and oovoo. Galaxy hub brings people together to their families and friends.

 

 

Files On Cloud, Music and Photos:

With Galaxy hub you can store your files on cloud and access them anywhere else when you need them in the office or at home.

Play music tracks and videos not only from the internal storage or your SD card, but also from the cloud.

 

News:

Get the latest News using CNN and BBC apps. The story you want, when you want it, right on your big screen TV.
That’s not the end of it! You can also use Flipboard, an thousands of other awesome news apps that are made for Big Screens!

 

 

Streaming Video:

Imagine being able to watch YouTube on your TV rather than on a small computer screen. Or even other video subscriptions such as Netflix, Hulu or Amazon Video Services.

You can now do that right on your home theater system instead of your tablet or smartphone. And it’s all displayed in HD with up to 1080p resolution.

 

Gaming and Apps:

Who wants to wait for Angry Birds and other Awesome apps to come to Xbox or PlayStation?
You can play all those amazing Apps, right on your TV, Right Now!
Deep down, you know the best gaming memories happened with your friends in the living room!
Then why not play these apps together with friends on a big screen.
Galaxy hub is very portable!

You can easily take it with you when going to your friends place and set up tournaments to play different games

 

Google Earth:

Talking about fun stuff!!! Search the whole world on a 50-inch Plasma TV and enjoy the satellite pictures.

 

Web Browsing:

And of course you can do Web Browsing too. All the major web-browsers are supported on the device such as Chrome and FireFox.

 

Thousands more apps:

The Google Play store has more than 600,000 apps and most of them are already supported by Galaxy hub.
You can easily let us know in the comments section of Indiegogo campaign what apps you want specifically, and we will try our best to make sure they are available by the time you receive your Galaxy hub.

 ___________________________________________________________________________

 

Design

User interface

Symplicity is an important factor in the User interface of Galaxy hub.

We worked with an amazing group of designers to create the best User Interface for media consumption.

We made it easy for people to understand the system. Even kids can use it.

 

Industrial Design

Galaxy hub has an incredible hardware design.
It is built for productivity and portability with a vision of symplicity in mind.
It has a sleek design with everything needed to navigate and use galaxy hub both for entertainment and professional uses.

 

Smart Controller

The Galaxy Controller works flawlessly when you point the device toward your TV. It recognizes hand-movements and works similar to a Wii controller.

_________________________________________________________________________

Hand-Motion Technology

 

 

Developers, Developers, Developers...! 

Excellent Bridge to connect Developers to TVs

Galaxy hub provides an excellent bridge for developers to create apps for TVs, closing the gap between Televisions and SmartPhones. 

Currently it is impossible for developers to create apps for TVs and be financially efficient at the same time.
But with Galaxy hub, developers can easily send their Android apps that are already available on Google play to TVs.

 

Unlimited Apps!

 

Specifications:

  • Tegra3 quad-core Processor
  • 4GB/8GB/16GB of internal flash storage (depending on your pledge)
  • 1GB RAM
  • HDMI output to a TV or Projector
  • WiFi 802.11 b/g/n
  • Bluetooth LE 4.0
  • USB 2.0
  • Wireless Galaxy Controller

 

______________________________________________________________________

Key Features

- Professilnal: Portabale for Professional use in the office or school.

- Elegant: A unique and amazing Industrial Design

- Simple: Makes everything not only Smart, but also Simple!

- Smart Controller: Recognizes hand movements! Works like a Wii Controller

- Unlimited Apps Support: Supports Smartphone Apps! Endless possibilities!

 -Quality Design: Solid Design that feels extremely good in hand

- Easy To Use: Just connect it to any projector or screen with an HDMI input

- Compatible: Can be connected to many USB devices to increase functionalities

_____________________________________________________________________

What we’ve done and What you get:

We’ve been working on Galaxy hub for a long time and we’ve come a long way since then. As you see the user interface and the industrial designs look amazing!

Our prototype is functional and all we need is the initial interest of you amazing backers to enable us to order our first batch of the product.

We think that the future of technology will be a lot more portable than it is today, and by Galaxy hub, we will get one step closer to the future!

Imagine the day that you can plug in your galaxy hub into a Smart Desk at School or Office and a new world of features and apps becomes available right away!

Or the day that you can connect galaxy hub to your vehicle, and it turns it into a multimedia center for all your Music, Movies and Photos, stored both on the device and the cloud!

 ______________________________________________________________________

Use of the Funds:

  • A portion of the funds will be used for the improvements on the prototypes, developement costs and implementation of new features
  • The rest will be used in the manufacturing process to bring you a world class quality product.

 

All we need is you:

With your help, we need to:

  • Get the word out there about Galaxy hub to make this happen.
  • Convert the latest prototypes to production-ready models and get all the regulatory approvals.
  • Place our first batch of orders to make this available to all of you by Mid-summer.
  • Create even more innovative features and integrate them into the device.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that some people may not be able to back us up with money

But You can still Help us by Simply:

  • Talking about us on Facebook and Twitter
  • Sharing our campaign page
  • and Making some Noise :)

 

____________________________________________________________________________

FAQ

Do I need a smartphone to use Galaxy hub?

No, all you need is Galaxy hub and it's controller to use the device. It simply connects to the HDMI input of your display (TVs, Projectors, Monitors, etc.) and you are set!

Can I make actual video calls with Galaxy hub?

Yes, simply connect a webcam to Galaxy hub, place it on the TV, and start calling from Skype or other Apps available on Google play.

How does the Galaxy hub connect to the internet?

Galaxy hub connects to the Wifi just like your iPad, or laptops.

Why should I use Galaxy hub for presentations?

Because using a laptop with all those wires and remote problems is too much hassle!
Galaxy hub simply connects to the projector, and Boom!

Can I use the device as a flash storage?

Yes, device comes with an internal storage, and also accepts MicroSD cards up to 32GB. So feel free to use it as a flash storage as well.

How much extra capacity can I add?

You can add up to 32GB of MicroSD

Can iPhone users use Galaxy hub too?

Yes, the User Interface of Galaxy hub is exceptionally simple. We designed it simple so everyone loves it. iPhone lovers, will also love it!

How many apps are supported on the device?

There are 600,000 apps on the Google play market, and Galaxy hub supports almost all of them!

Can I connect a Playstation or Xbox controller to Galaxy hub for gaming?

Almost yes! We are working on this one, we will keep you updated about the process!

Can I connect Galaxy hub to any computer to transfer files?

Yes, simply use the USB cable that comes with the device, and connect it to any computer.

What accessories can I connect to the Galaxy hub's USB port?

You can connect mouse, keyboards, trackpads, webcams, and even external hard-drives. In fact most USB devices that you can connect to a regular computer are supported.

Can I connect more than one accessory to Galaxy hub?

Using a USB hub you can connect multiple USB devices to Galaxy hub at the same time.

What is the resolution of the Galaxy hub?

You can choose between 720p, 1080i and 1080p

____________________________________________________________________________

 

Perks Detailed:

 

________________________________________________________________________

 

Help us get this technology out to the hands of consumers!

Show the world that you are out there!!

 

 

Galaxy hub
            is the beginning

 

To create this amazing future we need you to support Galaxy hub, Starting from Today!

_______________________________________________________________

 

Questions, Comments, Concerns?

Email us at galaxyhub2012@gmail.com

We'd love to hear from you!
story_txt:
What is Galaxy hub?
Galaxy hub is a smart Presentation device that supports smart apps!





Show Presentations slides, Play Games, Apps, Movies, Music, and also Photos on any Screen or a Projector!
 

___________________________________________________________________________
Press Coverage:
Techli: Galaxy Hub Brings Android Apps To The Big Screen
 
More press coverage coming soon...
___________________________________________________________________________
 
What can Galaxy hub be used for?
Professional Work:
Present your PowerPoint Slides on any Projector by directly connecting Galaxy hub to an HDMI input. No need to take your laptop with you anymore! Plus, you get to have the coolest presentation remote in your hand!Do video conferencing, edit documents, read PDFs, review PowerPoints, and even send and receive emails. Oh! and don't forget the cloud apps that you can use to transfer data everywhere on the go.
 
 
Video Calls:
You can easily connect a webcam to Galaxy hub, and do a video call on a Big TV screen with your family and friends on the other side of the world!There are many apps available for this purpose including Skype, and oovoo. Galaxy hub brings people together to their families and friends.
 
 
Files On Cloud, Music and Photos:
With Galaxy hub you can store your files on cloud and access them anywhere else when you need them in the office or at home. 
Play music tracks and videos not only from the internal storage or your SD card, but also from the cloud.
 
News:
Get the latest News using CNN and BBC apps. The story you want, when you want it, right on your big screen TV.That’s not the end of it! You can also use Flipboard, an thousands of other awesome news apps that are made for Big Screens!
 
 
Streaming Video:
Imagine being able to watch YouTube on your TV rather than on a small computer screen. Or even other video subscriptions such as Netflix, Hulu or Amazon Video Services.
You can now do that right on your home theater system instead of your tablet or smartphone. And it’s all displayed in HD with up to 1080p resolution.

 
Gaming and Apps:
Who wants to wait for Angry Birds and other Awesome apps to come to Xbox or PlayStation?You can play all those amazing Apps, right on your TV, Right Now!Deep down, you know the best gaming memories happened with your friends in the living room!Then why not play these apps together with friends on a big screen.Galaxy hub is very portable!
You can easily take it with you when going to your friends place and set up tournaments to play different games

 
Google Earth:
Talking about fun stuff!!! Search the whole world on a 50-inch Plasma TV and enjoy the satellite pictures.

 
Web Browsing:
And of course you can do Web Browsing too. All the major web-browsers are supported on the device such as Chrome and FireFox.
 
Thousands more apps:
The Google Play store has more than 600,000 apps and most of them are already supported by Galaxy hub.You can easily let us know in the comments section of Indiegogo campaign what apps you want specifically, and we will try our best to make sure they are available by the time you receive your Galaxy hub.
 ___________________________________________________________________________
 
Design
User interface
Symplicity is an important factor in the User interface of Galaxy hub.
We worked with an amazing group of designers to create the best User Interface for media consumption.
We made it easy for people to understand the system. Even kids can use it.

 
Industrial Design
Galaxy hub has an incredible hardware design.It is built for productivity and portability with a vision of symplicity in mind.It has a sleek design with everything needed to navigate and use galaxy hub both for entertainment and professional uses.

 
Smart Controller
The Galaxy Controller works flawlessly when you point the device toward your TV. It recognizes hand-movements and works similar to a Wii controller.

_________________________________________________________________________
Hand-Motion Technology

 
 
Developers, Developers, Developers...! 
Excellent Bridge to connect Developers to TVs
Galaxy hub provides an excellent bridge for developers to create apps for TVs, closing the gap between Televisions and SmartPhones. 
Currently it is impossible for developers to create apps for TVs and be financially efficient at the same time. But with Galaxy hub, developers can easily send their Android apps that are already available on Google play to TVs.
 
Unlimited Apps!

 
Specifications:

Tegra3 quad-core Processor
4GB/8GB/16GB of internal flash storage (depending on your pledge)
1GB RAM
HDMI output to a TV or Projector
WiFi 802.11 b/g/n
Bluetooth LE 4.0
USB 2.0
Wireless Galaxy Controller



 
______________________________________________________________________
Key Features
- Professilnal: Portabale for Professional use in the office or school.
- Elegant: A unique and amazing Industrial Design
- Simple: Makes everything not only Smart, but also Simple!
- Smart Controller: Recognizes hand movements! Works like a Wii Controller
- Unlimited Apps Support: Supports Smartphone Apps! Endless possibilities!
 -Quality Design: Solid Design that feels extremely good in hand
- Easy To Use: Just connect it to any projector or screen with an HDMI input
- Compatible: Can be connected to many USB devices to increase functionalities
_____________________________________________________________________

With your help, we need to:

Convert the latest prototypes to production-ready models and get all the regulatory approvals.

Place our first batch of orders to make this available to all of you by Mid-summer.
Create even more innovative features and integrate them into the device.

 
Other Ways You Can Help
We know that some people may not be able to back us up with money
But You can still Help us by Simply:

Talking about us on Facebook and Twitter
Sharing our campaign page
and Making some Noise :)

story:
Purpl is a new mobile chat solution aimed at liberating its users from a traditionally straightforward chat environment, injecting the fun back into instant messaging.

Our app delivers the ability to express yourself in ways like never before. Let your personality shine through so much more than just text.



Let's face it. Body language makes up 55% of any conversation... words only make up 7%. More often than not, words alone will fail to convey the meaning behind your messages.

Existing chat clients only offer users the basics as far as composing messages. When it comes to placing emphasis, your only options are to add capitalization and quotation marks. That's it. Want to be sarcastic? Better save it for face-to-face.



Facebook and Line offer users a limited array of stickers and emoticons when chatting. However, there's not always a sticker to fit the occasion. As a result, the chat environment can be pretty constricting on the user.



At last, a new way to chat. Purpl breathes new life into the traditional chatting environment; time to let people know how you really feel. Bring a whole new variety of text modifiers into your conversation. Things like bold, italics, and underline, as well as a wide palette of colors and even fonts.

You have a personality, and so should your words. Make your conversations uniquely your own.





Your sticker collection just got a whole lot bigger.

Purpl extends far beyond simply modifying the style of your text. For the first time ever, not only can you draw your own stickers to share with friends (or "knacks," as we've affectionately named them), but you can also upload them for the world to see.




We've got the concept. We've got the design. What we need now is development. With your help, we can take Purpl from inception to fruition, and forever change the landscape for mobile chat.

Thanks for giving us a shot, we really do appreciate it.

story:
My name is Jason Sylvestre and my co-engineer is Ben Lenginton. We are two 17 year old engineers with a project that has the potential to save many lives and would be a very beneficial tool to rescue teams such as firefighters, law enforcement, etc.

What's your project about?

The main focus of this project is to create a remotely operated robot that can navigate a dangerous situation such as a natural disaster or a fire, locate that person in need of rescue, provide them with nourishment & fluids, and then extract them from that situation without any direct human aid.  This is what differentiates this robot from other robots currently on the market.  Those robots can simply locate, but you still have to put a rescuer at risk in order to extract that person from the dangerous situation.  The elegant solution is to create a robot that can locate and extract, which is what we have designed here.


Credentials? How Can I trust you?

I built the first iteration of this project last year without funding or additional help and entered it into my local science and engineering fair. I ended up advancing to state and then eventually to the International competition called I-SWEEEP where I received a silver medal out 600 students from 68 different countries.
If you are interested more about the first iteration, check out the powerpoint I made for my presentation. https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1r91IPA8cocDVKYym-q3FG1u2_KiMBMK7AcrccRV5G8U/edit?usp=sharing


I did not just want to stop there because I felt there was much more potential with this project so we began designing VoltX 2.0.  We are very excited about this new model. The whole design has been revised with many additions, but is based off iteration 1. We have created a complete model of the frame in Solidworks and schematics & PCB layout in Express. I learned my lesson with the first iteration that it's better to have everything planned out initially than having to run into it later. Everything is laid out in CAD so there are no surprises.

So what's so special about this design?

Victim Extraction System (VES) can extract people with shoulder widths ranging from 10-18 inches

Proprietary track and suspension system offer great mobility over the toughest of terrains

Live HD video and audio feed anywhere with celluar coverage

360 degrees of vision

Capable of pulling a payload of approximately 200 lbs

Rugged steel frame (welded)

20 watts of illumination

Controlled by Xbox 360 controller

Fully waterproof design

Temperature sensing


A U.S defense contractor called Alliant Tech Systems (ATK) saw the potential in this project and offered support. All of the designs have been verified by professional engineers and they have offered to partially fund the robot itself.


Why do you need my help then?

So why we need your help is for the purchase of precision machinery and the rest of the robot. We would like VoltX 2.0 to be 'implement ready' meaning once it's completed, it could be utilized in live rescue situations. Three pieces of equipment are essential to this project: a drill press, horizontal metal cutting band saw, and a set of cobalt drill bits.  We also need to pay for  the welding fees.

http://www.sears.com/craftsman-15inch-drill-press/p-00934984000P?prdNo=1&blockNo=1&blockType=G1

http://www.northerntool.com/shop/tools/product_200365120_200365120?cm_mmc=Google-pla-_-Metal%20Fabrication-_-Band%20Saws%20%2B%20Accessories-_-155790&ci_src=17588969&ci_sku=155790&gclid=COCCk-f31bgCFRSVMgod7SMAvA

http://www.sears.com/craftsman-professional-21-pc-cobalt-drill-bit-set/p-00964085000P?prdNo=6

This project has the potential to save many lives whether its the rescuers' or the person in the danger. Any contributions are greatly appreciated.

story:
CordArmor


What is it that I am supporting again?

CordArmor is a Patent Pending accessory primarily designed to improve durability of the Apple Lightning charging cable and improve its low-light usability. Replacing these cables can be quite costly, at $30 a piece they can really add up. CordArmor's built in LED puts an end to those nightly struggles with your iDevice's tiny charge port. If you own an iPhone, iPad, or iPod that uses the lightning cable, then CordArmor is a must have. For a fraction of the cost to replace the cable you can eliminate the need to eventually purchase a replacement.

How does it function?

CordArmor is made of an ultra-durable Polypropylene plastic and a unibody design to provide a long lasting and easy to use product. The greater surface area and traction embossment are intended to allow you to remove your charger from its port with ease! So STOP pulling on the cord and damaging your lifeline to the most important accessory that you own.

If you have suffered the inevitable "iPhone cable fray," then you are already aware of its Achilles heel. But in case you forgot, here is a picture to remind you...

I can't speak for the entire world, but i'd be willing to bet that most people struggle to grip the factory plug and as a result remove the charger by tugging on the cable. 

Cord Armor was designed for the Lightning Cable to fit snug into a cavity and is supported by two interference teeth to secure the cable. The housing then closes over the top to create a semi-permanent attachment to the cable. After extensive testing, CordArmor was shown to evenly distribute the force away from the weak points of the cable. 

Cord Armor also features a built in LED light that is captivated by a momentary pressure switch to simplify low-light to no-light use. The ultra small and bright LED is powered by a 3V coin cell battery which provides about 2 years of usage considering that you are going to use it every night.

How was CordArmor designed?

CordArmor comes from humble beginnings. From an issue to a simple solution then to an amateur sketch. 


I sent the above image to a childhood friend of mine named Josh. Josh is a Mechanical Engineer who graduated from the University of Central Florida. We would then spend every day of the next six months developing what we now call CordArmor. 

As the actual design process began, CordArmor began to evolve...



CordArmor Official Design...



CordArmor Official Design Color Options...

CordARMOR's PCB prototype...



CordArmor has been tested to work with numbers different cases. Even the bulkiest of cases such as the LifeProof and Otterbox Cases pass with flying colors! Keep in mind that CordArmor is designed for Apple's OEM Lightning Cable which is the very best! CordArmor will also work with any aftermarket cables that meet Apples exact specs.

Where is CordArmor in terms of progress?

CordArmor is ready to rock! CordArmor has passed all necessary tests. Aside from a few aesthetic tweaks, the manufacturer is on standby and awaiting approval to begin production. 

Your support will allow us to begin the mold tooling, approve consumer-ready product samples, begin mass production, and deliver CordARMOR to you! Follow along with the progress as we approach our funding goal! The support hearts will begin to fill as we approach each Manufacturing check point! 

1. Early December: Begin Mold Tooling

2. 2 Weeks Later: Receive consumer ready samples for aesthetic and functional approval.

3. Mid December: Initiate Mass Production.

4. Early January: Test and Deliver each unit to you!

With every pledge CordARMOR will be able to complete each necessary step to ensure delivery on January of 2014.


Who are you supporting?

I am a 27 year old college student who is looking to make a positive impact on this world. Ever since I can remember I have been conjuring up wild inventions to simplify life.  I have always hoped that I could become an inventor but never had the resources to make it possible. CordArmor comes from humble beginnings. CordArmor began as a solution for my own personal use to eliminate what I would later learn to be a widespread problem. My buddy Josh Dixon and I have put months and months into ensuring that you get the best product possible. Josh and I have spent day in and day out hard at work to ensure that we address the Lightning Cables fatal flaw. We are extremely proud that we were able to develop such a small and streamlined accessory that can provide the protective functionality as well as simplify the low-light usage. 

Why support my project?

I can think of quite a few reasons to support CordArmor.  One reason would be that you feel that my product can simplify your life. This means that you, like me, are tired of dealing with broken iPhone charging cables and the expenses ($30) of replacing them. You may also be starting to feel guilty for waking your significant other up on a nightly basis while you battle to plug your phone in each night. Don't wait to ruin yet another cable or resort to the cheap knock-off's. Grab your CordArmor today and rest assure that your cable is safe.

Even if you do not have an iDevice that uses the Lightning Cable, be sure to support the project to help fund the development of CordArmor for all other makes/models of phones. You can show your support by donating or purchasing this awesome T...

Check my gallery to check out the Shirt.

A special Thank You:

I would like to give a special thank you to you for taking the time to learn about my product and support it. I would also like to give a huge Thank You to Josh Dixon, Dane Johnson, Todd Simpson, Rob Grohman, Cedrick Dawson, Wayne Anderson, Steven Bularca, Breddy Uzcategui, Denys Snodgrass, Shellie Laws, Roy Rauschenberg, Scott Comcowich, my amazing family and my beautiful better half, and the rest of my friends and family that have supported me along this journey. 

Have questions about CordArmor? Feel free to ask in the comments section at the top of the page or visit our page HERE at CrowdFundingForum.com!

Also, like and follow CordArmor:

Facebook

Twitter

Instagram
