Josh is a Mechanical Engineer who graduated from the University of Central Florida. We would then spend every day of the next six months developing what we now call CordArmor. As the actual design process began, CordArmor began to evolve...CordArmor Official Design...CordArmor Official Design Color Options...CordARMOR's PCB prototype...CordArmor has been tested to work with numbers different cases. Even the bulkiest of cases such as the LifeProof and Otterbox Cases pass with flying colors! Keep in mind that CordArmor is designed for Apple's OEM Lightning Cable which is the very best! CordArmor will also work with any aftermarket cables that meet Apples exact specs.Where is CordArmor in terms of progress?CordArmor is ready to rock! CordArmor has passed all necessary tests. Aside from a few aesthetic tweaks, the manufacturer is on standby and awaiting approval to begin production. Your support will allow us to begin the mold tooling, approve consumer-ready product samples, begin mass production, and deliver CordARMOR to you! Follow along with the progress as we approach our funding goal! The support hearts will begin to fill as we approach each Manufacturing check point! 1. Early December: Begin Mold Tooling2. 2 Weeks Later: Receive consumer ready samples for aesthetic and functional approval.3. Mid December: Initiate Mass Production.4. Early January: Test and Deliver each unit to you!With every pledge CordARMOR will be able to complete each necessary step to ensure delivery on January of 2014.Who are you supporting?I am a 27 year old college student who is looking to make a positive impact on this world. Ever since I can remember I have been conjuring up wild inventions to simplify life.  I have always hoped that I could become an inventor but never had the resources to make it possible. CordArmor comes from humble beginnings. CordArmor began as a solution for my own personal use to eliminate what I would later learn to be a widespread problem. My buddy Josh Dixon and I have put months and months into ensuring that you get the best product possible. Josh and I have spent day in and day out hard at work to ensure that we address the Lightning Cables fatal flaw. We are extremely proud that we were able to develop such a small and streamlined accessory that can provide the protective functionality as well as simplify the low-light usage. Why support my project?I can think of quite a few reasons to support CordArmor.  One reason would be that you feel that my product can simplify your life. This means that you, like me, are tired of dealing with broken iPhone charging cables and the expenses ($30) of replacing them. You may also be starting to feel guilty for waking your significant other up on a nightly basis while you battle to plug your phone in each night. Don't wait to ruin yet another cable or resort to the cheap knock-off's. Grab your CordArmor today and rest assure that your cable is safe.Even if you do not have an iDevice that uses the Lightning Cable, be sure to support the project to help fund the development of CordArmor for all other makes/models of phones. You can show your support by donating or purchasing this awesome T...Check my gallery to check out the Shirt.A special Thank You:I would like to give a special thank you to you for taking the time to learn about my product and support it. I would also like to give a huge Thank You to Josh Dixon, Dane Johnson, Todd Simpson, Rob Grohman, Cedrick Dawson, Wayne Anderson, Steven Bularca, Breddy Uzcategui, Denys Snodgrass, Shellie Laws, Roy Rauschenberg, Scott Comcowich, my amazing family and my beautiful better half, and the rest of my friends and family that have supported me along this journey. Have questions about CordArmor? Feel free to ask in the comments section at the top of the page or visit our page HERE at CrowdFundingForum.com!Also, like and follow CordArmor:FacebookTwitterInstagram

story:
TL;DR Broadband internet and data plans are expensive and being stuck to a cable isn't the point of mobile devices like tablets and laptops. Running around looking for a free WiFi hotspot isn't our idea of freedom. Big telecom companies ignore people too far out. We want to give you fast wireless internet anywhere you go in your city or town, even if your population is 100 people.

Read on if you feel the same!

 

It's time for internet to become truly mobile, unrestricted by cables, buildings, or speed caps. It's also time that fast internet came to rural and micropolitan Americans. Wisp Networks is laboring to bring this vision of the future to the present, to provide blazing fast 4G connection to you wherever you wish to travel.

Big Telecom is built on old infrastructure and keeps itself alive with complex contracts and pricing schemes. We want to bring you simplicity and mobility. One price, no contracts (unless you want one), and one speed: unlimited!

Wisp Networks is going to launch in Gainesville, Florida soon, so keep an eye out!

Our Story

Our founders were tired of paying high prices for unreliable internet access, horrible customer service, and having only one option for broadband internet access. The central problem we identified was that big old telecom companies were using big old technology to provide their services. In the mobile age, people on the go deserve constant connection for their laptops, smartphones, and tablets, and everything else! And it shouldn't be a luxury!

Bringing the Future to the Past

Many cities in Florida have been left in the past. Whether they are too far away or have too sparse a population, Big Telecom has left these municipalities in the dial-up age. If broadband internet is available, it's often through only a single provider. We believe that's called a monopoly, which we believe is bad for prices and customer service.

Wisp will bring 4G Wireless Broadband over WiMAX to Gainesville and the other municipalities throughout Florida, classified as either micropolitan or rural, and who have little choice. Our goal is to do what big telecom never could, give you fast easy internet no matter how far out there you are. Being connected to the world should be considered an affordable necessity, not a luxury.

Bringing the Future to the Present

People live mobile lives. We are constantly on the go and the economy requires Americans to work longer hours in more places. Businesspeople and students are commonly crammed into coffee shops or anywhere else with a WiFi hotspot. The future we want to build is one where you can be connected anywhere you go. From parks to local business, from home to campus, you should be able to work and play from anywhere you please. Our 4G wireless network can give you 4 times the speed of 3G from anywhere in the city. With one subscription you can enjoy high speed internet anywhere you roam. This is the technology that realizes the true benefits of mobile devices.

Our Dream

We want to open a world of possibilities to the underserved. From our central hub in Gainesville, we see ourselves providing opportunity throughout rural and micropolitan North Florida. Schools will be able to teach computer technologies, take advantage of the cloud, connect their students to limitless information. Townships and cities can finally have the infrastructure to attract larger business and help their local businesses attract sales from markets anywhere in the world. Our business model makes it possible to connect the communities that Big Telecom ignored to the rest of the world.

 

**Information below is more for investors, but if you're interested in how our business works feel free to read through this excerpt from our business plan. If you are interested in becoming an equity investor please email us directly at wispnetworks@gmail.com or leave a voicemail at (239) 464-5317**

___________________________

Business Synopsis:

Wisp Networks’ core business will be the provision of high speed broadband access to the internet. The Company will provide “last mile” connection via a multi-frequency wireless access network built on scalable 4G technology. The distribution network will be built over multi-gigabit fiber optic cable. Connections from the distribution network to the internet backbone will be controlled by a data center owned and operated by the Company. This hybrid wireless-fiber network will provide broadband speeds to both commercial and residential accounts.

Although Wisp Networks will be an internet service provider, the Company plans to compete in a variety of markets. The advantage of an entirely IP-based network is the ability to provide many services over a shared medium, such as digital video, voice communication and teleconferencing (VoIP), internet access, data-transfer, data hosting, email services, and application services. Wisp Networks plans to incrementally implement these value-added services, contingent upon proper demand and market research. Because the Company will is an ISP which competes in markets other than internet service provision (television, voice communications, etc.), Wisp Networks is considered a cross-boundary competitor in many markets.

Mission Statement

The mission of Wisp Networks is to provide truly unlimited network access with unparalleled reliability and customer service. The Company seeks to provide the infrastructure which enables techno-centric life to become truly mobile, truly unlimited, and truly satisfied.

Company Goals and Objectives

The goal of Wisp Networks is to provide high quality, low cost communication solutions to anyone who needs them. To meet this goal, several objectives must be met. Primarily, cost-effective equipment must be sourced to construct the required network at a cost that enables the Company to keep service subscriptions at a low cost to consumers compared to alternatives while maintaining sustainable margins. Secondarily, the Company will have to attract talent to assist in maintaining and managing the hybrid wireless-fiber network infrastructure which provides service to our clients.

Customer satisfaction is valued highly by Wisp Networks. Reliable infrastructure is not enough to fully satisfy a client and the Company will need to build a capable customer support team to achieve high levels of perceived brand quality and product satisfaction in the communities we operate in.

Business Philosophy

Our business philosophy is straightforward: Customers are happiest when the product meets their expectations. If a service is advertised as unlimited, it had better be unlimited. If a service is advertised at a particular price, it had better actually cost the client that price. As founders of Wisp Networks, we believe that following this philosophy will guide the decisions of the Company’s employees in the best direction: a value-focused direction.

Target Market

The Company targets markets in which there are currently few competitors, high prices, and high dissatisfaction. It is the Company’s belief that consumers are dissatisfied with traditional telecom service models, customer service practices, and general prices of most large ISPs. Exacerbating the problem is the scarcity of competition; many areas of the United States with populations less than 100 thousand either do not have access to broadband networks or have only a single service provider. Wisp targets markets whose consumers will benefit from competition, lower prices, more options, and faster service. The Company believes that broadband internet access should be affordable and available to everyone, and never limited.

The Internet Industry

Demand for internet access is increasing rapidly with current trends in business, consumer electronics, and consumer behaviors. Many firms are recognizing the drivers of demand for internet access and competition is expected to increase steadily in the near future.

Recent research predicts that mobile data traffic will increase to more than 10 exabytes by 2016[1]. Compound annual growth rates for mobile data are predicted to be 129% over the next five years in North America. As 4G mobile network technology, for most of the United States, is provided by a single ISP, if at all outside of major metropolitan areas.

As 4G WiMAX technology increases its installed base, suppliers are finding newer ways to reduce the cost of their broadcast technologies. Wisp Networks intends to take advantage of the decreasing equipment cost to provide 4G mobile networks to consumers in locations where competition is sparse and demand growth is rapid.

Wisp Networks is well poised to use its rapid deployment strategies, scalable equipment, hybridized network design, and integrated service model to sustain its early-mover advantage as more firms enter the market.

Core Competencies and Competitive Advantage

The Company’s competitive advantage stems from its core competencies: Rapid deployment, a modern hybrid wireless-fiber network infrastructure, and an integrated service model. The wireless nature of the Company’s “last-mile” infrastructure enables new service areas to be constructed within days rather than the weeks or months it would take a traditional wireline company to lay cable. Wisp Networks relies on a “last-mile” wireless network connected to a distribution network built on multi-gigabit fiber optic cable. This type of cable provides bleeding-edge speed and bandwidth, unparalleled by any other transmission medium. The fiber links are leased from local/regional utilities. Building our networks over this medium provides a significant advantage over the aging cable mediums of other big telecom firms. Leasing our fiber needs removes the cost burden of installation and maintenance which limit the response time of cable-based telecom firms. Lastly, our IP-based network can deliver internet access, web hosting, digital television, Voice-over-IP, and many other services over a shared medium. With low incremental cost, Wisp Networks can provide quality value-added services to secure further sources of revenue that other pure internet service providers cannot access.

In future growth, Wisp Networks hopes to use its hybrid network design to enter rural and micropolitan markets. The wireless medium can provide high-speed access to areas that may not have been reached by other technologies because they are too expensive or too far away to be profitable relative to the size of the client base.

Founder Background

Jordan Williams is a UF student and a self taught computer guru.  He will be graduating in December 2013 with a degree in Construction Management and a concentration in heavy civil construction.  Mr. Williams is experienced in advanced software applications and network administration infrastructure systems.  As the founder of Wisp he is responsible for the design and implementation of the company's wireless WAN.

Brian Foos is an experienced computer network architect and industry-certified IT professional with more than five years of combined experience. He will be graduating with honors from the University of Florida in December 2012, earning a B.S. in Business Administration with a concentration in Finance.

Business Structure

Wisp Networks is incorporated in the state of Florida and has elected “S” corporation status with the Internal Revenue Service. This legal form of ownership was selected to enable the Company to reduce its tax burden during the startup phase, enabling higher rates of funds re-investment while continuing to provide limited liability to its owners.


[1] Cisco (2012). Cisco Visual Networking Index: Global Mobile Data Traffic Forecast Update, 2011-2016. Access from http://www.cisco.com/en/US/solutions/collateral/ns341/ns525/ns537/ns705/ns827/white_paper_c11-520862.html.

story:
BarSential's Vision:

Bars have always offered special promotions to bring people through their doors.  The problem is how they notify their customers about these promotions.  Currently, bars rely on social media posts and word-of-mouth promotions.  This means that to find the best deal on a given night, people would have to search multiple venue pages on Facebook or try and talk with a busy bartender.  We simplify this process by placing all the nearby promotions on a single platform.

Enter, BarSential, a simple mobile app that allows consumers to purchase and redeem offers from their phone.

With BarSential, consumers gain access to discounts on popular nightlife items including drinks, bottle service, admission and food.  Merchants are able to signup on http://BarSential.com and, once approved, can immediately start publishing offers in real time to the BarSential smartphone application, engaging their target customer.  We focus on successful promotions that will increase revenue and clientele for these businesses. 


Consumer Benefits:

Get discounts on drinks at bars and clubs by paying with BarSential

-Purchase and redeem offers from your phone; no printing necessary

-Access exclusive discounts when and where you want them

-Save time by pre-paying or use immediately

 

Merchant Benefits:

Increase sales with BarSential

-Publish offers anytime

-Control quantity and availability of deals

-Reward existing customers and attract new ones

-Increase turnover and decrease downtime

-Collect valuable analytics in real time

 

Why We Need Funding? 

-Beta application testing

-Making final edits to the app and website

-Creation of marketing materials

-Legal start-up fees

 

*Remember that even if we hit our goal of $12,000 you can still donate up to the 35th day.  If you like this service, help us make it a reality.  Any contribution will help.

 

 Screenshots:

 

 

We’re working on something great that we know you will love.  By backing us, you will join BarSential as the disruptive force in the discount payment industry.

 

Click on the social media links below to find out more about BarSential:

story:
Was möchten wir tun - was ist eigentlich die Idee?

Wir möchten Dir eine SmartphoneApp für Ausstellungs- und Museumsbesuche anbieten, die die herkömmlichen (ausleihbaren) AudioGuides ablöst. Zusätzlich zu den Audioinformationen kannst du auch multimediale Inhalte, wie Bilder oder Videos, auf deinem eigenen Smartphone abspielen lassen.

Hast Du das vielleicht auch schon einmal erlebt - Welche Probleme wollen wir lösen?

Du besuchst mal wieder eine interessante Ausstellung oder besuchst ein Museum und:

  • musstest bereits lange an der Kasse anstehen. Dennoch musst Du dich an einer extra Schlange anstellen, um Dir einen AudioGuide auszuleihen;
  • es ist kein AudioGuide mehr erhältlich;
  • Dir ist die Frage "Wer hatte die Kopfhörer vor mir schon an?" auch schon in den Sinn gekommen;
  • der AudioGuide hat fast genauso viel wie der Eintritt gekostet, bot aber kaum zusätzliche Inhalte oder war langweilig und monoton;

Zusätzliche Museums- bzw. Ausstellungsinhalte müssen nicht mehr durch extra ausleihbare Geräte bereitgestellt werden. Stattdessen kannst Du als Besucher dein eigenes Smartphone verwenden.

Museen- und Ausstellungsbetreiber sind nicht mehr auf reine Audioinformationen beschränkt, wie es mit den bisher am Markt verfügbaren Geräten der Fall ist. Folglich können sie neben Audioinhalten weitere, interaktive Inhalte anbieten ohne sich neue bzw. zusätzliche Abspielgeräte anzuschaffen/auszuleihen.

Warum ausgerechnet solltest Du unseren MultimediaGuide verwenden - Welche Vorteile hast Du von der SmartphoneApp?

Als Besucher ...

  • wird Dir im Vergleich zu den herkömmlich verfügbaren AudioGuides der MultimediaGuide zu einem geringeren Preis mit mehr Inhalten (Bilder, Video, etc.) angeboten.
  • sind die Inhalte für dich bereits im Vorfeld downloadbar bzw. vor Ort on-demand verfügbar.
  • fällt ein zusätzliches und ggf. auch langes Anstehen weg.


Als Aussteller/Betreiber ...

  • hast Du keinen Mehraufwand (wie bspw. Personal oder Material) für die Ausgabe. 
  • wirst Du an den Einnahmen aus dem Verkauf deines MultimediaGuides beteiligt.
  • kannst Du durch den Einsatz des MultimediaGuides ein moderneres Image erlangen und demzufolge wiederum ein breiteres Publikum ansprechen.

Welches Anliegen ist uns wichtig - Wofür engagieren wir uns mit unserer Idee?

Wir möchten Ausstellungs- und Museumsbesuche interaktiver, erlebbarer und somit attraktiver gestalten, um ein größeres Interesse - vor allem bei dem jüngeren Publikum - für Kunst, Kultur, Wissenschaft u.v.m. zu wecken.
Durch Nutzung moderner Technologien soll mehr Begeisterung geschaffen und das "angestaubte Image" von Ausstellungen und Museen aufgebessert werden.

Wie funktioniert es?

Die SmartphoneApp wird komplett kostenlos angeboten und stellt lediglich die Plattform für die Wiedergabe da. Die MultimediaGuides - sprich die eigentlichen Inhalte für deinen Ausstellungs- oder Museumsbesuch - hingegen sind von Dir, dem Besucher, käuflich zu erwerben.

Der MultimediaGuide ist auf zwei Arten erhältlich:

a) Du kaufst und lädst dir den jeweilige MultimediaGuide direkt aus unserer App auf dein Smartphone. Unmittelbar danach steht er dir zur Verfügung. Bezahlen kannst Du ganz bequem mit Kreditkarte, aufladbarem Guthabenkonto oder aber auch per Telefonabrechnung.

b) Mit dem Kauf der Eintrittskarte kannst Du gegen einen kleinen Aufpreis zusätzlich ein Gutscheincode erwerben, den Du dann wiederum in der SmartphoneApp einlöst. Nach dem einlösen des Gutscheincodes steht Dir auch hier der bezahlte MultimediaGuide zur Verfügung.

Wofür benötigen wir das Geld?

Wenn wir das Funding-Ziel erreichen, wollen wir das Geld für die Entwicklung eines Prototypen bzw. einer ersten Version des MultimedaiGiudes verwenden. 

Für den Fall, dass wir unser Ziel nicht erreichen, werden wir die gesamte finanzielle Unterstützung in die Bekanntmachung unseres MulitmediaGuides stecken.

Geld alleine ist nicht alles - Wie kannst Du uns sonst noch unterstützen?

Wir benötigen nicht ausschließlich finanazielle Unterstützung. Für uns ist es ebenso wichtig, dass unsere Idee bekannt wird. Wenn Du unsere Idee bzw. Indiegoog-Kampagne auch deinen Freunden, Bekannten oder gar Arbeitskollegen mitteilst, kannst Du uns ebenfalls unterstützen. Am einfachsten nutzt Du dazu Facebook, Twitter oder andere SocialMedia Plattformen. Es spricht natürlich auch nichts dagegen, dass Du es mündlich weiter verbreitest. 

Vielleicht kennst Du einen Aussteller oder bist gar einer, dann melde dich doch einfach bei uns und wir sprechen persönlich über die Idee und mögliche Inhalte.

Du hast erst neulich eine Ausstellung oder Museum besucht und hast Dir in diesem Moment unseren MultimediaGuide auf deinem Smartphone gewünscht?! Auch hier sind wir an deiner Meinung interessiert. Also zögere nicht und melde dich bei uns.

Wer steckt hinter dem MultimediaGuide - Wer sind wir?

Wir sind ein Kulturinteressierter und ein Computerbegeisterter, die zusammen saßen und erkannten, dass Kultur und moderne Technologien kein Widerspruch darstellen müssen.

Geboren wurde die Idee in der Warteschlange eines AudioGuide-Verleih's in Nürnberg. Ein gemeinsames Telefonat und 10 min später waren wir uns sicher, dass das eigene Smartphone die ausleihbaren AudioGuides ersetzen kann. 

 

Du findest unsere Idee genauso spannend und vielversprechend?! Du möchtest ein Teil der Idee werden?! Dann unterstütze uns! Wir sagen schon einmal DANKE.
story_txt:
Was möchten wir tun - was ist eigentlich die Idee?
Wir möchten Dir eine SmartphoneApp für Ausstellungs- und Museumsbesuche anbieten, die die herkömmlichen (ausleihbaren) AudioGuides ablöst. Zusätzlich zu den Audioinformationen kannst du auch multimediale Inhalte, wie Bilder oder Videos, auf deinem eigenen Smartphone abspielen lassen.
Hast Du das vielleicht auch schon einmal erlebt - Welche Probleme wollen wir lösen?
Du besuchst mal wieder eine interessante Ausstellung oder besuchst ein Museum und:

musstest bereits lange an der Kasse anstehen. Dennoch musst Du dich an einer extra Schlange anstellen, um Dir einen AudioGuide auszuleihen;
es ist kein AudioGuide mehr erhältlich;
Dir ist die Frage "Wer hatte die Kopfhörer vor mir schon an?" auch schon in den Sinn gekommen;
der AudioGuide hat fast genauso viel wie der Eintritt gekostet, bot aber kaum zusätzliche Inhalte oder war langweilig und monoton;
Zusätzliche Museums- bzw. Ausstellungsinhalte müssen nicht mehr durch extra ausleihbare Geräte bereitgestellt werden. Stattdessen kannst Du als Besucher dein eigenes Smartphone verwenden.
Museen- und Ausstellungsbetreiber sind nicht mehr auf reine Audioinformationen beschränkt, wie es mit den bisher am Markt verfügbaren Geräten der Fall ist. Folglich können sie neben Audioinhalten weitere, interaktive Inhalte anbieten ohne sich neue bzw. zusätzliche Abspielgeräte anzuschaffen/auszuleihen.
Warum ausgerechnet solltest Du unseren MultimediaGuide verwenden - Welche Vorteile hast Du von der SmartphoneApp?
Als Besucher ...

wird Dir im Vergleich zu den herkömmlich verfügbaren AudioGuides der MultimediaGuide zu einem geringeren Preis mit mehr Inhalten (Bilder, Video, etc.) angeboten.
sind die Inhalte für dich bereits im Vorfeld downloadbar bzw. vor Ort on-demand verfügbar.
fällt ein zusätzliches und ggf. auch langes Anstehen weg.
Als Aussteller/Betreiber ...

hast Du keinen Mehraufwand (wie bspw. Personal oder Material) für die Ausgabe. 
wirst Du an den Einnahmen aus dem Verkauf deines MultimediaGuides beteiligt.
kannst Du durch den Einsatz des MultimediaGuides ein moderneres Image erlangen und demzufolge wiederum ein breiteres Publikum ansprechen.
Welches Anliegen ist uns wichtig - Wofür engagieren wir uns mit unserer Idee?
Wir möchten Ausstellungs- und Museumsbesuche interaktiver, erlebbarer und somit attraktiver gestalten, um ein größeres Interesse - vor allem bei dem jüngeren Publikum - für Kunst, Kultur, Wissenschaft u.v.m. zu wecken.Durch Nutzung moderner Technologien soll mehr Begeisterung geschaffen und das "angestaubte Image" von Ausstellungen und Museen aufgebessert werden.
Wie funktioniert es?
Die SmartphoneApp wird komplett kostenlos angeboten und stellt lediglich die Plattform für die Wiedergabe da. Die MultimediaGuides - sprich die eigentlichen Inhalte für deinen Ausstellungs- oder Museumsbesuch - hingegen sind von Dir, dem Besucher, käuflich zu erwerben.
Der MultimediaGuide ist auf zwei Arten erhältlich:
a) Du kaufst und lädst dir den jeweilige MultimediaGuide direkt aus unserer App auf dein Smartphone. Unmittelbar danach steht er dir zur Verfügung. Bezahlen kannst Du ganz bequem mit Kreditkarte, aufladbarem Guthabenkonto oder aber auch per Telefonabrechnung.
b) Mit dem Kauf der Eintrittskarte kannst Du gegen einen kleinen Aufpreis zusätzlich ein Gutscheincode erwerben, den Du dann wiederum in der SmartphoneApp einlöst. Nach dem einlösen des Gutscheincodes steht Dir auch hier der bezahlte MultimediaGuide zur Verfügung.
Wofür benötigen wir das Geld?
Wenn wir das Funding-Ziel erreichen, wollen wir das Geld für die Entwicklung eines Prototypen bzw. einer ersten Version des MultimedaiGiudes verwenden. 
Für den Fall, dass wir unser Ziel nicht erreichen, werden wir die gesamte finanzielle Unterstützung in die Bekanntmachung unseres MulitmediaGuides stecken.
Geld alleine ist nicht alles - Wie kannst Du uns sonst noch unterstützen?
Wir benötigen nicht ausschließlich finanazielle Unterstützung. Für uns ist es ebenso wichtig, dass unsere Idee bekannt wird. Wenn Du unsere Idee bzw. Indiegoog-Kampagne auch deinen Freunden, Bekannten oder gar Arbeitskollegen mitteilst, kannst Du uns ebenfalls unterstützen. Am einfachsten nutzt Du dazu Facebook, Twitter oder andere SocialMedia Plattformen. Es spricht natürlich auch nichts dagegen, dass Du es mündlich weiter verbreitest. 
Vielleicht kennst Du einen Aussteller oder bist gar einer, dann melde dich doch einfach bei uns und wir sprechen persönlich über die Idee und mögliche Inhalte.
Du hast erst neulich eine Ausstellung oder Museum besucht und hast Dir in diesem Moment unseren MultimediaGuide auf deinem Smartphone gewünscht?! Auch hier sind wir an deiner Meinung interessiert. Also zögere nicht und melde dich bei uns.
Wer steckt hinter dem MultimediaGuide - Wer sind wir?
Wir sind ein Kulturinteressierter und ein Computerbegeisterter, die zusammen saßen und erkannten, dass Kultur und moderne Technologien kein Widerspruch darstellen müssen.

story:
The Cobra Flexible Dock from MOBO is a cable, dock, tripod, and stand combined into one convenient device. This dock is small enough to fit in your travel bag, but strong enough to hold your phone in multiple configurations and locations, including your office, nightstand, kitchen, and much more. The design of the Cobra features a nickel-plated steel wrapping that's designed to protect your cable and securely support your phone no matter how you position it.
The bendable cable is crafted out of gooseneck metal tubing and can be coiled and twisted to stay where you need it, when you need it.


COMPATIBILITY

Available for all iPhones using the Apple Lightning connector or Micro USB Devices.
Depending on your case, you may need to remove it before charging. If your speakers, Lightning port, and headphone jack are fully exposed with a single opening, you should be able to easily charge your phone without removing the case.



FEATURES

Our cable is 18 inches (45 cm) long.
Flexible gooseneck allows operation in practically any position.
Innovative gooseneck can bend to any shape you choose.
Easily access your GPS and music while driving.
Mounts and charges your device at the same time.
Confirms and swivels 360 degrees for optimal viewing angles.
Can be used as a stand or tripod when taking pictures or video conferencing.

COLORS

Available in White or Black.

MATERIAL

Plastic + Metal

story:
-  Meet AirLink -

The World's First Hi-Fi Sound Bluetooth Adapter with Remote Control

 

Meet AirLink, the world's first Hi-Fi sound Bluetooth adapter with remote control, that can evolve your wired earphones/headphones into wireless and promise you 24bit Hi-Fi sound in your favorite headphones. It adds new features to upgrade your wired headphones.

—  At a Glance  —

 

Double Your Happiness by Syncing and Sharing

The music experience is doubled when you share it. Sync two AirLinks together and enjoy the same music in 24bit with separate earphones.

 

Unlock More Selfie and Groupie Postures

Airlink is more than a Bluetooth adapter -  you can also use it as a camera remote. Unlock more Selfie and Group postures with it.

Keep Your Old Headphones Alive on New Smartphones

 

Wanna to keep your old wired headphone even if it requires a 3.5mm jack to use on the new smartphone? AirLink lifts you out from this dilemma by making your wired headphones into wireless. Clipped AirLink on your shirt,  and walk around without tangled cords.  

 

Get a Bluetooth-able Car and More Devices

Can't play your favorite Apple Music playlist in a non Bluetooth-able car? AirLink let you easily stream your favorite playlist with the car stereo, wake Siri or Alexa, and select any one from your contact to start a hands-free call. AirLink also adds Bluetooth connectivity to the home stereo, TV, and powered speakers, enabling you to stream music wirelessly with any audio device.

 

Enjoy Wired Headphone Tangle-free

Running? Hiking? Any other outdoor activities? As the very best companion for working out, AirLink provides the most convenient solution with its short cords. No more tangling with the jungle of cords.

 

Make Calls without Taking Out Your Phone

Control your phone remotely. Airlink features 2-button in-line remote that lets you shift a track, accept/end calls, and wake up a virtual assistant.

 

 

Yes, it's Hi-Fi + Bluetooth. 

 

Who says that "Hi-Fi + Bluetooth, no thanks." AirLink is here to challenge the status quo. Airlink takes sound seriously by making it vivid (professional and independent DSP supporting 14-band PEQ), natural (24bit high resolution), clear (with echo cancellation and noise reduction) and stable (BT 4.2, 2.5x faster transmission).

You will never sacrifice the audio quality for the convenience of being wireless ever again. The dual audio processor cores, MCU and DSP, support 14-band PEQ, making you experience the music like in a real world - the sound is coming at you from every direction. Better yet, AirLink promises no sound export delays with hundreds of times faster transmission. With the passion for peak performance, AirLink pushes boundaries in sound quality in Bluetooth adapter to make the high-resolution sound possible and affordable.

—   How It Works  —

 

 

—   Minimalist Design  —

 

 

—   Tech Specs  —

 

 

—   What's In the Box  —

 

 

—   Accessories  —

 

The premium earphone with short cords works in an unconventional pairing with AirLink. With an advanced exceptional noise cancellation, the high-definition sound process chip carves out every aural nuance in finest detail and delivers crystal clear sound. It not only leaves the notorious tangled and long wires in dust but also lets you enjoy the optimal music sound.   

#Update: Stretch Goal is UNLOCKED

We have reached the goal of $60,000! Thank you all for the enormous supports! As promised, a Carry Case will be shipped to every backer FOR FREE! With this well-designed carry case, you can protect your AirLink from dust, sweat, and rain properly.

#Update: Manufacturing in Process

We've done some small batch manufacturing already, and now we're working very hard on mass manufacturing to deliver AirLink to you just next month!

—   Share & Earn 10% Cash Back  —

How to Start:

1. Create a login for Indiegogo. If you contributed as a guest, you should have received an email from Indiegogo that gives you an option to create an account.

2. Share our campaign by clicking any of those options below:

3. Get 10% cash back towards your contribution when you successfully refer a friend. We’ll keep refunding you until you get your whole contribution back!

4. At the end of the campaign, we will calculate the total amount of successful referrals you have made and refund you via PayPal.

How to Track Your Referrals:

If you go to your own profile page and click on the “referrals” tab, you can see how many of your friends have contributed through your referral link.

If you have any questions about the referral program, please email us at  airlink@neorblab.com or on our Indiegogo page.

—   Share & Win a Free Gift  —

1. Share AirLink on your Facebook or Twitter.

2. Tag your friend

3. Receive a Cord Organizer with your pledge

After sharing, please complete your claim via the Google form below. We will properly credit your reward (limit 1 per backer).

—  In the Press  —

Feel free to download our media kit here.

—   About Neorb Lab  —

Neorb Lab consists of international engineers with decades of experiences in industrial design, manufacturing and supply chain industries. We dedicate ourselves to simplicity and making peoples' lives easier with simple yet cost-effective solutions.  AirLink Bluetooth Adapter is the first gadget representing the minimalism that we are pursuing.

 

—   Timeline  —

 

—   Risks & Challenges  —

We guarantee that we will deliver AirLink on time with the high quality once the funding meets the goal. Though we have tested our prototype and are confident in its performance, as with any hardware project, there are always schedule risks associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics based on the number of orders we receive.

Our team has successfully delivered similar products to market. We understand the unique challenges and are familiar with how to avoid and mitigate any issues that arise. We are committed to delivering AirLink on time with high quality. Should there be any uncontrollable factor contributing to delays, we will keep you, our awesome backers, up to date, and you can also reach out to us anytime.

 

—   Frequent Asked Questions  —

 

Q: How AirLink different from other Bluetooth receivers?

A: AirLink is not only a Bluetooth receiver that wirelessly transfers high-quality sound from your phone to any audio devices, but it is also a remote camera shutter to take pictures.

Q: How good is the sound quality?

A: AirLink is able to produce 24bit of stereo audio and supports 14 bands PEQ, which delivers high-resolution DSP sounds.

Q: What kinds of headphones work with AirLink?

A: Any headphones that receive audio via a 3.5mm cable can work with AirLink.

Q: Does AirLink work with iPhone, Android, and Windows devices?

A: Yes! It works with various smartphones.

Q: Can I use AirLink to rouse Siri?

A: Yes, AirLink is able to wake your voice assistants like Siri, Cortona, or Google.

Q: How to use the Camera Shutter button to take pictures?

A: After connecting AirLink to your phone, launch the camera app and simply tap the button, the picture is done.

Q: How does AirLink work with stereo in my car?

A: If your car has an AUX port, we will offer you one 3.5mm AUX cable to connect to your car stereo.

Q: What about battery life?

A: AirLink’s 200mAh battery provides 8 hours of continuous playback.

Q: Can I use for hands-free calls?

A: Yes. When the phone rings, you can answer the call by clicking the middle button on the side without looking for your phone. If you want to reject the call, just tap the middle button longer. You can talk via the built-in microphone.

Q: Can I listen to music while charging?

A: Yes, you can enjoy music while charging your phone. 

Q: Is AirLink waterproof?

A: Since it has a USB port and one 3.5mm audio jack, it is not waterproof.

Q: What will come in the box?

A: You will receive one one micro USB charging cable, and a 3.5mm AUX cable.

Q: Do you offer refunds?

A: Since this is a crowdfunding campaign, your support plays a significant part to bring AirLink to real life. We have a firm policy that we do not offer individual refunds after the campaign finished.

Q: Will there be a warranty with AirLink?

A: Yes. AirLink carries a one-year limited warranty on manufacturing defects.

Q: I’d like to place an order for a bulk amount. How do I contact you?

A: Please contact us at airlink@neorblab.com for distribution inquiries. Cheers!

Q: Do you ship internationally?

A: Yes, we ship anywhere in U.S. as well as all over the world! International shipping charges apply.

Q: Do you handle VAT?

A: We do not cover VAT (value added tax). Please consult your local customs regulations to make sure if you need to cover the added tax.

Q: How do I know if I can get the free cord organizer?

A: After sharing our campaign to your Facebook or Twitter, please kindly claim your cord organizer here http://bit.ly/2v0eVBY.

story:
Welcome to Freedom Genie!

Freedom Genie is an application for your iPhone/Android that helps protect your rights when in a situation where you are being detained and or questioned by a member of law enforcement or any other government agency.

The Freedom Genie floats on your background as a “widget” with instant access to the Freedom Genie Dashboard. Once you are confronted by law enforcement, simply follow the situation setup wizard and the Freedom Genie does the rest.

(SITUATION)

YOU WERE JUST PULLED OVER BY A CHP OFFICER AND HE WONT GIVE YOU A DIRECT ANSWER AS TO WHY HE PULLED YOU OVER! 

LUCKY YOU! THE OFFICER DOESN'T KNOW YOU ACTIVATED FREEDOM GENIE SOON AS YOU WERE PULLED OVER!

Activating the Freedom Genie:

1.  Upon activation your cell phone will be locked via Freedom Genie.

2.  Freedom Genie will automatically log your GPS location and record it to Freedom Genie.

3.  Freedom Genie then turns your phone into a live broadcasting video camera streaming the whole incident via Youtube, U-stream, or Freedom Genie servers aka "Magic Lamps". If no internet is available the video will be compressed and hidden inside the Freedom Genie encrypted folder also requiring a PIN#. Audio will be automatically recorded if live stream isn't available.

4.  Freedom Genie then sends email notifications to your lawyer, spouse, family, etc., stating you are either being detained or questioned by law enforcement. E-mails will contain links to live stream, GPS location, times and dates.

5.  Freedom Genie will then keep your phone safe and secure until you wish it back to normal.

6.  If you are about to be wrongfully searched and/or detained, or you simply just feel threatened just push and hold the Panic Button and Freedom Genie sends an URGENT alert out to whomever you may have in your emergency contact list.

Customize Settings!

1. Customize your possible threat menu with preloaded agencies such as police, CHP, state troopers, FBI, CIA, DHS, etc., and other agencies pertaining to local jurisdiction. Also customize special events such as DUI checkpoints, NWO/TSA security checkpoints and border inspections.

2. Customize your notify list! You can program your Freedom Genie to e-mail and/or SMS text your Emergency Contacts; this includes, spouse, family, lawyer, client, agent.

3. Customize your phone to Beacon Announcement Alert via speakerphone "This citizen is protected by Freedom Genie! For the safety of both parties this incident is being filmed and streamed live online. Also note that this citizen has requested his or her family and legal representatives be contacted upon activating this program. Thank you for fair treatment and upholding all constitutional rights of this citizen."

Funding and Distribution

The complexity of this app and all of the unique functions I would like it to perform are costly! There is an estimated base cost of $4k to $6k to design the program for both Apple and Android platforms. A database would have to be built to accommodate subscription customers and private customers with a private server to stream and store their videos if they would not like to use public services such as Ustream. In addition we need funding for technical support to work out the bugs during beta-testing, and for marketing the app once it is launched.

Incarceration in America

In case you didn't know, the United States (so-called "Land of the Free") is also is the global leader in human incarceration. Current forensic science has given many victims freedom to move on with their lives after being wrongfully convicted and locked away. There were no Android Phones or iPhones back in those days, but could you imagine how many lives would have been saved if this application had existed? The prison industry is thriving and normal, everyday people are being turned into criminals for job security by our corrupt judicial system. The legend below shows incarceration percentages:

Thousands of people nation-wide come forward every year to report police and judicial corruption only to have their cases thrown out due to lack of evidence! The government has cameras that watch you to protect themselves; but who or what protects you? Dash-cams on the officers cars don't film them planting drugs and/or firearms in your car. Dash-cams don't get the smart cops that pull far enough back and know the blind spots to assault you. The video below shows two women getting improper full cavity searches! These cops weren't smart enough to go off camera this time. This leaves us to wonder how many other times has this happened off dash-cam? And wouldn't Freedom Genie's live video broadcasting prevent the crooks (ahem... cops) from destroying the evidence by destroying your phone? The answer is YES!




Once in a while a person gets lucky and films such chaos as is seen in the video above; but what about those who weren't so lucky? As we grow closer and closer to becoming a police state, we are continually losing more and more of our rights. Stop being a victim and take steps to protect yourself.

Not just for use in your vehicle!

(Home)

(Public /Events)

(CPS /Public Defenders Office /DMV /Public Services)

(Utility Abuse /Smartmeter installation bullying)

When you wake up tomorrow are you protected?

Help make the Freedom Genie reality!


PLEASE NOTE WE DO NOT HATE LAW ENFORCEMENT OR GOVERNMENT AGENCIES! WE JUST BELIEVE IN THE UNITED STATES CONSTITUTION AND RIGHTS FOR ALL! WITH THE FREEDOM GENIE WE PLAN TO HELP PROTECT YOU FROM CORRUPTION FROM WHICHEVER DIRECTION IT MAY COME!


Note: Features may vary between Android and Apple
story_txt:
Welcome to Freedom Genie!


Freedom
Genie is an application for your iPhone/Android that helps protect your rights
when in a situation where you are being detained and or questioned by a member
of law enforcement or any other government agency.
The Freedom Genie floats on your background as a “widget” with instant access to the Freedom Genie Dashboard. Once you are confronted by law enforcement, simply follow the situation setup wizard and the Freedom Genie does the rest.
(SITUATION)
YOU WERE JUST PULLED OVER BY A CHP OFFICER AND HE WONT GIVE YOU A DIRECT ANSWER AS TO WHY HE PULLED YOU OVER! 


LUCKY YOU! THE OFFICER DOESN'T KNOW YOU ACTIVATED FREEDOM GENIE SOON AS YOU WERE PULLED OVER!

Activating the Freedom Genie:

1.  Upon
activation your cell phone will be locked via Freedom Genie.
2.  Freedom
Genie will automatically log your GPS location and record it to Freedom Genie.
3.  Freedom
Genie then turns your phone into a live broadcasting video camera streaming the
whole incident via Youtube, U-stream, or Freedom Genie servers aka "Magic Lamps".
If no internet is available the video will be compressed and hidden inside the
Freedom Genie encrypted folder also requiring a PIN#. Audio will be automatically recorded if live stream isn't available.
4.  Freedom
Genie then sends email notifications to your lawyer, spouse, family, etc., stating you are either being detained or questioned by law enforcement. E-mails
will contain links to live stream, GPS location, times and dates.
5.  Freedom
Genie will then keep your phone safe and secure until you wish it back to
normal.
6.  If you are about to be wrongfully searched and/or detained, or you simply just feel threatened just push and hold the Panic Button and Freedom Genie sends an URGENT alert out to whomever you may have in your emergency contact list.



Customize Settings!

1. Customize your possible threat menu with preloaded agencies such as police, CHP, state troopers, FBI, CIA, DHS, etc., and other agencies pertaining to local jurisdiction. Also customize special events such as DUI checkpoints, NWO/TSA security checkpoints and border inspections.
2. Customize your notify list! You can program your Freedom Genie to e-mail and/or SMS text your Emergency Contacts; this includes, spouse, family, lawyer, client, agent.
3. Customize your phone to Beacon Announcement Alert via speakerphone "This citizen is protected by Freedom Genie! For the safety of both parties this incident is being filmed and streamed live online. Also note that this citizen has requested his or her family and legal representatives be contacted upon activating this program. Thank you for fair treatment and upholding all constitutional rights of this citizen."

story:
MOM•ARMS is a new type of smartphone cradle for you.

Have you been looking for a convenient and secure way to carry your smartphone ?  

MOM•ARMS, which safely embraces your smartphone, is your answer. With MOM•ARMS, you don't have to worry about finding a place for your smartphone any more.

Smartphone holder made out of silicon

Silicon is soft, resilient and harmless. We used a 3D printer and liquid silicon to test various samples for the best result.

We repeated the test  until we arrived at the ideal prototype.

Finally, we decided upon a baseball sized silicon holder.

Carry and place your smartphone anywhere.

We came up with a  silicon holder that is detachable from a stand. We added a polygonal-shaped knob to the silicon holder. Naturally fitting our hands, the knob is easy to grip. 

 

Easy to insert and remove. 

Flexible silicon holders allow you to conveniently insert and remove smartphone.

 
You can even remove and carry the holder with your smartphone inserted.

 

Fit various sizes 

Silicon's elasticity and slip resistance securely hold various sizes of phone.

 

Hold your smartphone firmly even while shaking it.

 
 

Adjust to any direction

Silicon ball joints provide smooth omnidirectional rotation: You can easily adjust your smartphone to any direction.

Multiple functions

The function of the holder demonstrates its value in various places such as cars, homes and offices. The polygonal cone-shaped knob allows easy detachment and attachment while it maintains a solid fit.

  • Horizontal plane 

Use the top mount to secure your smartphone to a horizontal plane, such as your car dashboard or desk. The gel adhesive pads at the bottom of the mount ensure both a strong adhesion and reusability.

  • Vertical plane

Use the wall mount to fix the smartphone onto a wall, kitchen cabinet, bedside, etc. Strong double-sided tape is attached at the bottom of the mount in order to maintain a secure adhesion.

  • Hand grip 

You can remove the holder and use it as a hand grip. The baseball-sized silicon head naturally fits between your fingers so you do not have to worry about dropping it.

  • Stand 

You can turn your holder into a stand for your phone.

Why is MOM•ARMS the best smartphone holder for your car ?

1. Smooth omni-directional rotation allows you to lock your smartphone at any desired angle.

2. Due to its soft silicon cover, it does not scratch the smartphone even when the car is shaken. 

3. Smartphone can be easily attached and removed to allow for quick and convenient use.

4. A strong reusable adhesive pad leaves no trace after application.  

 

 

 

Product Composition 

MOM•ARMS consists of a silicon holder and two mounts (Top mount and Wall mount).

Color

There are two color options, Black and White. If color is not selected, Black color will be shipped.

Size guide

For secure smartphone mounting, the MOM•ARM Holder comes in two sizes: large (L) and small (S). 

  • Only large size is included in this funding : Samsung, LG and iPhone 6 or later models(smartphone width of 65mm or greater)
  • Small size is excluded in this funding : iPhone 5 and earlier (smartphone width smaller than 65mm)

Risks and challenges

We promise to honor the funding schedule of Rewards, which is a token of appreciation to supporters. 
Please note that due to the nature of crowdfunding, which can only be initiated by funding, and unforeseen circumstances during the preparation process may delay the reward offer. 
If the reward is delayed within one month from the scheduled schedule 
- We will notify you the date of delivery of the changed goods immediately when the reward delivery date is expected to be delayed. 
- However, funding cancellation is not possible due to delay in reward schedule. 
If the reward is delayed for more than one month from the agreed schedule 
- We will notify you of the reward offer date immediately when the reward delivery date is expected to be delayed. 
- If you would like a refund, please contact us and we will refund 100% of the amount you have funded to your account.

story:
-MEET M8-

Pico projector built into phones are still a relatively new idea in the world of mobile phones, and the Roam Cat is banking on that fact to garner your interest. So does it have anything more than that? Let's take a look at what this little phone has to offer.

 

-CORE FEATURES-

 

  • Redefining the smart projector

Smartphones are a common thing these days and people love to share videos, movies and images with friends using them. You can make your experiences memorable with Roam Cat M8 projector smartphone near your hand. With this machine you can project images, movies and videos on the big screen. Enjoy to your heart's content and make it big by buying one today!

enjoy movies and video with your family at home anytime.

 

share videos, movies and images with your beloved one.

 

Easy to prepare your business files for meetings.

These are just a few examples but there’s a lot more that you can do!

 

  • Roller to adjust the focus​​

When you scroll the roller, it will change the clarity of images,videos or other files

 

  • Throw Ratio

​

M8 has a projection image size of 9.37-140.55 inches with projection distance 0.2-3m, which provides a big-screen experience whether you’re watching a movie or a football game. The image size can be adjusted by changing the distance.

 

  • 1080P 100 lumens HD visual experience​

Share your videos, Movies and images in great detail: Yes, like the big versions of projectors, M8 do deliver stunning picture quality and video details. It gives you HD Video resolutions of 1080p and more even if you amplify the output 60 times. ​Even under well-lit conditions, the projection is still clear.

 

  • DLP technology

MM8 has an LED-based light source more than 20000 hours life time.

 

  • 32GB Internal + 128 GB SD

It is built with dual SIM ports which allows two SIM cards to be used at the same time. Both of them support 4G/3G/2G network. You will feel the high-speed smooth network experience ----- online video, real-time car navigation and more fast response operations.

​M8 can even store data within itself with the help of internal memory and external Micro SD up to 128GB connectivity option. Powerful running memory can synchronize multiple tasks, effectively support cpu run. Don't be worry about flashback.

 

  • Super Performence

Designed with 2.2 GHz quad-core cortex-A53 Advanced 64-bit processor chip, makes the collobration of CPU and GPU very efficient. 64-bit processor with Android 5.1 kernel that based on the new Flyme 4.5 system is extrordinary fluency and stable.

 

  • 4000mAh rechargeable battery

​

 

  • 13MP Rear Camera

 

 

-TOP PARTNERS-

Roamcat M8 is designed by MOTOROLA, which is the world's major manufacturers to provide design. Not only that, we has contracts with  Foxconn which will  produce M8.

 

-PERK-

 

-TECH  SPEC-

 

 

-WHAT'S IN THE BOX-

  • 1 x M8
  • 1 x Charging head
  • 1 x Earphone
  • 1 x Charging cable
  • 1 x User manual
  • 1 x Pin
  • 1 x Tripod
  • 1 x Bluetooth Speaker

 

-M8 in ICEEB-

Roamcat attend the Eletrolarshow 2016 in Sao Paulo, Brazil. Many medias live interview with RoamCat.

 

-OUR WARRANTY-

RoamCat Team have creative idea with great passion in manufacturing that want to create something impossible. We have recently partnered with a premier manufacturer Foxconn who specialize in computer, communications, consumer electronics and other 3C product R & D and manufacturing so many awesome products to produce this cool smartphone. This product will bring different and pleasant experience to all of you.

We sincerely hope to bring our work to life and to all of you. We believe everyone deserves a high quality smartphone projector that tag along our everyday journey. Please back us and make it come true.
 
We promise that once funded, we'll send you your  M8 smartphone very quickly! And we provide warranty service. 

 

-SHIPPING-

 

 

-SHARE #ROAMCAT WITH FRIENDS-

Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the Kudrone community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!

If you have any questions about the share program, please email us at roamcatm8@yahoo.com or on our Indiegogo page.

​

—   Risks & Challenges  —

We guarantee that we will deliver AirLink on time with the high quality once the funding meets the goal. Though we have tested our prototype and are confident in its performance, as with any hardware project, there are always schedule risks associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics based on the number of orders we receive.

Our team has successfully delivered similar products to market. We understand the unique challenges and are familiar with how to avoid and mitigate any issues that arise. We are committed to delivering AirLink on time with high quality. Should there be any uncontrollable factor contributing to delays, we will keep you, our awesome backers, up to date, and you can also reach out to us anytime.

story:
About the NMCs

Connectors are faced with a multitude of problems. They can wear down over time, suffer losses in signal and are susceptible to water damage. With the Non-Mating Connector (NMC) (patent pending), we seek to avoid this. This new design in connectors, which we are first implementing on USB (with our first application with USB flash drives), is a way around this as it is completely sealed in a polymer. It has proven to outperform standard USB and is completely waterproof due to the lack of exposed ohmic contacts, eliminating the connector as a means of entry for water. When connectors are implemented in this manner, any portable consumer electronics device that uses NMC connectors will be waterproof.

USB connectors are widely used. This is one of the reasons why this application was chosen first. 

 

NMC USB Standard A-Connectors

 

NMC USB Standard B-Connectors

 

Our NMC connectors work by using electric fields between metal plates (that are insulated) rather than metal-to-metal wire contacts to transmit data signals. NMC engineers have also developed a way to transmit USB power, so the NMC connectors will be fully functional USB connectors.

We had usability in mind when designing these connectors. NMC connectors also get rid of the use of standard mechanical latches that mechanically hold the two connector parts together. We wanted to remove the gradual wear with mechanical latches, so we designed one with a magnet that won't wear down over time. The magnets, therefore, hold the two connectors in place instead of the mechanical latches. This concept is similar to the design used in Apple's power connectors. The application of the NMC is not limited to the USB connector, and we hope to develop applications inside of all mobile electronics soon.

 

 

The above picture shows the basic operation of how the NMC connector works. Electric fields between two plates of the NMC pass the data signal. The electric fields are concentrated in the dielectric material which also insulates the two plates from any water or dust.

 

Inside of NMC connector: Metallic plate and dielectric material on top which insulates the metallic plate from any water or moisture.

We also designed it to be symmetric about the horizontal axis, so you can no longer insert USB devices upside down, another common complaint about USB. It does not matter which way you insert the USB into the connector, there is no right or wrong way to insert. The orientation does not matter. It can be inserted either way and work just as well. We have developed an adapter to convert from NMC USB to regular USB to allow for easy adoption of the connector with any device currently on the market today.

USB Prototype Connector & Cable

 

We have published a paper on the NMC connectors in the IEEE International Conference on Consumer Electronics (ICCE) transactions which was presented in Las Vegas this last January. For pictures of of ICCE please see our website: www.gonmc.com or like us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/nmccorporationinc

 

We have also developed prototypes of working connectors that transmit data and power. With both data transfer and power, USB flash drives were designed:

NMC USB Flash Drive. The NMC connectors on this flash drive are insulated by a high-k dielectric insulator material making the flash drive waterproof.

 

USB Flash drive prototype with NMCs

 

NMC power transmission test

 

In tests, the NMC has performed admirably so far, admirably meaning 84.5% above the standard performance in comparison to the USB standard. This proves to be much more better at transmitting signals that standard USB 3.0 A connectors (especially at the higher speeds of modern computing), in addition to being completely waterproof:

 

NMC less lossy than standard USB

 

What We Need

We need to manufacture the NMC connectors and adapters on a large scale and acquire machines to do that, a task that a monetary barrier provides a huge obstacle to. Prior to doing that, we also need to refine our working designs even more to reduce those costs.

We have a team of bright engineers who are passionate and dedicated to perfecting the NMC. We also have formed a research collaboration agreement with the University of California, Davis who opened their labs, cleanrooms and research resources to overcome any problems in developing and producing the NMCs. Using this equipment is very costly on a monthly basis.

We have also held several meetings with Intel Corporation who have expressed huge interest. We hope in the near future to form a partnership with them in order to make the process of full integration into consumer electronics much faster. But as of now, we need seed funding to continue this research which is where you come in. We badly need to raise funds for this and hope you will consider partnering with us in this effort. We are grateful for any help you can give.

Thank you in advance!

 

For the Backers and Supporters:

For you help, we will offer each backer some cool NMC perks. It all adds up. Even if you cannot personally help us, you can still do so by telling your friends on Facebook about our project.

The above picture shows the basic operation of how the NMC connector works. Electric fields between two plates of the NMC pass the data signal. The electric fields are concentrated in the dielectric material which also insulates the two plates from any water or dust.
 

Inside of NMC connector: Metallic plate and dielectric material on top which insulates the metallic plate from any water or moisture.
We also designed it to be symmetric about the horizontal axis, so you can no longer insert USB devices upside down, another common complaint about USB. It does not matter which way you insert the USB into the connector, there is no right or wrong way to insert. The orientation does not matter. It can be inserted either way and work just as well. We have developed an adapter to convert from NMC USB to regular USB to allow for easy adoption of the connector with any device currently on the market today.

USB Prototype Connector & Cable
 
We have published a paper on the NMC connectors in the IEEE International Conference on Consumer Electronics (ICCE) transactions which was presented in Las Vegas this last January. For pictures of of ICCE please see our website: www.gonmc.com or like us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/nmccorporationinc
 
We have also developed prototypes of working connectors that transmit data and power. With both data transfer and power, USB flash drives were designed:

NMC USB Flash Drive. The NMC connectors on this flash drive are insulated by a high-k dielectric insulator material making the flash drive waterproof.
 
USB Flash drive prototype with NMCs
 

NMC power transmission test
 

In tests, the NMC has performed admirably so far, admirably meaning 84.5% above the standard performance in comparison to the USB standard. This proves to be much more better at transmitting signals that standard USB 3.0 A connectors (especially at the higher speeds of modern computing), in addition to being completely waterproof:
 

NMC less lossy than standard USB


 

What We Need

We need to manufacture the NMC connectors and adapters on a large scale and acquire machines to do that, a task that a monetary barrier provides a huge obstacle to. Prior to doing that, we also need to refine our working designs even more to reduce those costs.
We have a team of bright engineers who are passionate and dedicated to perfecting the NMC. We also have formed a research collaboration agreement with the University of California, Davis who opened their labs, cleanrooms and research resources to overcome any problems in developing and producing the NMCs. Using this equipment is very costly on a monthly basis.
We have also held several meetings with Intel Corporation who have expressed huge interest. We hope in the near future to form a partnership with them in order to make the process of full integration into consumer electronics much faster. But as of now, we need seed funding to continue this research which is where you come in. We badly need to raise funds for this and hope you will consider partnering with us in this effort. We are grateful for any help you can give.
Thank you in advance!

 
For the Backers and Supporters:
For you help, we will offer each backer some cool NMC perks. It all adds up. Even if you cannot personally help us, you can still do so by telling your friends on Facebook about our project.

story:
Who are we?

My name is Pete Melhuish, of The Portable Office Company (POC), and I'd like to tell you a little bit about our fantastic new Virtual Desktop...

With a committed team of cloud wizards, we have been working long and hard on this project for 3 years. We are now in a position to launch our desktop into the marketplace, to let you the consumer decide if we have hit the right spot! By opening it up to Indegogo users (you cannot put a price on early adopters), we hope this question will be answered, and you will love this product as much as we do!

Why we need your help

In a nutshell, we are looking for £7K of funding to refresh our website and hone our Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) plans, in preperation for pressing the 'GO' button in March 2013. To show you how much your help and support means to us, we wanted to offer you a little something in return as a BIG thank you...
 
Here's the deal...
 
By making a contribution you will receive a HUGE saving on what will be our opening market price for this product. Coupled with the fact that our desktop means you will NEVER have to update your software or centralise your storage EVER again! Just out of curiosity, what have you got to lose? 

A big THANK YOU

Thanks for taking the time to look over our project. I am sure it will become evident that POC is one of the coolest and most cost effective ways to use genuine Microsoft software on any device! Moving forward it is also one of the best ways to stay at the forefront of computing. By carefully managing the interaction of the end user, our online Windows desktop increases the
relevance and quality of the service provided to you.
 
By utilising new revenue streams and smarter infrastructure design, we have been able to price our desktop considerably lower than other similar products on the market. This means that even with the most basic understanding of computers, you are able to create your own multi-user networked business environment at a fraction of the cost. Better still, being virtual means we keep the software up to date for you!
 
 
Our product targets business start-ups, micro-businesses and students. Through beta testing, it is currently proving to be a huge success with both the student market in the UK and businesses in the USA. Both communities are providing us with excellent feedback, which means that we are able to further enhance the functionality in time for production delivery.
 
 
As standard, the POC desktop comes with a Windows Server operating system that has been designed to look and feel like Windows 7 (Windows 8 coming soon at no additional cost), 2GB of secure cloud storage, and Apache OpenOffice.
Through our online 'Desktop Store' it is possible to add both variations of MS Office (standard and pro), SharePoint servers, Exchange email, and additional personal/company storage. In short, everything you need to create a cohesive and secure shared environment from which to run a small business or manage university life. 
 
Security is of course paramount in any situation where you are storing peoples personal/business data. POC uses best-of-breed virus checkers, firewalls, SSL encrypted login and only operates out of PCI compliant datacentres.
 
 
The POC desktop solves a problem faced by nearly every PC user today; information and functionality is often spread across several devices.
 
The POC desktop brings all this together for the user in one place, at the same time, across virtually any modern internet enabled platform. This is a fully supported enterprise grade product that we know will rewrite the rules in terms of how online software is sold.
 
Be there at the beginning to say 'I was there first!'
 
We look forward to welcoming all new 'Pocsters' onto the platform in March, and guarantee that we will be keeping technology interesting for many years to come!

Spreading the word

If you cannot help financially, but you still like the cut of our jib, then, please use the links below to spread the word on LinkedIn, Facebook and Twitter, or contact me personally if you have any ideas.
 
Thanks a million,
 
Pete

pete@pocster.com

story:
Our campaign is closed since the 16th of March. You can still pre-order at -30% on our website: www.PKparis.com 

OUR GOALS


The PK K'isauve (in French, "PK which saves") gets its name from its main purpose: to be a smartphone survival kit, aiming to reduce some useless stress.
Universal USB Key laptop/ smartphone/ tablette/ iPod touch
Sync/ Charge Cable computer/ smartphone/ tablet/ iPod Touch
Emergency Battery +30' autonomy
Practical & Discreet mini cables & suction cups
Always With You compact, rainproof, clip

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING

CNET This tiny keychain square could be your smartphone's BFF.
The Examiner Check them out, I think you’ll be impressed.
Ubergizmo Additional functions in a far more portable manner.
Rude Baguette PK's smartphone Swiss army knife charges, syncs & stores.
Click here for more press reviews

UNIVERSAL 128 GB USB KEY

The PK K'isauve is a USB key for PC, Mac, iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch and Android with a maximum memory capacity of 128 GB. Save and share your videos, photos, music and docs with just a few clicks. The PK K'isauve allows you to read nearly any kind of files (mkv, flac, cr2, pdf, etc.) which can be read with the PK Air application available for iOS and Android.

SYNC/ CHARGE CABLE

Never be without a charge cable again! The PK K'isauve incorporates a sync/ charge cable which is available in iOS or Android version. We embedded mini cables to avoid damage to the ports of your devices and guarantee easy usage with laptops.

EMERGENCY BATTERY

In any emergency situation or when your phone's battery is nearly dead, you will have a mini battery of 30-minute smartphone autonomy with you. It's very useful to send urgent text messages, make an important call, or charge your smartwatch or your Bluetooth headset. The PK K'isauve only needs 8 minutes to fully charge once plugged into your laptop. The battery power level is indicated by three small LED lights.

PRACTICAL & DISCREET

The PK K'isauve can adhere to the back of your device by two suction cups. This feature allows for simultaneous smartphone and PK K'isauve use, which is very useful when making phone calls or watching movies.

ALWAYS WITH YOU

Ultra-compact and rain-resistant, the PK K'isauve is always with you. Its integrated clip allows you to clip/ unclip it instantly from your keyring.

COMPONENT DETAILS

43 x 43 x 11 mm/ 1.7 x 1.7 x 0.5 in.
iOS 16, 32, 128 GB
Android 16, 32, 128 GB
For more details click here

LOOK INSIDE

ENRICHING PK AIR APP

Access your movies on your smartphone, tablet or MP4 iOS-Android, as well as your photos, music and docs in most formats (mkv, avi, flac, cr2, nef, etc.)
Save your photos and videos on your PK K'isauve with just 3 clicks
Share files with your friends
Available for iOS above 7.0/ Android above 4.0

QUALITY CERTIFICATIONS

Currently, there are only a few USB keys for iPhone on the market. To improve upon these existing products, we worked very hard on the compactness, practicality, strength and 'key' functions for smartphones to bring a fully great user experience. We are convinced that our high standards in research, design and production make the PK K'isauve to be unique and innovative. This product is in progress of getting all requiered quality certifications and licenses.

MORE FILMS & MUSIC

The PK K'isauve allows you to free up enough memory on your smartphone/ tablet to use legal downloading services. For instance, you could move all your photos/ videos from your smartphone to your PK K'isauve. You are now ready to watch your movies and listen to your music anytime, anywhere, even without Internet access.

FILMS (examples of sites): Canalplay, Ultraviolet, iTunes,
Imineo, Vodeo, Arte Boutique, Megavod, etc.
MUSIC (without drm): Qobuz, Starzik, Amazonmp3, Jamendeo,
Virgin mega, Google play music, etc.

PRODUCTION PLAN

May 2014

First industrial designs

August 2014

Prototyping and refinement
Technical development

October 2014

Electronic integration
Production planning

February 2015

May 2015

1st prototype

July 2015

Mass production

August 015

Shipping to funders

September 2015

Market launch

Note: The schedule depends heavily on certifications and licenses.

Prizes will arrive in late March.

  • Challenge of Feb. 17th

  • Challenge of Feb. 24th
    "Crowd Special Edition" laser engraved on your PK K'isauve, a collector's item for everyone!
  • Challenge of March 3rd
    One iPad mini to win for the luckiest funder!

ECHOES AROUND THE WORLD

CNET(US) This tiny keychain square could be your smartphone's BFF.
The Examiner(US) Check them out, I think you’ll be impressed.

Gizmodo(DE) Das quasi unverzichtbare Zubehör für Digital Natives.
Macwelt(DE) Drei lebenswichtige Ausrüstungen in einem kleinen Gehäuse für iPhone- und iPad-Besitzer.

Neuerdings(DE) K'isauve (ist) eine praktische kleine Box. Immer am Schlüsselbund dabei (...) gleichzeitig Speicherplatz, Reserveakku und Synchronisationskabel.

Gadget Gear(NL) Handig tijdens het laden ;-).
