Tek.no(NO) Lanserer mobil overlevelsespakke. På størrelse med en fyrstikkeske.
Le Figaro(FR) Le français PK Paris invente le couteau suisse du smartphone.
Sciences et Avenir(FR) Plus de batteries, la solution K'isauve.
Gizmodo(FR) Le couteau suisse de votre smartphone.
Génération NT(FR) Pour pallier aux problèmes d'autonomie et de stockage.
01 Net(FR) Le boîtier ultra compact et la fonction de batterie de secours.
CNET(FR) Accessoire malin pour smartphone.
iPhoneSoft(FR) Le boîtier qui offre stockage et autonomie à nos smartphones.
4UGeek(FR) La meilleure amie de votre smartphone.
La Vie Numérique(FR) 3 choses essentielles dans un astucieux boîtier miniature.
Panorama(IT) Il kit di sopravvivenza per iPhone e Android.
PC Professionale(IT) Survival kit per smartphone iOS o Android.
PC de Mano(ES) Te dará una tranquilidad para no tener que andar siempre preocupado de la batería de tu móvil.
CNET(KR) USB 케이블·보조배터리·OTG 메모리 “한 방에”

THE PK K'IBOSSE ("The Workers")

At PKparis, we have the same passion and enthusiasm for innovation, community and technology as you do. We strive daily to create and develop unique and premium new products. We believe that simple ideas, applied in a new way, can be a powerful source of innovation.

Luc Pierart founded PKparis in April 2013. Benefiting from 20 years of experience in the hi-tech industry, he has worked for such companies as Motorola, Alcatel and LaCie. He has brought more than 30 hi-tech products to the market, including the OT500 (the world's first synchronizing cellphone), the OT700 (the world's first internet enabled cellphone), the iamakey (exhibited at the MOMA New York and the Centre Pompidou Paris), the Xtremkey (the world's strongest USB key), the Rikiki (the world's smallest external hard drive).

Luc
CEO & Founder
Product Marketing
Joëlle
Admin. & Sales Assistant
Laura
Legal Assistant
Ariel
Operations

Mikhaël
Design
Marketing
Joseph
Webmaster
Pierre
Community Manager
Clément
Sales Director

Loïc
Project Manager
Jinliang
Mechanical Engineer
Patrick
Mechanical Expert
Khalid
Electronics Expert

START-UP BUT EXPERIENCED

Founded in April 2013, PKparis is a young startup that focused in its first year to implement its industrial circuit. Nowadays, the procedure has been installed (development, production with quality/ cost/ time respect, and logistics). PKparis has proven its capacity to bring products that are in line with its own ambitions to the market: the PK K'1 (the world's smallest 3.0 USB key) and the PK K'3 (the world's smallest 3.0 USB key for smartphones/ Androids), fulfilling the company's motto:

WE NEED YOU

PKparis exists thanks to support and investment of friends only (a big thank you to them all). This allowed us to demonstrate our industrial knowledge by creating a unique and premium range of USB keys despite a very competitive market. Indeed, we're facing the biggest world-famous hi-tech brands... This is the great but difficult challenge of every hi-tech start-up, David against Goliath! That is why we need your support to make this project become real, and to put the PK K'isauve in your hands.

Beyond the financial aspect, the PK K'isauve also needs interest. Help us to bring this project to the world by sharing it with your friends (click on links on the left of screen or below the video).

YOUR QUESTIONS, SUGGESTIONS
OR COMMENTS ARE VALUED

Your questions, suggestions or comments have a real impact on the way we create our unique and innovative products:
Say bonjour to Pierre – contactcf@pkparis.com

Partnerships, special orders or distribution:
Write to Clement – sales@pkparis.com

DETAILED SPECIFICATIONS

　Dimension 43 x 43 x 11 mm/ 1.7 x 1.7 x 0.5 in.
　Weight 19 g/ 0.67 oz
　Versions iOS 16 GB/ 32 GB/ 128 GB (with lightning connector)
Android 16 GB/ 32 GB/ 128 GB (with microUSB connector)
　Switch 3 positions (USB key, cable, battery)
　Cable length 3 cm/ 1.18 in.
　Battery 100 mAh
up to 30 min of smartphone autonomy (varies with device)
charge within 8 min
　USB 2.0 speed ≈ 19/ 10 MB/s
　3 white LEDs indicates battery charge level and switch button position
　Warranty 2 years
Click here to return to the 3D view

LEARN MORE

  • Compatibility

All OTG Androids with microUSB and iOS with lightning connector (iPhone 5/ 6, iPod Touch and iPad) are compatible with the PK K'isauve. Find the list of compatible devices here.

  • What does "compatible" with Android smartphones mean?

All Android smartphones are compatible with the charging cable and battery functions of the PK K'isauve. However, only Androids with the OTG function are fully compatible with the PK K'isauve (sync/ charge cable + USB key + battery). Find the list of compatible devices here.

  • Is the PK K'isauve waterproof?

The PK K'isauve is water resistant, but can't tolerate a complete immersion into water.

  • Will it work with iPhone 4 or older versions of iPad/ iPod?

The PK K'isauve microUSB connector is not directly compatible with the 30 pin connector of your iPhone 4. You can buy a microUSB - 30 pin adaptor to enjoy your PK K'isauve Android with your iPhone 4/ 4S (and older generations of iPod Touch and iPad). We advise you to choose a short adaptor (15 mm wide).

  • Is the PK K'isauve easy to share data between smartphones?

With the PK K'isauve Android and an adapter microUSB - iPhone 5 or iPhone 4 you can easily share between all the iPhone and Androids. The application PK Air helps you easily copy photos and videos to your smartphone.

  • Should I manually add shipping if I'm not in the European Union?

Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. When you pledge, manually add an additional $10 to the price of the perk you want. We will do the matching at the end of the campaign.

  • I entered a wrong shipping address! What can I do?

We will contact all our funders at the end of the campaign about their product choice. When we do, please respond and inform the correct address.

  • What is the PK K'isauve made of?

The PK K'isauve has a durable metallic enclosure and plastic with soft touch rubber for the main body. The cables are made in a more flexible plastic.

Images and pictures are not contractual.
Mac, iPhone, iPad, iPod, iPod Touch, iTunes are trademarks of Apple Inc.

THE PK K'IBOSSE ("The Workers")

At PKparis, we have the same passion and enthusiasm for innovation, community and technology as you do. We strive daily to create and develop unique and premium new products. We believe that simple ideas, applied in a new way, can be a powerful source of innovation.

Luc Pierart founded PKparis in April 2013. Benefiting from 20 years of experience in the hi-tech industry, he has worked for such companies as Motorola, Alcatel and LaCie. He has brought more than 30 hi-tech products to the market, including the OT500 (the world's first synchronizing cellphone), the OT700 (the world's first internet enabled cellphone), the iamakey (exhibited at the MOMA New York and the Centre Pompidou Paris), the Xtremkey (the world's strongest USB key), the Rikiki (the world's smallest external hard drive).






LucCEO & FounderProduct Marketing

JoëlleAdmin. & Sales Assistant

LauraLegal Assistant

ArielOperations



MikhaëlDesignMarketing

JosephWebmaster

PierreCommunity Manager

ClémentSales Director



LoïcProject Manager

JinliangMechanical Engineer

PatrickMechanical Expert

KhalidElectronics Expert




START-UP BUT EXPERIENCED
Founded in April 2013, PKparis is a young startup that focused in its first year to implement its industrial circuit. Nowadays, the procedure has been installed (development, production with quality/ cost/ time respect, and logistics). PKparis has proven its capacity to bring products that are in line with its own ambitions to the market: the PK K'1 (the world's smallest 3.0 USB key) and the PK K'3 (the world's smallest 3.0 USB key for smartphones/ Androids), fulfilling the company's motto:

WE NEED YOU
PKparis exists thanks to support and investment of friends only (a big thank you to them all). This allowed us to demonstrate our industrial knowledge by creating a unique and premium range of USB keys despite a very competitive market. Indeed, we're facing the biggest world-famous hi-tech brands... This is the great but difficult challenge of every hi-tech start-up, David against Goliath! That is why we need your support to make this project become real, and to put the PK K'isauve in your hands.
Beyond the financial aspect, the PK K'isauve also needs interest. Help us to bring this project to the world by sharing it with your friends (click on links on the left of screen or below the video).

YOUR QUESTIONS, SUGGESTIONSOR COMMENTS ARE VALUED
Your questions, suggestions or comments have a real impact on the way we create our unique and innovative products:Say bonjour to Pierre – contactcf@pkparis.com
Partnerships, special orders or distribution:Write to Clement – sales@pkparis.com

Click here to return to the 3D view

LEARN MORE
Compatibility
All OTG Androids with microUSB and iOS with lightning connector (iPhone 5/ 6, iPod Touch and iPad) are compatible with the PK K'isauve. Find the list of compatible devices here.
What does "compatible" with Android smartphones mean?
All Android smartphones are compatible with the charging cable and battery functions of the PK K'isauve. However, only Androids with the OTG function are fully compatible with the PK K'isauve (sync/ charge cable + USB key + battery). Find the list of compatible devices here.
Is the PK K'isauve waterproof?
The PK K'isauve is water resistant, but can't tolerate a complete immersion into water.
Will it work with iPhone 4 or older versions of iPad/ iPod?
The PK K'isauve microUSB connector is not directly compatible with the 30 pin connector of your iPhone 4. You can buy a microUSB - 30 pin adaptor to enjoy your PK K'isauve Android with your iPhone 4/ 4S (and older generations of iPod Touch and iPad). We advise you to choose a short adaptor (15 mm wide).
Is the PK K'isauve easy to share data between smartphones?
With the PK K'isauve Android and an adapter microUSB - iPhone 5 or iPhone 4 you can easily share between all the iPhone and Androids. The application PK Air helps you easily copy photos and videos to your smartphone.
Should I manually add shipping if I'm not in the European Union?
Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. When you pledge, manually add an additional $10 to the price of the perk you want. We will do the matching at the end of the campaign.
I entered a wrong shipping address! What can I do?
We will contact all our funders at the end of the campaign about their product choice. When we do, please respond and inform the correct address.
What is the PK K'isauve made of?
The PK K'isauve has a durable metallic enclosure and plastic with soft touch rubber for the main body. The cables are made in a more flexible plastic.

story:
TOGETHER we could speed this process up!!!


Awesome! Now you have the opportunity to receive funding and tips from more than 2.5 billion people with just a few clicks.

PaperLike is an exclusive smart & secure social payment service that allows you to obtain not only virtual support “likes” in gratitude, but also to get support in the simplest and most direct way - byreceiving funds from anyone, anywhere, at any time. 

Receive PaperLikes directly from your blog, website, forum, newsletter, email, feed of comments, social network profile or page, chats, generally from any online platform.

Amazing! Clicking on the Personal PaperLike Button or link, or scanning the qr code, redirects your supporter to a payment window where they can select between payment amounts of $1, $3, $5 or a custom value. Users can also type a message to the recipient and can choose one of 4 payment methods (Paypal, Credit and Debit Cards, Mobile Payment or PaperLike Account and send PaperLike).

All transactions are stored in a magic user's area which keeps track of all notes and messages from supporters, payment methods used, status of payments, the total amount available for payout, and of course has the magic PAY ME button.

All accumulated funds can be withdrawn in cash from any bank or ATMworldwide via the personal PaperLike MasterCard, which will be shipped to you absolutely free.



We know you are the ONE that can change the world! 

Through our Referral Thank You Program, we want to give you a PaperLike Account for FREE, in exchange for taking a few minutes to help spread the word... 

At the end of our Indiegogo campaign, we will reward you for your referrals of anyone who opens a PaperLike account and spends at least $15 during the campaign.

story:
Check out our video (above) for our story in 2 minutes.


               

 

You can still order

If you have missed our campaign, you don't have to worry. You can still (pre-order) a case on www.UCreate3D.com. Our IndieGoGo backers will receive their case first, but you could be customizing your case directly after them!

High quality 3D Printed cases with switchable panels

UCreate3D is bringing customizable, high quality and awesome 3D Printed cases with switchable panels to your doorstep.

3D Printed cases for all smartphones and tablets and everyone, including supermodels.

What makes our cases unique?

  • ALL SMARTPHONES AND TABLETS: It doesn’t matter which device you have, we will have the perfect case for you

  • HIGHEST QUALITY: We have selected the best materials and developed a unique way of combining 3D Printing with top quality coating to deliver optimal protection

  • SWITCHABLE PANELS: Want to match your Smartphone and Tablet with your latest style? No problem. Just hit our easy to use online design interface and get a new one (Preview)

  • DESIGNED BY YOU: Design your own case. Customize it with your favorite quote, company name, logo, image and your name

See our iPhone 4 case in Caribbean Blue with Switchable Panel

A short introduction

Two Dutch entrepreneurs, pleasantly insane, incredibly ambitious and only separated by the pacific ocean, who are building a multilingual global platform to offer 3D Printed customizable cases. And that's just the beginning. Koen is running our offices in Hong Kong and is responsible for production. Last year Vincent moved to San Francisco to focus on sales and E-Commerce! It all started when Koen couldn't find a nice case for his HTC Sensation. Only one year later and we are running this IndieGoGo campaign!

Only available for 1 brand? BORING!

The best things should be available for everyone. Every time new case designs or concepts are introduced one thing is certain, it will only be available for the iPhone, iPad and if you’re lucky Samsung. If you are the proud owner of an HTC, Blackberry, Nokia, LG, a Sony, tough luck. You will end up keeping your precious device “safe” in an old sock (we’ve all been there) or a one-size-fits-all sleeve. All this is history! UCreate3D creates awesome cases for every available Smartphone and tablet device on the market! 

We´ll keep on adding devices!

Cases for the first 20 devices will be ready this summer, but depending on your support we could do even more! If your device is not on the list below, don’t be alarmed. We continually add more devices to our assortment. If you are thinking of buying a new Smartphone or tablet and you want to support us, no problem. All new models by the established brands will be available. If Apple releases the iPhone 6 we will be the first to offer a customizable case! Our cases will be available to everyone for every device!

Create your own design!

Do you want to express yourself through your phone and tablet case? Do you like adding a personal touch to your device? That’s an expensive hobby! Well actually, it WAS an expensive hobby. What makes our concept truly unique in the field of 3D Printing, are the switchable panels. You can create new cases for your device, or just create a new panel.

Available in 11 colors, +1

Our cases and panels will be available in: Batman Black, Ron Burgundy Red, Deep Blue, Rex Green, Artic White & Sterling Silver; Juicy Orange, District Red, Go Green, Caribbean Blue, Pretty in Pink & Color #12

Whether you want to change your back cover to:

  • Match your mood, dress or outfit.
  • Support your favorite sports team because they won the World Series (Go Giants!!!).
  • Become the best boyfriend ever by surprising your girlfriend for Valentine’s Day.
  • Become the favorite uncle by giving a case for your cousins birthday.
  • Promote your company (or ours).
  • Make your most loyal customers or employees even more loyal.
  • Have your favorite brand (UCreate3D of course) or TV show on it.
  • Show your secret identity (or not)

The possibilities are endless. Just design a new panel on our website and we will print it just for you!

You can customize your device, to infinity and beyond!

The best thing is, it's very easy to design your case with our online customization software! In only 4 steps you can customize you case. 

You can design your own case in June!

Our cases aren’t just art

We are as passionate and obsessed about quality as we are about the freedom of choice. Most 3D Printed products are not used on a daily basis. A piece of art like that isn’t meant to go in and out of pockets all day long, exposed to bright sunlight and sweaty palms.Today’s 3D Printing techniques are not capable of making products that can withstand these daily challenges. In contrast, our products have been developed especially for daily usage.

The highest quality on the market

That’s why 3D Printed cases require a different, special approach, developed especially for smartphones cases. That’s what we’ve done! We developed a new way of applying our protective coating to withstand all these daily challenges and keep our cases looking brand new. We have worked with the best painting, finishing and case experts to develop our unique way of protecting the case. We have painted sample after sample, with different combinations of paints and coating, until we found our magical mix and were completely satisfied with the end result.

Left: Our case with special coating. Right: Competitors case. Both after 1 month of usage.

The secret is:

After 3D Printing your case we apply multiple layers of paint, the base coat, and a strong high end coating, which originates from the car industry. This multiple layer finishing technique dramatically increases the durability of our cases. Without these layers, your 3D Printed creation would soak up fluids, dirt, and all the things that we encounter every day. We want to make sure that your piece of art stays safe! We were amazed by the quality when we held the case for the first time and we are sure that you’ll feel the same way. Our products have the highest quality of all 3D Printed Cases on the market!

Giftcards are available!

Our cases are the perfect gift! Buy a sixpack and you don't have to worry about presents for the coming 6 birthdays!

Always wanted to be a Super Hero?

This is your chance to become ours! If you have real super powers (super strength, lightning, spider sense, etc.), please use them to help kickstart our full production process. A large initial order (300+) will help us to scale up, cut costs, improve quality and expand the range of devices. The first cases for four devices are already done. If you are a mere mortal, like us, you can be a great help by backing us so we can develop our webshop and designs for the other 16 devices. With your support we could be shipping the first cases to all of you in June 2013!

Where will the money go?

So far we have financed UCreate3D ourselves, and we have been able to develop the first devices and proof of our concept. But now it’s time to take the next step and we need your support! We are using our IndieGoGo campaign in three ways.

1. Webshop

Developing an easy to use web shop isn’t cheap, especially when you want to do it right. We expect our fully functional webshop to be ready in June 2013. IndieGoGo backers: YOU are going to be the first to create your very own 3D Printed Case.

2. Designs

We will deliver on our promise to develop designs for the 16 other devices. With 20 models we will have the most devices of any 3D printing company. And this is just the beginning. We’ll keep an adding more!

3. Pre-Orders

The more cases pre-ordered during this campaign the more we can spread our costs and the faster we can develop more cases and design, have more colors and designs available, and the better our web shop will be! So...

Please Pledge & Spread the word!

We hope that you are inspired and excited about 3D Printing, by the idea of creating your own Smartphone or tablet case and choose to use your superpowers to support our project. You can also help us by spreading the word to your friends. Every Tweet, Like and Pledge brings us closer to realizing our dream.

$30,000 Stretch Goal: UCreate3D’s Draw-a-thon!

Everyone can design a creative, fun, artistic case with or without a computer. Old schoolers, whip out your black markers! Fellow computer nerds, fire up Photoshop and Illustrator and let’s get ready to rumble! 

On April 25th we will then make a selection of the coolest 10 designs. Then you will be able to vote on which one you like most. The three most popular will be made into 3D models for ALL Smartphones & Tablets by our designers and listed on our web shop! We are only able to do this is we reach the $30,000 mark, so start designing and spreading the words to get your cases on devices worldwide.

You can order the winning designs for your case.

Find the rules of our Draw-A-Thon here


 

 

Your Options

Our Story

Koen and I go way back! We met 12 years ago in Amsterdam through a mutual friend, Rosa (pink hat). We named our logo after her, there is no visual resemblance! UCreate3D was founded in 2012 after a skiing trip with a group of friends in France. We spent the whole week talking about 3D Printing, E-Commerce and entrepreneurship. We got excited about 3D Printing and the impact it will have on everything imaginable. For instance on the case market, availability for all devices and freedom in designing them. When we looked at Koens case, we knew what to do. He finally could have a high quality personalized case for his HTC Sensation. Not much later we founded UCreate3D and started developing our case concept you are looking at right now.  

 

 

We will do everything in our power to fulfill your expectations and we hope you will support us to realize our dream.

Thanks for checking out (y)our project and supporting us so we can realize our dream.

Vincent, Koen and the rest of the UCreate3D team.

If you have any questions or suggestions mail us!

IndieGoGo@UCreate3D.com

Thank you backers (YOU), Advisory Board (Stans, Remi, Ron & Zeger), Joost, Thomas, Maarten & Ludwig (awesome designers), Maikel & Ingeborg (amazing video crew) and of course Irene & Yuna (our biggest backers ;)

Back to PLEDGE

 

 

 

FAQ

For which devices are the cases available?

What will the t-shirt look like?

If I order more than one case, can they be different?

Can my frame be a different color than my panel?

How will I design the case and when will I get it?

What happens if I buy a different Smartphone or Tablet?

Where do you ship?

Where do I upload my text / image?

How do I pick my color?

Can I still access the headphone jack and all buttons of my phone?

How can I help make UCreate3D even cooler?

Where will the money go?

 

Q: For which devices are the cases available?

A: Smartphones

Apple iPhone 4(s) & 5
Samsung Galaxy S2, S3, S4 & Note II
Nokia Lumia 820
HTC One, 8X & Sensation
LG Optimus G
BlackBerry Z10
Sony Xperia Z

Tablets:

Apple iPad 2, 3 & Mini
Samsung Galaxy Tab Note 10.1 & Tab 2
Blackberry Playbook

Back to TOP

Q: What will the t-shirt look like?

 

Q: If I order more than one case, can they be different?

A: Yes, you can mix and match as much as you want. All of our perks are available for one or more of the following Devices
example: If you pre-order 2 smartphone cases you can order 1x iPhone 5 case and 1 Galaxy S3 case.

Back to TOP

 

Q: Can my frame be a different color than my panel?

A:  Yes, you can choose one color for both or two different colors.

Back to TOP

 

Q: How will I design the case and when will I get it?

A:  You can design the case in June, once our webshop it finished. Two weeks later you will receive your customized case! Of course, we will keep you updated on all of our developments.

 Back to TOP

 

Q: What happens if I buy a different smartphone or Tablet?

A: That’s the cool thing about our concept. You can change the model up until you order in June.

Back to TOP

 

Q: Where do you ship?

A: We ship to every country in the world for free! Backers will be responsible for applicable tariffs and customs fees. We ship directly from China.

 

Back to TOP

 

 

Q: Where do I upload my text / image?

A: Once we are ready to 3D Print all the cases we will contact you so you can design the case on our webshop.

Back to TOP

 

Q: How do I pick my color?

A: Once we are ready to 3D Print all the cases we will contact you so you can design the case on our webshop.

Back to TOP

 

Q: Can I still access the headphone jack and all buttons of my phone?

A: Of course, all buttons are accessible and there is a cut-out for the headphone jack so you will have no problems using the port.

Back to TOP

 

Q:How can I help make UCreate3D even cooler?

A: Follow us on Facebook and Twitter, tell us all about your great ideas and share our project with all your friends.

Back to TOP

 

 Q: Where will  the money go?

Go Back to our story

So far we have financed UCreate3D ourselves, and we have been able to develop the first devices and proof of our concept. But now it’s time to take the next step and we need your support! We are using our IndieGoGo campaign in three ways.

1. Webshop

The past couple of months we've worked with an amazing team to develop our webshop. Developing an easy to use web shop isn’t cheap, especially when you want to do it right. Vincent worked 4 years at one of the most successful web shops in Europe, and has successfully launched and managed a multilingual webshop. We expect our fully functional webshop to be ready in June 2013. We will launch our webshop, for IndieGoGo backers only of course. You are going to be the first to choose your device, use your creativity and create your very own 3D Printed  case.

You

  1. Choose your device
  2. Add your favorite quote or upload a logo or an image
  3. Add your name or company name
  4. Choose colors for the case and the back panels

 UCreate3D

      5. 3D Prints the case
      6. Finishes the case
      7. Packages and ships it

 2. Creating the designs

We will continue developing designs for the 15 devices we’ve promised. We want to deliver on the promise: all Smartphones and tablets. With 20 devices we will offer the most devices of all 3D Printing companies. It takes high skilled engineers hours and hours and a couple of runs of 3D printing samples and adjusting to get a perfect case. We will use the money to buy our own paint and coating, which will be applied by experts to ensure the quality.

Focus on quality

Koen is the head of our Hong Kong Office. He has been going in and out of China to build a strong personal relationship with our manufacturers. Its vital to have a team and one of the two founders on the ground in China to be on top of the production process. To ensure quality and eliminate or minimize delays. All to make sure that the designs that you create and see on your screen will be converted flawlessly into final products. During this process we’ve learned a lot and have become very selective when it comes to choosing our partners.

3. Pre-Orders

The more cases will be pre-ordered during this campaign the easier our work gets. We can spread our costs; develop even more cases; have more colors and designs available, and the webshop will be even more awesome!

Go Back to our story

You can design your own case in June!

http://i48.tinypic.com/5fouu8.jpg

You can design your own case in June!
Our cases aren’t just art
We are as passionate and obsessed about quality as we are about the freedom of choice. Most 3D Printed products are not used on a daily basis. A piece of art like that isn’t meant to go in and out of pockets all day long, exposed to bright sunlight and sweaty palms.Today’s 3D Printing techniques are not capable of making products that can withstand these daily challenges. In contrast, our products have been developed especially for daily usage.

The highest quality on the market
That’s why 3D Printed cases require a different, special approach, developed especially for smartphones cases. That’s what we’ve done! We developed a new way of applying our protective coating to withstand all these daily challenges and keep our cases looking brand new. We have worked with the best painting, finishing and case experts to develop our unique way of protecting the case. We have painted sample after sample, with different combinations of paints and coating, until we found our magical mix and were completely satisfied with the end result.
Left: Our case with special coating. Right: Competitors case. Both after 1 month of usage.
The secret is:
After 3D Printing your case we apply multiple layers of paint, the base coat, and a strong high end coating, which originates from the car industry. This multiple layer finishing technique dramatically increases the durability of our cases. Without these layers, your 3D Printed creation would soak up fluids, dirt, and all the things that we encounter every day. We want to make sure that your piece of art stays safe! We were amazed by the quality when we held the case for the first time and we are sure that you’ll feel the same way. Our products have the highest quality of all 3D Printed Cases on the market!

Giftcards are available! 

Our cases are the perfect gift! Buy a sixpack and you don't have to worry about presents for the coming 6 birthdays!

Always wanted to be a Super Hero?
This is your chance to become ours! If you have real super powers (super strength, lightning, spider sense, etc.), please use them to help kickstart our full production process. A large initial order (300+) will help us to scale up, cut costs, improve quality and expand the range of devices. The first cases for four devices are already done. If you are a mere mortal, like us, you can be a great help by backing us so we can develop our webshop and designs for the other 16 devices. With your support we could be shipping the first cases to all of you in June 2013!

Where will the money go?
So far we have financed UCreate3D ourselves, and we have been able to develop the first devices and proof of our concept. But now it’s time to take the next step and we need your support! We are using our IndieGoGo campaign in three ways.
1. Webshop
Developing an easy to use web shop isn’t cheap, especially when you want to do it right. We expect our fully functional webshop to be ready in June 2013. IndieGoGo backers: YOU are going to be the first to create your very own 3D Printed Case.
2. Designs
We will deliver on our promise to develop designs for the 16 other devices. With 20 models we will have the most devices of any 3D printing company. And this is just the beginning. We’ll keep an adding more!
3. Pre-Orders
The more cases pre-ordered during this campaign the more we can spread our costs and the faster we can develop more cases and design, have more colors and designs available, and the better our web shop will be! So...
Please Pledge & Spread the word!
We hope that you are inspired and excited about 3D Printing, by the idea of creating your own Smartphone or tablet case and choose to use your superpowers to support our project. You can also help us by spreading the word to your friends. Every Tweet, Like and Pledge brings us closer to realizing our dream.

$30,000 Stretch Goal: UCreate3D’s Draw-a-thon!
Everyone can design a creative, fun, artistic case with or without a computer. Old schoolers, whip out your black markers! Fellow computer nerds, fire up Photoshop and Illustrator and let’s get ready to rumble! 
On April 25th we will then make a selection of the coolest 10 designs. Then you will be able to vote on which one you like most. The three most popular will be made into 3D models for ALL Smartphones & Tablets by our designers and listed on our web shop! We are only able to do this is we reach the $30,000 mark, so start designing and spreading the words to get your cases on devices worldwide.
You can order the winning designs for your case.
Find the rules of our Draw-A-Thon here

 
 
Your Options










Our Story
Koen and I go way back! We met 12 years ago in Amsterdam through a mutual friend, Rosa (pink hat). We named our logo after her, there is no visual resemblance! UCreate3D was founded in 2012 after a skiing trip with a group of friends in France. We spent the whole week talking about 3D Printing, E-Commerce and entrepreneurship. We got excited about 3D Printing and the impact it will have on everything imaginable. For instance on the case market, availability for all devices and freedom in designing them. When we looked at Koens case, we knew what to do. He finally could have a high quality personalized case for his HTC Sensation. Not much later we founded UCreate3D and started developing our case concept you are looking at right now.  
 
 
We will do everything in our power to fulfill your expectations and we hope you will support us to realize our dream.
Thanks for checking out (y)our project and supporting us so we can realize our dream.
Vincent, Koen and the rest of the UCreate3D team.
If you have any questions or suggestions mail us! 
IndieGoGo@UCreate3D.com
Thank you backers (YOU), Advisory Board (Stans, Remi, Ron & Zeger), Joost, Thomas, Maarten & Ludwig (awesome designers), Maikel & Ingeborg (amazing video crew) and of course Irene & Yuna (our biggest backers ;)
Back to PLEDGE 
 
 
 
FAQ
For which devices are the cases available?
What will the t-shirt look like? 
If I order more than one case, can they be different?
Can my frame be a different color than my panel?
How will I design the case and when will I get it?
What happens if I buy a different Smartphone or Tablet?
Where do you ship?
Where do I upload my text / image?
How do I pick my color?
Can I still access the headphone jack and all buttons of my phone?
How can I help make UCreate3D even cooler?
Where will the money go?
 

Q: For which devices are the cases available?
A: Smartphones
Apple iPhone 4(s) & 5Samsung Galaxy S2, S3, S4 & Note IINokia Lumia 820HTC One, 8X & SensationLG Optimus GBlackBerry Z10Sony Xperia Z
Tablets:
Apple iPad 2, 3 & MiniSamsung Galaxy Tab Note 10.1 & Tab 2Blackberry Playbook
Back to TOP

Q: What will the t-shirt look like?
 

Q: If I order more than one case, can they be different?
A: Yes, you can mix and match as much as you want. All of our perks are available for one or more of the following Devicesexample: If you pre-order 2 smartphone cases you can order 1x iPhone 5 case and 1 Galaxy S3 case.
Back to TOP
 

Q: Can my frame be a different color than my panel?
A:  Yes, you can choose one color for both or two different colors.
Back to TOP
 

Q: How will I design the case and when will I get it?
A:  You can design the case in June, once our webshop it finished. Two weeks later you will receive your customized case! Of course, we will keep you updated on all of our developments.
 Back to TOP
 

Q: What happens if I buy a different smartphone or Tablet?
A: That’s the cool thing about our concept. You can change the model up until you order in June.
Back to TOP
 

Q: Where do you ship?
A: We ship to every country in the world for free! Backers will be responsible for applicable tariffs and customs fees. We ship directly from China.
 
Back to TOP
 
  

Q: Where do I upload my text / image?
A: Once we are ready to 3D Print all the cases we will contact you so you can design the case on our webshop.
Back to TOP
 

Q: How do I pick my color?
A: Once we are ready to 3D Print all the cases we will contact you so you can design the case on our webshop.
Back to TOP
 

Q: Can I still access the headphone jack and all buttons of my phone?
A: Of course, all buttons are accessible and there is a cut-out for the headphone jack so you will have no problems using the port.
Back to TOP
 

Q:How can I help make UCreate3D even cooler?
A: Follow us on Facebook and Twitter, tell us all about your great ideas and share our project with all your friends.
Back to TOP
 
 Q: Where will  the money go?
Go Back to our story
So far we have financed UCreate3D ourselves, and we have been able to develop the first devices and proof of our concept. But now it’s time to take the next step and we need your support! We are using our IndieGoGo campaign in three ways.
1. Webshop
The past couple of months we've worked with an amazing team to develop our webshop. Developing an easy to use web shop isn’t cheap, especially when you want to do it right. Vincent worked 4 years at one of the most successful web shops in Europe, and has successfully launched and managed a multilingual webshop. We expect our fully functional webshop to be ready in June 2013. We will launch our webshop, for IndieGoGo backers only of course. You are going to be the first to choose your device, use your creativity and create your very own 3D Printed  case.
You

Choose your device
Add your favorite quote or upload a logo or an image
Add your name or company name
Choose colors for the case and the back panels

 UCreate3D
      5. 3D Prints the case      6. Finishes the case       7. Packages and ships it
 2. Creating the designs
We will continue developing designs for the 15 devices we’ve promised. We want to deliver on the promise: all Smartphones and tablets. With 20 devices we will offer the most devices of all 3D Printing companies. It takes high skilled engineers hours and hours and a couple of runs of 3D printing samples and adjusting to get a perfect case. We will use the money to buy our own paint and coating, which will be applied by experts to ensure the quality.
Focus on quality
Koen is the head of our Hong Kong Office. He has been going in and out of China to build a strong personal relationship with our manufacturers. Its vital to have a team and one of the two founders on the ground in China to be on top of the production process. To ensure quality and eliminate or minimize delays. All to make sure that the designs that you create and see on your screen will be converted flawlessly into final products. During this process we’ve learned a lot and have become very selective when it comes to choosing our partners.
3. Pre-Orders
The more cases will be pre-ordered during this campaign the easier our work gets. We can spread our costs; develop even more cases; have more colors and designs available, and the webshop will be even more awesome!
Go Back to our story
You can design your own case in June!
http://i48.tinypic.com/5fouu8.jpg

MT7612E Tough Card 5GHz 1W 30dBm


MT7688A, MT7620A modules compatible pins avalible

All are OPENWRT supported, new perks available.

AWM688

AWM071

MT7623A Geek Force Board

Linux, Android, Ubuntu Snappy OS avalible


MT7623A data sheet
MT7623N data sheet
MT7612E 802.11ac Mini PCIe WiFi card

Tiny Low Cost Linux Embedded Computer with WiFi and Ethernet Low Heat AWM002 kit

Customize your IoT(Internet of Things) Now! 

 

Why pay $15 for a WiFi module to attach to your embedded CPU? Why not use a module that runs Linux and WiFi in the same chip for $15?

AWM002 is a module based on the Ralink RT5350with 32MB of RAM and 8MB of flash, Ethernet and 802.11N support too.

This is not a hard to program embbed system, it is full Linux. Hook up a serial port or use SSH and you have the normal Linux command line. Run a web server.  Hook up a printer on USB. Plug in a Zwave USB module. This is full Linux minus the screen.  It runs OpenWRT - www.openwrt.org

Many developers want to use a WiFi devices to do monitoring, communicating, even surveillance. What kind of IC and modules are needed with most effective and low cost? 

This module is included MIPS CPU 380MHz and WiFi functions, also Linux Embedded. It runs OpenWRT. Support is already in OpenWRT, and passed FCC (ID: TKZAWM002), CE. 

After 5 times modifications reaches the low operating temperature. The module size is 25mm x 35mm with 40 pins out.

What applications could be used?

WiFi IP Camera, WiFi Walkie-Talkie, WiFi Speaker, Control Center like Robot and Arduino, 3G station, Cloud Storage server, Smart IP TV repeater, Printer Server, Switch, and many others you can do.

Who are we?

AsiaRF is a more than 10 years dedicated in WiFi area. In beginning generated WiFi high RF power USB, and later on get into WiFi router field.

As we found out Internet of Things, there are many applications can do with router IC, we started to design a AP router module as small as we can.

We had done with many versions of base boards from beginning a bigger base board, like the latest version below.

This one could be in the beginning design and debug your firmware or software.

Later on, we figure out we should design the base board as small as we can for people can apply in everywhere they want.

We had done many works on it, and it is like a baby now for us. 

With your help to develop as much as smaller base board, we can offer more to the people who want to develop IoT devices.

This tiny base board will be 2.7 x 3.5 cm (1.06 x 1.38 inches). There are RJ45, USB type A for USB host, Micro USB for 5V electronic power in. The base board will have some pins can be linked to other devices and so on.

What We Need & What You Get

We need 6,000 USD fund to make the design and make samples to pass FCC and CE with full kit included this tiny base board.

With your help, you will get the kit (The WiFi module and Tiny base board) with full design of this tiny base board included sch, gerber, BOM, SDK(OpenWRT) and applications we suggested.

The Impact

Our campaign is let people know MIPS CPU can do many applications now not only be a device only. With this development, more and more Smart Applications will show up and bring people's life easier and intelligent.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are interesting with our campaign, you can also share with Indiegogo tools.

story:
Navigation:

Summary                             Features                            Benefits for you   

Stretch Goals                     Awesome Perks                Get Free Beelance! 

Impact                                  Where will funds go?       Nerd Talk

About Us                              Press Kit


Beelance is going to be the only app that you will need for all office and personal management, storage and sharing!


Check Out today's Hot offer on the perks. There is some real deal in there. Only limited available per day!


Also, Win free Beelance Check  

Get Free Beelance!


In Short:

What if you could make your office completely paperless, What if your office was a hub on the cloud which your workers have access 24x7. What if you could create, manage, share and collaborate on your projects on the go? What if you are not denied a family Ibiza holiday just because of an appointment in between? Well, its quite a dream but at Beelance we are making all this a reality.

This is the future and we are making it happen! Beelance is a web application that recreates the complete office experience online with added collaboration, note-making, sharing and communication features that'll boost productivity and morale of you and your workers.

In case you don't need one or cant contribute be that awesome employee that tells his/her boss a holy grail to boost productivity. Share or tweet it with friends, every single share counts we love you!

So what exactly does Beelance do?

You might use Skype, ever-note, Basecamp and might have tried tonnes of tools for improving your business productivity and fill communication gaps that exist between you and your workers. Beelance is an all - in one tool that will help you manage projects, share notes, feedback, communicate and collaborate on the go from your PC, Mac, Tablet or Smartphone.

Let's look at the highlights of what you can do with Beelance:

Project management simplified:

A calendar that does everything for you just like a personal assistant. You can do the following things using the calendar

  1. See all running works, progress, people working on it and their schedules.
  2. If you are a worker you can see the deadlines, work plan suggestions etc
  3. Schedule calls, conferences meetings on a particular day at a particular time. Choose who attends the conference and have easy online collaboration. 
  4. Schedule Automatic payments on particular dates
  5. Create Events on particular Dates
  6. Track your works progress and give feedback to your workers from anywhere
  7. Manage you time, resources and finances effectively, Get in depth statistics on your projects for you to analyze and improve productivity
  8. Overall its a one stop to see everything important and take actions,

So now, finally you don'y have to walk from one end of office to the other every 5 minutes to set things up and manage work!

Your files and projects are on the cloud. Now anyone in your team have access to everything whenever they want it no matter where they are.

What's more you can go paperless. Remove the hassle of bulks of paper and files in your office by using Beelance notebooks and projects. Everything is stored,updated and searched in seconds with multiple search filters including the location you saved it from.

Access everything and meet your team anytime with Beelance

Note-making and sharing re-imagined:

Notebooks are the best things you can possibly get to not only keep things organized but also to help you remember the best things you come across everyday

You can save web, emails, articles in snipped non cluttered formats into your notebook and share them or use it in the next conference. Beelance notebooks are the best way to share things online

Web has beautiful things to inspire and share. So snip them save them in the notebook and share it. What's more your notebook can open and edit common  file formats like PDF and DOCx. Its a complete word processor 


Intelligence Calendar, one stop for everything:

This is not just a calendar that shows you everything you have to do, this is a place where you can manage and create new events, automate payments, jump into meetings and see your work plan.

With this level of automation and attention to your tasks, missing deadlines is never possible even if you try to miss them

Never miss anything! punctuality comes with Beelance calendar

Collaborate better than you think:

Beelance provides state of the art communication and collaboration facilities. Yes, you can do everything that you can do in a real office! You can

  1. Video Call to share instructions
  2. Hold Video conferences/Business Meetings live no matter where your employees are
  3. Group Call/Hangouts For collaboration In between workers
  4. File sharing and visual feedback system integrated into calling center for better collaborative work

It's always difficult to convey great ideas effectively especially when you are far away from each other but with Beelance Video studio conferencing solution it's now very simple.

You can open your cloud notebook and show your saved notes/presentations/pictures and then use the tools to draw, edit, mark and share your innovative ideas! yes all in between your conference and its easy


On the cloud, on the go:

How many times have you gone nuts because your company network crashed or you don't have access to a file when you need it the most for the project! Worry no more, Beelance Cloud storage is the best solution.

  1. Store all the project files on Beelance cloud
  2. Every user in the project has access to it
  3. 99.99% up time guaranteed
  4. Your files will be at your fingertips always
  5. You can discuss things on particular file and every user who downloads the file sees the instruction and discussion. You can even clip audio notes to each file and the users will hear them.

Beelance mobile and Tablet apps can not only be used to monitor and see all your works. It has added features like Photo stream to quickly snap things around you, edit it and share it with friends, family or your workers. What's more you can take s a snap and in one click, import it into a live conference. Does that sound cool?


Finance management in clicks:

You might have tried many finance management apps and yes there are really amazing ones out there but what makes Beelance different is that its connected to your activities completely. If you use beelance to manage projects  you never have to import all the things in again. Just import whatever you don't do on beelance!

16 Types of Analysis

Profit and Loss indicators

Heavy Loss analysis

8 Types of Graphs for better in depth understanding of your usage of resources.

Paying employees and receiving payments on time has always been many company's biggest problem. Not only will your workers feel upset and decreases their interest you are also decreasing your reputation. With Beelance, payments are automated and easy

  1. Send and receive payments through Beelance
  2. Credit Card, Paypal, Bitcoin and more options
  3. Automate payments with help of calendar app
  4. Pay overtimes easily by billing overtimes using time tracker tool  
  5. Unmatched analysis on your finances in the finance section
  6. Export\Import  your transaction invoices and more in CSV or XLS files

You don't need to hire another person to manage all your finances now! and yes, Beelance does it better than anyone.

Finance data often mislead us. We need to use right finance management and details to get the best insight out of your transactions.

Beelance not only completely tracks and analyzes your expenditure and earnings,  it shows useful graphs and insights to help you plan better.

It is completely exportable. You can separate you personal and work finances and analyze them separately.

Mesmerizing and easy to use UI:

Beelance is designed to be super easy to use. Its clean user interface makes sure you have access to important things directly from the front page. We have paid utmost importance to User experience so that users can easily find and do things on the site without taking much time.

One of the coolest things in Beelance is the universal search function. From any screen, Search shows highly filterable results. Browse notebooks, notes, projects, files, workers, clients, events and even your deadlines through the search function. You have an option to specify and filter things by using

1. Type (notebook, notes, events, projects, reminders, users, payments etc)

2. Geo Locations: Everything is geo tagged in beelance, you can filter notes, projects, users, events by filtering with location. You might not remember the name you gave for the event or note but you will definitely know where you are conducting the event or where you saved the note from

3. Project (Browse in a particular project)

4. Notebook (Browse in a particular notebook)

5. If you are searching for files filter file types like image, video

6. Author, Browse on of your team mates uploads.notebooks

7. Time and Date

8. Link search: search using image, video, website link to see matching contents

Secure Outsourcing:

Beelance is also an outsourcing and job marketplace. So next time when you are searching for a freelancer for a custom project or a new worker for your company, all you have to do is just list a sub project task and list it as public. relax, and wait for all the Beelance users to see and apply for the job.

What's more you or  your company can opt in to give services on Beelance. You could be landing big projects on Beelance by keeping your public profile updated. We also will integrate a rating system that is specifically designed to rate the quality of work each user delivers.

All this without compromising any confidentiality of your private projects and team.

Security

  1. SSL encryption
  2. 100% https secure
  3. Hacker protection
  4. Heart bleed protection

Benefits

Perfectly managed and organized projects/works

Easy note making and sharing makes quick ideas come to life

Interactive Feedback system to convey ideas better

Powerful collaboration tools 

Allow your workers to work at the time and place they wish

With all your projects on the cloud, you can access any of them any time
No more forgotten CDs and flash drives at office
Easy to update your workers and be informed about updates
No more missing deadlines with Intelligence calendar warning you every day

Prices start at 0$/month (FREE)

Cloud storage + Project management + Finance management + Communication Facilities + Outsourcing at the price less than any other providers combined!

One place to rule them all and save time

Save money by outsourcing works

Oodles of space to store your office works

Access anytime, 100% up time hosting

Drop box like interface and easy to use

With Mobile and tablet apps, work from anywhere

Attend Meetings, Conferences from anywhere

Access project files on the go 

Everything your projects need in one place
Everything integrated and interconnected
No 100s of apps for business, just Beelance!
API for extending the beelance features

Project Timeline



Stretch Goals:

Do not get mislead by 2000$ goal, it is the minimum we will need to get started. here is a full list of goals and We will explain each goals during the time we hit them. 


Pricing

For personal management, occasional project management and moderate cloud storage usage is completely FREE. 

But for those who want to manage work and lot of personal and family things we have exciting plans that will fit everyone. What's more Beelance has an easy upgrade option. so you can take any plan and upgrade storage, conferencing and team, number of projects and more separately. 

All so there is a pay as you go option that lets you pay per each project and enjoy all features unlimited on a single project but there is a restriction of 5 GB space for each project in this case

To know the prices of complete packages and additional storage etc. please contact us via comments and we will surely get back to you.

For those of you who are not sure if a package will fit, you can pre-order vouchers at upto 50% off on the perks

Beelance Vs Competition

We are first of its kind, but there are plenty of project management and note making software out there, lets see how we stack up! 

Sorry, evernote, basecamp, dropbox, mint or anything hit by Beelance. Beelance is the one app that can do everything and has a magic of its own. It is not fair comparing Beelance with any app out there.

Perk Highlights

Early Access (10$ and above)

SPECIAL PLAN OFFERS (Grab limited time plans)

NOTE: User is charged at normal rate after the plan ends (you can downgrade/upgrade/unsubscribe anytime) 

So Get as many months as possible now! There are 3 months & yearly plans on DEAL BUSTER offer, get them now at up to 70% off and save. yeah use the savings to buy more irresistible T-shirts below


Upto 50% off on Beelance Credits

Beelance lets you completely upgrade
-Storage
-Video studio Conference access
-Business features
-Number of projects
-Size of team
So grab credits and use them to upgrade your office on beelance!
  
T-SHIRTS & POSTERS
Our Designers have designed the most amazing set of T-shirts on the planet, Grab them now.  We will do anything to get this project up!


POSTERS 15$

'



The Impact

Every 1$ makes so much of a difference. We wont use jargon and annoy you! Here are some facts illustrated.


Where will the funds go?

Important: 

1> We wont use money that we raise in Indiegogo for marketing, All the funds will go for development and testing purposes only.

2> Funds indicate total remaining money raised after expenditure for perks

Nerd Talk

Beelance Build details

Web: PHP 5.3

iOs: Swift

Android: Eclipse

256 bit Secure payments

100% https secure website.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Build v1.0 basic features:

-Notebooks

      -Notebook editor with HTML support, images, word processor features

      -Geotagged notebooks and notes. Search with multiple filters like location, title, content, image etc

      -Email to note (email a personal beelance address and it will be saved as note

      -SMS/MMS (text Message) to note

      -Business Notes/Personal notes

       -Notebook publishing for online sharing with privacy settings

        -Content Filter, polls, rating and feedback on note sharing

       -Web Clipper - Trim the web and save it in the notes, annotate and edit it and share it     

-Project Management

   -Team management with one click live video chat

   -Video Studio Conferencing

   -File sharing and discussions, Native File support for all images, audio, video PDF, Doc, xls, csv

    -File Preview for Adobe Creative Cloud, Autodesk apps

   -Auto Scheduling calendar

   -Payment system, Automatic payments, invoicing

   -Time management, overtime tracker

   -Project workflow assistance

    -Live project updates, track updates, announce updates, push notifications

    - Worker to Worker Collaboration, Worker - client collaboration, worker Project manger collaboration

     -Warnings (missed deadlines, lazy workers, vacations and schedule)

     -Custom Management API

-Cloud Storage

      -Drag and Drop Cloud Storage

      -Structured Folder View

      -Easy secure Share links

       -Integrated to projects, conferences and notebooks

       -100% Secure and 99% uptime

-FInances

       -Comple analysis of payments and income

        -Import your own data in CSV

        -Export to CSV

         -Automated Payments

          -Auto Profit/Loss monthly analysis report

          -Unlimited Plan users get custom personal report from a finance staff (opt out possible).

-Outsourcing

         - Bidding System

         -Contest System with Design Studio

         -Interview on the go

         -Feedback system

         -User profiles

          -User Community and Social network

- Search

      -Advanced Filtering System

      - Geo tagging feauture

      -

-Mobile and Tablet Features

(please contact the admin via comments to know about prospective additional features on launch)

Beelance API

Beelance API is a major stretch goal to extend the beelance into an open source community with extensions. Our first planned Beelance extension using Beelance API is the Hotel Management API

What will beelance API let developers do?

-Allows Developers to use features of beelance and build upon that a customized suite

-For example the Hotel management API will allow the hotel which uses beelance to manage their project in their completely custom app. This means they can add and extend features according to their need. And also connect to hardware like CCTV, Lights, Electronics, Hardware Devices, e-keys and manage them on Beelance. The possibilities with beelance API is endless

-Add additional features to your office on beelance according to requirements

-Complete Design Customization Of UI. You can build custom UIs for your beelance office suite according to requirements.

-Connect to Devices and hardware. Allowing home/office automation and much more. Giving Master control etc


About Us

The idea of beelance came from the founder Aqueel Miqdad's daily life chaos of having to use and pay for multiple applications online to manage and succeed at his work. 
Aqueel Miqdad:
He is a young entrepreneur a web design enthusiast. He builds websites for fun. He also designs web sites for companies as a freelancer. He also manages a design and development agency called Fresh & Distilled Designs. He is a Computer Science major at Illinois Institute of Technology Chicago
 Mateusz Wozniak:
Mateusz Wozniack heads the UI design department of Beelance. He creates seamless designs that are simple and very effective.
Gautam:
One of Aqueel's long time best friends, Aqueel approached him at first to start developing the Beelance under his guidance. He is the management head of Beelance. Naturally management and clear cut decisions are in his blood. He has a good eye to differentiate appealing and non appealing ideas.
Other Team mates
Beelance team includes 5 developers and 3 designers. If you want to know more about them personally please feel free to contact us via comments.

Risks & Challenges

The main risks and challenges are as follows

  • 3rd party services used in development may cause security and privacyproblems
  • File security and confidentiality from hackers
How we will solve these issues?

  1. We will minimize use of 3rd arty applications on the website, The more funded the more we can rely less on 3rd party services
  2. We will host in 100% https SSL protected secure servers
  3. Encryption for files and data
  4. Internet Heart bleed Protection
What happens if we are not completely funded?

We will still complete the project but at a delay, as we need to find alternatives for funds and development. 

The more we are funded, We will rely less on 3rd party applications like Google and Skype and will also cover more platforms. As development costs are high, our first priority is to complete the web application, then Tablet version, followed by mobile versions.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute that doesn't mean its the end of the world, you still can get Beelance early! We also have a promotional challenge running check it out here

  • You can share this to your boss and impress him at what you found. Undoubtedly Beelance will take any company to the next level. You can rub off your competition like Germany thrashing Brazil in the world cup
  • Use Indiegogo share tools on top of the page and let your friends and family know there is something awesome happening on the Internet

FAQ

Will be updated as per our notice, once we get comments.

And that's all there is to it.

Stretch Goals                     Awesome Perks                Get Free Beelance! 

Impact                                  Where will funds go?       Nerd Talk

About Us                              Press Kit



Beelance is going to be the only app that you will need for all office and personal management, storage and sharing!





Check Out today's Hot offer on the perks. There is some real deal in there. Only limited available per day!


Also, Win free Beelance Check  
Get Free Beelance!



In Short:What if you could make your office completely paperless, What if your office was a hub on the cloud which your workers have access 24x7. What if you could create, manage, share and collaborate on your projects on the go? What if you are not denied a family Ibiza holiday just because of an appointment in between? Well, its quite a dream but at Beelance we are making all this a reality.
This is the future and we are making it happen! Beelance is a web application that recreates the complete office experience online with added collaboration, note-making, sharing and communication features that'll boost productivity and morale of you and your workers.
In case you don't need one or cant contribute be that awesome employee that tells his/her boss a holy grail to boost productivity. Share or tweet it with friends, every single share counts we love you!



So what exactly does Beelance do?You might use Skype, ever-note, Basecamp and might have tried tonnes of tools for improving your business productivity and fill communication gaps that exist between you and your workers. Beelance is an all - in one tool that will help you manage projects, share notes, feedback, communicate and collaborate on the go from your PC, Mac, Tablet or Smartphone.
Let's look at the highlights of what you can do with Beelance:
Project management simplified:

A calendar that does everything for you just like a personal assistant. You can do the following things using the calendar

See all running works, progress, people working on it and their schedules.
If you are a worker you can see the deadlines, work plan suggestions etc
Schedule calls, conferences meetings on a particular day at a particular time. Choose who attends the conference and have easy online collaboration. 
Schedule Automatic payments on particular dates
Create Events on particular Dates
Track your works progress and give feedback to your workers from anywhere
Manage you time, resources and finances effectively, Get in depth statistics on your projects for you to analyze and improve productivity
Overall its a one stop to see everything important and take actions,

So now, finally you don'y have to walk from one end of office to the other every 5 minutes to set things up and manage work!


Your files and projects are on the cloud. Now anyone in your team have access to everything whenever they want it no matter where they are.
What's more you can go paperless. Remove the hassle of bulks of paper and files in your office by using Beelance notebooks and projects. Everything is stored,updated and searched in seconds with multiple search filters including the location you saved it from.Access everything and meet your team anytime with Beelance
Note-making and sharing re-imagined:


Notebooks are the best things you can possibly get to not only keep things organized but also to help you remember the best things you come across everyday
You can save web, emails, articles in snipped non cluttered formats into your notebook and share them or use it in the next conference. Beelance notebooks are the best way to share things online
Web has beautiful things to inspire and share. So snip them save them in the notebook and share it. What's more your notebook can open and edit common  file formats like PDF and DOCx. Its a complete word processor 




Intelligence Calendar, one stop for everything:


This is not just a calendar that shows you everything you have to do, this is a place where you can manage and create new events, automate payments, jump into meetings and see your work plan.
With this level of automation and attention to your tasks, missing deadlines is never possible even if you try to miss them
Never miss anything! punctuality comes with Beelance calendar

Collaborate better than you think:


Beelance provides state of the art communication and collaboration facilities. Yes, you can do everything that you can do in a real office! You can


Video Call to share instructions
Hold Video conferences/Business Meetings live no matter where your employees are
Group Call/Hangouts For collaboration In between workers
File sharing and visual feedback system integrated into calling center for better collaborative work


It's always difficult to convey great ideas effectively especially when you are far away from each other but with Beelance Video studio conferencing solution it's now very simple.
You can open your cloud notebook and show your saved notes/presentations/pictures and then use the tools to draw, edit, mark and share your innovative ideas! yes all in between your conference and its easy

On the cloud, on the go:

How many times have you gone nuts because your company network crashed or you don't have access to a file when you need it the most for the project! Worry no more, Beelance Cloud storage is the best solution.

Store all the project files on Beelance cloud
Every user in the project has access to it
99.99% up time guaranteed
Your files will be at your fingertips always
You can discuss things on particular file and every user who downloads the file sees the instruction and discussion. You can even clip audio notes to each file and the users will hear them.




Beelance mobile and Tablet apps can not only be used to monitor and see all your works. It has added features like Photo stream to quickly snap things around you, edit it and share it with friends, family or your workers. What's more you can take s a snap and in one click, import it into a live conference. Does that sound cool?


Finance management in clicks:



You might have tried many finance management apps and yes there are really amazing ones out there but what makes Beelance different is that its connected to your activities completely. If you use beelance to manage projects  you never have to import all the things in again. Just import whatever you don't do on beelance!
16 Types of Analysis
Profit and Loss indicators
Heavy Loss analysis
8 Types of Graphs for better in depth understanding of your usage of resources.
Paying employees and receiving payments on time has always been many company's biggest problem. Not only will your workers feel upset and decreases their interest you are also decreasing your reputation. With Beelance, payments are automated and easy

Send and receive payments through Beelance
Credit Card, Paypal, Bitcoin and more options
Automate payments with help of calendar app
Pay overtimes easily by billing overtimes using time tracker tool  
Unmatched analysis on your finances in the finance section
Export\Import  your transaction invoices and more in CSV or XLS files

You don't need to hire another person to manage all your finances now! and yes, Beelance does it better than anyone.Finance data often mislead us. We need to use right finance management and details to get the best insight out of your transactions.Beelance not only completely tracks and analyzes your expenditure and earnings,  it shows useful graphs and insights to help you plan better.
It is completely exportable. You can separate you personal and work finances and analyze them separately.

Mesmerizing and easy to use UI:
Beelance is designed to be super easy to use. Its clean user interface makes sure you have access to important things directly from the front page. We have paid utmost importance to User experience so that users can easily find and do things on the site without taking much time.
One of the coolest things in Beelance is the universal search function. From any screen, Search shows highly filterable results. Browse notebooks, notes, projects, files, workers, clients, events and even your deadlines through the search function. You have an option to specify and filter things by using
1. Type (notebook, notes, events, projects, reminders, users, payments etc)
2. Geo Locations: Everything is geo tagged in beelance, you can filter notes, projects, users, events by filtering with location. You might not remember the name you gave for the event or note but you will definitely know where you are conducting the event or where you saved the note from
3. Project (Browse in a particular project)
4. Notebook (Browse in a particular notebook)
5. If you are searching for files filter file types like image, video
6. Author, Browse on of your team mates uploads.notebooks
7. Time and Date
8. Link search: search using image, video, website link to see matching contents
Secure Outsourcing:

Beelance is also an outsourcing and job marketplace. So next time when you are searching for a freelancer for a custom project or a new worker for your company, all you have to do is just list a sub project task and list it as public. relax, and wait for all the Beelance users to see and apply for the job.
What's more you or  your company can opt in to give services on Beelance. You could be landing big projects on Beelance by keeping your public profile updated. We also will integrate a rating system that is specifically designed to rate the quality of work each user delivers.
All this without compromising any confidentiality of your private projects and team.

story:
Thanks for all the supporters help us reach our goal ! 

Perfect Evolution :

The Super Fast Charger Battery and cable that slip in your pocket


Our working prototype is plastic mock up, but we have designed a durable, cool light alloy casing for mass production. That's why we need the funding for the alloy tooling for the final product. Our backer has the choice to pick color or alloy casing for the perk.

Due to popular request, two metallic surface choices is available  :

The Golden Quality


The Platinum Quality 


PalmPower's rapid charge circuit design allows for seamless power transfer.
  • Build in AC adapter transfer energy to your smartphones or tablet
  • Build in 1000 mAh lithium polymer battery
  • Supports Qualcomm Quick-Charge 2.0 rapid charge
  • Supports Apple 2.4mode (Maximun 2.4A@5V)
  • Samsung Galaxy Tablet & Samsung Phones

With Our QC 2.0 fast charge circuit, the charging current for iPhone 6 / 6+ increased from to 2.02 AMP. Charging iPhone 6 / 6+ over 200% faster.

Others Adapters and USB cable can only provide iPhone 6/6+ with a 0.47 AMP charging current.


No more messy cable and additional adapter, It's the perfect travel companion and even include a AC adapter with the retractable cable.


No need to bring 2 chargers, 2 USB cables and a power bank to charge your iPhone and Android devices. The pocket size Palmpower one units replace it all. It come with fast charge AC adapter, retractable high power cable, lightning and micro USB connector to fast charge your iOS or Android devices twice as fast.

It's extremely powerful and can charge even larger devices like the iPad and Galaxy Tablet.



With micro USB For Android and Ligthning For iPhone 6/6+

Due to popular request a type C power adapter is available for the rest of the world and the US.


True Fast Charging On The Go

With the Quick-Charge 2.0 ciruit design and OFC cable, it give you faster and secure charging than other chargers or cable in the market

It is an ultra portable charger with fast charging circuit designed to fully charge your smartphone, support iPhone 6/6+,Samsung and QC 2.0.

With Our QC 2.0 fast charge circuit, the charging current or iPhone 6 increased from 0.47 AMP to 2.02 AMP. Over 400 % increasing charging power.


PalmPower's rapid charge circuit design allows for seamless power transfer.

  • Build in AC adapter transfer energy to your smartphones or tablet
  • Supports Qualcomm Quick-Charge 2.0 rapid charge
  • Supports Apple 2.4mode (Maximun 2.4A@5V)
  • Samsung Galaxy Tablet & Samsung Phones

Fast recharging Oxygen Free Copper Cable

We use highest quality twisted copper in our charging cable

Support higher transmission up to 3.5A

Provides enhanced cable strength and durability



Perks


It is our mission to provide innovative products at deeply discounted pricing for our IndieGoGo backers. Why pay full price at your local retail store when you can double your value with a smaller, faster and more powerful product?  

Be the early bird to get hand on this wonderful fast charging cable !


The ultimate double pack for $45 :


The wonderfour for $69 :

Risks and Challenges:

Being an OEM supplier for the past 10 years, we have developed stringent procedures with our manufacturing factorys, who has been manufacturing grade A quality products for our OEM customers.
They both have been proven with high production capability, therefore manufacturing risk is at a minimum.

As for the challenge of delivery,we have already produced fully functional prototypes, once the funding goal reach, the machine tooling can be done in 4 weeks, then we are already for mass production.
             
Delivery Schedule
