Thanks for all the supporters help us reach our goal ! Perfect Evolution : 

The Super Fast Charger Battery and cable that slip in your pocket
Our working prototype is plastic mock up, but we have designed a durable, cool light alloy casing for mass production. That's why we need the funding for the alloy tooling for the final product. Our backer has the choice to pick color or alloy casing for the perk.Due to popular request, two metallic surface choices is available  :The Golden Quality The Platinum Quality PalmPower's rapid charge circuit design allows for seamless power transfer.
Build in AC adapter transfer energy to your smartphones or tablet
Build in 1000 mAh lithium polymer battery
Supports Qualcomm Quick-Charge 2.0 rapid charge
Supports Apple 2.4mode (Maximun 2.4A@5V)
Samsung Galaxy Tablet & Samsung Phones

With Our QC 2.0 fast charge circuit, the charging current for iPhone 6 / 6+ increased from to 2.02 AMP. Charging iPhone 6 / 6+ over 200% faster.Others Adapters and USB cable can only provide iPhone 6/6+ with a 0.47 AMP charging current.
No more messy cable and additional adapter, It's the perfect 
travel companion and even include a AC adapter with the retractable cable. No need to bring 2 chargers, 2 USB cables and a power bank to charge your iPhone and Android devices. The pocket size Palmpower one units replace it all. It come with fast charge AC adapter, retractable high power cable, lightning and micro USB connector to fast charge your iOS or Android devices twice as fast. It's extremely powerful and can charge even 
larger devices like the iPad and Galaxy Tablet.With micro USB For Android and Ligthning For iPhone 6/6+
Due to popular request a type C power adapter is available for the rest of the world and the US.


True Fast Charging On The Go
With the Quick-Charge 2.0 ciruit design and OFC cable, it give you 
faster and secure charging than other chargers or cable in the marketIt is an ultra portable charger with fast charging circuit designed 
to fully charge your smartphone, support iPhone 6/6+,Samsung and QC 2.0.With Our QC 2.0 fast charge circuit, the charging current or iPhone 6 increased from 0.47 AMP to 2.02 AMP. Over 400 % increasing charging power.
PalmPower's rapid charge circuit design allows for seamless power transfer.
Build in AC adapter transfer energy to your smartphones or tablet
Supports Qualcomm Quick-Charge 2.0 rapid charge
Supports Apple 2.4mode (Maximun 2.4A@5V)
Samsung Galaxy Tablet & Samsung Phones
Fast recharging Oxygen Free Copper CableWe use highest quality twisted copper in our charging cableSupport higher transmission up to 3.5AProvides enhanced cable strength and durabilityPerks

It is our mission to provide innovative products at deeply discounted pricing for our IndieGoGo backers. Why pay full price at your local retail store when you can double your value with a smaller, faster and more powerful product?  
Be the early bird to get hand on this wonderful fast charging cable ! 


The ultimate double pack for $45 :









The wonderfour for $69 :


Risks and Challenges:Being an OEM supplier for the past 10 
years, we have developed stringent procedures with our manufacturing 
factorys, who has been manufacturing grade A quality products for our 
OEM customers. They both have been proven with high production capability, therefore manufacturing risk is at a minimum.As
 for the challenge of delivery,we have already produced fully functional
 prototypes, once the funding goal reach, the machine tooling can be 
done in 4 weeks, then we are already for mass production.              Delivery Schedule

story:
Why I did this?

I want to own a large screen like in the cinema for my family. We can talk , laugh freely, play and share our story together.

Also I can put the screen wherever I want in my home and I can carry it whenever travelling , and we can enjoy more time and more often as a family.

But I can’t afford myself cinema so I decided to realize my dream.


What you get ?

  • Live Pico can create an exclusive drive-in cinema, just need  connect to the car stereo via Bluetooth if you drive car while driving out with your family or friends.You can share the movie or vocal concert with them, you will fell yourself in the real cinema , and the felling is wonderful.

  • It can help you to create a Romantic atmosphere when you needed.  For example, you can express your love to you girlfriend at the seaside: show the pictures which you once photographed and it reminds all things that you have ever made, also if you want to propose at this moment , it will make your dream come true.

  • Are you troubled by the small screen when exercising? Live Pico can solve this obsession , you can just connect Live Pico to SD card or mobile hard disk drive then Live Pico will reflect it to wall or anyplace you want. You can dance or do yoga with the larger screen which will  bring more amazing personal experience and it also could improve your interest and let you enjoy the exercising more and more.



  • More and more Kids are crazy about tablets, smart phones, but lots of time they are play alone, which makes them feel lonely and self-centered. Why don't we squeeze some quality time with the children and enjoy the hours of happiness together. You can read anything or play games or watch any movie with your kids together just like you are in the family cinema .No need worry about harming their eyes and health because Live Pico can soften the light which becomes harmless. Of course you can add more family meaningful things, to shorten the soul distance between you and your kids, and your family will be more harmonious. 


Schedule

story:
Introduction

My name is James Lee. I am asking for your help to complete TopXNotes 2.0 (pronounced Top-Ten-Notes) for Mac.

There is nothing like TopXNotes on the market for Mac or PC. As far as we know there is no other app that can display multiple notes in adjacent views like TopXNotes. We call it MultiView and with it you can not only view multiple notes at once, you can edit each independently with the aid of a sliding test toolbar to access your fonts, colors and other information, sliding in place right over the note you are typing in automatically. You can also drag and drop, or cut/copy/paste from note view to note view, or to/from any other Mac text app.

TopXNotes contains a unique dual-level encryption to keep sensitive information safe and the QuickNotes feature for instant access from the desktop to your most important information. There is no other hybrid personal information organizer (PIO) and security app like TopXNotes.  Help us build TopXNotes 2 today by contributing to our TopXNotes 2 crowd funding campaign and benefit from one of the many perks we are offering for doing so.

The goal of this campaign is funding TopXNotes development for 2015 and well into 2016. I have enough ideas for TopXNotes, many contributed by our wonderful customers, to continue working on TopXNotes for years into the future. I would love to do just that, but need to fund development to complete the next release.

Why is this so important to us? TopXNotes has many unique benefits that are touched on below, but mainly, this is important to us because we love helping folks get their personal information organized and secured. 

If you are an existing TopXNotes customer please consider the $30 perk, a $20 savings on the TopXNotes 2 price. If you are not already using TopXNotes, please check out the short video tutorial on TopXNotes benefits and consider one of our many other perks.

Why is this so important to us? TopXNotes has many unique benefits that are touched on below, but mainly, this is important to us because we love helping folks get their personal information organized and secured. 

My Background

I am an experienced Mac and iOS programmer, scientific and systems software engineer and software development manager. I have developed Mac software and I have led the development of Mac and iOS apps. For more on me see my profile.

TopXNotes Background

I lead a small team developing our flagship product TopXNotes. TopXNotes was first introduced at Macworld in 2005 and has been under constant use and active development since then. TopXNotes has been presented to over 100 Mac User Groups across the country. A free trial of TopXNotes can be downloaded right now by clicking here: http://www.tropic4.com/download/TopXNotes.zip.

Please help me continue the development of TopXNotes. We need your help in order to complete and release version 2.0 of TopXNotes. Current sales of TopXNotes are not enough to fund future development. We need to raise $50,000 to continue development through 2015 and into 2016. 

TopXNotes 2 Campaign

We need operating capital to complete TopXNotes 2. In order to raise the capital quickly, we are offering some amazing deals (Indiegogo calls them “Perks”) on TopXNotes licenses, and licenses of our other software.

What We Need & What You Get

The Funding

We need to raise additional capital to continue development of TopXNotes 2.0. We have already completed the basic parts of many of the major features including upgrades to the QuickNotes feature, notes (pictures in notes, many new drag and drop options), stronger (AES 256) encryption, and rewritten WiFi Sync, NoteOrganizer and ToDo Notes. Though much of the basic work is complete, we need your help to round out and refine each of these into the true gems we want them to be. So, to use a sports analogy, we are in the red zone and need a touchdown!

We also have a few more features to add to TopXNotes 2.0, but those features will depend on the time we have to complete the work, and that depends on the funding.

What You Get

This is a flexible funding campaign. If the goal is not reached then your contribution will still be used to help Tropical Software release TopXNotes 2.0. and you will still receive the “perk” you choose.

The Perks

The perks are personal or site license keys for TopXNotes 1 or 2 (or both) at bargain prices (less than or matching the regular price). Here are two examples:

The $25 perk is a license key which is valid only for version 1.x and you will need to upgrade to version 2.0 when TopXNotes 2 is released.

The $30 perk is a reduced price license key (for existing customers only) which will be valid only for version 2.x when TopXNotes 2 is released.

The $50 perk is a unique license key which is valid for both TopXNotes 1.x (immediately) and TopXNotes 2.0 (when released).

The $75 perk is a unique license key which is valid for both TopXNotes 1.x (immediately) and TopXNotes 2.0 (when released), and one copy or each of our Mac apps (the 2Remember reminder program, Kitchen Timer, and our contacts navigation app iAddressX).

We feel each perk is a bargain designed just for you, and we structured the campaign this way because we want to show our deep appreciation to you for helping us.

The Impact

An Introduction to TopXNotes

TopXNotes is a hybrid Personal Information Organizer (PIO) and information security app. TopXNotes has many unique features. One TopXNotes feature is MultiView, that offers the benefit of being able to display and edit more than one note at a time simultaneously. As far as we know no other program can do this on Mac or PC. Part of MultiView technology is another benefit, its distinctive sliding text toolbar that is always above where you are typing. This too is in no other program that we know about. TopXNotes has many other benefits you can read about. Click below to take the tour of TopXNotes: (http://www.tropic4.com/topxnotes.html).

How  We View TopXNotes

Here is a short description of how we feel about TopXNotes:

You do not need a note or task manager that takes more time to learn than its intended purpose.  You need a simple, easy to learn, easy to use personal note, password and task manager.

Information management should not be your full time job, it should help you do your job or complete tasks. TopXNotes will put your mind at ease by helping you create, view, organize, and instantly access your important information and much more. You can read about the “much more” in the many good reviews referenced on our website and in TopXNotes extensive built-in Help.

TopXNotes 2.0

If you already have TopXNotes you are familiar with TopXNotes extensive benefits for organizing and securing your notes. With TopXNotes 2 you will continue to receive these benefits plus new features with a very similar user interface.  When you get TopXNotes 2, you should be able to use it immediately as the user interface will be improved, but little will be changed in the basic way it works. So if you are already using TopXNotes, most of your knowledge of TopXNotes 1 will enable you to get right to work with TopXNotes 2. Here is an example of TopXNotes 2 development, a MultiView of 5 notes and the NoteOrganizer each note view showing pictures in notes, running on the latest Mac OS X 10.11, El Capitan:

We consider many of the 2.0 features nearly guaranteed since they are already partly implemented or completed features. As noted above, we have completed basic development of QuickNotes 2.0, improved notes (pictures in notes, many new drag & drop options), basic view note in separate window,  stronger (AES 256) encryption, improved WiFi sync, an improved NoteOrganizer (many new drag & drop options), and ToDo Notes. (TopXNotes “ToDo Notes” is a new concept, which marries the power of TopXNotes with a unique ToDo implementation.) The remaining features will depend on the time we have to complete the work, and that depends on the funding.

The final feature set for TopXNotes 2.0 will depend on the time available for development and not everything will be in TopXNotes 2.0. We anticipate a 2.1 and other releases. 

Risks & Challenges

Why Indiegogo?

For some of you this may be your first exposure to Indiegogo, a marvelous operation that, as Indiegogo states “empowers people to activate the global community to make ideas happen.” According to Wikipedia (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indiegogo), Indiegogo was founded in 2008 as one of the first sites to offer crowd funding. Indiegogo allows people to solicit funds for an idea, charity or start-up business. From Indiegogo’s research, they have found people fund ideas they can be passionate about and people they trust. We hope to assure you that we are passionate about notes, about getting you organized on your Mac, and can be trusted to deliver TopXNotes 2.0.

Our Personal Commitment

Many Mac note products have been created in the past, so I can understand how you might wonder why anyone would want to do it again. Creating a better Mac notepad was not too hard when we started, but creating a sophisticated, feature-rich, personal information organizer with our unique dual-level encryption and multiple view architecture was a huge project with many facets and lots of testing to be sure data was safe. 

For me, TopXNotes has been and remains a compelling project filled with challenging problems. TopXNotes started as a simple extension of some consulting I had done down in south Florida. I gained some knowledge of Apple's text system and realized it would be easy to make a notepad with many fancy text options like one sees in Microsoft Word, Apple's Pages and TextEdit. But as TopXNotes progressed, I realized it could be very valuable as a place to collect all the little bits of information scattered across my Mac's many “nooks and crannies," in multiple formats, to get them all centralized in one place, and to create the QuickNotes system for easy access from the Mac desktop. So, TopXNotes evolved from just one more simple notepad into a powerful note organizer—a note organizer worth paying for. 

Steve Jobs liked the expression “we eat our own dog food” to explain how Apple used its own development tools and other products as they were being developed to be sure they were the best they could be. We have always used TopXNotes during its development for planning, bug lists, proposed feature lists, call agendas, and many other tasks.

TopXNotes has always been popular with the Apple/Mac User Groups, and it did briefly make it into the Apple physical stores before it was bumped (along with many other boxes of Mac software) to make room for iPad accessories.

However, I have now reached a point where TopXNotes has to pay its way. TopXNotes is not a one-person business, but almost. I take care of some of the development and most of everything else (support, website, marketing, sales) and now, crowd funding. I have a very small crew of dedicated developers helping me with TopXNotes. Supporting TopXNotes is to support me, my family, and our small development team. If you want to you can read a bit more about Tropical Software (http://www.tropic4.com/about.html), about our team (http://www.tropic4.com/team.html) and the background for this crowd funding campaign.

Q and A

What happens after the funded period if the goal is reached?

Ideally, the regular daily sales of TopXNotes 2.0 will be enough to continue full time development. If not, then I might create a new crowd funding campaign.

What happens if the goal is not reached?

This also depends on the daily regular sales. I will continue to support existing users, but my primary occupation might be something other than TopXNotes.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the Word

You do not have to make a funding contribution to support the development of TopXNotes. There are other ways to help. Spread the word whenever you can and/or follow me on Facebook, Twitter or use the Indiegogo share tools.

Version: 2015.10.09

story:
Four months ago we got in touch with our opponents at Better Together and proposed we, together, host a large-scale debate, with joint promotion, organisation and funding.  They told us initially they were "too busy" organising speakers for meetings at Strathclyde University - a programme consisting of a grand total of 4 events over 6 months.


We went back to them at the beginning of February, asking if they were now ready to sit down and begin the process of planning a debate and discussion supported by both sides of the debate in the best interests of democratic openness.

They refused.

We believe the people of Glasgow deserve better.  Whatever your views on the decision we'll take in September, we believe you should have the opportunity to hear from those for and against independence, to see them test each other's arguments, and to have your say in an open, free, and public forum.

Our nation's future will be decided this year.  The decision as to which of two futures we travel down - within the UK or as an independent, self-governing country - is too important to be left to politicians, TV panellists and newspaper columnists.  It's a decision that all of us, collectively, will take - and that all of us must feel informed and knowledgable about.

To that end, we are going ahead with the debate we originally proposed to the official No campaign.  We will invite speakers from each side of the debate, secure an impartial and fair Chair, book a venue, publicise and market the debate, and do everything we can to make sure the people of Glasgow have an opportunity to play a full part in the discussion on Scotland's future.

We want to:

  • Print and distribute a minimum of 100,000 leaflet advertising the debate
  • Book and pay for a large, open, and accessible venue in the City Centre
  • Publicise the debate in print, electronic and social media
  • Hire equipment for the event, including PA and video equipment

No money will be wasted, and any surplus will be used to support and promote local campaign across the city in the remaining six months of the campaign.

Like the rest of the Yes campaign, we are a volunteer, grassroots organisation, reliant on donations to support events like this.  If you can, please donate what you can.  No amount is too small or too big to help..


Thanks.

Yes Glasgow
story_txt:
Four months ago we got in touch with our opponents at Better Together and proposed we, together, host a large-scale debate, with joint promotion, organisation and funding.  They told us initially they were "too busy" organising speakers for meetings at Strathclyde University - a programme consisting of a grand total of 4 events over 6 months.We went back to them at the beginning of February, asking if they were now ready to sit down and begin the process of planning a debate and discussion supported by both sides of the debate in the best interests of democratic openness.They refused.We believe the people of Glasgow deserve better.  Whatever your views on the decision we'll take in September, we believe you should have the opportunity to hear from those for and against independence, to see them test each other's arguments, and to have your say in an open, free, and public forum.Our nation's future will be decided this year.  The decision as to which of two futures we travel down - within the UK or as an independent, self-governing country - is too important to be left to politicians, TV panellists and newspaper columnists.  It's a decision that all of us, collectively, will take - and that all of us must feel informed and knowledgable about.To that end, we are going ahead with the debate we originally proposed to the official No campaign.  We will invite speakers from each side of the debate, secure an impartial and fair Chair, book a venue, publicise and market the debate, and do everything we can to make sure the people of Glasgow have an opportunity to play a full part in the discussion on Scotland's future.We want to:
Print and distribute a minimum of 100,000 leaflet advertising the debate

Book and pay for a large, open, and accessible venue in the City Centre


Publicise the debate in print, electronic and social media


Hire equipment for the event, including PA and video equipment

No money will be wasted, and any surplus will be used to support and promote local campaign across the city in the remaining six months of the campaign.Like the rest of the Yes campaign, we are a volunteer, grassroots organisation, reliant on donations to support events like this.  If you can, please donate what you can.  No amount is too small or too big to help..Thanks.Yes Glasgow

story:
Summary

Hi, we're a team of young Jamaican students at the University of the West Indies seeking to build a global sports app for Android and iPhone.

We know, it's a massive undertaking, but one we feel we are up to. We are a team of 3 supported by a mentor:

  • Lance Williams - is a successful high-school athlete currently attending the University of the West Indies studying Accounting.
  • Ritesh Reddy - won a Jamaican coding competition while in high school for a mobile app that provided alerts about missing children. He also attends the University of the West Indies studying Computer Science.
  • Francois Brown - is an Electronics Engineering major at the University of the West Indies whose passion for sports knows no bounds.
  • Chad Cunningham - is our mentor and a successful Jamaican internet entrepreneur and brings years of startup experience and advise.

We are currently seeking $900 to finalize our App for launch before the 2014 FIFA World Cup. This is hugely important to us, as we feel the World Cup is the perfect time to launch such an App. However we are lacking some critical coding and customizations that we need to be ready in time.

You can make it happen. Each and every contribution makes a difference. You can help us become the first ever global app from Jamaica!


What We Need & What You Get

Let's break it down in more detail:

What we need?
We need US$900 in funding to pay for completion of our App for both iPhone & Android. We will use the funds to purchase the additional coding & customization that we need from a company in Asia.

What You Get?
In exchange, not only will you be the first to get access to the App but your will also receive. Get them excited!

If we fall short?
If we don’t reach your entire goal we will use the funds earned to at least develop the Android version. We believe this is the more important of the two based on global usage numbers.


The Impact

Infanity is the missing part of any sports fan's life. Facebook, Twitter and Instagram are cluttered with tonnes of meaningless content. Sports fans just want sports. Simple.

Our goal is to get this App ready to launch in time for FIFA World Cup 2014. Your contribution can make it a reality.

  • Finally the app you want - News and photos from all your favorite sports teams. Talk trash with your friends. Feast on sports material on your phone whenever you want it.
  • Proven talent - We have successfully developed Mobile Apps before. Winning a competitions in Jamaica and brulding successful web apps.
  • Global or nothing - We truly believe that we can create a global sports app that people will love to use.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you simply don't have the money or don't have a credit card, that's ok.
You still don't mind helping us right?

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools and tell your friends!

story:
because we needed a better tool



We work on graphic design, video editing or CAD on a daily basis. Keyboard and mouse are great, but they are far from giving you the same sensitivity and abilities as your hand. 

The same applies to music, browsing or presentations. We need a tool that gives us flexible shortcuts and perfect control, a tool that makes the things we love fast, precise, intuitive and fun. 

That's why we created a freely programmable wireless controller.


"Why Senic's controller is important for designers and creatives"

by Garry Tan, Partner Y Combinator

"How we built it"

by Team Senic on Medium (44,000 Views)



Made for your hand

The best of three worlds




We've tried out many tools. We liked some functions; others not so much.
With the controller, we combined three technologies in a way that suits the needs of those who work and live like we do.
Hand gesture recognition, sensitive touch and precise haptics make it the perfect tool for anyone who wants to work, play and create in the digital world.



For your computer

Dozens of controls out of the box



We have already developed controls for more than 30 of the most popular applications. Week by week, you will see more controls which means that your controller will  evolve over time. Your intuition is our roadmap.
Let us know which shortcuts or controls are important to you and we'll get right to work. 

For your smart devices

Home should feel like home



We love smart homes. We backed some of the earliest smart devices and love them. The problem is that controlling them with your smartphone is not a great experience. 
Read more: "Smartphone ≠ smart home"
We wanted a simple device that gave us natural and instant access to our smart lights and speakers.


Use Cases

Make it your own









Better Control

through Haptics, Precision and Speed








Fits into your life

"By design"




The best tools never get noticed.

We aim to make our controller beautiful in its functional complexity yet inconspicuous in your environment. 

It seamlessly fits into your lives. Therefore, Senic's controller had to be portable and simple to use. 





Tech Specs

Design meets technology







Connectivity

Works with your devices you already own




It connects directly to anything that speaks Bluetooth Low Energy with no additional hardware required. 
We'll start off by supporting Mac, then add support for iOS devices, Android, Linux and Windows. We're making progress fast and we'll keep you posted along the way.



Setup

Personalize your controller






Choose between hundreds of setups and create your own personal controls and shortcuts. You'll be able to access your settings through an intuitive web interface. We can add mobile apps as well.

 


Open Platform

Create your own applications



Senic's controller's speciality is the combination of hardware and software and the possibilities this uncovers. We built it on an open platform, so developers can build even more applications. It is possible to implement custom shortcuts as well as Apple Script. 




Our team grew up immersed around tools and raw materials. Our parents are carpenters, engineers and electricians. 
It is fascinating and inspiring to watch how unconsciously they use their tools and the beauty and quality that results from using them.
Why can't interaction with the digital world feel the same way? 

We experimented extensively in our quest to combine the physical and digital worlds. Our dream is to live in an ecosystem where technology naturally blends into our lives, allowing us to analyze, control and create in a fluid fashion. 


This controller is the first major step towards this goal and you are the ones who will enable it. From the bottom of our hearts, thank you so much. We promise to work harder and smarter than we can imagine. 


Our Team


Philip

Philip is an Electrical Engineer. He worked on quantum computers in Berkeley, worked for companies like Audi and has built microchips from scratch.

❤ Chinese & Rock'n'Roll

Chirantan

Chirantan is a Computer Scientist. He has developed more than 20 commercially used software products and has been involved in the Ruby community from the beginning. 

❤ Cooking & Photography

Felix

Felix is an Industrial Designer. He studied in Germany and Sweden and has designed musical instruments, cars and industrial machines. 

❤ Music & Design


Tobias

Tobias is a Product Manager. He worked in the US, Germany, Mexico and Korea, was part of YCombinator and German Accelerator and has won numerous innovation awards. 

❤ Psychology & Design






Design Process

We care about details




 "Good design is as little design as possible: less, but better - because it concentrates on the essential aspects, and the products are not burdened with non-essentials. Back to purity, back to simplicity." - Dieter Rams

We're using some of the latest technologies from material sciences, prototyping and electronics to build our controller and went through dozens of iterations until we were satisfied with a design, both functionally and aesthetically.



Made Locally

Support local manufacturing







We are proponents of local manufacturing. Why? Because you can only build quality products if you're in close proximity with your manufacturers and suppliers.

We're witnessing tremendous changes in the way products are and will be manufactured. This evolution has allowed products to be made locally. We have to be willing to explore the opportunities and lead by example. 

We're happy to share our entire process with you. There is true beauty in craftsmanship giving birth to appreciation for skills and quality. 





Cost

Where your money goes



Initial costs for hardware products are very high. Prices drop with larger quantities but costs like production tooling and certification are big hurdles for startups.
Have you ever wondered what the CE and FCC symbols on the back of your electronics products stand for? They certify that the products are safe to use. In order to produce the controller, we have to go through many tests from electromagnetic compatibility to safety tests. That costs a lot of money. 
Therein lies the essence of crowdfunding. You help small teams like us to build something which would otherwise be impossible to make. Thank you so much!

Referral Program

Get a bag from high grade materials for free.



It is your perfect companion, wherever you go. To protect your controller, we will add a bag from high quality materials which is also crafted in Germany. 
If 1 of your friends contributes to at least 1 of our controllers, YOU get one of these bags for free. We only have a limited number. Here is how you refer a friend: 
1. Make sure you're logged in (check your name on top of the Indiegogo page)
2. Copy the link of the page (it includes a number, this is your personal ID)
3. Send this link to your friend.
That's it. If your friend uses that link to back the controller (which includes your ID) we can attribute the contribution to your referral.



Rewards and Stretchgoals

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts!



Stretch goal 1 (UNLOCKED): We sent out a survey asking you what kind of stretch goals you like. More than 300 of you participated. Now that we reached 300%, you will be able to choose between the classic controller's design or an all black edition. 

Stretch goal 2 (400%): If we reach 400%, we will be able to add a wall mount for the controller. This is the perfect accessory if you want to use it as a controller for connected devices like Philips Hue, LifX or Sonos speakers. It is very easy to take off and put back on again. 



Stretch goal 3 (500%): If we reach 500%, we will be able to shoot a small movie about Senic's controller which shows how it is designed and manufactured. Just like in a real movie, the stars (YOU, OUR BACKERS!!!!!!) will be listed in the credits at the end of the movie. Stay golden!



Timeline




FAQ


I forgot to add shipping, what now?
Don't worry. You can still add shipping by using the box to the right of the video and above the pink contribute button. 
Please add:
$10 for shipping within Europe and
$20 for international shipping. 
How many controls does it have?
This might still slightly change based on the feedback you guys give us:
- Ring (2): Left and Right. It can also detect how fast you turn.
- Buttons (5), Left, Right, Middle, Up, Down
- Capactive Touch (4): Swipe Left, Right, Up, Down. You can also use certain areas of the touch surface as digital inputs
- Gesture Recognition (6): Left, Right, Up, Down, High, Low. It can also detect how fast you wave your hand. 
Does your controllerw replace the mouse?
No. Senic's controller was designed as a natural user interface that gives you speed and precision and works complimentary with your computer / mouse. 
Does it work like Leap Motion?
Our controller and Leap motion both use infrared technology. With Leap Motion you can track individual positions of fingers for example. For our applications like switching songs we needed simpler controls like swipe right or left.
The controller seems to be elevated, what's on the bottom?
We use an anti-slip material so it doesn't skid around. 

Can I use multiple controllers?

Yes. It uses Bluetooth Low Energy. This means that you can use an unlimited number of the controller. 

Can I use one control for multiple actions like dimming lights and turning on the computer?

Yes. This is done on the software side. Just let us or the other developers know what you need. 

What is the maximum distance for Senic's controller?

This heavily depends on where you use it. It can range anywhere from 5 to 50m. It should be enough for any conventional apartment or house.

story:
NOW SHIPPING FROM GOOD Ol' CANADA

ORDER NOW AND GET YOUR PEEK SCREEN SHIPPED WITHIN A WEEK!

______

The iPhone fundamentally changed humanity. We used to have to go long distances to get our hands on what we needed, but now everything we need is right in the palm of our hands. We can text relatives around the world, collaborate on office documents, and pay our banking bills anytime, anywhere. Our phones hold great power, along with very important, sensitive and meaningful information.

With everything accessible with the click of a button, it's not hard for others to peek into our lives. This is why we've designed the Peek Screen; a highly transparent tempered glass protective cover that brings strength, durability, and privacy to your mobile device. You won't notice it, but others sure will.

When we looked up from our phones during the busy subway commute to work, we noticed that at least three-quarters of the people crowded around us were looking down at their phones. We could see everything they were doing from messaging friends to swiping on dating apps to reading financial briefs for the morning's meetings.

We opened our eyes and realized that people everywhere are looking and reading over others' shoulders. How could we stop people from peeking into our lives?

 We researched and found a quick and seemingly perfect solution: the privacy screen. We bought one, then another, and another. Unfortunately, what was out there was not good. 

 

 

Everyone advertised the same thing, but the actual screens were hard to see through from all angles, thick and chunky when glass, and flimsy and ugly when plastic; essentially, the privacy screen interrupted our iPhone's intended functionality and beautiful design. 

There was room for huge improvement, and so we innovated.

  

We created the Peek Screen because we're avid iOS users, and couldn't find a high-quality protector that did it all – privacy, strength, and elegant design – for the right price. 

  

We love our iPhones not just for the important and meaningful information they hold, but also for their beautifully simple design – so it's important to protect our iPhones, and the information they hold, with something elegant, sleek and strong. 

 

The Peek Screen's polarized film layer keeps your private texts, web browsing, and work emails safe from others' eyes. Keep it vertical for privacy, and turn it sideways to share with friends.

When we looked at other screens, they typically fell around 75% clarity, which means it's sometimes dark and difficult to see your phone even when it's only you and you're looking at it straight on. Our engineering team took a giant step forward to 87% clarity, the best in the market, and such high quality that it only interferes with other people looking at your iPhone.

The Peek Screen is made with eco-friendly 9H Hard tempered glass, which prevents scratches, doesn't crack under pressure, and is ultra responsive to your touch. 

We dip our glass into potassium nitrate (KNO3) solution that is heated to 430 degrees Celsius, or almost 810 degrees Fahrenheit, tempering it to ensure that the Peek Screen keeps your iPhone the way it's supposed to be: powerful and beautiful. Plastic protectors do not feel, function, or look the same – the Peek Screen adds a slim 0.3mm of real tempered glass to your iPhone, fully protecting its functionality, without hurting its natural elegant design. The Peek Screen also gets along with phone cases, unlike other tempered glass screens. Put it on for extra protection and style!

Think of the  Peek Screen as  insurance on your mobile device. Rather than paying $100 or more for getting your actual mobile screen replaced and functional again, the Peek Screen comes away with the damages, leaving your actual phone screen safe and sound, and your wallet happy. 

 

 

In only 0.3mm, the Peek Screen packs a hell of a punch. Its oleophobic top layer stops oily finger/water smudges and scratches, keeping your iPhone clean and smooth.

The Peek Screen goes easily onto your iPhone and stays there. When we tried out other privacy screens, they were hard to put on our iPhone, left lots of air bubbles, and eventually peeled off.

The Peek Screen uses advanced Nippa OCA, which stands for Optically Clear Adhesive. This high-quality Japanese-made adhesive uses gravity to set in place, which means no air bubbles, and an ultraclear screen that stays on your iPhone for as long as you want it there. 

Just because it's well made doesn't mean it has to be expensive. We've left that motto in the behind, and brought you an affordable well-made product. 

& now for the iPhone 7 and 7 Plus

We believe that slowing down in life inspires your creations. We take our time to design intentional, technological products that people use all around the globe. SlowLabs represent ease, exploration, & advancement. We're a collective of young professionals – designers, engineers, and critical thinkers – driving innovation with purpose. We find pride in our products because of their usability, environmental sustainability, and positive impact on people's lives. We believe in ourselves because of our curious, exploratory attitude, which pushes us to new places, and generates innovative ideas that could positively change the world.

We're now on Indiegogo because we believe in collectively driving innovation. We believe your support can bring the Peek Screen, and many other meaningful ideas and designs, to the world! Join us and lets make it happen!

Our phones hold great power, along with very important, sensitive and meaningful information.With everything accessible with the click of a button, it's not hard for others to peek into our lives. This is why we've designed the Peek Screen; a highly transparent tempered glass protective cover that brings strength, durability, and privacy to your mobile device. You won't notice it, but others sure will.When we looked up from our phones during the busy subway commute to work, we noticed that at least three-quarters of the people crowded around us were looking down at their phones. We could see everything they were doing from messaging friends to swiping on dating apps to reading financial briefs for the morning's meetings.We opened our eyes and realized that people everywhere are looking and reading over others' shoulders. How could we stop people from peeking into our lives? We researched and found a quick and seemingly perfect solution: the privacy screen. We bought one, then another, and another. Unfortunately, what was out there was not good.   Everyone advertised the same thing, but the actual screens were hard to see through from all angles, thick and chunky when glass, and flimsy and ugly when plastic; essentially, the privacy screen interrupted our iPhone's intended functionality and beautiful design. There was room for huge improvement, and so we innovated.  We created the Peek Screen because we're avid iOS users, and couldn't find a high-quality protector that did it all – privacy, strength, and elegant design – for the right price.   We love our iPhones not just for the important and meaningful information they hold, but also for their beautifully simple design – so it's important to protect our iPhones, and the information they hold, with something elegant, sleek and strong.  The Peek Screen's polarized film layer keeps your private texts, web browsing, and work emails safe from others' eyes. Keep it vertical for privacy, and turn it sideways to share with friends.When we looked at other screens, they typically fell around 75% clarity, which means it's sometimes dark and difficult to see your phone even when it's only you and you're looking at it straight on. Our engineering team took a giant step forward to 87% clarity, the best in the market, and such high quality that it only interferes with other people looking at your iPhone.The Peek Screen is made with eco-friendly 9H Hard tempered glass, which prevents scratches, doesn't crack under pressure, and is ultra responsive to your touch. We dip our glass into potassium nitrate (KNO3) solution that is heated to 430 degrees Celsius, or almost 810 degrees Fahrenheit, tempering it to ensure that the Peek Screen keeps your iPhone the way it's supposed to be: powerful and beautiful. Plastic protectors do not feel, function, or look the same – the Peek Screen adds a slim 0.3mm of real tempered glass to your iPhone, fully protecting its functionality, without hurting its natural elegant design. The Peek Screen also gets along with phone cases, unlike other tempered glass screens. Put it on for extra protection and style!Think of the  Peek Screen as  insurance on your mobile device. Rather than paying $100 or more for getting your actual mobile screen replaced and functional again, the Peek Screen comes away with the damages, leaving your actual phone screen safe and sound, and your wallet happy.   In only 0.3mm, the Peek Screen packs a hell of a punch. Its oleophobic top layer stops oily finger/water smudges and scratches, keeping your iPhone clean and smooth.The Peek Screen goes easily onto your iPhone and stays there. When we tried out other privacy screens, they were hard to put on our iPhone, left lots of air bubbles, and eventually peeled off.The Peek Screen uses advanced Nippa OCA, which stands for Optically Clear Adhesive. This high-quality Japanese-made adhesive uses gravity to set in place, which means no air bubbles, and an ultraclear screen that stays on your iPhone for as long as you want it there. Just because it's well made doesn't mean it has to be expensive. We've left that motto in the behind, and brought you an affordable well-made product. & now for the iPhone 7 and 7 PlusWe believe that slowing down in life inspires your creations. We take our time to design intentional, technological products that people use all around the globe. SlowLabs represent ease, exploration, & advancement. We're a collective of young professionals – designers, engineers, and critical thinkers – driving innovation with purpose. We find pride in our products because of their usability, environmental sustainability, and positive impact on people's lives. We believe in ourselves because of our curious, exploratory attitude, which pushes us to new places, and generates innovative ideas that could positively change the world.We're now on Indiegogo because we believe in collectively driving innovation. We believe your support can bring the Peek Screen, and many other meaningful ideas and designs, to the world! Join us and lets make it happen!

story:
Cycli turns exercise into a social experience. Cycli is the world's first Bluetooth enabled portable cycle that lets you race against your office buddies, your grandma, your dodgeball team, your city, or even the whole world. 

Just put Cycli under your office desk or in front of your couch and start cycling. Cycli will track all your data like reps/calories burned and send it to your iPhone or Android (think FitBit while you're sitting).


And here's where it gets social... In addition to tracking how much you exercise, Cycli let's you compete against other people in public or private groups. Simply join a group with your family, your coworkers, or even your Facebook friends and see how well you stack up against everyone else!   




IOT meets fitness. Join the community.  We all know it's easier to stick to a fitness goal if you're not doing it by yourself. The Cycli app connects you to every other Cycli user so that the whole world can be your exercise buddy.


Exercise any time, with anyone. We all have our excuses. The gym is intimidating. Your workout buddy just moved out of state. You like playing video games. You just had a baby. We get it. We made Cycli for you. 


The portable cycle. Reinvented. Cycli is packed with tons of features that you literally cannot find on any other portable cycle. Patents pending. 

Meet the brains of the operation. We built all the electronics from scratch to handle and store all the metrics from your exercise and, most importantly, to wirelessly transfer data to your phone through a BLE connection.


Take Cycli anywhere! With its sleek, compact design, you can put Cycli under your desk, in front of your couch, or beside your bed. We guarantee Cycli won't become another drying rack like that giant treadmill in the corner.


Large 46mm LCD touchscreen shows you important metrics like calories burned, time spent exercising, and number of reps. Just tap the screen to scroll through the metrics. You can even use your foot! The screen automatically turns on when you start cycling.


Cycli uses a high quality magnetic resistance mechanism that provides a wide range of resistance levels. Need an easy workout? Turn the resistance knob to Level 1. Are you a fitness junkie that wants to feel the burn? Turn the resistance knob to Level 8. Cycli's magnetic resistance also provides smooth and quiet operation so you won't bug your office mates.


Did you know that most (if not all) other portable cycles are giving you a very "rough" estimate of calories burned? That's because they do not factor in the resistance level. We gave Cycli a proprietary smart sensor that measures the resistance level (1-8) and uses it to give you a much more accurate measurement of how many calories you've burned.


Being connected isn't always a good thing. Especially when it's to the wall. That's why we added a large lithium polymer battery that can run for days without charging. When you need a boost, simply plug Cycli in to any outlet (charger included)!


Cycli is built on a high quality steel and aluminum foundation. That means that Cycli will be able to handle all your aggression on Monday morning, and it won't slide around while you're pedaling away.



We have spent the last 7 years building tools to get people moving again. At our roots, we are passionate about using technology in innovative ways to empower people to lead healthier and happier lives. Our first products were geared towards helping people with stroke, brain injury, and Spinal Cord injury to recover using music and technology. You can learn more at www.flintrehab.com



Two years ago, we decided to expand our original mission of helping people after they have had a neurologic injury to developing devices that can help prevent those injuries in the first place. Did you know that not exercising may be as bad for you as smoking cigarettes?! Check out this time magazine article (http://healthland.time.com/2012/07/18/lack-of-exercise-as-deadly-as-smoking-study-finds/).

And its no surprise that we don't exercise as much as we should. Most of us sit all day at work looking at a screen, and when we go home we either have no time for exercise or are too tired to do anything but lounge on the couch and watch TV. Because of this, we wanted to create an exercise tool that people can use while they are going about their daily lives. We sit for an average of 8 hours per day, so why not put those sitting hours to better use?

Our Search For the Perfect Cycle. We realized that most stationary, under the desk-type cycles out there were antiquated, broke easily, and were unattractive. So we started from scratch by making a cycle that people could get excited about. 


It had to be Social. These days we are more connected than ever. We place a high value on being able to share experiences with everyone, even if they are on the other side of the world. And even though we don't like to admit it, we care about how we measure up to those people (no one wants to be the last person picked in gym class!). 

We knew that by making Cycli social, we could leverage those innate human desires for competitiveness, accountability, and community in a positive way. It's no surprise that if you and your friends are working towards a common goal, everyone does better. 

We have gone through multiple design iterations and are finally happy with the result. Everything from the hardware to the electronics to the phone app have been meticulously thought out and tested, and Cycli is ready for show time. 

This is where we need your help! In order to get the cost down to a reasonable price point, we need to do a large scale manufacturing run. We have a track record of delivering on unique tech products that make a difference in people's lives, and we are confident that with your help we can get Cycli to you before the holiday season. 

Production and Fulfillment Plan:

We want to be perfectly transparent with you every step of the way. Here’s some information on how we will be turning this product from our current prototype to a product that you can hold in your hands. Production and fulfillment will be handled in a three step process.

Step 1: Manufacturing Printed circuit board (PCB) fabrication, PCB assembly, and injection molding will all be handled through NOA Labs. This manufacturing firm has a proven track record. They have worked with giants such as BMW and Airbus as well as countless small businesses and start-ups. We have worked with them on several successful projects. The company is ready to produce up to 50,000 units per month and quoted us a lead time of 45-60 days for production. Shipment will take another 45-60 days. We received small sample runs of both the electronics and the housing and they look great! 

Step 2: Assembly. We will begin assembly the same day the units arrive from NOA labs. During the assembly process, will will perform a functional test to make sure everything is in working order. We will then package this item in the supplied retail box. This process is expected to take between 15-30 days depending on the number of orders.

Step 3: Fulfillment. We partnered with a local fulfillment center that is ready to ship out all the units. This process will take 5-10 days. It will take an additional 5-15 days for USPS to get the item to your door. We will push as hard as humanly possible to get Cycli to your doorstep!

Risks and challenges

We’ve worked hard to minimize the risks associated with Cycli. The product has already gone through several design/prototyping stages and beta tests with target users. We are officially ready to manufacture. We have qualified our manufacturers and first-level fulfillment partners. If we can raise enough funds, we are confident that we can ship the product in time for our customers to be using Cycli before the holiday season. We have verified prototype level manufacturing, but we need large orders to bring the manufacturing costs down to an affordable level.

If setbacks occur, we will contact our customers to keep them informed of possible delays. If orders are slow to arrive, we will ship to customers in order that they committed funds.

Acknowledgements: 
A special thanks to Myron Kim and his team at Moka Visuals for putting together an amazing video.

Another special thanks to Velvetwire for aiding with the electronics and enclosure design. You guys are awesome!

A huge thanks in advance for believe in us and helping to support Cycli!

story:
What is EL Wire ?

EL wire is the next generation cable for Mobile devices. it features Electroluminescent Light Technology for high speed charging (2.5A), data transfer (480 MB/S), lowering power consumption and saving energy. 

The luminescent current, light up the cable's cord, when a mobile device is connected to it. You can see how fast your device is charging, and how much energy you are saving, with EL lights flowing through the cord.


We are flexible funding, So all perks are 100% guaranteed to ship.

Technology:

EL Wire gives you up to 480 MB/s ULTRAFAST data transfer rate and 2A current ULTRAFAST charging. You can transfer your maximum size files within a minute!




The Next Generation Cable :


The current moves quickly, when the phone's battery is less than 65 percent full. It moves slower, when the battery is in the 65 percent, to 99 percent full range, and once the phone reaches 100%, it stops completely. 


Specification & Compatibility:

  • Length: 3 ft. 
  • Connector: Lightning or micro-USB or 30-Pin
  • Color: Red, Green, White, Blue
All iPhone and Android devices, tablets and controllers are compatible!
(many but not all devices are listed because your time is valuable)


Multiple Color selection:

(More available colors are coming soon)



What We Need & What You Get

Our goal: to catalyze the evolution of the EL Wire  by spotlighting our simple-but-perfect cable and raising awareness of its unique benefits.

We have been designing and building cables for over 5 years, We aims to build cost-effective EL Wires! We need money and support for the MASS PRODUCTION and Development of EL Wires in application of Earphone cable, Power Cord, and HDMI cable.

With some assistance and contributions from backers and supporters, we will be able to provide a wider array of colors, more uniquely conceived designs and additional connection types for other devices.  

Please help us get the word out by sharing us with your friends and family! :)

Don't forget you can use the Indiegogo share tools.

Your contribution will be used to:

  • Cost for production of EL Wires (Lighting, Micro-USB, 30 Pins)
  • Build our 2nd prototype (Earphone cable, Power cord and HDMI cable)
  • Compliance testing & Certifications


Thanks again for all of your support and helping us! You guys rock! Together we can make this campaign a huge success and we have some really cool things in store that we will be sharing with you throughout the campaign.

Remember we are always happy to hear from you. So if you have questions or comments please feel free to send us an email or drop us a comment! 



GET YOUR EL WIRE TODAY!



FAQ : 


1. If I pledge will I 100% get my Color Cable & when? 

YES!  We are a flexible funding campaign. This means even if we do not reach our funding goal all pledgers will receive their cables.


2. How do I choose the type and color of the cable?   
 We will sent a survey via email, and you can choose your cable type and color.

3. Is my contributions refundable?   
All contributions on Indiegogo are nonrefundable according to the terms of use.

4. Will your cable work with the new iPhone 6?   
Yes! It will work with the new iPhone 6, 5, 5C & 5S, iPad 4, iPad Mini, iPod Touch, iPod Nano and all new iOS devices.


5. When will we receive our cable? 

Estimate time for packaging and shipment to our backer is October 2014.


6. What if I forgot to pay for shipping?

Adding shipping cost to your pledge is super easy to do. Just go to Contribute now and add the amount for the shipping cost. The shipping cost depends on the number of EL Wires you are buying:

Add $4 if you chose to buy 1 to 5 EL Wires

Add $8 if you chose  to buy 6 to 10 EL Wires

Add $12 if you chose to buy 11 to 15 EL Wires

Add $16 if you chose to buy 16 to 20 EL Wires


7. What's your referral program?
In a sentence: if you successfully refer 2 friends to pre-order a family pack, then we will pay you $5!

story:
I dream of the day when we will all be free from debt and economic slavery.



A day when we can all be financially free and independent, be our own bosses and work on our own time.



I long for the day we can all work together and exchange our valuable assets without the need for money or traditional jobs.



When the world realizes we already have what we need if we just use what we have.



That day has come and I have the solution!



I have already began offering a phone service for anyone to receive UNLIMITED talk, texts and internet on their phones..


This unlimited flow of service never ends.


You never have to pay another phone bill!



Freeing your phone or tablet is great, but...


How about complete financial freedom?



I believe we should all be financially free and independent.



If we shared our resources, time and energy we could live free from debt, and therefore free from economic slavery...



I've developed an extremely complex universal exchange system that includes its own currency that is used within it.



I'm talking about an entirely new digital currency that can be earned, exchanged, gifted, sent, received, bought and sold even at bulk discounted prices.


So you can buy low and profit from the money itself!!!



But that's not all...



This currency would operate differently from fiat currencies that we are used to...




THE PROBLEM AND THE SOLUTION



US dollars are nothing more than reserve notes which are basically overly glorified IOU's exchanged for bonds created by banks, so they are actually DEBT.



The privately owned corporation known as the Federal Reserve gives banks these bills in exchange for a promise of debt paid, which is impossible.



THERE ISN'T ENOUGH MONEY IN EXISTENCE TO PAY THE DEBT "WE" OWE



The banks also charge interest, making the amount of debt even higher.


The money we use isn't backed by gold or silver and the more money that gets created, the more value it steals from the money already in existence.



DEBT = MONEY & MONEY = DEBT


If there was no money, there'd be no debt!



So the way this currency would work is it would be created as value is recognized.


In other words, wherever there is money to be made, it IS made out of thin air...



But this money will be debt-free and backed by the time and energy or value that created it in the first place.



TIME IS MONEY. EVERYTHING IS ENERGY



Our time and energy are the most valuable and important things we have in our lives.



All that exists is just energy, vibrating in the void we call nonexistence.



What we think we know and what we perceive is nothing more than an illusion.



We are meant to evolve and become more advanced.


We are meant to become so much more than this.



Our world is being governed and monopolized by bankers and privately owned corporate entities.



These entities control our resources and keep us from advancing and living healthier, wealthier and happier lifestyles in order to oppress us, make disgustingly huge amounts of money and to do their best at keeping us from under their boot.



There are endless inventions that could have revolutionized us and made life a million times easier.



Some examples being clean, free renewable energy,


Debt free money (Lincoln's Greenbacks)


Free phone service


Cars that run on air, solar and water


Cryptocurrencies 


Jet packs


Holograms


Teleportation


Wireless electricity


Live satellite feeds


And much more



These advancements have been quietly shut down and covered up.


Many of the inventors persecuted, imprisoned and even killed.


Some of these things are attainable today but the average person can't afford them.



So it's clear that we are being held back but why? 


I ALREADY TOLD YOU...MONEY!!!


It's time to take back our value and make our own money complete with an entirely new system.



This new financial system will always capitalize on itself, automatically making our time and energy even more valuable. 


The value of this currency will always naturally increase the more it exchanged.


This new system will operate on credits that are created and backed by real value.



These credits can be exchanged for any other world currencies, other peoples time, services, products and virtually anything else on and off the internet, instantly...



So no more having to wait 3-5 days for your money to move to/from your bank ;)



I have been working on the structure and model for this startup for over 8 years now and have had time to brainstorm ideas with others and put the pieces together to create something that has the potential to completely change the world and  also free humanity from economic slavery...



I plan to use the majority of this money to develop apps that enable anyone to share and exchange virtually anything at any time using this currency from anywhere.



This would allow people from all walks of life to be financially independent and make a great living doing what they want to do on their own set times. 



Everyone has talents and other valuable assets they can offer the world, this platform would enable you others who are interested in putting these assets to use, do so, effortlessly and anonymously.



I also plan to add a service like uber or lyft giving free and discounted rides to people who don't have transportation to and from any local exchanges that would require it.



Not only that, I plan to provide a service where multiple people can invest in products, projects or anything else and work together to share their profits.



This would make it effortless for people with great ideas or who are just looking for others to help with a project or with starting a new business to do so and connect with one another in an easy and secure way. 


Now we can take action and create and share ideas, products and valuable resources, step by step and reap the rewards much faster than traditional methods.



This Will revolutionalize crowd funding!



I am also adding an affiliate marketing feature that enables anyone to suggest any valuable asset posted in the marketplace and get paid for conversions.



So not only do you get paid for selling your assets, you'll get a cut of others as well.



Not only that...


Anyone will be able to easily earn these credits by completing tasks, joining projects and just being actively involved.


The possibilities are truly endless...




EXCHANGE CREDITS FOR ANYTHING


Credits are completely interchangeable!


Whatever you want and need will be at your fingertips in our asset marketplace.


Including both physical and virtual gift cards to all of the stores you go to most!




CUSTOMIZE AND PRINT YOUR MONEY!


One of the coolest features I'm excited to add is the ability to customize, print and exchange your own money with QR codes.



This is great for personal and professional advertisement and enables exchanges in person. QR codes can only be used once but never expire so the system  is secure.



I have endless more ideas and will quickly improve this system more with time & $$$



I WILL NOT BE RELEASING THE NAME!

Until I have secured copyrights, it's secret!



As soon as I have the funding, I will be able to go live but we can't do this with no support and no funding to back it up!



So if you believe in our cause and you can't wait to start living your life the way you should be living it, make a contribution...



All that money that goes to feeding the hungry and supporting people is a waste...



Why not contribute to something longterm that is guaranteed to work and change lives, rather than a temporary dead end fix



So with that I leave you with an opportunity to be a part of it all.



Take the initiative and commit to change!



It's time to stop serving the beast, and serve ourselves instead! 



POWER TO THE PEOPLE!!!



HERE'S WHAT IT'S GOING TO COST US:


Web hosting / Services = <$200


Cost for apps to be developed = $20K+


Cost for website to be developed = $500+


Cost for getting everything legal = $500+


Cost to pay organizers/ hired help = $30K+


Other Expenses = Unknown $$$



HERE'S WHAT WE HAVE FOR PERKS:


#1 Donations of $10 or less


-Get a thank you email


-Get An Account With $10 in credits 



#2 Donations of $25


-Get All The Above


-Get An Account With $30/credits


-I'll FREE YOUR PHONE (FREE SERVICE)


(Get Unlimited Talk/Texts/Web For LIFE)



#3 Donations of $50


-Get All The Above


-FREE YOUR PHONE (See #2)


-Get An Account With $60/credits 


-Get A 6 Month Free VIP Membership 


 


#4 Donations of $100


-Get All The Above


-FREE YOUR PHONE (See #2)


-Get An Account With $120/credits


-Get A 1 Year Free VIP Membership



#5 Donations of $250 or More


-Get All The Above


-FREE YOUR PHONE (See #2)


-Get An Account With $300/credits 


-Get Free VIP Membership For LIFE


-Get Added To Our Founders List


-More



READY TO REALLY CHANGE THE WORLD?



I'm available 24/7 for questions...



Devin Armstrong


401-400-2031


DevinDaily@aol.com
story_txt: I dream of the day when we will all be free from debt and economic slavery.A day when we can all be financially free and independent, be our own bosses and work on our own time.I long for the day we can all work together and exchange our valuable assets without the need for money or traditional jobs.When the world realizes we already have what we need if we just use what we have.That day has come and I have the solution!I have already began offering a phone service for anyone to receive UNLIMITED talk, texts and internet on their phones..This unlimited flow of service never ends.You never have to pay another phone bill!Freeing your phone or tablet is great, but...How about complete financial freedom?I believe we should all be financially free and independent.If we shared our resources, time and energy we could live free from debt, and therefore free from economic slavery...I've developed an extremely complex universal exchange system that includes its own currency that is used within it.I'm talking about an entirely new digital currency that can be earned, exchanged, gifted, sent, received, bought and sold even at bulk discounted prices.So you can buy low and profit from the money itself!!!But that's not all...This currency would operate differently from fiat currencies that we are used to...THE PROBLEM AND THE SOLUTIONUS dollars are nothing more than reserve notes which are basically overly glorified IOU's exchanged for bonds created by banks, so they are actually DEBT.The privately owned corporation known as the Federal Reserve gives banks these bills in exchange for a promise of debt paid, which is impossible.THERE ISN'T ENOUGH MONEY IN EXISTENCE TO PAY THE DEBT "WE" OWEThe banks also charge interest, making the amount of debt even higher.The money we use isn't backed by gold or silver and the more money that gets created, the more value it steals from the money already in existence.DEBT = MONEY & MONEY = DEBTIf there was no money, there'd be no debt!So the way this currency would work is it would be created as value is recognized.In other words, wherever there is money to be made, it IS made out of thin air...But this money will be debt-free and backed by the time and energy or value that created it in the first place.TIME IS MONEY. EVERYTHING IS ENERGYOur time and energy are the most valuable and important things we have in our lives.All that exists is just energy, vibrating in the void we call nonexistence.What we think we know disgustingly huge amounts of money and to do their best at keeping us from under their boot.There are endless inventions that could have revolutionized us and made life a million times easier.Some electricityLive satellite feedsAnd much moreThese advancements have been quietly shut down and covered up.Many of the inventors persecuted, imprisoned and even killed.Some of these things are attainable today but the average person can't afford them.So it's clear that we are being held back but why? I ALREADY TOLD YOU...MONEY!!!It's time to take back our value and make our own money naturally increase the more it exchanged.This new system will operate on credits that are created and backed by real value.These credits can be exchanged for any other world currencies, other peoples time, services, products and virtually anything else on and off the internet, instantly...So no more having to wait 3-5 days for your money to move to/from your bank ;)I have been working on the story:
Volt Buckle - A Revolution in Mobile Device Charging Where Form and Function Unite to Create a Charging Device Unlike Any Other in the World

Have you been stranded at work without your charger? Without your charger at the airport? At school? Have you ever forgotten your charger in your car, office, hotel room, or need a charger when you've been out and about or at your favorite coffee shop? Perhaps you are just tired of carrying oddly shaped chargers and bulky wires in your pocket. If you said yes to any of these scenarios, then Volt Buckle is for you! Volt Buckle makes these worries a thing of the past.

Volt Buckle stands alone in product features when compared to other wall chargers and docking devices. Volt Buckle lets you charge, sync, and dock* all in one convenient, sleek, and fashionable device that fits comfortably around your waist. 

  • Volt Buckle is a USB product, so it charges a wide variety of mobile devices such as iPhones, most Androids, and iPads. Volt Buckle could be adapted in the future for use with gaming devices, cameras, or virtually any USB product that needs power! 
  • Volt Buckle provides sync capability. Sync and charge your device with one convenient product without bulky charger cases and wires.
  • Volt Buckle seamlessly integrates into your wardrobe for convenient portability. No more bulky chargers or "rat's nest" of wires in your pocket.
  • Volt Buckle provides peace of mind knowing that you will never forget your charger in your car or leave it behind at home!

Whether you are a traveler on the go, a student, need your mobile device for work, or just an avid device user, Volt Buckle will ensure that you will always have your charger with you.

Volt Buckle - The Story Behind the Product

Volt Buckle came to fruition after realizing that men typically have only their pockets to carry mobile device chargers and all the associated wires that come along with them. After trying to match numerous existing chargers to buckles, a match was finally found. After some genuine, old-fashioned blood, sweat and tears, and hours pounding metal in the garage, the original prototype Volt Buckle was born.

Original Volt Buckle Prototype

Building off of this working proof of concept, the CaliBuilt Team went to the experts. Some of the best and brightest electrical, mechanical, and 3D design professionals in California's Bay Area came together to custom design the charger and buckle using the latest and most advanced tools. The result is the alpha-prototype that we are presenting to you here on Indiegogo! The Volt Buckle chargers that you see here on our Indiegogo site (thanks for giving us a look!) are samples from our overseas manufacturer. 

Volt Buckle - Where are we in the Process?

Volt Buckle is ready to sell! The funding that we seek here with the help of the Indiegogo community will fund the final minor engineering, and most importantly, will allow us to pay back the manufacturer for the molds to produce the charger case, and part for the Volt Sync Connector. Your charger will be made of custom molded ABS and will have a sleek, stylish appearance.

Your support will also, of course, pay for the parts and labor to create the Volt Buckles ordered by the Indiegogo community, and hopefully a few more for an initial inventory to roll-out the product to the general public.

Volt Buckle - Where are we going? 

We think Volt Buckle is awesome as it currently is, and we hope you do too! Helping us reach our funding goal will let us take Volt Buckle to the next level. We are appreciative and receptive to your feedback, so who knows, maybe your idea will be incorporated into Volt Buckle version 2.0!

With funding, we anticipate future versions of Volt Buckle to feature:

  • a back-up battery. We designed Volt Buckle with the possibility of incorporating a back-up battery capable of providing 30-60 minutes of power for your mobile device, even if you are not near an outlet!
  • a design geared towards professionals that allows the wearer to pop a discretely designed charger out of the buckle without disengaging the belt in any manner.
  • an endless variety of customizable colors, designs, and styles. The buckle as well as the belt provides a virtually limitless platform to express your creativity, style, and taste.
Volt Buckle - FAQ

Q: What size belt do I order if I am waist size X?

A: The belt that comes with your Volt Buckle is custom designed, and we have endeavored to accommodate the widest range of waist sizes as possible. Unfortunately, we may not be able to fit all waists until later in development. Our initial production run will accommodate waist sizes from 30 inches to 42 inches, and we will contact you directly at the conclusion of the campaing to obtain your sizing information, in addition to which sync connector you would like (USB to mini USB, USB to micro USB, USB to Apple 40 pin, or USB to Lightning iPhone connector.)

Q: Will my pants stay up if I'm using the Volt Buckle?

A: Yes! We have specially designed the Patent Pending belt that comes with your Volt Buckle to securely latch so your pants stay up when Volt Buckle is providing you the power that you need.

Q: Is Volt Buckle 220V compatible?

A: No. Volt Buckle currently provides 2 amps at 110 volts, which means Volt Buckle works out of the box in North America, e.g. the United States, Canada and Mexico. Depending on the level of funding achieved, Volt Buckle may look to go international very quickly!

Q: Is there a women's version?

A: At this time, there is no specific women's version; however, the belt goes well in casual situations and fits well with jeans, so there is nothing preventing women from wearing the belt. We have some ideas in development specifically for women! Help fund the development of a women's version by donating to Volt Buckle version 1.0.

Q: My mobile device's charger input is on the side. Will Volt Buckle still work for me?

A: Yes. Volt Buckle will charge your device; however, for best performance when docked, we recommend that the charger input be either on the top or the bottom of the device. With your funding we are devising a solution so that all mobile devices will be able to be docked when charging.

Q: What about the new iPhone 5 connector?

A: Volt Buckle is Lightning Connector compatible.

*Volt Buckle will charge any Apple, or USB connective device. It may not properly dock large items such as the iPad.

THANK YOU TO THE INDIEGOGO COMMUNITY!

The CaliBuilt team sincerely appreciates you taking the time to check out our project. We hope the Indiegogo community is as excited about Volt Buckle as we are. Any amount you can contribute brings us that much closer to making our dream a reality, and we are truly grateful for all contributions to our project. We strive to be responsive to comments and feedback to the greatest extent possible.

story:
What is Magnetic Charging Cable ?

Magnetic charging cable consists of two parts, the magnetic USB cable which goes to the USB power adapter or computer USB port, and the magnetic charging connector which goes to the mobile phones or tablets, and they’re connected thru our patented magnetic charging technology.


Magnetic Charging Cable Features:

1. Safety, Flexibility and Convenience!

Image when you’re charging your phone or tablet and someone comes across your charging cable, your phone/tablet will probably be pulled down to the ground and get broken, or the human body fall down and get wounded! Our magnetic charging cable can solve this problem properly, because it breaks out automatically in that case; You can easily pick up your phone for incoming calls without plugging out your power adapter while you're in charging.


2. There is a LED indicating the connection status and it makes the cable very cool!


3. Multi-colors for option :


4. Multi Charging Connectors for Option


What We Need from You?

We've already got the engineering samples ready and need your help to build up the molds, prepare the production materials, set up the tools for mass production.


What you will get?


Products and Delivery

We will start the production from the end of Feb, 2014. The goods will be shipped within one month after the starting of the production.


Contact

E-mail: info@victuregroup.com

Website: www.victuregroup.com
