story:
Selfie smartphones are going popular - iPhone 6 / Sony Xperia C3 / HTC Desire Eye... The phones are equipped with excellent front cameras. The selfie remote is the best accessory for those phones. Now in the market,  most of the selfie remotes are looked boring and dull - which can not bring out the fun and stylish feeling of having selfies.  

iSmile is different.

iSmile, selfie in style.



" the iSmile Bluetooth Selfie Remote is the most compact and best looking selfie remote that we have ever come across. " - GetdatGadget 


"It has a nice loop on one side so you can slide it onto a carabiner and attach it to your belt." 


"When I used this device the one thing I liked the most was the Bluetooth connected to my iOS incredibly fast without any problems." - e-list reviews




iSmile

thinnest selfie remote
for iOS and Android

iSmile is not only a very thin premium for remote snapping of selfie, it is also remarkably durable and having extra long power life.


Design

  • Zinc alloy metal frame for premium and class.
  • 4.2mm thin profile for beauty.
  • 6 patterns for different styles.
  • Keychain design for carry around.



Features

  • IP67 waterproof. iSmile can stay 1m depth of water for 30mins.
  • No App is needed to control.
  • Perfect Bluetooth signal. 
  • 2-year battery life.


Technology

  • Bluetooth 4.0 BLE 
  • Battery life is enormously prolonged to 2 years.


Specifications


Size: 41 x 41 x 4.2 mm

Weight: 24g

Material: Zinc Alloys + Waterproof plastic material 

Battery Capacity: 200mAh (CR2032) 

Battery Life: 2 years

Bluetooth Version: Bluetooth 4.0 BLE

Max. distance for Bluetooth connection : 10m

Max. no. of mobile device can link : 7 units

Waterproof : IP67

Auto Power Off after 90 seconds

Compatibility List: 

Mobile Device Built-in camera App Camera360
( third-party App )
iPhone 4S / 5 / 5S / 5C / 6 / 6 Plus with iOS 7 or above √ √
New iPad / iPad Air / iPad mini / iPad mini 2 with iOS 7 or above √ √
iPod touch (5th Generation) / iPod nano (7th Generation) with iOS 7 or above √ √
Samsung S3 / S4 / S5 with Android 4.4.2 or above √ √
Samsung Note 2 / Note 3 / Note 4 with Android 4.4.2 or above √ √
LG G Pro 2 with Android 4.4.2 or above √ √
HTC One / HTC One Mini with Android 4.4.2 or above x √

Power Consumption:

-Deep Sleep: 1uA 

-Advertising: 780uA

-Connected: 45uA




iSmile

selfie in style.


iSmile's story


At the very beginning, we realised that people were difficult to snap selfies by the timer of their phones. So, we decided to make a device that can remote control the phone to snap selfies.
We think people would love to snap selfies anytime on their own or with their loved ones, therefore, we have made the iSmile in a keychain-design for people to carry around. 
As we know, Steve Jobs believes that thin is beautiful, so we make iSmile in a thin profile to have it interpret the beauty. 
Right, to carry around and anywhere. People would go indoor and outdoor to snap selfies. That's why we make iSmile durable and waterproof.
Thank you for our devoted and passionated designers and engineers, without them,  this nice selfie remote would not exist.

Last but not the least - thank you for your support and appreciate iSmile. 

Thank you.

Best Regards,
Gigaflash Mobile
story_txt:
Selfie smartphones are going popular - iPhone 6 / Sony Xperia C3 / HTC Desire Eye... The phones are equipped with excellent front cameras. The selfie remote is the best accessory for those phones. Now in the market,  most of the selfie remotes are looked boring and dull - which can not bring out the fun and stylish feeling of having selfies.  iSmile is different.
iSmile, selfie in style.






" the iSmile Bluetooth Selfie Remote is the most compact and best looking selfie remote that we have ever come across. " - GetdatGadget 



"It has a nice loop on one side so you can slide it onto a carabiner and attach it to your belt." 



"When I used this device the one thing I liked the most was the Bluetooth connected to my iOS incredibly fast without any problems." - e-list reviews



iSmile
thinnest selfie remotefor iOS and Android

iSmile is not only a very thin premium for remote snapping of selfie, it is also remarkably durable and having extra long power life.










Design



Zinc alloy metal frame for premium and class.


4.2mm thin profile for beauty.


6 patterns for different styles.

Keychain design for carry around.









Features
IP67 waterproof. iSmile can stay 1m depth of water for 30mins.

No App is needed to control.

Perfect Bluetooth signal. 
2-year battery life.


Technology

Bluetooth 4.0 BLE 


Battery life is enormously prolonged to 2 years.


Specifications

Size: 41 x 41 x 4.2 mm
Weight: 24g
Material: Zinc Alloys + Waterproof plastic material 
Battery Capacity: 200mAh (CR2032) 
Battery Life: 2 years
Bluetooth Version: Bluetooth 4.0 BLE
Max. distance for Bluetooth connection : 10m
Max. no. of mobile device can link : 7 units
Waterproof : IP67
Auto Power Off after 90 seconds
Compatibility List: 




Mobile Device
Built-in camera App
Camera360 ( third-party App )


iPhone 4S / 5 / 5S / 5C / 6 / 6 Plus with iOS 7 or above
√
√


New iPad / iPad Air / iPad mini / iPad mini 2 with iOS 7 or above
√
√


iPod touch (5th Generation) / iPod nano (7th Generation) with iOS 7 or above
√
√


Samsung S3 / S4 / S5 with Android 4.4.2 or above
√
√


Samsung Note 2 / Note 3 / Note 4 with Android 4.4.2 or above
√
√


LG G Pro 2 with Android 4.4.2 or above
√
√


HTC One / HTC One Mini with Android 4.4.2 or above
x
√



Power Consumption:
-Deep Sleep: 1uA 
-Advertising: 780uA
-Connected: 45uA

iSmileselfie in style.






iSmile's story

At the very beginning, we realised that people were difficult to snap selfies by the timer of their phones. So, we decided to make a device that can remote control the phone to snap selfies.

We think people would love to snap selfies anytime on their own or with their loved ones, therefore, we have made the iSmile in a keychain-design for people to carry around. 
As we know, Steve Jobs believes that thin is beautiful, so we make iSmile in a thin profile to have it interpret the beauty. 

Right, to carry around and anywhere. People would go indoor and outdoor to snap selfies. That's why we make iSmile durable and waterproof.

Thank you for our devoted and passionated designers and engineers, without them,  this nice selfie remote would not exist.

Last but not the least - thank you for your support and appreciate iSmile. 

Thank you.

Best Regards,
Gigaflash Mobile

story:
(Free 2 Hour Parking Coupon Codes and Free Friend Referral Hours at Bottom of Page and Donation Perk Hours to the Right)

What is Park On The Fly?

Created by concerned UF students in 2010, Park on the Fly is a massively scalable parking management system designed to make buying, selling, and finding parking simple.  We’ve brokered over 10,000 transactions at rock bottom prices, such as $0.50/hour, $3.75/ 24 hour day, and $10/week for our fellow UF students and residents of the city at large.  The system allows consumers to purchase parking before leaving home, removing the hassle of searching for an open lot.  Our clients are property owners looking to monetize unused or not fully utilized parking or land near high traffic areas, such as campus or downtown.  Our clients are also individuals that want to sell their home parking spaces for special events such as football games and day to day parking.  We are currently active at 13 locations, even 1 parking garage, and are working hard to add locations daily, even in new cities!

How Does It Work?

Simply go to our website and tell us where you're going and when you're going there.  We'll show you the lots we manage and let you buy your spot hours, days, or even weeks in advance.  The day of your reservation just drive to the lot and park.  No printouts necessary!  We're also currently developing our mobile app which will allow you to find and buy parking in under 30 seconds, which reduces the current transaction time experienced on mobile devices.  We expect to release the app in the near future.

Who's Running The Show?

We're all Gator Grads! We're current graduate students, a former consultant, and a nuclear engineer supported by an amazing programming team of local and distant talent that counts billion dollar companies among its clients.  We believe that there is absolutely no reason why anyone should spend twenty or thirty minutes looking for parking.

Contests Attended And Media

We've been invited to compete in several business competitions on behalf of UF.  You can see Sargent and Aashish presenting at the Wake Forest Elevator Pitch competition at the top of this page.  We qualified to present at Wake Forest after beating out applicants all over the country.

We were also one of 11 student run companies worldwide invited to present at the HKUST MBA International Business Plan in Hong Kong.  They flew us out there to represent The University of FL.  It was a great experience that has kept us moving on the right path.

Why Do We Need Your Support?

Over the past 3 years we've proven the business model and conducted a beta test.  We provide real value to people parking, property owners, and feedback from our existing customers has been amazing.  The next step is to expand and make the systems even more feature rich for students and our users.  We plan to use funds raised from this campaign to increase our user base locally by growing beyond our 10-13 locations.  This sometimes takes some capital to go along with hard work.  The more locations we have, the more we can get rates reduced for students beyond the $0.50/hour, $3.75/day, $20/month, and $80/semester we already have achieved.  We've found that our biggest problem is publicity.  When people find us, they keep using our service.  In fact, the average user has completed over 16 transactions! 

Get FREE Referral Parking Hours by Spreading the Word!

Share this campaign on Facebook using the below steps.  Friends who see it can take action, earning you free hours, shown below in chart.  We'll keep track of it.


Steps For Sharing and Getting Your Referral Hours (Easy Free Parking)

For every person you refer to our Indiegogo page that donates, we'll give you 5 hours of FREE parking.  If you get 10 friends to donate, that’s 50 free hours of parking that costs you nothing! In order to get credit for your referrals please do the following easy steps:

1.  Via your Facebook wall or wall of your favorite groups, for example, share our Indiegogo campaign address in several places.  The address is igg.me/at/freeparking or you can click the share button above.  The more places you share to, the more free parking referral hours will accrue to you!  Never pay for parking again.

2.  In order for us to total your referral hours, mention in a comment below your share and say the following via a copy paste job if you like:

 “Please take a moment and let Parkonthefly.com know that I referred you by putting my email address, (enter your email here), on their wall which is at the following address, https://www.facebook.com/pages/Parkontheflycom/5908678373.  You will enjoy their cheap parking system for class, downtown, and other locations this year.  They have the lowest prices in town hands down for short and long term parking.  I get 5 free hours of parking for each person that donates to this community funded campaign.  You can too by telling your friends about this awesome new system designed by students for students!  Share the above with your info instead and let the good parking karma roll!”

3.  Also, you don't have to donate to earn the referral hours.  Each of your referrals that donate will earn you 5 hours of parking that will be distributed 1-4 times a month or at the end of the campaign.  Even if we don't have lots in your city yet, feel free to share the campaign and simply use your referral hours once spaces open in your city


Free 2 Hour Coupon Codes

Try out our service with 2 hours of FREE parking at our website.  Just use this coupon code when you do a transaction and feel free to donate or refer others for more free and cheap parking:

  • Code for Anyone
    • Parkindiegogo2013
  • Code for Gainesville Place Residents
    • ParkGVP2013
  • Copy paste or enter the codes above as the coupon code when making reservation online

Check out the system for yourself with the 2 free hours.  We think you'll like what we're doing and will want to support our efforts.  Please note that due to expected demand, we can't guarantee you a spot.  The code will be active for at least a year, so if all the spaces are full in a certain lot come back and try again and something will open up.


Additional Important Terms:

1.  You can still order parking perks and get free hours even after our fundraising goal is reached.

2.  You can donate more than once if you want access to more perk hours.

3.  Coupon codes for perk hours will be issued to the email address of donor on a regular basis during the campaign.

4.  Referral hours earned may be capped at somewhere between 300 -500 hours of free parking for each person who refers friends or they may be uncapped for the duration of the campaign, at the discretion of Parkonthefly.com


Selling Parking on the System

Last, but not least, if you know property owners that might want to sell parking please contact us directly via the website. We have a generous cash commission program in place for individuals and organizations that bring us new clients.

Thank you for your time, donations to system, referrals, and have a great day from our team!

story:
EasyFinder is a smart battery you can use to locate your smartphone and other battery operated devices! Just pop in an EasyFinder to any battery-powered device and let EasyFinder's signal locate your smartphone using its low power Bluetooth transmitter. Unlike other smartphone trackers, EasyFinder will guide you to your phone's exact proximity, even when it is on silent!  You can also use the FREE EasyFinder app to track your battery-powered devices when you can't remember where you set them down!

You can use EasyFinder in any battery-powered device.

The EasyFinder is a low power Bluetooth transmitter that helps you locate your phone by simply substituting one of the AA or AAA batteries in your TV remote (or other battery powered device) with an EasyFinder battery.  EasyFinder technology is patent-pending!

Download the free app on your smartwatch, smartphone or tablet and you’re ready to locate your remote. The app uses radar-like guidance with an audible beeping sound from the EasyFinder device, sending you in the direction of your lost remote.


 Find Your Phone Fast Too: EasyFinder works two ways! You can locate your smartphone easily by pressing the logo on your EasyFinder battery (in your tv remote or other devices) and a signal will be sent to your phone making it ring, even if its on silent!!!!


EasyFinder Features

                                                                     

The EasyFinder App

We've already started development of the EasyFinder App. We'll be developing a FREE app for iOS & Android App so that you can easily track and find your stuff. Send alerts to your devices and to your phone!


                                

                                                   

  

Check Out Our Rewards!

We Want to Make EasyFinder Better!

We are excited to already have many aspects of production and development under way. Help me make EasyFinder better! Our STRETCH GOALS will help us make a better app and give you a better end product.

Our Production Timeline 

Frequently Asked Questions

How does EasyFinder work?

EasyFinder uses Bluetooth technology to create a two-way communication system from your smartphone to the battery. Using the free EasyFinder app, you can see the location and/or set off an alert on up to 10 devices at a time,never losing your battery-operated devices again. Every EasyFinder battery comes with a button to locate your smartphone, so with the push of a button on the EasyFinder, sends an alert to your smartphone, even if the phone is on silent.

What sizes does the EasyFinder come in?

EasyFinder comes in AA and AAA battery sizes.

How are  the EasyFinder batteries rechargeable?

You can recharge your EasyFinder batteries with any standard battery charger, which can be found at most Big Box stores.

How often will I have to buy new EasyFinder batteries?

The EasyFinder battery has a lifespan of 4-12 months, depending on usage and can be re-charged up to 1000 times.

How did you come up with the idea for EasyFinder?

EasyFinder was born out of necessity. Rick, our founder, realized that something is always lost in the house, whether it be his phone, the remote, or some other toy or gadget. EasyFinder was created as a fix-all solution to find everything you need .

What phones does the app work for?

EasyFinder is compatible with iOS and Android devices and will have the EasyFinder App available for free. You can use the EasyFinder app on your smartphone, tablet AND smartwatch.

How does EasyFinder locate your phone?

EasyFinder uses a two-way Bluetooth signal, so from either your battery-operated device or your smartphone, you can push the EasyFinder logo on the battery to send an alert to your smartphone.

Where can I use the EasyFinder?

EasyFinder can be used anywhere where you have a Bluetooth connection. EasyFinder is compatible with international smartphones.

When will EasyFinder be shipping?

EasyFinder is targeting to ship in November 2015, ready for the holiday season

Where are EasyFinder batteries assembled?

EasyFinder batteries are assembled in USA in the Greater Fort Worth-Dallas area of Texas.

Is EasyFinder going to be coming out with any other products?

Yes, EasyFinder plans for several battery types and specialty batteries coming soon. Stay tuned for updates and announcements in the future!

How can I get in touch with the EasyFinder team?

For questions or comments,email info@easyfinder.com. Media inquiries should contact media@easyfindertv.com.

story:
• Indoor/Outdoor Flight
  • Fast and Slow Mode
  • Return to home, when you are far
  • Flips Mode
  • LED lights for night flight
  • Convenient remote design with built in storage for drone, spare parts, and charger. 

  • Eco-Friendly Packaging

  • 10 Minute Drone Time

  • 17 Minute Charging Time

  • Double the amount of spare part compared to competitors

  • Newly designed propeller protector

  • Minimalistic design

  • Ships out of Canada!

  • More than double the range of competitors


The back side of the PCB board features the:

  • 100mAh Battery
  • Extended 2.4GHz Antenna

As many of you are wondering, we do not have the drone shell manufactured yet because we are still looking into what materials we want to use in order to maximize efficiency of the drone at the lowest cost possible. We are using default drone shells to do tests with just drone’s pcb board. We are planning on making the shells in China. There are two options that we can use to create the shells, injection moulding or 3D-Printing. If we decide  to use 3D-printing we will have to see how fast these drone shells can be made so they can be delivered to the customer on time. The other option of using Injection Moulding will have a much faster manufacture time although will have higher costs and lower amounts of customizability. However we are looking out for our customer’s best interest so we will update you as soon as we have some news on this.



Currently we are using a standard 2.4GHz remote to control the drone. Although we have cut the antenna to the same length as the final remote, as well as other slight modifications to match the specifications of the final product. The manufacturer has agreed to make the final remote once we confirm the order. It will be made to the exact same specifications as to what we are testing the drone and statistics we have published.


We chose to do flexible funding because we want to ensure that no matter what, we do receive support for our project. However, if we do fall short of the set goal, we will most definitely still be pursuing the project and developing this product. We do have contingency plans in place, to ensure the completion of Zekko. That being said, we will certainly be trying to meet out aspired goal. Furthermore, though funding is an important part of this entire process, we are aiming to see the public's reaction to our product, we want your opinions. We want to see what the community wants in a nano drone. We want to find solutions to the flaws of current products on the market, to create the ultimate nano drone. With Indiegogo we hope to receive YOUR input and subsequently create the best drone possible!

    

In response to the many inquiries we have received, no we do not yet have the drone shell manufactured, because we are still looking into what materials that would maximize efficiency for the drone at the lowest possible cost. We are using default drone shells to do tests with our custom drone pcb board. We are planning on having the product produced in China. There are two options to choose from in terms of the creation of the shells, injection moulding or 3D-printing. If we do decide  to use 3D-printing, we will have to see how fast these drone shells can be made, to ensure delivery to our customers in a timely fashion.  The other option would be to use injection moulding which would ensure quick manufacturing of our product, however it would increase costs as well as limit our customization capabilities. However we are looking out for our customer’s best interest, so we will update you as soon as we have any updates on our method of production.


Our team consists of three friends, the core members of this project and all of which are quad-rotor hobbyist! Our head developer is a mechanical engineer who has a passion for designing drones! Our other two members of the team are marketing wizards fresh out of university. Our team was put together when we all decided we wanted our other friends to share our love for drones!

However we are looking out for our customer’s best interest so we will update you as soon as we have some news on this. 





Currently we are using a standard 2.4GHz remote to control the drone. Although we have cut the antenna to the same length as the final remote, as well as other slight modifications to match the specifications of the final product. The manufacturer has agreed to make the final remote once we confirm the order. It will be made to the exact same specifications as to what we are testing the drone and statistics we have published. 


We chose to do flexible funding because we want to ensure that no matter what, we do receive support for our project. However, if we do fall short of the set goal, we will most definitely still be pursuing the project and developing this product. We do have contingency plans in place, to ensure the completion of Zekko. That being said, we will certainly be trying to meet out aspired goal. Furthermore, though funding is an important part of this entire process, we are aiming to see the public's reaction to our product, we want your opinions. We want to see what the community wants in a nano drone. We want to find solutions to the flaws of current products on the market, to create the ultimate nano drone. With Indiegogo we hope to receive YOUR input and subsequently create the best drone possible! 




    

In response to the many inquiries we have received, no we do not yet have the drone shell manufactured, because we are still looking into what materials that would maximize efficiency for the drone at the lowest possible cost. We are using default drone shells to do tests with our custom drone pcb board. We are planning on having the product produced in China. There are two options to choose from in terms of the creation of the shells, injection moulding or 3D-printing. If we do decide  to use 3D-printing, we will have to see how fast these drone shells can be made, to ensure delivery to our customers in a timely fashion.  The other option would be to use injection moulding which would ensure quick manufacturing of our product, however it would increase costs as well as limit our customization capabilities. However we are looking out for our customer’s best interest, so we will update you as soon as we have any updates on our method of production. 
Our team consists of three friends, the core members of this project and all of which are quad-rotor hobbyist! Our head developer is a mechanical engineer who has a passion for designing drones! Our other two members of the team are marketing wizards fresh out of university. Our team was put together when we all decided we wanted our other friends to share our love for drones!

story:
What is plygrnd.es?

plygrnd.es is an app for iOS & Android phones that helps you discover nearby playgrounds, and add new ones to share with your friends.

Who is plygrnd.es for?

parents. Parents. PARENTS! But seriously we’re for anyone who enjoys discovering new playgrounds for their kids to visit. So if Grandma wants to download our app to her iPhone that you bought her and are still teaching her how to use it (yes mom, I’m talking about you!) then she can discover nearby playgrounds to take her grandkids to.

Who is plygrnd.es NOT for?

You’re all thinking it by now, so we won’t even go there. Needless to say anyone can find where playgrounds are located by Googling them on the internet, so by putting them in an app it isn’t going to change the fact that parents still need to watch out for their kids and protect them from the bad people out there in the world.

Why do we need funding?

Well....hobbies aren’t cheap, and this project has been a passion of mine for the last year and a half. Your funding will allow us complete the UX and Graphic Designs, and hire an incredible development team in NYC we’ve been working with to architect the app's core functionality and educate us about the development of native apps for the iOS & Android platforms. We’ll be hosting the app on Amazon’s EC2 cloud, and hope to begin rolling it out to our Beta testers give-or-take a month or so after we’ve completed our fundraising. When the app has been well vetted our intention is to submit it for review and inclusion in both the Apple iTunes and Android Play stores.

Completed Screens

We've finsihed all of our app's screen mockups, and are beginning to convert them to HTML and adding basic functionality.

This screenshot is of the Login screen, and shows how users can login using their existing foursquare credentials.



This is a screenshot of the Map Screen that the app opens up to upon launch. It shows all of the playgrounds that are nearby to your current location (yes that's a map of Central Park in NYC, and no those aren't the exact locations of real playgrounds - for all my hardcore New Yorkers this is just an example):



This is a screenshot of the Playground Profile screen, and shows how easily you can add a new playground by: entering its name, address if you know it, select what kind of playground it is (what's its made of), and what sort of features it has such as slides or seesaws.



Technology

We're using foursquare's Venues database API to store all playground locations, and displaying those graphically using foursquare's mapping partner MapBox. We're building native apps for both iOS & Android phones, and plan to submit the apps to their respective app platform stores when development and testing is complete. 

Ambitious Timeline

We’re embarking on a 30 day IndieGoGo funding campaign, with a targeted end date around October 31 (Halloween YEA!). By the time we receive all the funds we’re anticipating a 4-6 week development time-frame, which will bring us out toward the end of December (not the best time of year to bring the kids to a playground if you live in the North East, but it turns out designing, funding, and building an app takes a lot of time!).

Who are we and other philosophical questions?

The “we” is really more of a “me” supported by a group of talented and dedicated friends, and the answer is complicated (isn’t it always). The short answer is I’m an entrepreneurial dad who’s trying to make a simple and intuitive app for helping other parents like myself discover nearby playgrounds and add new ones, so they can take their kids to play at on the weekends.

Feel free to ping me with questions, follow us out on twitter @plygrndes or visit us at www.plygrnd.es and sign up to be notified when the app launches!

story:
The Paci-Finder - Help For All Mommies, Daddy's & Caregivers

One day as I was watching my brother and sister-in law go crazy yet AGAIN looking for my neice's pacifier, then I had a "light bulb moment". Wouldn't it be great if the pacifier had a built in gps tracking device and a mobile app that would tell my brother and sister in-law where the pacifier was immediately upon opening of the app. Since I am a mobile app developer already, making the app would be simple. But the funding for the Paci-Finder itself would be the challenge. And then I discovered Indiegogo and here I am.

The Problem 

For All Mommies, Daddy's & Caregivers

The inevitable problem of losing the pacifer and buying another and then losing that pacifier and buying another, and repeating that over and over again until you have 12 pacifiers you can't find. Any parent knows about this too well and would give anything to just find the pacifier FAST and stop their childs crying in a hurry.

The Solution

The Paci-Fier will have built in locater chip that will work with the Paci-Finder moblile and/or web app and instantly locate the pacifier by sending a signal and causing the pacifier to beep until located by the caregiver.
As soon as you cannot find the Pacifier you would open the Paci-Finder app and press the locate button. Instantly sending a signal to the pacifier and it will begin to beep. As you approach the beeping sound coming from under the bed, you look and THERE is the pacifier and the crying stops.

The purchase of the Paci-Fier will come with the free Paci-Finder mobile and /or web based app.


What I Need & What You Get

The Details:

  • The $10,000 I am trying to raise would go to a company called Davison. Davison has been helping individuals with their product ideas for over 20 years. They design and develop working product samples and present them to corporations. Your contributions would pay for analysis of the feasibility, marketability, patentability and profitability of the Paci-Finder. Preliminary data and research shows there is a huge market and need for the Paci-Finder and would help many around the world. 
  • You willl be helping children to feel at peace a little quicker while helping millions of parents around the world.

The Impact

Will assist millions of parents and caregivers find the pacifier quickly and STOP the crying faster. Ease your child's pain faster by finding the Pacifier AS SOON AS POSSIBLE! If your a parent, you know what I mean.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know some of you can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • PLEASE get the word out and make some noise if you like the idea.
  • Indiegogo has tons of share tools to make it easy for you to share my idea.

Millions of babies, parents and caregivers worldwide THANK YOU!

story:
Click Here to Learn About Our Rewards Program - Share and Get Money Back





 






FAQs

WHAT DISPLAY ENGINES OPTIONS ARE OFFERED IN THE IRIS?
We offer 2 different display engines: a MEMS laser scanning engine and a DLP display engine.

WHAT IS THE DIFFERENCE?
MEMS laser scanning produces an incredible crisp, vibrant full color image. When viewed at nightime, the difference is apparent when the lack of an ambient backglow makes the laser display really stand out from anything you've ever seen. Laser display engines are also incredibly expensive and for our initial campaign, we are only offering 30 units with the laser display.
DLP display engines provide a bright, crisp full color image. Their performance is excellent and combined with their compact size and availability, they are an excellent choice for use in the Iris.

HOW DOES IRIS FUNCTION?

If Iris is used without the app downloaded on your iOS or Android smartphone, it will display information from your car's computer by default such as speed, engine data, fuel consumption and more.

If you have downloaded the app onto your iOS or Android smartphone, you will be able to select what information you want displayed. This includes phone calls, messages, GPS and geolocation information. We will be working on expanding the range of features so your Iris improves with time.

IS PROJECTED IMAGERY VISIBLE TO ONCOMING CARS?

No. Iris display is not easily viewed by anyone other than the driver.

DOES IRIS BLOCK THE SUN IF IT IS BRIGHT?

Yes. Iris has a flip down sunshade for when your future is bright and you gotta wear shades ;-)

CAN I CHANGE MESSAGE DISPLAY SETTINGS?

Yes, you can decide if messages will display while you are moving or wait until your vehicle is stationary.

DOES IRIS USE VOICE RECOGNITION?

Yes. Iris allows you to compose messages, initiate phone calls and more with voice command.

WHAT IS THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN IRIS LASER AND IRIS DLP?

By using a laser display, Iris is able to display incredibly crisp imagery with zero ambient backlight. This is most noticeable at nighttime, when the laser display will have no ambient glow around the icons. Both versions of Iris are great, but the laser really looks amazing. Its also extremely expensive to purchase in small quantities, so we are only offering a limited number of these for our initial Indiegogo production run.

WHAT’S IRIS’ RESOLUTION?

HD 720p.

WHAT APPS WORK WITH IRIS?

Iris currently works with  Google Maps, Facebook, Whatsapp, and most native phone notifications as well. Iris has an App that will be available for download giving you the ability to control which notifications are projecting on the Head Up Display The list of features will grow and grow.

IS IRIS LEGAL?

Iris is an improved version of the OEM display screens pre-installed on luxury vehicles. There are already more then 4 million of these on the road. In most regions, this is legal but always be sure check your local laws.

HOW WILL IRIS FIT IN ALL CARS?

Yes. We have successfully installed Iris on a variety of cars and trucks with zero difficulty. Iris mounts securely into the visor body mounting points, and we supply a variation of mounting clips to ensure a secure fit in your vehicle. 

WILL THIS PRODUCT MAKE FOR MORE DISTRACTED DRIVERS?

No. Iris keeps the driver informed of changing road conditions, as well school zone notifications, speed alerts, navigation and much more. Iris keeps the drivers eyes focused on the road ahead while still being able to acknowledge incoming communication.

WHAT DOES DD STAND FOR IN DD TECHNOLOGIES?

In mathematical terms, D is written as Δ or delta. Delta is representative of change, D*D is exponential or rapid change. Rather than writing it as D(squared), we used DD. It also happens to be Dallas and Dino's first initial... just sayin.

WHERE IS IRIS MANUFACTURED?

Iris has components manufactured in Asia and the United States.

WHEN WILL THE PRODUCT BE READY?

The first two rewards with immediate shipping will be sent out within 30 days of the completed crowd funding campaign. We expect to send out the remainder of the Iris units late fall 2015.

WHAT IS THE REFUND OR CANCELLATION POLICY?

We feel that Iris will hit the spot but you may cancel your order during our crowdfunding campaign. No questions asked. 

HOW LONG IS THE WARRANTY?

1 year from date shipped. This warranty does not include normal wear and tear, and/or product abuse. Under this warranty, DD Technologies will provide the opportunity to have one of its technicians assess any possible defect. If defective or device failure is determined under normal use, DD Technologies will, at no cost to the Owner, repair or replace the defective Iris.

INSTALLING IRIS

The visor of your vehicle must be removed to install Iris. This may sound daunting - but its actually pretty easy. Depending on your vehicle, you may be able to remove the visor yourself, but the easiest thing to do may be to take your car to your dealership and ask them to remove your visor. They will probably give you a funny look but its OK. Once the visor is removed, you will place the included mounting bracket with metal clips in the visor mounting holes. You will want to select the best fit from the included bracket clips. then slide the bracket together so it is nice and snug, and screw the bracket in place. This should feel very secure and not move once completed. Next, plug the OBD connection cable into the Iris front face, making sure to feed the cable OVER the display arm. Next, place the Iris body mounting hole on the mounting bracket bolt, level the iris and screw the round central retaining bolt in place, making sure to adjust the level of the iris. You want it straight! Once this is tight and level, screw the allen screws in the Iris mounting bar and lock the Iris into place. Once this is done, the Iris should not move at all and is now a secure part of your car. Clip the visual beauty covers over the mounting bracket. Next, locate your vehicles OBD port, usually in the driver's footwell, near the door. Plug in the Iris and hide the wire. Iris is now installed and ready to use.

They will probably give you a funny look but its OK. Once the visor is removed, you will place the included mounting bracket with metal clips in the visor mounting holes. You will want to select the best fit from the included bracket clips. then slide the bracket together so it is nice and snug, and screw the bracket in place. story:
Quite simply, this will be the best eNail on the market and have features that no other eNail has. 

So what makes this thing so special?

Replaceable Coil: We have to stress that the coil is replaceable. For about $75 you can replace the coil if it ever breaks. You can also buy different styles of coils if you prefer a flatter head, larger stalk, or different design.

Healthier: When you dab, you are not inhaling any plant particulates. The vapour is clean and the material is more concentrated and refined. This also means that it is medically cleaner and more potent with less harmful side effects.

Healthier Again and Saves Money: No butane! Instead of inhaling butane you don't have to worry about that with a coiled heater. And on top of it being better for your health, you can save on average $50 per month. So it pays for itself in no time!

Small Size: The eNail.BUZZ is an extremely compact design making it easy to use, easy to store, and easy to transport. The designs in the past are completely inferior.

Presets: Press a button, save the temperature. It's that simple. Save up to 6 different presets for 6 different people, personalities, plants, or any other reason you may think of.

Safety Auto-Shutdown: Don't light your couch on fire and burn down your house. That would be bad. eNail.BUZZ is good, it saves you the trouble of remember to turn it off, it will do it automatically after a user configurable amount of time.

Cool-To-The-Touch Warning: Don't touch that coil! The only product that tells you how hot the coil is and not to touch it, even when the product is off. Wait until it gets cooler before you disassemble it and pack it away. Hot coil and your pocket don't go well together.

Glowing State LEDs: A quick glance at the glowing will tell you if the coil is off and cool, blue, or if it is hot and on, red. Don't guess, it is an easy colour coded system.

Fast Heat-Up and Super Accurate: Heat up the coil in less than a minute and keep it within a degree or two of where you set it. Get the best possible burn with the best eNail ever produced.

Long-Winded Version About the Product

It is a small compact design that quickly heats up a coil. The coil itself is removable and replaceable so that if anything happens to the coil, you can replace just that for less than $100. Most other solutions require buying a whole new unit. The temperature control is within a single percent once heated up and can be easily adjusted to any temperature you would need. You can then store up to 6 preset temperatures for various materials or people using an interface similar to a car radio. Press and hold to save, it is that simple.


The glowing LEDs will pulsate either blue or red to show the device on or off quickly, easily, and from across the room. A large bright OLED (Organic LED) display can be seen from any angle, not just straight on, and displays the current temperature, the set point temperature, and any warning or error messages. The first few people to pledge for the personalized version can display their own information on it.

Another prototype shot

A simple "d-pad" type configuration of buttons on the right side enable you to adjust the temperature of the coil in 1-degree increments or 10-degree increments to quickly change the range and then precisely narrow in on the exact temperature you want.

The menu gives you a bunch of configuration options. You can change the glowing of the under-case lighting, the status ring around the power button, and even the backlighting of the buttons themselves. All settings are stored internally on the internal micro-computer and once saved will be remembered forever even without power.

The eNail.BUZZ checks the state of your coil constantly for dangerous problems that may arise over time. What if you accidentally slam the cord in a door and pinch it? Does it still work? Is it safe? You are sending a bunch of power down the wire to heat up a coil to over 1000-degrees! The eNail.BUZZ constantly monitors the coil connection and sees if there are shorted sense wires or an open connection. If that happens, the coil will not heat up and an error message is displayed.

Two of the best safety features are some of the simplest. Firstly, after using the coil it will be hot. That's the point! But now you turn the power off, the coil is still hot. No other eNail gives you any details about the coil. The eNail.BUZZ will display the actual coil temperature on the LCD screen along with a warning message that the coil is still hot until it is in a safe handling range. The other feature that can save your bacon is if you turn it on and then forget, a user programmable turn-off timer will automatically shut off the coil and not have a burning hot piece of metal stay on the entire time.

The eNail.BUZZ can be used for many things, but because of how versatile the temperature settings can be, it can be used as a scented oil infuser filling a room with pleasant smells. You can save the temperature for various oils and substances in different presets and recall them with the touch of a button. You can even program which of the 6 presets is the default option when the unit powers on.

Wells in the back of the case to hold hot items or sticks without burning



Da Plan

So now that you know what it is, here is the rest of the plan! We have working prototypes and the design is complete. The circuit boards have been designed, built, and tested. The firmware for the micro-computer has been coded, flashed, and tested. The enclosure has been designed in a 3D CAD tool and is ready to be fabricated. Essentially all the back-end design, is done.

The next steps involve manufacturing it. We need to order hundreds of boards and assemble hundreds of boards. Get machined mouldings for the plastic injection cases. Get boxes printed for retail locations. Website design, all the logistics that the customers can see. That is what this money goes towards. 

Our plan is to make a first initial run of 250 boards. The parts, the PCBs, the assembly, the cases, the boxes, coils, nails, and other costs total about $76,000 USD. This includes the NRE (Non-Recurring Engineering) costs for die cuts, print masks, moulds, and so on. We are going to have an asking MSRP in the $650 to $850 range which puts us in the middle end of the spectrum but with the highest end features and things that don't have any comparison.

We already have tens of units sold to a local store that will be stocking them and selling them at their multiple retail locations.

This is a good thing for everyone and we can't wait to revolutionize the industry.

Summary

  • Prototype works and is built
  • Looking for startup costs to scale operation
  • Already have retail locations asking to sell
  • Features that nobody else has
  • Coil is replaceable!
  • Save on butane! On average $50/month!
  • Healthier! No more inhaling butane or plant particulates
story_txt:
Quite simply, this will be the best eNail on the market and have features that no other eNail has. So what makes this thing so special?Replaceable Coil: We have to stress that the coil is replaceable. For about $75 you
 can replace the coil if it ever breaks. You can also buy different 
styles of coils if you prefer a flatter head, larger stalk, or different
 design.Healthier: When you dab, you are not inhaling any
 plant particulates. The vapour is clean and the material is more 
concentrated and refined. This also means that it is medically cleaner 
and more potent with less harmful side effects.Healthier Again and Saves Money: No
 butane! Instead of inhaling butane you don't have to worry about that 
with a coiled heater. And on top of it being better for your health, you
 can save on average $50 per month. So it pays for itself in no time!Small Size: The
 eNail.BUZZ is an extremely compact design making it easy to use, easy 
to store, and easy to transport. The designs in the past are completely 
inferior.Presets: Press a button, save the temperature. 
It's that simple. Save up to 6 different presets for 6 different people,
 personalities, plants, or any other reason you may think of. Safety Auto-Shutdown: Don't
 light your couch on fire and burn down your house. That would be bad. 
eNail.BUZZ is good, it saves you the trouble of remember to turn it off,
 it will do it automatically after a user configurable amount of time.Cool-To-The-Touch Warning:
 Don't touch that coil! The only product that tells you how hot the coil
 is and not to touch it, even when the product is off. Wait until it 
gets cooler before you disassemble it and pack it away. Hot coil and 
your pocket don't go well together.Glowing State LEDs: A 
quick glance at the glowing will tell you if the coil is off and cool, 
blue, or if it is hot and on, red. Don't guess, it is an easy colour 
coded system.Fast Heat-Up and Super Accurate: Heat up the coil in less than a minute and keep it within a degree or two of where you set it. Get the best possible burn with the best eNail ever produced.Long-Winded Version About the ProductIt
 is a small compact design that quickly heats up a coil. The coil itself
 is removable and replaceable so that if anything happens to the coil, 
you can replace just that for less than $100. Most other solutions 
require buying a whole new unit. The temperature control is within a 
single percent once heated up and can be easily adjusted to any 
temperature you would need. You can then store up to 6 preset 
temperatures for various materials or people using an interface similar 
to a car radio. Press and hold to save, it is that simple.


OLED Screen and LED Underglow -- Actual Prototype


The glowing LEDs will pulsate either blue or red to show the device 
on or off quickly, easily, and from across the room. A large bright OLED
 (Organic LED) display can be seen from any angle, not just straight on,
 and displays the current temperature, the set point temperature, and 
any warning or error messages. The first few people to pledge for the 
personalized version can display their own information on it.Another prototype shot



A simple "d-pad" type configuration of buttons on the right side 
enable you to adjust the temperature of the coil in 1-degree increments 
or 10-degree increments to quickly change the range and then precisely 
narrow in on the exact temperature you want. The menu gives you a
 bunch of configuration options. You can change the glowing of the 
under-case lighting, the status ring around the power button, and even 
the backlighting of the buttons themselves. All settings are stored 
internally on the internal micro-computer and once saved will be 
remembered forever even without power. The eNail.BUZZ checks the 
state of your coil constantly for dangerous problems that may arise over
 time. What if you accidentally slam the cord in a door and pinch it? 
Does it still work? Is it safe? You are sending a bunch of power down 
the wire to heat up a coil to over 1000-degrees! The eNail.BUZZ 
constantly monitors the coil connection and sees if there are shorted 
sense wires or an open connection. If that happens, the coil will not 
heat up and an error message is displayed. Two of the best safety
 features are some of the simplest. Firstly, after using the coil it 
will be hot. That's the point! But now you turn the power off, the coil 
is still hot. No other eNail gives you any details about the coil. The 
eNail.BUZZ will display the actual coil temperature on the LCD screen 
along with a warning message that the coil is still hot until it is in a
 safe handling range. The other feature that can save your bacon is if 
you turn it on and then forget, a user programmable turn-off timer will 
automatically shut off the coil and not have a burning hot piece of 
metal stay on the entire time.The eNail.BUZZ can be used for many
 things, but because of how versatile the temperature settings can be, 
it can be used as a scented oil infuser filling a room with pleasant 
smells. You can save the temperature for various oils and substances in 
different presets and recall them with the touch of a button. You can 
even program which of the 6 presets is the default option when the unit 
powers on.Wells in the back of the case to hold hot items or sticks without burningFrom the right side of the enclosure












From the front with cutouts


Da PlanSo now that you know what it is, here is the 
rest of the plan! We have working prototypes and the design is complete.
 The circuit boards have been designed, built, and tested. The firmware 
for the micro-computer has been coded, flashed, and tested. The 
enclosure has been designed in a 3D CAD tool and is ready to be 
fabricated. Essentially all the back-end design, is done.The next
 steps involve manufacturing it. We need to order hundreds of boards and
 assemble hundreds of boards. Get machined mouldings for the plastic 
injection cases. Get boxes printed for retail locations. Website design,
 all the logistics that the customers can see. That is what this money 
goes towards. Our plan is to make a first initial run of 250 
boards. The parts, the PCBs, the assembly, the cases, the boxes, coils, 
nails, and other costs total about $76,000 USD. This includes the NRE 
(Non-Recurring Engineering) costs for die cuts, print masks, moulds, and
 so on. We are going to have an asking MSRP in the $650 to $850 range 
which puts us in the middle end of the spectrum but with the highest end
 features and things that don't have any comparison.We already 
have tens of units sold to a local store that will be stocking them and 
selling them at their multiple retail locations. This is a good thing for everyone and we can't wait to revolutionize the industry. Summary

Looking for startup costs to scale operation
Already have retail locations asking to sell

story:
From Wireless Freedom Charge Inc. we are proud to say:


  We have designed the  "world's first smart device & wireless charging system combined into an awesome hybrid system!" this is  revolutionary work and an absolute game changer.

        

                                           

             WFC products!


My name is Basheer Contractor and I am the Chief Executive Office and founder of Wireless Freedom Charge Inc,  I have developed the products and now I need a "little" help manufacturing the products on a large scale.  Take a look below and see what my product specifications are and what they will be sold at on my website online. The incentives you can receive from becoming a backer for WFC are huge. Getting funded would catalyze the manufacturing process and help me take large quantity orders and because of this I will be able to provide individuals who backed my company with huge savings on products. Remember this project is flexible and I generate enough capital already to make my quota for orders.  I am making amazing incentives though for any backers of this technology and you will be rewarded for your loyalty. I have been working and developing these products consistently and with all my energy for the last 3 years. 

You are looking at game changing products that are going to cause a ripple in the "wireless charging market". This is the first universal wireless charging system that is completely independent from the 3 major players in the wireless charging industry (Qi,A4WP,PMA). Our products have nothing to do with the 3 wireless charging standards listed previously, this is revolutionary work and at WFC (Wireless Freedom Charge Inc.) we believe that we have the wireless charging industry in a guillotine submission ready to choke it out. 


           (Nikola Tesla )

             Micro-USB port for receivers: (For Interchangeable cords)

( We designed our receivers so that they have a Micro-USB port which in turn completely eradicates any issue for compatibility between devices. Just have the proper cord for your device plug it in the micro-USB port and into your device.Your device is now ready to receive charge from one of our smart transmitters.)

               This is the Assembly Detail: 

(Our receivers are retractable and adjustable fitting. Using this method our receiver can fit literally any device (either mobile phone or tablet.) We believe our retractable fitting receiver gives us an edge over the competition. This truly helps us in preserving our universal charging image because we are compatible with any device from this mechanical application adapted into our technology.)



                                     WFC Universal Minimum Receiver         

(This is the WFC Universal Minimum receiver, It is meant for mobile devices, and in the power transfer specifications range for mobile cell phones. Any mobile cell phone is compatible with this WFC universal receiver.)

 - Uses zig-bee 3.0 data communication.

Manufacturer Specifications

  • CPU: RK3288 Quad-Core
  • Processor Speed (max): 2.4 GHz
  • RAM: 16 GB

  • Micro USB
  • 3.5 mm Audio out port


                        (WIRELESS FREEDOM CHARGE INC. product line)



Our innovations in wireless charging technology will enable consumers to combine the advantages of wireless charging and complete freedom of mobility to create a new era of convenience for all users of mobile electronic devices.

Our Solution :

We have a vision around our 2 unique technologies of complete power sustainability. By combining technologies that use sustainable power sources, wireless charging capabilities as well as power storage principles, we will completely eliminate the need for ‘inductive charging’ methods which use AC power from wall outlets. The 2 technologies that we want to combine to achieve this goal are our Universal Smart Transmitter(UST), and Aftermarket receivers. Currently available solutions force the end user into a “closed” system, limiting the user’s ability to charge their device with only a compatible charging pad.

WPC and PMA standards are based on inductive charging-considered to be tightly coupled systems which does not permit spatial freedom. Main reason of this flaw: no smart data signalling between devices. Currently available solutions force the end user into a “closed” system, limiting the user’s ability to charge their device with only a compatible charging pad. WPC PMA A4WP Established in 2008, inductive based, exploring Mag Res 140+ members Shipping in volume today  

RECOMMENDED SOLUTION: Aftermarket receiver design that allows smart data signalling between devices. Charging devices will scan for other devices. Receiving devices will accept and pair using Zig-bee data communication. Once paired, they may exchange data using smart data signalling:

- Eliminate the use of inductive charging and use loosely coupled coils to provide spatial freedom

-Implementation based on DC-DC resonance system that provides power sustainability as well as high power transfer efficiency 

- magnetic field formed directly from the DC power source.

-Simplified design eliminating the need of AC source from receiver.

-Unique power sustainability design via Universal Smart Transmitter


ADVANTAGES AND APPLICATIONS:

-High power transfer efficiency as multiple AC-DC conversions eliminated

-Solution independent of various wireless charging standards (WPC, PMA and A4WP)

-Provides an actual wireless charging experience with spatial freedom compared to traditional inductive charging.)  

- No need of any docking station.

-Simple, convenient and consumer friendly design.

- Can be deployed at: Airports, cafes, restaurants, night clubs, electric vehicles, medical applications (medical implants, pace-makers, cardiology), military, commercial industry sectors.

DESIGN OVERVIEW:

- Universal Smart Transmitter powers up Aftermarket receiver which will in turn power up your device.

- Transmitter side: DC Power bank will power Tx Resonator that will transmit electromagnetic power. 

-Power amplifier and matching circuits are used before providing power to resonator.

-Receiver side: Transmitted power is received by Rx Resonator of other device. This is converted to electric power. This power is provided to DC battery of the device being charged, after proper rectification and regulation.

- Also, it is provided to DC Power bank where it is stored to have power sustainability. During this power transfer, status of both the devices is monitored by respective MCUs (Micro-control Units) through exchange of control signals over Zig-bee communication.




Project Background:

Basic Coil Formulas:

A coil has inductance, resistance and capacitance. Its self-resonant frequency is given by: 

Fr = 1/ 2 pie square root(LC)

L= Inductance, C= Capicitance

At resonance the impedances of C and L are equal and opposite thus they cancel out leaving the impedance to be R. The quality factor is given by:

Q= WoL/R

The lower the R the better the quality factor. R really represents the losses in the coil and includes the wire resistance.

radiated energy and losses due to the proximity effect (eddy currents). As the frequency increases the skin effect becomes more pronounced

and less current travels in the interior of the wire, this effectively means the resistance of the wire increases with frequency.

Based on the above formulas maximum efficiency will be obtained by:

• Maximizing coil inductances

• Maximizing frequency while taking into account skin effect, proximity effect and radiative losses

• Optimizing load resistance based on other system parameters



Summary of Key Points for Maximum System Efficiency

• High Q

• Minimize coil resistances and capacitances

• Maximize coil inductances.

(The main goal from research was maximizing frequency while taking into account skin effect, proximity effect and minimizing radiative losses.)

• Optimizing load resistance based on other system parameters

• An efficient driver such as a class D or E

• On the device side the load resistance and the efficiency of the rectification and power regulation are important


Wireless Freedom Charge Inc.

This Technology is 100% safe, we at WFC take health and safety very seriously and adhere to strictest CSA and FCC guidelines and our product is already ISO-9001 certified.


www.wirelessfreedomcharge.com

http://www.wirelessfreedomcharge.com/shop/

info@wirelessfreedomcharge.com

Business phone = 17809024143

(Chief Executive Officer : Basheer Contractor)

I have done extensive research into this project and I already have fully developed prototypes. I already have a manufacturer in china on stand by ready to mass manufacturer these prototype products we developed. If i reach my funding goal I promise all my backers that they will receive there products on time delivered right to there address to anywhere in the world! I also have an E-commerce site with hundreds of products, If you back WFC i promise 50% off your first purchase on any product on my site, and we have amazing products!!!

All the technical testing has already been completed and we are ready to start manufacturing on a large scale. Help catalyze this process and contribute to Wireless Freedom Charge Inc. and you will not regret it! 

We have the  the unit ready, become a indiegogo backer for WFC and you will be rewarded with an amazing product shipped right to your door! This is the first hybrid Smart device that is also a spatial wireless charging system, this hasn't been ever seen in the technology industry. We have extensive research completed,this technology is the future, we have broken down the barriers between smart devices and  spatial wireless charging systems. If you become a backer for Wireless Freedom Charge Inc.  you will be rewarded with amazing and beautifully crafted device ready for you to use. We are working diligently and full throttle forward to make sure Wireless Freedom Charge is a house hold name by 2017.

Multi-touch: Support 10 Point
OTG
Bluetooth
Google Play
Support 4K Video
Portable Wifi hotspot(Tethering): USB 3G Dongle (Not Included)
Sensors: Proximity, Accelerometer, Gravity
Mic and Speaker
Battery Size: 15 000 mAh
Continuous Usage Time: About 4 Hours
Battery Standby: About 8 Hours
Wi-Fi: 802.11 b/g/n

Ports

Micro SD card slots
Micro USB
3.5 mm Audio out port




                        (WIRELESS FREEDOM CHARGE INC. product line)







Our innovations in wireless charging technology will enable consumers to combine the advantages of wireless charging and complete freedom of mobility to create a new era of convenience for all users of mobile electronic devices.
Our Solution :
We have a vision around our 2 unique technologies of complete power sustainability. By combining technologies that use sustainable power sources, wireless charging capabilities as well as power storage principles, we will completely eliminate the need for ‘inductive charging’ methods which use AC power from wall outlets. The 2 technologies that we want to combine to achieve this goal are our Universal Smart Transmitter(UST), and Aftermarket receivers. Currently available solutions force the end user into a “closed” system, limiting the user’s ability to charge their device with only a compatible charging pad.
WPC and PMA standards are based on inductive charging-considered to be tightly coupled systems which does not permit spatial freedom. Main reason of this flaw: no smart data signalling between devices. Currently available solutions force the end user into a “closed” system, limiting the user’s ability to charge their device with only a compatible charging pad. WPC PMA A4WP Established in 2008, inductive based, exploring Mag Res 140+ members Shipping in volume today  
RECOMMENDED SOLUTION: Aftermarket receiver design that allows smart data signalling between devices. Charging devices will scan for other devices. Receiving devices will accept and pair using Zig-bee data communication. Once paired, they may exchange data using smart data signalling:
- Eliminate the use of inductive charging and use loosely coupled coils to provide spatial freedom
-Implementation based on DC-DC resonance system that provides power sustainability as well as high power transfer efficiency 
- magnetic field formed directly from the DC power source.
-Simplified design eliminating the need of AC source from receiver.
-Unique power sustainability design via Universal Smart Transmitter



ADVANTAGES AND APPLICATIONS:
-High power transfer efficiency as multiple AC-DC conversions eliminated
-Solution independent of various wireless charging standards (WPC, PMA and A4WP)
-Provides an actual wireless charging experience with spatial freedom compared to traditional inductive charging.)  
- No need of any docking station.
-Simple, convenient and consumer friendly design.
- Can be deployed at: Airports, cafes, restaurants, night clubs, electric vehicles, medical applications (medical implants, pace-makers, cardiology), military, commercial industry sectors.
DESIGN OVERVIEW:
- Universal Smart Transmitter powers up Aftermarket receiver which will in turn power up your device.
- Transmitter side: DC Power bank will power Tx Resonator that will transmit electromagnetic power. 
-Power amplifier and matching circuits are used before providing power to resonator.
-Receiver side: Transmitted power is received by Rx Resonator of other device. This is converted to electric power. This power is provided to DC battery of the device being charged, after proper rectification and regulation.
- Also, it is provided to DC Power bank where it is stored to have power sustainability. During this power transfer, status of both the devices is monitored by respective MCUs (Micro-control Units) through exchange of control signals over Zig-bee communication.






Project Background:
Basic Coil Formulas:
A coil has inductance, resistance and capacitance. Its self-resonant frequency is given by: 
Fr = 1/ 2 pie square root(LC)
L= Inductance, C= Capicitance

At resonance the impedances of C and L are equal and opposite thus they cancel out leaving the impedance to be R. The quality factor is given by:
Q= WoL/R

The lower the R the better the quality factor. R really represents the losses in the coil and includes the wire resistance.





radiated energy and losses due to the proximity effect (eddy currents). As the frequency increases the skin effect becomes more pronounced
and less current travels in the interior of the wire, this effectively means the resistance of the wire increases with frequency.





Based on the above formulas maximum efficiency will be obtained by:




• Maximizing coil inductances
• Maximizing frequency while taking into account skin effect, proximity effect and radiative losses
• Optimizing load resistance based on other system parameters





Summary of Key Points for Maximum System Efficiency
• High Q
• Minimize coil resistances and capacitances
• Maximize coil inductances.





















(The main goal from research was maximizing frequency while taking into account skin effect, proximity effect and minimizing radiative losses.)

• Optimizing load resistance based on other system parameters
• An efficient driver such as a class D or E
• On the device side the load resistance and the efficiency of the rectification and power regulation are important

Wireless Freedom Charge Inc.
This Technology is 100% safe, we at WFC take health and safety very seriously and adhere to strictest CSA and FCC guidelines and our product is already ISO-9001 certified.

We have the  the unit ready, become a indiegogo backer for WFC and you will be rewarded with an amazing product shipped right to your door! This is the first hybrid Smart device that is also a spatial wireless charging system, this hasn't been ever seen in the technology industry. We have extensive research completed,this technology is the future, we have broken down the barriers between smart devices and  spatial wireless charging systems. We are working diligently and full throttle forward to make sure Wireless Freedom Charge is a house hold name by 2017.

story:
My name is Red Lightning.

Before I got fat I was one of the most sought after performers on the Scottish Wrestling circuit. People love to hate me. Although I am currently trying to get fit again I feel that my hand eye co-ordination is lacking due to the out of date gaming hardware I have.

Being injured and slightly chubby means I get dregs of work in Wrestling now and can't fund my gaming habits because the money I do make gets spent on drugs of all kind

I am looking for  500 people to donate £1 so I can buy one. Hey if you don't ask you don't get right?

Come on, 50p. Come on. Change a man's life. Go on.

If I get the PS4 I will stop eating Pic N Mix

If you donate the quid I will answer 5 questions for you. That's just 20p per question.  Bargain guys, bargain.

story:
Universal and modular VR, enhanced by high-fidelity audio.

Virtual reality can be a life changing experience, with the ability to inspire, entertain, educate or even lessen the symptoms of conditions like PTSD and anxiety.

But, VR is unfinished: units are expensive, bulky, and incompatible with certain smartphones. Almost all are lacking a key component... AUDIO! We're a seasoned group of designers, engineers, and marketers who set out to address those issues and make it affordable in the process.

Our goal was to create the most universal, accessible, and immersive experience possible. The Model A delivers on that goal. A carefully designed VR system, supported by a free app, and beautiful high-fidelity audio.

We need your help!

The Model A is in the hands of the factory and ready to go, but we need your help to open tooling and place our first order. Please help our team continue to create, and innovate by making a pledge.

Learn more about us below the Rewards section. Join our team and let's support each other.

As seen on...






 


 

 


 


 


 






 

 

Specs

  • Universal:

    Works with most smartphones.

  • 45MM Lenses:

    an immersive visual experience.

  • Hi-Fidelity Audio:

    This is a game changer and provides an amazing immersive experience.

  • On-Ear OR Over-Ear:

    Choose between smaller more portable A.1 On-Ear Design, "featuring 30mm drivers", Or go for the Model A.2 boasting a more immersive design and 40mm drivers.

  • Capacitance 'touch' button:

    Pause / Play / Interact with objects on screen

  • Durable & Comfortable:

    The Model A is made from a a durable expanded EVA foam which is soft and comfy on your face.

  • Modular:

    The Model A breaks down so that all major components can be shuffled. You'll have the ability to upgrade components, swap colors to customize your experience.

  • Free App:

    We're passionate about finding the best, most exciting and creative experiences out there. To make it easy on you, we're hand delivering it in a FREE app, made specifically for the Model A.

  • Compatible with hundreds of apps and experiences:

    We want to help you explore the world of VR and that's why the Model A works with YoutubeVR, DiscoveryVR, Veer, Within, RelaxVR and more!

 

​

*Patent Pending

 


 

Let's get deep for a second.

"But... I'm not so sure about VR.

So do we. Truthfully, we think about that a lot. We don't believe that virtual reality should replace reality. Rather, we're setting out to enhance the technology available. Planning to hike Mount Kilimanjaro? Check out some training tips and tours before you book. Get inspired, not sucked in.

The very real positive benefits of Virtual Reality experiences shouldn't be ignored. By creating a feeling of ‘presenseʼ VR has tremendous potential in the fields of education and healthcare. Studies have shown success in wellness efforts too, relieving symptoms of PTSD, anxiety, conquering fears/phobias, meditation. It's also been found to be very useful in education.

Check out studies and information below the Team section.

Why us?

ANMLY means a deviation from the common rule. That's what we are: a tech company that's not just here to sell you plastic. Rather, we are a group of Creatives, hell-bent on exploring the multiverse. We're focused on using technology for the betterment of society, we believe that VR if used for the right reasons, can have a serious positive impact. We are aware of, and cater to the emotional needs of the consumers; by developing attractive lifestyle solutions that you actually want to be seen using.

With our products, we aim to solve unsolved problems. With our apps, we aim to bring creative, educational and mind evolving experiences.

Please help us grow.

Mikie Krisztal, Founder, CEO, ANMLY


Did we mention that we're Bluetooth veterans? True story. We've designed, developed and brought to market dozens of Bluetooth speakers and headphones over the years. The cost of producing a Bluetooth unit is significantly higher, requiring PCB board development, batteries, cords etc. In order to ensure that we can make basic models, we're saving this one for the stretch goal.

For those of you dongle-phones out there, the Bluetooth Model A will be the right choice for you.

The Bluetooth Model A will have the following specs:

  • Bluetooth 5.0:

    The newest available Bluetooth technology will offer faster connection times (no lag), better range, better quality.

  • 8 HR Battery Life
  • Built-in-Mic:

    Wanna take a call while surfing the multiverse? You can!

  • The BTH Model A will retail for $90 but will be available to our backers for $70.

 

Blood. Sweat. Tears.

Actually, it was a pretty good time. Here's our team.


 

Mikie Krisztal: Founder / Creative Director

Mikie is the founder of BrandMatter LA, a boutique creative agency based in Los Angeles. He's a multidisciplinary Creative Director and experienced entrepreneur with a proven track record of building successful brands from the ground up. Mikie has created products, packaging, websites, as well as retail and tradeshow displays for clients ranging from tiny startups to Fortune 500 companies.

Martin Ortiz: Industrial Designer

Martin is an American Industrial Designer, educated at the renowned Facultad de Arquitectura Urbanismo y Diseño in Cordoba, Argentina, before moving back to Miami’s design district to soak up all things ‘cool’ for the past decade or so. Martin’s impressive body of work includes design for products, transportation and yachts, environmental design, and furniture.

Mariah Clark: Project Manager

Mariah is a project manager with experience leading teams new products and business strategies in multiple industries from entertainment and consumer electronics to healthcare and real estate. Whether strategizing and implementing growth expansion strategies for a consulting firm into the Caribbean or developing and launching global consumer electronic products, Mariah brings a high-level of strategic thinking. With the ability to adapt, Mariah has supported sales, marketing, data science and engineering teams to achieve goals under tight budgets and deadlines.

Jeff Allen: Digital Marketing

Jeff is an experienced marketing executive and entrepreneur with a multidisciplinary background including traditional and digital marketing, product management, operations, and eCommerce. He’s spent the last several years building Hallmark’s online content marketing platform and strategy. With extensive experience in the trenches, Jeff has a deft hand when it comes to growing a new business.

Alex Fish: Social Media

Alexandra Fish (Alex) is a copywriter and social media specialist with a background in creative and professional writing. Originally from New York, Alex cut her teeth in film and TV after moving to Los Angeles in 2010. She has her finger on the pulse of pop-culture and media, as she works freelance in TV (FLAKED, ARRESTED DEVELOPMENT, GOOD BEHAVIOR), social media consulting and copywriting of any size. If you have a dog, she will pet it unapologetically.

Leah Polk: Public Relations

A veteran of the tech PR scene, Leah Polk has overseen numerous product launches and secured coverage in influential outlets such as The Wall Street Journal, The New York Times, Wired, Fast Company, etc. Aside from a brief foray into the energy industry, she has spent the bulk of her career in consumer electronics at companies including the Consumer Technology Association, Belkin and Wemo. Leah graduated from the University of Texas and has been secretly plotting her return to Austin for the better part of a decade.

Gregg Thomas: COO

Gregg has decades of experience in the world of Consumer Electronics Retail from both sides of the desk. Senior Merchant for award-winning retailers to a Director of Business Alliances for SiriusXM, Gregg has lead and worked with teams launching and marketing 1,000’s of new products. Gregg has contributed to the success of several startups and will be taking on several responsibilities for ANMLY.

Bear Prelogar: Advisor

For twenty-three years, Bear has worked with the very best audio brands to design and develop innovative products and merchandising strategies. He has developed speakers, headphones, and other digital appliances for the fine folks at Denon, Mcintosh Labs, Beats By Dre, Polk Audio, Sony, Pioneer, and many others. Bear is a veteran in the CE Industry, bringing immensely valuable insight as well as relationships with vendors and retailers alike.

Erica Felsenthal, Ph.D.: Advisor

Dr. Felsenthal is a Clinical Neuropsychologist who has been practicing psychology in the Los Angeles area since 2004. She received her BA in Psychology from The University of Colorado at Boulder, PhD from Palo Alto University (APA accredited, affiliated with Stanford University), and also completed a Post-doctoral fellowship focused on Behavioral Medicine and Pediatric Neuropsychology. She has published 19 research articles. Her current research interests include alternative to medication treatments for mental health conditions.

Risks and challenges

The Model A is nearly here. Our prototype is finished. Our factory is ready for production. Our app is being developed as we speak.

With any new product, there are always possible challenges to overcome. The good news is, we've been working with our factory for years. As it stands, we don't expect any major issues.

We’ve done our very best to create a solid production plan. We've been working with our factory for years, but sometimes forecasts don’t always hit the mark. Components can run short, suppliers can change. If anything happens that causes us to miss our projections, we’ll let you know why and make it right as quickly as possible.
