story:
JUST ADDED A NEW COLORFUL PERK:


This project is about passion. Passion for soccer and passion for developing an idea come true.

Once, watching a soccer match with friends in a Sports Bar, we have an idea of a unique shaped drinkware inspired in the FIFA World Cup Trophy.

We called “Trophy-glass”, a US pint capacity (16 fl.oz./473ml) daily glassware. NO plastics, 100% pure flint food container glass for every kids & adults beverages, and dishwasher resistant.

We develop a complete line of trophy-glasses for every fan desire:

  • Flint glass (undecorated).
  • Coloured glass (undecorated)
  • 2014 official Emblems and Logos decoration, flint-glass
  • Collectable Set of 8 trophy-glasses with the former FIFA World Cup™ Champion Teams

They are all official merchandising of the  2014 FIFA World Cup™ Brazil.

We love soccer, and we love the FIFA World Cup™.

Sometimes, we go with friends to a Stadium but most games we watch them on a Soccer Bar or at home and twitting to friends. The unbeatable combination for us is: friends + soccer + beer + pizza.

We are not alone and many families will follow the next World Cup starting in June 12th, 2014.

Many USMNT supporters and fans are united and organized thru American Outlaws chapter and Sam’s Army. Also every Soccer bar owner can be interested in our trophy-glass for their sports bar as glassware or as a premium for giveaway promotions to their fanbase clients.

If you know a soccer fan (or a Sports Bar owner), share our project with them.

Our project has a long roadmap, Now is time for the first production but our capital is not enough for it minimum quantity.

So we decide to open our project to the huge soccer community  and ask directly to them to help us fund our first trophy-glass production.

As a reward for your contribution, we have make several perks with different decorations in order to satisfy every desire and feasible help. With the trophyglass set, every contributor will receive a “First Batch Certificate”.

If you love soccer, If you love the FIFA World Cup, you will love the Trophy-glass.

As soon as we reach the project goal we will order the first production. We have everything set for starting delivering the perks on the first days of February 2014.

Help us with your contribution. You can also help us sharing with friends that love soccer.

If we get a overwhelming respond to our Trophy-glass project, we can add units to the first batch without any problem. 


We have made perks for Soccer Fans as individuals, as aTeam and  for contributors with soccer-related businesses.

All contributions helps. You can add several perks according to your interest.

Drinking glasses made of 100% pure glass are heavy.

We include shipping to 48 contiguous States addreses but for the heavy rewards (84 to 840 lb) we consider fair to every contributor to have 3 zones within US. Please see the map at the end for more details on States and zones. 

Rewards for Soccer Fans

Rewards for Soccer-related Businesses:

Tired with the “Happy Hour”, “2x1” or “BOGO” ? Innovate and propose to your soccer fan clients a unique giveaway promotion of “Draft Beer+Trophyglass” and they take it home the Trophyglass, a 2014 FIFA Official merchandising.

Everyweek there are at least 5 important soccer matches on your screens: differentiate from other nearby competitors and make your clients live a unique experience in your Sports Bar.

This rewards to your help is a 20 Master Cases perk, each case with 48 trophyglasses. Total 960 trophyglasses for selling by unit.

We can also help your Soccer Bar with tabletent, menus and posters artworks & images. SPECIAL FOR AO CHAPTERS SOCCER BARS.


What happens if I receive a parcel that sound like broken glasses inside ?

Don’t worry. Receive it. If by any case, the contributor received a broken trophy-glass, we will send without any extra cost a replacement of the broken trophy-glass so you can have your perks full & perfect.

Is very simple: just take a photo with your mobile upon delivery of the parcel with the broken T-Glass, send it to: contributors@collectible-goods.com with the tracking number or address. Allow us 7 days for delivering the replacement.


I don’t see any perk with the coloured trophy-glass set ?

In this first batch, we want to focus in the flint-glass, decorated & undecorated. We know that many people like the coloured glass sets and we are going to do it for the second batch because we need an important number of units for making them. If you want them, please send us an email (see below) with the reference “coloured set” so we advise when we are going to manufacture.


Which is the first batch number?

The overall minimum quantity is 100.000 units. We have the 85% funded with our & relatives capital. We are needing the project goal: $ 27,000


Are the trophy-glass be available at Walmart, Target , etc ?

You are not going to find it a Walmart, Target, K-mart, Sports Authority, Dick’s SG, etc.

Major Retailer ask for a payment term that we cannot finance. As said we have no extra capital and we believe in the benefits for customers and manufacturers of a direct sale. After our project, maybe we launch an ecommerce site.

 

Are inks and materials safe ?

All of the Trophy-glass comply with the State of California OEHHA Proposition 65.

Inks used are organic type provide by Ferro USA and are free of heavy metals. We manufacture and decorate all our trophy-glass in a O-I Group facility (a US based Group) formerly known as Owens-Illinois Group. They are made of 100% pure flint food container glass.

Also all decorations are more than 20mm from upper border so lips cannot touch them.


Contact us:

General inquiries:    info@collectible-goods.com

Contributors:  contributors@collectible-goods.com

Founders:   robert@collectible-goods.com

       bruno@collectible-goods.com

Risk and Challenges: 100% Shipping Warranty

The only risk in our project is that some trophy-glasses can be broken during delivery to contributors address. Although Postal Services will cover the replacement cost, we decide to make a commitment to our contributors of

100%  Free replacement warranty in case of broken delivery

If by any case, the contributor received a broken trophy-glass, we will send without any extra cost a replacement of the broken trophy-glass so you can have your perks full & perfect.

Is very simple: just take a photo with your mobile upon delivery of the parcel with the broken T-Glass, send it to: contributors@collectible-goods.com with the tracking number or address. Allow us 7 days for delivering the replacement.

JUST ADDED A NEW COLORFUL PERK:

This
project is about passion. Passion
for soccer and passion for developing an idea come true.
Once,
watching a soccer match with friends in a Sports Bar, we have an idea of a
unique shaped drinkware inspired in the FIFA World Cup Trophy.
We called
“Trophy-glass”, a US pint capacity (16 fl.oz./473ml) daily glassware. NO
plastics, 100% pure flint food container glass for every kids & adults
beverages, and dishwasher resistant.
We
develop a complete line of trophy-glasses for every fan desire:

Flint
glass (undecorated).
Coloured
glass (undecorated)
2014
official Emblems and Logos decoration, flint-glass
Collectable
Set of 8 trophy-glasses with the former FIFA World Cup™ Champion Teams

They are all official merchandising of the  2014 FIFA World Cup™ Brazil.
We love
soccer, and we love the FIFA World Cup™.
Sometimes,
we go with friends to a Stadium but most games we watch them on a Soccer Bar or
at home and twitting to friends. The unbeatable combination for us is: friends
+ soccer + beer + pizza.
We are
not alone and many families will follow the next World Cup starting in June 12th,
2014.
Many
USMNT supporters and fans are united and organized thru American Outlaws
chapter and Sam’s Army. Also every Soccer bar owner can be interested in our
trophy-glass for their sports bar as glassware or as a premium for giveaway
promotions to their fanbase clients.
If you
know a soccer fan (or a Sports Bar owner), share our project with them.
Our project
has a long roadmap, Now is time for the first production but our capital is not
enough for it minimum quantity.
So we
decide to open our project to the huge soccer community  and ask directly to them to help us
fund our first trophy-glass production.
As a
reward for your contribution, we have make several perks with different
decorations in order to satisfy every desire and feasible help. With the
trophyglass set, every contributor will receive a “First Batch Certificate”.
If you
love soccer, If you love the FIFA World Cup, you will love the Trophy-glass.
As soon
as we reach the project goal we will order the first production. We have
everything set for starting delivering the perks on the first days of February
2014.
Help us
with your contribution. You can
also help us sharing with friends that love soccer.
If we get
a overwhelming respond to our Trophy-glass project, we can add units to the
first batch without any problem. 
We have made perks for Soccer Fans as individuals, as
aTeam and  for contributors with soccer-related
businesses. 
All
contributions helps. You can add several perks according to your interest.
Drinking
glasses made of 100% pure glass are heavy.
We include
shipping to 48 contiguous States addreses but for the heavy rewards (84 to 840
lb) we consider fair to every contributor to have 3 zones within US. Please see
the map at the end for more details on States and zones. 
Rewards for Soccer Fans

Rewards for Soccer-related Businesses:
Tired with the “Happy Hour”, “2x1” or
“BOGO” ? Innovate and propose to your soccer fan clients a unique giveaway
promotion of “Draft Beer+Trophyglass” and they take it home the Trophyglass, a
2014 FIFA Official merchandising.
Everyweek there are at least 5 important
soccer matches on your screens: differentiate from other nearby competitors and
make your clients live a unique experience in your Sports Bar.
This rewards to your help is a 20 Master
Cases perk, each case with 48 trophyglasses. Total 960 trophyglasses for
selling by unit.
We can also help your Soccer Bar with
tabletent, menus and posters artworks & images. SPECIAL FOR AO CHAPTERS SOCCER BARS.
What happens if I receive a parcel that sound
like broken glasses inside ?
Don’t worry. Receive it. If by any case, the
contributor received a broken trophy-glass, we will send without any extra cost
a replacement of the broken trophy-glass so you can have your perks full &
perfect.
Is very
simple: just take a photo with your mobile upon delivery of the parcel with the
broken T-Glass, send it to: contributors@collectible-goods.com with the tracking number
or address. Allow us 7 days for delivering the replacement.

I don’t see any perk with the coloured
trophy-glass set ?
In this first batch, we want to focus in the flint-glass, decorated
& undecorated. We know that many people like the coloured glass sets and we
are going to do it for the second batch because we need an important number of
units for making them. If you want them, please send us an email (see below)
with the reference “coloured set” so we advise when we are going to
manufacture.

Which is the first batch number?
The overall minimum quantity is 100.000 units. We have the 85% funded
with our & relatives capital. We are needing the project goal: $ 27,000

Are the trophy-glass be available at Walmart,
Target , etc ?
You are not going to find it a Walmart, Target, K-mart, Sports
Authority, Dick’s SG, etc.
Major Retailer ask for a payment term that we cannot finance. As said we
have no extra capital and we believe in the benefits for customers and
manufacturers of a direct sale. After our project, maybe we launch an ecommerce
site.
 
Are inks and materials safe ?
All of
the Trophy-glass comply with the State of California OEHHA Proposition 65.
Inks used
are organic type provide by Ferro USA and are free of heavy metals. We
manufacture and decorate all our trophy-glass in a O-I Group facility (a US
based Group) formerly known as Owens-Illinois Group. They are made of 100% pure
flint food container glass.
Also all
decorations are more than 20mm from upper border so lips cannot touch them.

Contact us:
General inquiries:    info@collectible-goods.com
Contributors:  contributors@collectible-goods.com
Founders:   robert@collectible-goods.com
       bruno@collectible-goods.com
Risk and Challenges: 100% Shipping Warranty
The only
risk in our project is that some trophy-glasses can be broken during delivery
to contributors address. Although Postal Services will cover the replacement
cost, we decide to make a commitment to our contributors of
100%  Free replacement warranty in case of
broken delivery 
If by any
case, the contributor received a broken trophy-glass, we will send without any
extra cost a replacement of the broken trophy-glass so you can have your perks
full & perfect.
Is very
simple: just take a photo with your mobile upon delivery of the parcel with the
broken T-Glass, send it to: contributors@collectible-goods.com with the tracking number
or address. Allow us 7 days for delivering the replacement.

story:
Featured In
 

"A Cool Pen" - Digital Trends

"Crowdfunding Project Of The Week" - Android Authority

"A Useful Pen" - CNET

"The Smartest Writing Option" - Tech Rviews

"A Classic And Sleek Design" - Gadgetsin

 

ChargeWrite...Now!

 

From the creators of bKey comes ChargeWrite: the world's coolest pen with a built-in external 16gb flash memory drive and a powerbank charger with our brand new state-of-the art universal smartphone tip which allows you to plug ChargeWrite into any iPhone lightning port or any Micro USB device including Android phones. But it does so much more... and it's ready to ship.

 

Product Features and Benefits

 

The Pen Is Mightier Than The Phone

All ChargeWrite products are equipped with a ballpoint pen. When the ink runs out replacements are available for free (plus shipping) for all our Indiegogo backers.

 

To use the pen just turn the metal pen tip until the pen comes out. 

 

The Memory

ChargeWrite+ has 16 gigabytes of flash memory built in. Perfect for accessing  your favorite movies, TV shows, important file or pictures on the go!

 

The Stylin Stylus

ChargeWrite has a built-in stylus perfect for all your touchscreen devices

 

The Screen Cleaner

ChargeWrite has a built-in screen cleaner great for removing dirt and smudges from all your screened devices.

 

The Smartphone Tip

ChargeWrite has our brand new state-of-the art universal smartphone tip which allows you to plug ChargeWrite into any iPhone lightning port or any Micro USB device including Android phones. One charging tip for all your devices, no adaptors needed!

 

A Tale Of Two Versions

 

 

Need A Boost?

 

ChargeWrite:

 

ChargeWrite+:

 

How It Works

 

Charge It

ChargeWrite charges through USB, you can use your computer or an AC wall adaptor. Just pull off the top metal cap to reveal the USB plug, plug in the male-USB end into any USB port and a flashing blue light will indicate it’s charging. Once fully charged it’ll change to solid blue.

 

Use It

To charge your phone, unscrew the pen tip to reveal the smartphone plug.

 

REMOVE YOUR PHONE CASE and plug the smartphone tip into your device, pen clip-side down for iphone

 

or pen clip-side up for android phones and you’re done.

 

Ready Set Ship!

 

ChargeWrite Being Produced

 

ChargeWrite Being Packaged To Ship

 

Warranty

We have taken all the necessary steps to make sure ChargeWrite will perform to the high standard we set for it. We have tested ChargeWrite numerous times and we have quality control personnel on hand to test ChargeWrite to make sure that they ALL work up to specifications. On the off chance that you should receive a ChargeWrite that doesn't perform up to specifications, we will gladly replace it within 60 days of delivery. We do not give refunds.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. For those that can't contribute or for those that have, we need you to help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. So you can like us and share us on social media as many times as you can. To make it easier you can use the Indiegogo share tools! We would appreciate this bigly. Thank you for your time and for your support!

story:
Jelly is a mini-sized phone with full features of Android 7.0 Nougat and also the first of its kind supporting the ultra-fast 4G network. It is the ultimate answer to any situation where using a heavy, expensive primary phone is inconvenient.
       

 

 

Jelly is designed to be small, but for a reason! whenever it is unnecessary to take a bulky and expensive phone with you, just put Jelly in the coin pocket. 

    

 

 

 

 Since heard a lot of feedback about the concern on capacity, we decided to add an upgraded version, Jelly Pro with 2GB RAM & 16GB ROM.

       

    
Jelly On Press:

 

 

Business Insider: Jelly, the tiny 4G smartphone is one of the world's smallest. Seriously, it's itsy-bitsy.

Engadget German: Actually you can make everything as usual, even if in mini size.
  
Digital Trend: Looking for a smaller phone you can fit in a smaller pocket? Jelly comes in at only 2.45 inches and features Android Nougat.
  
PhoneArena: Jelly won't wow anyone with anything else than its size. But that's still got to be a plus for some customers, right?
    
The Verge: Jelly is meant to be an alternative to your usual phone that you can use while working out or maybe going out for the night.

Review by Unbox Therapy:

 

          

 

 

  •  Small Yet Powerful     

Jelly may look cute but it packs a punch! It uses a quad-core of 1.1 GHz processor up to 2GB RAM & 16GB ROM.
     

  • Dual SIM-Cards
     

        
We are travelers and we are business people just like you. Many people prefer to maintain more than one phone number and switching SIM cards to do so or when traveling is a hassle. Jelly makes it easy with dual Nano SIM card slots.
       

  •  Battery Life    

        

  • Workout with Armband

        
As smartphones have gotten bigger and more powerful, they have become cumbersome for activities such as running or working out. With Jelly, your workout is much easier. In fact, it’s such a popular use for Jelly that we designed a comfortable armband mount for sports and exercise.  

         

  • Easy Selfie With Both Cameras

     
Selfies made easy! No more struggling to hold and handle a heavyweight smartphone while trying to capture the perfect ‘You’.

          

  • Run Any APP

      
Choosing the mini-sized Jelly doesn’t mean compromising on your favorite Apps either. Using the latest Android operating system, Jelly can run virtually any App from the Google Play store.

Whether you want to play games or chat with friends, go ahead and fill Jelly with all your essential Apps and enjoy the convenience and reliability that you would expect from any phone.

       

  • Enjoy the Fast 4G Speed

       
Jelly supports most of the 4G network carriers except those with CDMA.

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

  

  

 

      

Unihertz is based in Shanghai and our team has over 10 years’ experience in cellphone design and manufacturing. Before creating our own products, we worked with many world-class cellphone brands in the past. After our success with our previous product, we have greatly improved and evolved our concepts and processes. We are excited to use Kickstarter as the launch pad for our best product yet – Jelly.

Contact us: service@unihertz.com  

    
Our Proven Record of Making Mini-Smartphone

You may know us from our previous mini-smartphone. It was a great success and the result of years of experience and hard work perfecting cellphone manufacturing. It had a lot of happy users and they gave us valuable feedback about its present day limitations, such as only using GSM & 3G networks, limited storage and a few features they wish they had.

So we listened and went back to the drawing board to create a more advanced mini- sized smartphone -- the Jelly!

Check out the differences…

story:
**IMPORTANT**

NOT ONLY DO WE NOT NEED THIS MONEY, WE ENCOURAGE YOU TO NOT DONATE UNLESS YOU ARE SURE! We do not need this money. there is enough money in the kitty to keep us running for months. we have recieved bad press recently for making money from this, what people dont understand is that we have touched none of it. we pay the admins, and run the cost of the server, and the rest goes to a kitty we will use when donations stop! Whether you believe that or not is your choice, but thats what happens :) 

Currently there is enough money in the kitty to last us, if the donations STOP NOW, another: 5 months.

AFTER DONATING, PLEASE LEAVE YOUR INGAME NAME AND PREFERRED GUN IF APPLICABLE IN THE COMMENTS TAB!!! WE CAN NOT PUT GUNS OR ANY OTHER ITEMS IN BACKPACKS!

We have been required to introduce a cost to perk changes for two reasons. one, because it takes a fair amount of time to remake a perk, and two, it is easier for us to keep track of who has what, and the extra need to keep records of how many changes have been made etc.


you can NOT spawn with any of the following:

1. items in BAGS

2. repair equipment (tyres, fuel etc)

3. rpgs, satchel charges, grenades or smoke grenades

4. radio

5. bags any larger than Alice size

6. any form of machine gun


IF YOU DONATE, the procedure for spawning with weapons is as such:

step 1; create a new character

step 2; once logged in, log out within 25 minutes of creating the character, and wait at the lobby for 1 minute

step 3; log back in, once logged in, you will have your weapons and will spawn at your vehicle location (if you have that perk)

step 4; if this does not work, repeat. if it still does not work, contact krauterz or mancow ingame or by email at krauterz@live.com.

step 5; DONATORS CAN NOT CHANGE THEIR PERKS ONCE THE ORIGINAL REQUEST HAS BEEN PROCESSED!

**DONATION PERK RULES**

*1 DO NOT TELL ANYONE THE LOCATION OF VEHICLES!

*2 no deliberate trolling, or exploiting. this includes using vehicles that you have not got the perk access to use

*3 NO SPAWN CAMPING. it is ok to sit in capitals and murder innocents, but give them a change to get out of the city first..

*4 NO WASTING VEHICLES. dont crash one helicopter into 8 others..


*5 TRY NOT TO ADD TOO MANY VEHICLES TO THE GAME! take a chopper to a capital, but HIDE IT WELL. OR imobilize it.

*6 AND FINALLY, DONT DEATHMATCH OR SHOOT OTHERS AT PERK LOCATIONS!!! it takes up to 10 minutes to respawn there each time. please dont do it! DOING IT WILL RESULT IN A ONE DAY BAN, second warning is removal of perks for 2 days, third warning is permenant removal of perks.

*7 WE OFFER FULL REFUNDS FOR DONATIONS FOR ONLY 48 HOURS. AND ONLY IF PLAYER GIVES A RELIABLE REASON FOR THEIR REFUND REQUEST! THIS IS A DONATION SYSTEM! NOT A PAY TO RECEIVE SYSTEM!

**DONATING ACCEPTS THESE RULES. BREAKING RULES MAY RESULT IN SUSPENSION OF PERKS, REMOVAL OF PERKS AND DEPENDING ON THE MAGNITUDE OF THE INCIDENT, BANS MAY BE APPLIED**

Short Summary

ZUST is the most popular Day-Z sanctuary (private hive) server currently running. Funding is running well, the server is stable and we do not need any donations. however, due to popular demand, we will be keeping this donation page up :)

(the reason the perks are not cheaper, is so that not too many people are running around with 50 cals ;)
we just upgraded our server! its now an 8 core with HT (meaning 16 virtual cores!) 8gb of ram and almost 1gbps connection!


What We Need & What You Get
Realisticly, all we need is one months worth of funding, which is $460. ($169 for the server and $300 to hire 3 full time RDC admins) however, the more we collect, the better this server will become. more money means more slots, better uptime and less lag. granted, at the moment we are not looking to expand, but any excess money made gets added to a kitty, which will be used in the event that donations stop :)


QUIRKS INCLUDE WEAPONS AND VEHICLES! depending on how much you donate, we can set you up with weapons, and other items. if you donate a lot, we can even make you spawn at a bunch of Hueys, littlebirds and MI-17's. If we do not reach our goal of $460, no big problem, money will be taken from the kitty to pay for the server until funding is at its target once again.

The Impact
You will be securing ZUST's future in the world of Day-Z. This includes standalone, and many many months, if not years to come.



Other Ways You Can Help
If you cant donate, dont worry, just like us on facebook! and of course feel free to connect to our server to talk directly to an admin!

connect to our TeamSpeak and just talk to us! we like to make new friends :)

($169 for the server and $300 to hire 3 full time RDC admins) however, the more we collect, the better this server will become. more money means more slots, better uptime and less lag. granted, at the moment we are not looking to expand, but any excess money made gets added to a kitty, which will be used in the event that donations stop :)QUIRKS INCLUDE WEAPONS AND VEHICLES! depending on how much you donate, we can set you up with weapons, and other items. if you donate a lot, we can even make you spawn at a bunch of Hueys, littlebirds and MI-17's. If we do not reach our goal of $460, no big problem, money will be taken from the kitty to pay for the server until funding is at its target once again.The ImpactYou will be securing ZUST's future in the world of Day-Z. This includes standalone, and many many months, if not years to come.Other Ways You Can HelpIf you cant donate, dont worry, just like us on facebook! and of course feel free to connect to our server to talk directly to an admin!
connect to our TeamSpeak and just talk to us! we like to make new friends :)

story:
Tasklinks brings multiple task management to your mobile device and makes it a joy to use. Tasklinks works by making connections between the things you use to plan, organise and get-things-done. From one central inbox and with an intuitive timeline, Tasklinks effortlessly manages and beautifully presents in one app all your calendars, events, contacts, emails, important documents, photos, notes and reminders. Tasklinks is simple to use and integrates with your desktop software and standard apps. With its fully featured functions Tasklinks is a powerful task manager that makes managing multiple tasks, projects and people a breeze.




We are looking to develop iPad and Android versions and bring more features, functions and cloud syncing, but to do this requires your support. If we hit our target goal we can take the app to the next level and over a short time period bring you more updates and features to turn Tasklinks in to what we hope will be the best productivity tool on your mobile device.

It is that simple, and that is how we like to keep things, yes we could write lots of social marketing media nonsense but the facts are development means power, tools, equipment, research, time and that all means money and funding. The Tasklinks team is a small, quiet, dedicated bunch, we are not getting paid to bring this app to you, it is a labour of love. You can see the work and progress completed so far by visiting our website, you can see we are serious about bringing this project to its full conclusion across all platforms and we hope you will get behind our project, the team and Tasklinks.

story:
POWERUP 4.0 is the smartest, most intuitive paper plane kit we’ve ever made. It makes it possible to fly with ease and smoothness in a variety of conditions. 

Say goodbye to nosedives and choppy flights. We’ve added a new on-board flight computer and 2 new sensors: gyro and accelerometer, combined with 2 thrust vectoring motors. That means flying POWERUP 4.0 is smoother than ever, and can now do all this:

 

 

That’s right. POWERUP 4.0 can auto-loop. So you can master tricks and awesome aerobatics by simply pressing a button.

 

 

We’ve added 2 high speed motors to POWERUP 4.0. That means you’ve got double the thrust, additional maneuvering possibilities, and sharper turns.

 

And together with the flight assist, you can fly just about anything

 

 

 

Now you can learn to fly like a pro. We’re showing you real-time analytics including heading direction, thrust level and turning angles.

 

 

 

We’ve made it a lot easier and way cooler to fly POWERUP 4.0 at night. Optional LED lights will enable you to light up the night - making for awesome visuals and round-the-clock fun.

 

 

2 rear wheels and 1 front wheel give your paper plane more style and make for easier takeoff and landing. They also make it possible to launch off of a surface rather than hand-launching. 

 

We partnered with the best RC hobby vloggers on the planet – FliteTest! They have put together their incredibly creative minds to develop a foam jet inspired by the F22 for the 4.0. It is made from a special laser cut foam board they created and make in the USA.

 

Thanks to 3 super successful Kickstarter campaigns,400K+ happy customers, and more than $3.5 million in funding, we decided to bring you a new and improved paper airplane kit to add to your collection.

Shai Goitein - pilot, industrial designer, CEO and founder - decided it was time to level up again. So we listened to feedback from our POWERUP 3.0, POWERUP FPV and POWERUP Dart users, and made this the most powerful, most intuitive, and overall best version yet. Our brand new Autopilot Assist feature makes every flight a smooth one-- even in bad conditions. Real-time analytics help you become a better pilot, and two high speed motors mean you can get super creative with your plane designs. We’ve even added optional LED lights so you can fly at night.

POWERUP 4.0 is breaking paper plane barriers, and we’re excited to share this badass edition with you all.

 

POWERUP is an incredibly helpful tool when it comes to teaching and learning aeronautics. Students can test multiple designs, analyze their work and improve their planes. Through trial and error, they can understand what makes their plane fly smoother, longer and farther- key lessons in airplane design.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Tross is a data driven Crowdfunding company

story:
Full Quality Stream...

...is what we want to deliver to you! It is not only a pain for you to have the live stream cut out when we stream with a bad internet connection but it also adds a lot of stress to our daily routines during our KSP events. 


With a little funding... 

...as in fundraising support from you guys, we will be able to rent a satellite device and make your watching and our streaming experience a whole lot more enjoyable! Being able to stream with a much better quality from Cabo Verde in December sounds like a dream for all of us! :)


What we need...

...is about 6000 Euro of rent for the device plus an estimated 2000 Euro (kind of depends on how many hours we stream and how many of you tune in) for the upstream. If somehow we raise even more than this we will even be able to fly in the perfect commentator (you will love him, we promise) to bring the whole event to you without people having to jump in and out the commentary booth all the time... ;)


What you get...

...is not only the chance to win one of the prizes as stated to the right but also of course the FINALS of this years KSP world tour streamed in awesome picture quality so you can see first hand who wins the prestigious wave world championship title 2011! 


Thanks a million for your support and together we can make it happen and keep it going!

Your KSP team

story:
Let's Create Together: Help Launch & Become A First Edition Owner Of A Beautiful New iPhone Case From Artist Misha Blaise!

With this new iPhone case collaboration between Misha Blaise and Curio Road, we can help bring Misha's inspiring designs into our daily lives.  These cases have never been made before, and by helping to fund them, you will become a first-edition owner!

We need to reach at least 50 purchasers to launch this collection.

Pre-order one today to become a first edition owner, and get your choice of case shipped to you later this month!

Plus, if you love these designs, share this page with all your friends to help them come to life!

 

What You'll Get

  • In 2-3 weeks, you will become a proud first-edition owner of 1 or more of these 4 all-new iPhone case designs
  • You'll get a card commemorating your collector's edition case
  • You will receive your iPhone case 2 weeks after the end of the campaign.


About The Artwork

Shine on You Crazy Diamond:  "This is actually the title of a song by Pink Floyd.  I wanted to create an ethereal mood with dreamy, celestial forms as a background to this groovy quote."

AVAILABLE IN IPHONE 4/4S & 5. WE WILL REACH OUT WITHIN 30 MINUTES OF YOUR PURCHASE TO CONFIRM YOUR IPHONE SIZE.

Cheery Cloud:  "Maybe it's just my upbringing watching Bob Ross shows on PBS, but there is definitely something cheerful about a fluffy white cloud in a clear blue sky!" 

AVAILABLE IN IPHONE 4/4S & 5. WE WILL REACH OUT WITHIN 30 MINUTES OF YOUR PURCHASE TO CONFIRM YOUR IPHONE SIZE.

 

 

Love Wins:  "The background of this image is a beautiful photo of the grand canyon that I turned hyper color.  I added in some floral detail reminiscent of historic wallpaper design and added a quote we can all believe in: LOVE WINS!"

AVAILABLE IN IPHONE 4/4S & 5. WE WILL REACH OUT WITHIN 30 MINUTES OF YOUR PURCHASE TO CONFIRM YOUR IPHONE SIZE.

 

 

Rainbow Whale:  "I like art that can be fun and playful, and the idea of a whale shooting rainbows out of his blowhole is both absurd and fabulous!"

AVAILABLE IN IPHONE 4/4S & 5. WE WILL REACH OUT WITHIN 30 MINUTES OF YOUR PURCHASE TO CONFIRM YOUR IPHONE SIZE.

 

 

About The Artist

Misha Blaise is a talented artist living in Austin, Texas. Her artwork is inspired by her amazing background studying Conflict Resolution and working as a youth worker in lower-income communities in Chicago.

Says Misha, "I hope my art can give a breath of fresh air to those who connect with it; a small reminder of the wonder and beauty in the world around and within us."

About Curio Road

Curio Road (www.curioroad.com) is a company that discovers and promotes superstar up-and-coming designers. Founded in 2012, today we work with over 150 designers in categories from jewelry to decor to fashion. Our newest project is to help make design affordable to everyone by working with visionary small designers and manufacturers to create limited-edition product runs at amazing prices.

story:
(castellano abajo...)

About Us

We are a small group of techies, media makers and community organizers whose mission is to increase access to mobile telecommunications to the over 2 billion people without affordable coverage and the 700 million with none at all. We work as a bridge between the potential users of the technology and the engineers and developers of these efforts to ensure the technology is deployed and appropriate for use in the developing world.

Rhizomatica started as a way to bring together resources and promote the application of new and novel telecommunications technologies to real-world problems. Our first project was the first "real-world" deployment of the Serval mobile ad-hoc network software to facilitate communications amongst human rights defenders in the Niger Delta area of Nigeria (see:mediaforjusticenigeria.org).

 

Summary and Background

According to the ITU, 2-3 billion people around the world lack affordable mobile telephone services that facilitate critical communications and access to information. Due to market saturation in developed countries and economic disincentive in the developing world and especially rural areas, mobile coverage proliferation is slowing dramatically worldwide. And yet most telecom regulations forbid the provision of strictly rural service, effectively killing any chance for micro-telco’s to thrive.


Currently, only very large, powerful companies have access to the mobile spectrum and the concessions to provide cellular service. But their business model and the technology that these traditional providers use have proven unable to solve the problem of connecting much of the world. We want to break this oligopoly and allow communities to become service providers as well.


Thanks to a variety of open-source efforts developed in the last few years, it has become technologically and economically feasible for a community or an individual to provide carrier-grade cellular service to thousands of people. Yet no one has so far applied these technologies in the real-world, much less created the needed regulatory reforms or community-appropriate business models. This project has a parallel component that is seeking to develop the legal/regulatory space and secure access to the necessary frequencies to foment the growth of community, rural and micro-telco's.

 

What We Need

We are now trying to build the first independent GSM (cell phone) network in Mexico, in the state of Oaxaca. The initial part of the project has been demonstrated using OpenBTS software and a low-power test radio (USRP), and has been presented to village assemblies and groups throughout the state, especially in rural and indigenous communities. However, the test equipment we are using has limitations and cannot be deployed as a real-world solution.

This requires an initial investment in hardware, specifically:

  • a GSM Base Station.
  • A 2W power amplifier.
  • Cables and antenna.
  • A PC on which to run the network management software.

In case we don't reach the required amount to buy all the equipment, we will try anyway to buy as much as possible and cover the remaining expenses in other ways.

 

The Impact

We are trying to create the first community-owned and operated GSM network in the world (as far as we know). If the project succeeds, we have a number of communities and municipalities interested in investing and setting up networks and generally moving towards making low-cost, reliable networks a reality anywhere. It could also mean a totally different and revolutionary approach to mobile networks in the near future – one that ensures the freedom to communicate and uses telecommunication technology as it was meant to be from the beginning: a way to help people talk to each other.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't support us directly with money, there are still many ways to help out:

  • Spread the word! The more people know about what we are up to, the better.
  • Think about possible uses for a community-operated network, and tell us about it.
  • If you are aware of similar projects, based on GSM technology, please tell us where they are. If you are part of it, share your experience with us. We are still trying to figure out all the details and possibilities, and similar experiences from other people are always welcome.
  • We are going to write software, documentation, test equipment, and a million other things. If you are interested in any of these, get in contact with us!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

CASTELLANO

Sobre Nosotros

Somos un pequeño grupo de tecnologistas, comunicadores y promotores comunitarios quienes estamos trabajando para aumentar el acceso a las telecomunicaciones móviles para los más de 2 mil millones de personas sin cobertura asequible y los 700 millones sin ningún cobertura en absoluto. Trabajamos como un puente entre los usuarios potenciales de la tecnología y los ingenieros y desarrolladores de estos proyectos tecnológicos para asegurar que la tecnología se implementa de forma adecuado para su uso en el mundo en desarrollo.

Rhizomatica comenzó para reunir recursos y promover la aplicación de nuevas tecnologías de telecomunicaciones a problemas reales del mundo. Nuestro primer proyecto fue el primer despliegue en un contexto “vivo” del software Serval de redes móviles ad-hoc para facilitar la comunicación entre defensores de los derechos humanos en la zona del delta del Níger de Nigeria (véase: http://mediaforjusticenigeria.org).

Resumen y Antecedentes

Según la UIT, 2 a 3 mil millones de personas en todo el mundo carecen de servicios asequibles de telefonía móvil que facilitan las comunicaciones críticas y el acceso a la información. Debido a la saturación del mercado en los países desarrollados y desincentivos económicos en el mundo en desarrollo y especialmente las zonas rurales, la proliferación de cobertura móvil se está desacelerando drásticamente en todo el mundo.

Y sin embargo, la mayoría de las regulaciones de telecomunicaciones prohíbe la prestación del servicio estrictamente rural, efectivamente imposibilitando el crecimiento de un sector nuevo de micro operadores.

Actualmente, sólo empresas muy grandes y poderosas tienen acceso al espectro móvil y las concesiones para prestar servicios de telefonía móvil. Sin embargo, su modelo de negocio y la tecnología que utilizan estos proveedores tradicionales han demostrado ser incapaces de resolve el problema de conectar gran parte del mundo. Queremos romper este oligopolio y permitir que las comunidades se convierten en proveedores de servicios de telefonía también.

Gracias a una serie de iniciativas de hardware y software “abiertos” desarrollados en los últimos años, es tecnológicamente y económicamente factible para una comunidad o un individuo proporcionar con alta calidad servicios de telefonía celular a miles de personas. Sin embargo, casi nadie hasta el momento ha aplicado estas tecnologías en el mundo real, y mucho menos creado las necesarias reformas normativas o modelos de negocio adecuados para una comunidad. Este proyecto tiene un componente paralelo que se está tratando de desarrollar un espacio legal / regulatorio y garantizar el acceso a las frecuencias necesarias para fomentar el crecimiento de un nuevo sector rural y comunitario.

Lo que necesitamos

Estamos tratando de construir la primera red GSM (teléfono móvil) independiente en México, en el estado de Oaxaca. La parte inicial del proyecto, se ha demostrado con el uso del software OpenBTS y una radio de prueba de baja potencia (USRP), y se ha presentado en asambleas comunitarias y con grupos a lo largo del estado, especialmente en comunidades rurales e indígenas. Sin embargo, el equipo de prueba que estamos utilizando tiene limitaciones y no se puede implementar como una solución a nivel pueblo o comunidad.

Esto requiere una inversión inicial en hardware:

  • Un estacion de base GSM

  • Un amplificador de 2 watts

  • Cables y antenas

  • Un PC donde correr el software para administrar y gestionar la red

En caso de no llegar a la cantidad necesaria para comprar todo el equipo, vamos a intentarlo de todos modos como sea posible y cubrir los gastos restantes de otras maneras.

El Impacto

Estamos tratando de crear la primera red GSM en el mundo (hasta donde sabemos). Si el proyecto tiene éxito, tenemos varias comunidades y municipios interesados en invertir, crear redes y en lograr redes fiables de bajo costo y en cualquier lugar. También podría significar un realidad totalmente diferente y revolucionaria en las redes móviles en un futuro próximo - uno que garantiza la libertad de comunicación y utiliza la tecnología de las telecomunicaciones como una manera de ayudar a la gente hablar entre ellos.

Otras formas de apoyar

Si no nos puede apoyar directamente con dinero, todavía hay muchas maneras de ayudar:

  • Corre la voz! Cuanto más se sabe acerca de lo que estamos haciendo, mejor.
  • Piense acerca de los posibles usos de una red comunitaria, y nos dicenal respecto.
  • Si tiene conocimiento de proyectos similares, basados en la tecnología GSM, por favor díganos dónde están. Si usted es parte de él, compartir su experiencia con nosotros. Todavía estamos tratando de averiguar todos los detalles y posibilidades, y las experiencias similares de otras personas son siempre bienvenidos.
  • Vamos a escribir software, documentación, probar equipos, y un millón de otras cosas. Si está interesado en alguno de ellos, ponerse en contacto con nosotros!

Somos un pequeño grupo de tecnologistas, comunicadores y promotores comunitarios quienes estamos trabajando para aumentar el acceso a las telecomunicaciones móviles para los más de 2 mil millones de personas sin cobertura asequible y los 700 millones sin ningún cobertura en absoluto. Trabajamos como un puente entre los usuarios potenciales de la tecnología y los ingenieros y desarrolladores de estos proyectos tecnológicos para asegurar que la tecnología se implementa de forma adecuado para su uso en el mundo en desarrollo.
Rhizomatica comenzó para reunir recursos y promover la aplicación de nuevas tecnologías de telecomunicaciones a problemas reales del mundo. Nuestro primer proyecto fue el primer despliegue en un contexto “vivo” del software Serval de redes móviles ad-hoc para facilitar la comunicación entre defensores de los derechos humanos en la zona del delta del Níger de Nigeria (véase: http://mediaforjusticenigeria.org).
Resumen y Antecedentes
Según la UIT, 2 a 3 mil millones de personas en todo el mundo carecen de servicios asequibles de telefonía móvil que facilitan las comunicaciones críticas y el acceso a la información. Debido a la saturación del mercado en los países desarrollados y desincentivos económicos en el mundo en desarrollo y especialmente las zonas rurales, la proliferación de cobertura móvil se está desacelerando drásticamente en todo el mundo.
Y sin embargo, la mayoría de las regulaciones de telecomunicaciones prohíbe la prestación del servicio estrictamente rural, efectivamente imposibilitando el crecimiento de un sector nuevo de micro operadores.
Actualmente, sólo empresas muy grandes y poderosas tienen acceso al espectro móvil y las concesiones para prestar servicios de telefonía móvil. Sin embargo, su modelo de negocio y la tecnología que utilizan estos proveedores tradicionales han demostrado ser incapaces de resolve el problema de conectar gran parte del mundo. Queremos romper este oligopolio y permitir que las comunidades se convierten en proveedores de servicios de telefonía también.
Gracias a una serie de iniciativas de hardware y software “abiertos” desarrollados en los últimos años, es tecnológicamente y económicamente factible para una comunidad o un individuo proporcionar con alta calidad servicios de telefonía celular a miles de personas. Sin embargo, casi nadie hasta el momento ha aplicado estas tecnologías en el mundo real, y mucho menos creado las necesarias reformas normativas o modelos de negocio adecuados para una comunidad. Este proyecto tiene un componente paralelo que se está tratando de desarrollar un espacio legal / regulatorio y garantizar el acceso a las frecuencias necesarias para fomentar el crecimiento de un nuevo sector rural y comunitario.
Lo que necesitamos
Estamos tratando de construir la primera red GSM (teléfono móvil) independiente en México, en el estado de Oaxaca. La parte inicial del proyecto, se ha demostrado con el uso del software OpenBTS y una radio de prueba de baja potencia (USRP), y se ha presentado en asambleas comunitarias y con grupos a lo largo del estado, especialmente en comunidades rurales e indígenas. Sin embargo, el equipo de prueba que estamos utilizando tiene limitaciones y no se puede implementar como una solución a nivel pueblo o comunidad.
Esto requiere una inversión inicial en hardware:


Un estacion de base GSM

Un amplificador de 2 watts

Cables y antenas

Un PC donde correr el software para administrar y gestionar la red

En caso de no llegar a la cantidad necesaria para comprar todo el equipo, vamos a intentarlo de todos modos como sea posible y cubrir los gastos restantes de otras maneras.
El Impacto
Estamos tratando de crear la primera red GSM en el mundo (hasta donde sabemos). Si el proyecto tiene éxito, tenemos varias comunidades y municipios interesados en invertir, crear redes y en lograr redes fiables de bajo costo y en cualquier lugar. También podría significar un realidad totalmente diferente y revolucionaria en las redes móviles en un futuro próximo - uno que garantiza la libertad de comunicación y utiliza la tecnología de las telecomunicaciones como una manera de ayudar a la gente hablar entre ellos.
Otras formas de apoyar
Si no nos puede apoyar directamente con dinero, todavía hay muchas maneras de ayudar:

Corre la voz! Cuanto más se sabe acerca de lo que estamos haciendo, mejor.


Piense acerca de los posibles usos de una red comunitaria, y nos dicenal respecto.


Si tiene conocimiento de proyectos similares, basados en la tecnología GSM, por favor díganos dónde están. Si usted es parte de él, compartir su experiencia con nosotros. Todavía estamos tratando de averiguar todos los detalles y posibilidades, y las experiencias similares de otras personas son siempre bienvenidos.


Vamos a escribir software, documentación, probar equipos, y un millón de otras cosas. Si está interesado en alguno de ellos, ponerse en contacto con nosotros!

story:
More New Perks!!!

$69: Bluetooth + MP3 + Headset

Limited Time Offer!***Best Value***
  • Can't decide between the Bluetooth and MP3 module? Get both at a steal. 
  • Both modules have clips for your shirt, and both are compatible with the headset so you can easily switch out whenever you want. 
  • Going for a short run or to the gym? Leave your phone at home and just take your music along! 
  • Because the modules clip on the shirt, the headset is SUPER light on the head; even more comfortable than ear buds as there is no weight from the cable on the ears. 
  • Perfect for lots of high movement or long wears!
$24: Assembled Standalone Headset

Convert your existing Cynaps into a sleek headset version! This kit comes with the new improved headset with our newest transducers, a small adapter cable for those who use white connectors and clips to convert any Cynaps module into a shirt or bag wearable version. Clip it on and go!


$14: Headset Retrofit Kit

Use this simple kit to turn your new and improved transducers into an awesome bone conduction headset. Included are shirt clips designed to fit all previous versions of Cynaps modules. You can literally attach the clip & assemble the headset within 60 seconds. Works perfectly with bike helmets and hats without getting in the way. Super convenient! 

Check out this quick video to see how easy it is to install:


$22: Headset Retrofit x 2!

Get two of them at a steal!

$12: New and improved transducers!

That's right - we've redesigned them from the ground up to make them thinner than ever and super comfortable - while still improving the sound delivery. They're easy to place anywhere on a cap or helmet straps and are easily adjustable using the small magnetic attachments.


Look how thin they are!


This is how they attach to the cap band, using the small magnet - no more velcro!




They look AWESOME on the helmet straps! Safer and much more comfortable too, without being squeezed into the helmet structure.

We'll also send you that little attachment in the top photo to allow you to connect these transducers to any previous Cynaps device (including Bluetooth, Mint and Enhance). 
This upgrade is definitely worth it for the enhanced clarity and comfort!


$19: New & improved transducers x 2!
Just a little more and get 2 sets!$49: MP3 Headset

Leave your phone at home! This baby can store up to 1600 songs with the included 8GB Micro SD card. Like the Bluetooth version, the MP3 module also has an integrated clip on the back for your shirt or bag. Comes with leather carry case and USB charger.


$59: Bluetooth Headset: New and improved!

Here are the new features:

  • Super light headset with a new sleek look including our new and improved transducers; minimal sound leakage and awesome transmission with perfect placement on your cheekbones
  • Nearly twice the battery life as the original Mint: 700mAh
  • Improved Bluetooth reception: thinner housing near the Bluetooth antenna for dramatically increased recption over the original Mint
  • Mini headphone jack for the headset: much more stable and reliable than the original white connectors
  • Easier to access buttons on the front of the module
  • Sturdy integrated clip for optional attachment to a shirt or bag
  • Headset can be worn easily in combination with any hat or helmet!

See demo video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=avFQd11BR18

Comes with USB charging cable and leather carry case


$29: Cynaps MP3 - Standalone Unit

If you've already got any of our Cynaps products, this item is literally plug and play! It easily switches out with our Bluetooth, Mint and Enhance modules if you just want to relax and listen to music or audiobooks. It comes with an 8GB micro SD card, allowing you to store up to around 1600 songs! The volume on this is incredible as well (about 3X the max volume of the Bluetooth).

We'll also send you an adapter cable with this perk, just in case you have the transducers with the white connectors.


Plug and play for everyone!


$39: Cynaps MP3 - Self-Install Kit with new and improved transducers!

Get this one to install Cynaps MP3 along with our new awesome transducers into any cap or helmet. We'll add on the extra velcro strap to make helmet installation a snap!


$49: Cynaps MP3 - Assembled Cap with new and improved transducers!

Get the latest transducers along with our newest product - Cynaps MP3. Store 1600 songs on the included 8GB Micro SD card and let your phone chill at home! 

Fully assembled and ready to go in our black, white or grey sweat absorbing caps. Default is black, so just leave us a comment if you want it in white or grey!


$50: Cynaps Bluetooth Self-Install Kit with new and improved transducers!


Get this one to install a Cynaps Bluetooth module - along with our new awesome transducers - into any cap or helmet. We'll add on the extra velcro strap to make helmet installation a snap!

$59: Cynaps Bluetooth assembled cap with new and improved transducers!

Fully assembled and ready to go in our black, white or grey sweat-absorbing caps. Default is black, so just leave us a comment if you want it in white or grey!

Product Description: 

  • Cynaps (derived from 'synapse') is the world's first Bluetooth enabled, bone conduction headset, discreetly installed into an easy to wear hat. No earphones are required.  Just wear your hat, and the sound from your phone or PC is conducted directly into your inner ear through vibration.  You can listen to music or have a phone or Skype (for PC & Mac) conversation, even while doing an activity that requires your ears, eyes and hands to be available.

    Running and biking are perfect examples.  Normal bluetooth earpieces cover your ear, and you lose your ability to hear exactly where other cars may be around you.  Cynaps lets you keep this crucial ability, while enabling you to discreetly take a call, anytime, anywhere, keeping you safe and giving you back all of your senses!  Also, it's not putting pressure on your eardrums like conventional headsets or handsets do, so you won't get the headaches, earaches and arm-aches you normally get after a few hours of holding and talking on a handheld phone.  You can talk for much longer with Cynaps without getting tired.  And you can freely do whatever you want, at the same time.

    The battery life of Cynaps is amazing.  Standby time is around 30 days, and the average talk time is between 6 and 10 hours.  This wide range depends mostly on the volume setting and how frequently the audio part is used.  The microphone uses up almost none of the battery life, while the audio (vibration) accounts for almost all of it, so listening to very loud music on full volume can use up the battery in just a couple of hours.  Most people will be able to talk comfortably on medium volume for about 7-8 hours between recharges.  Most people can charge it once a day, but if you practically live on the phone or want to turn the volume up extra loud, it's worthwhile to have an extra Cynaps and battery backup on hand, just in case.

    The controls are super easy. Just press the bill to take a call or play the current song on your phone or PC.  Also control the volume level and navigate your playlist, all from the simple control buttons under the bill.

    Cynaps can connect to any bluetooth enabled phone, PC or audio player.  Pairing is as easy as pressing a button to make Cynaps discoverable, then selecting Cynaps on your phone or PC.


    Working in a loud environment that requires earplugs?  Want some tunes but can't hear them?  Now you can!  Even with protective earplugs in, Cynaps is crystal clear.  In fact, the sound is even better, richer and more pure with earplugs in!  Never miss a call, and always have some good tunes on hand to get you through the day.  Now if it could only make you coffee too :).  Perfect for any place you'd normally use earplugs: traveling, resting, etc.

 

Tech Specs:

  • Battery: 700mAh
    Talk time: 6-10 hours, standby time: 30+ days, charging time: 3-4 hours
  • Microphone: 
    Sensitivity: -36 to -46dB, Impedance: 2.2K ohm
    Max Current consumption: 0.5mA, Frequency response: 100 to 10,000Hz
  • Transducers (each): 0.8W normal, 1.5W max
    Resonant Frequency: 16 +/- 0.5 kHz, Frequency: 300-19000 Hz

story:
Worum geht es bei diesem Projekt?

Ich möchte hiermit den MachineCoin bekannter machen. Beim MachineCoin handelt es sich um eine Art "Tauschwährung" die selbst wiederum in einem vollständig dezentralen Banken- und Finanzsystem eingebettet ist. 

Vorgeschichte:

Als ausgelöst durch eine Immobilienpreis-Blase im Jahr 2007 die auch bis heute noch andauernde Weltwirtschaftskrise einsetzte wurde mir ziemlich schnell bewusst, welche spürbaren Nachteile ein zentrales Finanzsystem doch mit sich bringt. Ein zentrales Finanzsystem bei dem Geld im Prinzip nur allein durch einen Knopfdruck und dabei ohne eine real existierende Entsprechung in Form von Produkten und/oder Dienstleistungen erzeugt werden kann. Der Wunsch nach einer Alternative verfestigte sich schon damals in mir.

Gegenwart:

Ich, das ist der Jürgen, 31 Jahre alt, geboren in Quedlinburg, wohnhaft in Hofheim, Experte auf dem Gebiet der Theoretischen Informatik, Datenbanken, Computergrafik und des WWW, habe mir Anfang 2014 meinen lang ersehnten Traum erfüllt und ein vollständig dezentrales Banken- und Finanzsystem erstellt, welches nicht über die eingangs erwähnten Nachteile verfügt. Sein Name: MachineCoin. Seit nunmehr 8 Monaten ist das System mittlerweile nun schon erfolgreich im Einsatz und ich hoffe hiermit auch den einen oder anderen von euch dafür begeistern zu können.

An den MachineCoin kann jede Privatperson oder jedes Unternehmen vollkommen selbständig "andocken" und zwar ganz ohne dabei sich auch nur im geringsten mit irgendjemanden in irgendeiner Form absprechen zu müssen. Jeder kann die bereits dafür zur Verfügung stehenden Anwendungen nutzen oder eigene Anwendungen dafür erstellen. Auf der Basis des MachineCoin wurde so unter anderem schon eine graphische Online-Banking-App für den Einsatz auf einem Computer mit Windows, Mac OS X, GNU/Linux und Smartphones mit Android herausgebracht.

MachineCoin: Online-Banking-App

 Übersicht

Senden einer Zahlung

Empfangen einer Zahlung

Transaktionsverlauf

Adressbuch

Windows MachineCoin Online-Banking-App

Dies ist Version 0.8.7.3, die aktuellste, kompilierte Version.

http://www.machinecoin.org/installation.html

Mac OS X MachineCoin Online-Banking-App

Dies ist Version 0.8.7.3, die aktuellste, kompilierte Version.

http://www.machinecoin.org/installation.html

GNU/Linux MachineCoin Online-Banking-App

Die aktuellste Version gibt es stets für GNU/Linux. Sie lässt sich z.B. unter Debian oder Ubuntu mit nur 1-2 Zeilen direkt aus dem Source Code heraus kompilieren.

http://machinecointalk.org/showthread.php?tid=8

    Android MachineCoin Online-Banking-App

    Dies ist Version 3.40.0, die aktuellste, kompilierte Version.

    https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.schildbach.wallet_mac

    Häufige Fragen

    An dieser Stelle einige der häufigsten Fragen und deren Antworten

    Eine MachineCoin-Adresse für meinen Perk bekomme ich woher?

    Eine MachineCoin-Adresse ist vergleichbar mit der Kontonummer die man auch bei einer herkömmlichen Bank bekommt. Eine eigene ganz persönliche MachineCoin-Adresse kann man sich unter anderem mit der MachineCoin Online-Banking-App oder auch mit dem MachineCoin-Paper-Wallet-Generator erstellen und dann ausdrucken und abheften. Letzteres dauert weniger als 1 Minute.

    http://paper.machinecoin.org

    Warum "5+15 MachineCoin" statt gleich 20 wie bei dem Perk für 5 Euro?

    Es sind insgesamt 4 Funding-Runden geplant. Mit jeder weiteren Funding-Runde steigt der Preis dann in Richtung Ziel von 1 MachineCoin = 1 Euro. Die erste Runde startet bei einem Kurs von 4/1. Es folgt dann 3/1, 2/1 und schließlich 1/1. Es lohnt sich daher durchaus sich recht früh daran zu beteiligen. 

    Kann ich mir etwas für meine MachineCoin kaufen?

    Ja, denn: treffen Käufer und Verkäufer für Produkte und/oder Dienstleistungen von MachineCoin aufeinander und darüber hinaus auch eine beiderseitige Vereinbarung über die Ausgestaltung eines Tauschs dann entsteht dabei automatisch auch ein Kauf. Der Käufer hat dann am Ende sein gewünschtes Produkt und der Verkäufer im Gegenzug MachineCoin erhalten um davon später dann einmal selbst etwas kaufen zu können.

    Wie kommt es eigentlich, dass der MachineCoin wie "Geld" ist? "Geld", was ist das eigentlich?

    "Geld" stellt im Wesentlichen doch nur eins dar: eine Art Austauschmedium mit dem sich Produkte und/oder Dienstleistungen zwischen zwei "Parteien" austauschen lassen und zwar auch dann wenn der jeweilige Käufer eines Produktes und/oder einer Dienstleistung dem jeweiligen Verkäufer des Produktes und/oder der Dienstleistung keine eigenen Produkte und/oder Dienstleistungen im Gegenzug anbieten kann und zwar solche die der Verkäufer in Bezug auf ihre Menge und ihre erachtete Wertigkeit als etwa gleich wertvoll ansieht. In solchen Fällen vereinbaren beide "Parteien" dann in der Regel einfach ein "Geld" wie zum Beispiel den Euro oder den US-Dollar. Auch der Euro oder der US-Dollar ist damit eine Art Austauschmedium von dem der Verkäufer exakt im Moment der Annahme glaubt dieses dann wiederum zu einer gegebenen Zeit und an einem gewissen Ort gegen ein Produkt und/oder Dienstleistung seiner Wahl eintauschen zu können.

    Ausblick

    In Zukunft sind von meiner Seite aus noch einige Dinge geplant und ich hoffe auch möglichst alle davon realisieren zu können es sei denn mir kommt in diesem Fall irgendjemand zuvor und erledigt es eher:

    - MachineCoin.org für noch mehr Sprachen bereitstellen
    - Ausbau von MachineCoin-Pipe einem Projekt bei dem es darum geht im Laufe der Zeit auf eine MachineCoin-Prepaid-Kreditkarte hinzuarbeiten die man dann mit MachineCoin aufladen kann und damit dann auch in Geschäften bezahlen kann in denen nur Euro oder US-Dollar akzeptiert wird.
    - Die Integration von MachineCoin-Mary in Fahrzeuge und die Möglichkeit
    mit MachineCoin-Mary direkt heiraten zu können.
    - Einen MachineCoin Geldautomaten auf der Basis von Skyhook erstellen.
    - Der Bau eines MachineCoin-Phones auf der Basis von GNU/Linux Debian.
    - Den MachineCoin für Gebiete zugänglich machen in denen es keinen regulären Zugang zu Strom und/oder Banken gibt mittels MachineCoin-Pi.

    Wie Du sonst noch helfen kannst

    Bitte teile diese Crowdfunding-Kampagne mit allen Deinen Freunden & Bekannten. Jeder “Like” (auf Facebook), jeder "Tweet" (auf Twitter) und jeder “Kommentar” (hier auf Indiegogo) hilft immens weiter - gerne auch mehrmals! Bitte nutze dazu auch die Sharing-Funktionen ein Stück weiter oben auf dieser Seite.

    1000 Dank für Deine Hilfe!

    Weiterführende Links

    Globaler MachineCoin Online-"Kontoauszugsdrucker"

    http://blockchain.machinecoin.org:8080

    MachineCoin Forum

    http://machinecointalk.org

Worum geht es bei diesem Projekt? 
Ich möchte hiermit den MachineCoin bekannter machen. Beim MachineCoin handelt es sich um eine Art "Tauschwährung" die selbst wiederum in einem vollständig dezentralen Banken- und Finanzsystem eingebettet ist.

Der Wunsch nach einer Alternative verfestigte sich schon damals in mir.
Gegenwart:
Ich, das ist der Jürgen, 31 Jahre alt, geboren in Quedlinburg, wohnhaft in Hofheim, Experte auf dem Gebiet der Theoretischen Informatik, Datenbanken, Computergrafik und des WWW, habe mir Anfang 2014 meinen lang ersehnten Traum erfüllt und ein vollständig dezentrales Banken- und Finanzsystem erstellt, welches nicht über die eingangs erwähnten Nachteile verfügt. Sein Name: MachineCoin. Seit nunmehr 8 Monaten ist das System mittlerweile nun schon erfolgreich im Einsatz und ich hoffe hiermit auch den einen oder anderen von euch dafür begeistern zu können.

An den MachineCoin kann jede Privatperson oder jedes Unternehmen vollkommen selbständig "andocken" und zwar ganz ohne dabei sich auch nur im geringsten mit irgendjemanden in irgendeiner Form absprechen zu müssen. Jeder kann die bereits dafür zur Verfügung stehenden Anwendungen nutzen oder eigene Anwendungen dafür erstellen. Auf der Basis des MachineCoin wurde so unter anderem schon eine graphische Online-Banking-App für den Einsatz auf einem Computer mit Windows, Mac OS X, GNU/Linux und Smartphones mit Android herausgebracht.

MachineCoin: Online-Banking-App

 Übersicht

Senden einer Zahlung

Empfangen einer Zahlung

Transaktionsverlauf

Adressbuch

Windows MachineCoin Online-Banking-App
Dies ist Version 0.8.7.3, die aktuellste, kompilierte Version.
http://www.machinecoin.org/installation.html


Mac OS X MachineCoin Online-Banking-App

Dies ist Version 0.8.7.3, die aktuellste, kompilierte Version.

http://www.machinecoin.org/installation.html


GNU/Linux MachineCoin Online-Banking-App

Die aktuellste Version gibt es stets für GNU/Linux. Sie lässt sich z.B. unter Debian oder Ubuntu mit nur 1-2 Zeilen direkt aus dem Source Code heraus kompilieren.
http://machinecointalk.org/showthread.php?tid=8


  


Android MachineCoin Online-Banking-App
Dies ist Version 3.40.0, die aktuellste, kompilierte Version.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.schildbach.wallet_mac


Häufige Fragen

An dieser Stelle einige der häufigsten Fragen und deren Antworten
Eine MachineCoin-Adresse für meinen Perk bekomme ich woher?
Eine MachineCoin-Adresse ist vergleichbar mit der Kontonummer die man auch bei einer herkömmlichen Bank bekommt. Eine eigene ganz persönliche MachineCoin-Adresse kann man sich unter anderem mit der MachineCoin Online-Banking-App oder auch mit dem MachineCoin-Paper-Wallet-Generator erstellen und dann ausdrucken und abheften. Letzteres dauert weniger als 1 Minute.
http://paper.machinecoin.org
Warum "5+15 MachineCoin" statt gleich 20 wie bei dem Perk für 5 Euro?
Es sind insgesamt 4 Funding-Runden geplant. Mit jeder weiteren Funding-Runde steigt der Preis dann in Richtung Ziel von 1 MachineCoin = 1 Euro. Die erste Runde startet bei einem Kurs von 4/1. Es folgt dann 3/1, 2/1 und schließlich 1/1. Es lohnt sich daher durchaus sich recht früh daran zu beteiligen. 
Kann ich mir etwas für meine MachineCoin kaufen?
Ja, denn: treffen Käufer und Verkäufer für Produkte und/oder Dienstleistungen von MachineCoin aufeinander und darüber hinaus auch eine beiderseitige Vereinbarung über die Ausgestaltung eines Tauschs dann entsteht dabei automatisch auch ein Kauf. Der Käufer hat dann am Ende sein gewünschtes Produkt und der Verkäufer im Gegenzug MachineCoin erhalten um davon später dann einmal selbst etwas kaufen zu können.
Wie kommt es eigentlich, dass der MachineCoin wie "Geld" ist? "Geld", was ist das eigentlich?
"Geld" stellt im Wesentlichen doch nur eins dar: eine Art Austauschmedium mit dem sich Produkte und/oder Dienstleistungen zwischen zwei "Parteien" austauschen lassen und zwar auch dann wenn der jeweilige Käufer eines Produktes und/oder einer Dienstleistung dem jeweiligen Verkäufer des Produktes und/oder der Dienstleistung keine eigenen Produkte und/oder Dienstleistungen im Gegenzug anbieten kann und zwar solche die der Verkäufer in Bezug auf ihre Menge und ihre erachtete Wertigkeit als etwa gleich wertvoll ansieht. In solchen Fällen vereinbaren beide "Parteien" dann in der Regel einfach ein "Geld" wie zum Beispiel den Euro oder den US-Dollar. Auch der Euro oder der US-Dollar ist damit eine Art Austauschmedium von dem der Verkäufer exakt im Moment der Annahme glaubt dieses dann wiederum zu einer gegebenen Zeit und an einem gewissen Ort gegen ein Produkt und/oder Dienstleistung seiner Wahl eintauschen zu können.

Ausblick
In Zukunft sind von meiner Seite aus noch einige Dinge geplant und ich hoffe auch möglichst alle davon realisieren zu können es sei denn mir kommt in diesem Fall irgendjemand zuvor und erledigt es eher:
- MachineCoin.org für noch mehr Sprachen bereitstellen- Ausbau von MachineCoin-Pipe einem Projekt bei dem es darum geht im Laufe der Zeit auf eine MachineCoin-Prepaid-Kreditkarte hinzuarbeiten die man dann mit MachineCoin aufladen kann und damit dann auch in Geschäften bezahlen kann in denen nur Euro oder US-Dollar akzeptiert wird.- Die Integration von MachineCoin-Mary in Fahrzeuge und die Möglichkeit mit MachineCoin-Mary direkt heiraten zu können.- Einen MachineCoin Geldautomaten auf der Basis von Skyhook erstellen.- Der Bau eines MachineCoin-Phones auf der Basis von GNU/Linux Debian.- Den MachineCoin für Gebiete zugänglich machen in denen es keinen regulären Zugang zu Strom und/oder Banken gibt mittels MachineCoin-Pi.


Wie Du sonst noch helfen kannst

Bitte teile diese Crowdfunding-Kampagne mit allen Deinen Freunden & Bekannten. Jeder “Like” (auf Facebook), jeder "Tweet" (auf Twitter) und jeder “Kommentar” (hier auf Indiegogo) hilft immens weiter - gerne auch mehrmals! Bitte nutze dazu auch die Sharing-Funktionen ein Stück weiter oben auf dieser Seite.
1000 Dank für Deine Hilfe!
Weiterführende Links
Globaler MachineCoin Online-"Kontoauszugsdrucker"
http://blockchain.machinecoin.org:8080
MachineCoin Forum
http://machinecointalk.org

story:
Now with more nano-suction surface area, new colors and swappable backplates, the MEGAVERSE™ Anti-Gravity Case™ is one case with many uses!

The MEGAVERSE Anti-Gravity Case sticks even better to windows, mirrors, whiteboards, metal, kitchen cabinets, tile, flat car dashboards and more!

NEW! Swappable MegaBack™ plates allow you to add a leather wallet, shatter-proof mirror or bottle opener to the back of your case in seconds!


Hands-Free Fun and More...

The nano-suction back on the MEGAVERSE Anti-Gravity Case allows you to take hands-free photos and video just about anywhere.

 

Slap on the new Bottle Opener MegaBack and you'll be
the most popular person at the party!

The Wallet MegaBack keeps your cards and cash convenient and secure.

Keep the Mirror MegaBack handy so you're always ready for your close up!
 

The nano-suction back of the MEGAVERSE Anti-Gravity Case is for more than just selfies. It's great for the kitchen when you need to keep a recipe handy.
 

Watch streaming video or listen to music just about anywhere!

The MEGAVERSE Anti-Gravity Case feels great in the hand,
has a slim profile and protects against drops!

Every MEGAVERSE Anti-Gravity Case now includes four color backplates (Gold, Rose Gold, Space Gray and Black) to protect your nano-suction case when you're not using it hands-free!

Mega Tiny Suction Power

This case sucks, literally! Imagine millions of mega tiny suction cups defying gravity for you every day. Push the nano-suction onto a smooth, flat surface and the the millions of little craters create suction, holding your phone in place!

Easy On The Eyes, Tough On Drops

The MEGAVERSE Anti-Gravity Case is one tough cookie* all the way around. The nano-suction material cleans up with just water, self-heals and is temperature resistant. To clean, simply wipe down your case with water! (*unfortunately, the case is not made of cookie).

The Mega Tiny Team

We're tinkerers at heart and our days are a stream of ideas we can't shake. We see the world as an endless opportunity to make things a little better. We believe that a simple idea from a tiny group of people can have an impact. And if you're lucky, a big impact.

A new phone case won't change the world, but the belief that no matter how small you are, you can take something people use every day and make it just a little bit better will.

The MEGAVERSE Anti-Gravity Case is a proof of concept for all of us that small is the new big and that's why we launch our products through crowdfunding. This is the place where the tiny come together to make big things happen. This is the place where everyday things are made better by everyday people and that's why we're here.

So our ask today is simple: Take a moment right now and share this project with your friends using the share tools at the top of this page. Let them know there's a simple idea here that you think they'll love. And then after that, make sure to explore IndieGoGo and look for the passionate people and projects that need your support to become a reality.

We'll continue working hard to make things better ... and together with you, we'll make them happen.

We are the tiny.
-The Mega Tiny Team

Risks & Challenges

The Mega Tiny Corp founders have decades of combined experience working with international vendors building consumer tech products. We believe that all risks have been mitigated based on the due diligence that we have put into this project over the last several months. That being said, we understand that challenges can and will arise and we believe we can face them while still delivering this project on time. Thank you for your support!

story:
The Helium Core is a pocket-sized, sturdy aluminum chassis that lets you easily add lenses or filters, and accessories such as flashes, lights and microphones to your iPhone. It has a more ergonomic grip and multiple mounting points for a tripod or other piece of support gear, while allowing access to the display, switches, buttons, jacks and ports on your iPhone. 

The Helium Core is designed for tool-less removal and we'll ship the product with both thumbscrews and regular screws, so that you have the option of using either one. This gives you the option of removing your iPhone easily whenever you want to, and provides the added benefit of being able to set up your rig and leaving it set up, because removing your iPhone is now a breeze! 

With the Helium Core, you can customize your iPhone and set it up as a filmmaking camera, a photography camera, a mobile journalism rig, a live broadcasting setup, or a vlogging rig. Its durable design and ability to let you flexibly place accessories on it makes it a solid foundation for your iPhone-based camera system, all in a pocket-sized design.

The Helium Core makes your iPhone more comfortable to hold in your hands by giving you something more substantial to grab onto. Its curved surfaces were designed for both aesthetic and ergonomic reasons. You can do almost anything you can imagine with it.

The numerous industry-standard, 1/4"-20 mounting points allow you to mount and position your iPhone camera system in creative ways. 

Some of the creatives who've told us how the Core will expand their creativity include:

  • iPhone-specific designs to ensure precise fit (iPhone 6/6s and 6 Plus/6s Plus)
  • 6061-T6, aircraft-grade aluminum for strength and durability 
  • Multiple 1/4"-20 mounting points, located on all 4 sides (16 on the Core and 17 on the Core+)
  • Integrated lens mount fits 37mm threaded lenses, and other lenses, with adapters 
  • Axis of the tripod mount is aligned with the center of the lens
  • Direct access to all jacks, switches, buttons and ports
  • Curved walls aid ergonomics
  • Cutouts reduce weight, without sacrificing strength 
  • Anodized finish for aesthetics and to increase corrosion and wear resistance 

Brandon, one of two members of our team, is a professional photographer and filmmaker. A couple of years ago, he found himself using his iPhone more than his pro-grade equipment for non-commercial work, primarily because of its small size and light weight.

As much as he enjoyed using the iPhone, he found it limiting. He wanted to add lenses and other accessories to improve the iPhone’s capabilities as a camera. He also wanted a solution that maintained a compact form factor, provided mechanical strength and reliability, and allowed him to continue using the iPhone as a smartphone.

He didn't find anything that fit his needs, so he leveraged his engineering background and product development experience to produce the product that he believed would best fit the needs of demanding creatives. The Helium Core is the result of that effort.

The Helium Core team is made up of two people, Brandon and Walt. 

Brandon has been a full-time professional photographer and filmmaker for 5 years. Prior to his pursuit of a creative career, he worked in engineering and product development. At his last corporate gig, he was a product manager at Lenovo, where he successfully brought 6 notebook products with combined sales of over USD4 billion to market.

Walt has been designing and manufacturing products successfully for over 30 years, and has designed rocket engines, jet engine components, and turbochargers, for companies such as Boeing, Pratt & Whitney and Borg Warner.

Between them, they have a wealth of experience in the design, development, manufacture and go-to market launch of products. This experience enables them to understand and plan for the challenges typically associated with projects such as this one.
