story:
A GIANT LEAP INTO THE FUTURE IN POCKET SIZE and thousands of Dollars worth of Customized Instruction on your mobile device

What is it?

Tennis Central is an online community connected through a smart App packed with crazy features that help you to improve your game faster, socialize better, and network with powerful individuals all at the same time.  We decided to make it simple for YOU to “Find Your Match™.” Each download comes standard with $$$thousands of tennis instruction. 

Not Just a Hobby, but Life Long Benefits!

How often do you get the chance to practice your sport with leaders in businesses and industries?  Where else can you set up a pressure free hour of fun and meet new people where you can relax and practice your favorite sport?  Where else can you easily connect with other fans and improve your game with the touch of a button? And if you need some help with your game, where else can you find thousands of dollars worth of curated online instruction you can watch anytime? We just made your change over more powerful.  Tennis opens up doors most do not know exist.  This golden door is now pre-loaded in your phone and waiting for you to enter.

Welcome to Tennis Central

There are 65 million tennis fans in the US alone but only 5 million are frequent players.  This staggering fact means that the tennis industry has not yet found a way to simplify access to the game, which keeps more than 90% of our fan base from playing. Tennis Central directly addresses this challenge, and provides carefully crafted features and experiences designed to make playing tennis more accessible, easy, and fun.  The Tennis Central Mobile App was designed to connect tennis fans and give them all an experience like no other.

Simplicity, Convenience, Customized

Time is the one commodity we don’t have enough of.  Tennis Central makes it easy to find players, scan their availability, connect, and schedule games.  Additionally, we included instant notifications to simplify your day.  There are enough pressures in your day, and your sports and hobbies should not add extra stress.

Life is complicated enough and your hobbies should provide fun and peace of mind.  Tennis Central is simple to use, intuitive and filled with benefits you never imagined could be combined.  With this app, the possibilities are endless and your tennis improvements and personal growth guaranteed.


Technology should always do much more than you could do yourself.  Tennis Central’s algorithms deliver a customized experience for every user.  We want to make you a smarter player with high standards and expectations that only we can deliver. 

Partner Pairing

Finding the right match is a multi-dimensional endeavor, because it requires pairing personalities and skill levels accurately.  Social and casual players should not be randomly paired against hardcore competitors.  Tennis Central solves this problem.  As a result, players signed up in Tennis Central can enjoy the company of like-minded and evenly skilled individuals.

Practice

Getting better faster only happens when you expose yourself to different styles.  With the Tennis Central App you will never run out of options to find new players and new challenges.  Want to practice with a leftie so you can finally beat that leftie at the club?  Search our community for players based on all sorts of skills - including their dominant hand - and make your practices count. Need some extra instruction?  The app is packed with thousands of dollars worth of online instruction ready to take your game to new heights. 


Compete 

Competition accelerates improvements and whether you are looking for a match or a potential new team member, you will “Find your Match” within the app.   If you want to set up a match at a specific time, on a court close to your location but don't know anyone - we've got you covered!  You can create a challenge match or practice and open it up to the community.  Next time you are on business, throw a racket in your suitcase and use the Tennis Central App to schedule an hour of fun even if you don't know anyone!

Socialize 

When you bring millions of people together with a similar interest, you have officially created a community where social interaction happens organically.  Tennis is the platform and your interactions are your choices.

Network 

Tennis players are some of the most educated and successful individuals in the world because the game appeals to a highly driven segment of the population.  Why not mix tennis with networking?  In the app you will be able to find players also based on their profession. One hour of your time could be the professional opportunity of a lifetime. 

Track 

Tennis Central offers a state of the art improvement and tracking algorithm that you unleash by rating your skills, tracking your activity, accumulating points and watching your level improve faster than ever before. You can literally see your improvements mapped out and receive curated coaching videos to maximize performance.


Insane Value 

Let’s face it!  Tennis has an elitist reputation, and the perception is that it is very expensive.  Between the countless tennis lessons, the equipment and the court fees, our fans are weary of the costs.  Tennis Central has nipped this problem in the bud with customized complimentary instruction and affordable online lessons.  Additionally, we are currently negotiating partnerships with key manufacturers to bring you the most affordable pro shop on the market.  We only deliver Premium Quality content.


Courts

There are actually more free places to play in the US than any other sport, and you can easily find them with the Tennis Central App.  Our GPS technology tells you where they are and how to get there. You can easily see what is around you for convenience. 

ITunes Style Instruction 

Tennis Central has pre-loaded thousands of dollars of tennis courses and lessons that you can access for free or at a ridiculously low price.  Because we use an Itunes style delivery, you can access the lessons you need and leave the rest for later.  We made your tennis instruction mobile and CUSTOMIZED based on your skills to help you turn your flaws into weapons. Care to watch a video during the change over to change the course of your match?   There is an app for that!  Moreover, we regularly add new courses from some of the most reputable sources so you will never run out of content and new challenges. 

Because you will continue to improve steadily, we also created a complimentary improvement feature that helps you set goals and prompts you to complete them.  You will now be able to track and visualize your progress.   Need to be ready for the company's annual tennis outing?  No problem! Let the Tennis Central App turn your serve into the highlight of the day!


Products 

Tennis Central is actively working to secure the best products at the best market price.  We want you to be the best and to look your best without breaking the bank.  The Tennis Central Pro Shop will give you access to curated and tested products.  Tennis is also a fashionable sport and with our accessories, you will be sure to stand out.

                                        

Tracking & Reporting

We have designed this platform to increase the speed of your improvement.  Tennis Central offers tracking tools, statistics, and charts that reflect your accomplishments standard with our App.  As soon as you start using the App and tracking your activities, you will start to see the commensurate improvement in your ranking.  You will no longer need to remember your annual record, because the App will do it for you.  Even pro players don’t have this type of luxury at their fingertips.

IPhone and Android Compatibility

The two market leaders in smart phones define our lives today so we made Tennis Central compatible for both. We are also phone and tablet ready!

Consolidating a Fragmented Industry

The tennis industry is full of service providers and products that range from exceptional to plain mediocre and even dangerous.  Our responsibility as tennis experts is to help our users access curated, reliable information so that they can make intelligent decisions that will foster excellence and injury free development.

Some Interesting Facts

According to the Tennis Industry Association, the Tennis Avatar is a 33 years old with a household income of $98,000 annually. Tennis is also the fastest growing traditional sport in the US since 2000.  You can be confident you will be in great company by joining the game. 

Meet the Team

We have assembled an impressive team of passionate experts with combined experience, clout, and connection in the tennis, IT, entertainment, and fashion industries. 

Yann Auzoux – CEO 

Yann Auzoux is a former Davis Cup player who has become a leader in online tennis instruction.  His instruction has been featured on the premier website Tennis.com and has generated millions of views on You Tube.  He was voted for the second year in a row as one of the most influential tennis experts in the world by the Tennis Congress.  As a coach, Yann has been voted coach of the year twice by the Washington Post and his expertise ranges from total beginner to top 20 in the world.  He is one of the most sought after tennis coaches worldwide and with his connection in the industry you will be exposed to the best instruction in the world. His vision is to make tennis and its perks accessible to all. 

Jonathon Lunardi – CTO

Jonathon is an Internet technology leader with over 20 years of experience working in the education software, government contracting, and the staffing industries. Jonathon has the ability to apply technology entrepreneurship resourcefulness with pragmatic business principles he has learned while building over 13 companies. Jonathon also held many strategic positions at the public company Blackboard Inc. achieving over $500 Million in annual revenues.  Jonathon is actively involved in the lives of our Veterans raising money and creating opportunities for their smooth reentry into the work force.

Olivia Ricchi – Branding 

Olivia Ricchi is a market leader in branding in the Mid Atlantic area.  She has worked closely with powerful professionals ranging from the White House to fortune 500 executives.  Her expertise in branding ranges from fashion, health and wellness, athletics, and entertainment.  Her influence will be felt in the curated experiences we are planning for our community.

Peter Lawler - Corporate Relations

Peter Lawler is a veteran in the Sports Management industry.  He is one of the most experienced Sports Agents in the world having managed John McEnroe's interests and some of his likes.  Peter is so connected in the Tennis world that you will soon be exposed to some really fun cameos and instructional surprises.

YOU!

You are the MVP in the organization.  You are the reason why we developed Tennis Central and without your input and feedback, referrals, and support, this community would not be as multi-dimensional.  Contact us to suggest new features, and invite friends to join the fun!  We are grateful for your various contributions. 

Where We are in Development

The Beta Version of the Tennis Central App is finished and ready for a spin.  We need your help and support to add killer features that will make the experience even more memorable for all players around the world.  The website is operational and ready for your involvement.  Check it out at www.tenniscentral.net. 

Why We Need Your Support

Developing a killer App requires not only resources, but a lot of input and feedback. Your financial support and your feature requests are both extremely important to help us shape the Tennis Central App final iteration.  You will not just be a contributor but a true founder.  Thank you for your support.

PERKS

The big thank you: $9

We are grateful for your contribution and for your support we will give you the paid Tennis Central App that will activate your lifetime access to the App services. We will gift you the "Perfect Swing"course ($25 value) to help you master your game. 

The Soloist: $19

Thank you for supporting our efforts.  You will receive the lifetime access to the paid version of the Tennis Central App with our complimentary signature can of Blue™ tennis balls to strut your stuff and the "Perfect Swing" course ($25 value) to help you master your game.  ($15 extra for International Shipping)

The Duet: $50

We appreciate your contribution and for your support, we will send you two cans of our signature Blue™ tennis balls along with a Tennis Central “Meet your Match” t-shirt, the "Perfect Swing"course ($25 value) of course, and lifetime access to the paid version of the Tennis Central App to take your game to new heights.  ($20 extra for International shipping)

The Trio: $75

We could not do this without you! To show you how grateful we are, we’re throwing in the paid version of the App, three cans of our signature Blue™ tennis balls, a “Meet your Match” t-shirt, and our most downloaded tennis course -- The Serve Accelerator. ($25 extra for International shipping)

The Quartet: $125

Our mission has always been to bring the amazing game of tennis to all tennis enthusiasts in the world.  Our intention is to facilitate access and to empower all tennis fans.  We value your belief in us and for your trust we think you should get four cans of our famous signature Blue™ tennis balls, a “Meet your Match” t-shirt, our two most downloaded online courses -- The Serve Accelerator and Dynamic Footwork Formula-- and lifetime access to the paid version of the Tennis Central App. ($30 extra for International shipping)

The Great Case: $175

Your generosity does not go unnoticed, and no good deed should go unrewarded!  We believe in reciprocity and for your help, let us send you a case of our signature Blue™ tennis balls, one “Meet your Match” t-shirt, and lifetime access to the paid version of the Tennis Central App. ($50 extra for International shipping)

The MVP: $250

Extraordinary support calls for extraordinary treatment!  For your contribution, we will send you the MVP package that includes the lifetime access to the paid version of the App, a case of our signature Blue™ tennis balls, our top three online tennis courses “The Serve Accelerator,” “Dynamic Footwork Formula,” and “Prepping like Pro.” You also get a “Meet your Match” t-shirt to wear proudly. ($50 extra for International shipping)

The Exclusive Experience: $500

It doesn’t get much better than this.  Your confidence in our ability to deliver what we promise means you should have the best of everything that we produce.  For this amazing contribution, you will get lifetime access to the paid version of the Tennis Central App, a case of our Signature Blue™ tennis balls, our top four online tennis courses “The Serve Accelerator,” “Dynamic Footwork Formula,” “Prepping like Pro,” and “The Perfect Swing,” two “Meet your Match” t-shirts, and our world famous Sweet Spotter tennis training device  (www.sweetspottertennis.com). ($80 extra for International Shipping)

The Memory: $15,000

Life is about memories and there is no better way to experience the true essence of this endeavor than to be exposed to Tennis Central Founder and CEO Yann Auzoux.  His coaching is sought after worldwide, and to thank you for your contribution Yann will meet you at his favorite club in Florida (www.kiwitennisclub.com) for five days  to coach you individually for three hours each day.  Additionally, you will receive five cases of our signature Blue™ tennis balls, our top four online tennis courses “The Serve Accelerator,” “Dynamic Footwork Formula,” “Prepping like Pro,” and “The Perfect Swing,” five “Meet your Match” t-shirts, and two of our world famous Sweet Spotter tennis training devices (www.sweetspottertennis.com). The lifetime access to the Tennis Central App goes without saying. 

The Titleist:  $500,000

Tennis Central has been designed to feature a title sponsor.  For your contribution, your brand will be the title sponsor for the App for one full year.  You will be the exclusive sponsor for the 2015 calendar year! All of our members will see your brand every time they load the App. 


TIMELINE
App Beta Release: November 2014 --- Ahead of schedule
App Final Release: December 2014 --- Ahead of schedule
Perks Shipment Completion: February 2015 --- On schedule
story_txt:
A GIANT LEAP INTO THE FUTURE IN POCKET SIZE and thousands of Dollars worth of Customized Instruction on your mobile deviceWhat is it?

Tennis Central is an
online community connected through a smart App packed with crazy features that
help you to improve your game faster, socialize better, and network with
powerful individuals all at the same time. 
We decided to make it simple for YOU to “Find Your Match™.” Each download comes standard with $$$thousands of tennis instruction. 

Not Just a Hobby, but Life Long Benefits!
How often do you get the chance to practice your sport with leaders in businesses and industries?  Where else can you set up a pressure free hour of fun and meet new people where you can relax and practice your favorite sport?  Where else can you easily connect with other fans and improve your game with the touch of a button? And if you need some help with your game, where else can you find thousands of dollars worth of curated online instruction you can watch anytime? We just made your change over more powerful.  Tennis opens up doors most do not know exist.  This golden door is now pre-loaded in your phone and waiting for you to enter.
Welcome to Tennis Central
There are 65 million tennis fans in the US alone but only 5
million are frequent players.  This
staggering fact means that the tennis industry has not yet found a way to
simplify access to the game, which keeps more than 90% of our fan base from
playing. Tennis Central directly addresses this challenge, and provides
carefully crafted features and experiences designed to make playing tennis more
accessible, easy, and fun.  The Tennis
Central Mobile App was designed to connect tennis fans and give them all an
experience like no other. 
Simplicity, Convenience, Customized
Time is the one commodity we don’t have enough of.  Tennis Central makes it easy to find players,
scan their availability, connect, and schedule games.  Additionally, we included instant
notifications to simplify your day. 
There are enough pressures in your day, and your sports and hobbies
should not add extra stress.
Life is complicated enough and your hobbies should provide
fun and peace of mind.  Tennis Central is
simple to use, intuitive and filled with benefits you never imagined could be
combined.  With this app, the
possibilities are endless and your tennis improvements and personal growth
guaranteed. 


Technology should always do much more than you could do
yourself.  Tennis Central’s algorithms
deliver a customized experience for every user. 
We want to make you a smarter player with high standards and
expectations that only we can deliver.  
Partner Pairing
Finding the right match is a multi-dimensional endeavor,
because it requires pairing personalities and skill levels accurately.  Social and casual players should not be
randomly paired against hardcore competitors. 
Tennis Central solves this problem. 
As a result, players signed up in Tennis Central can enjoy the company
of like-minded and evenly skilled individuals.



Practice
Getting better faster only happens when you expose yourself to different styles.  With the Tennis Central App you will never run out of options to find new players and new challenges.  Want to practice with a leftie so you can finally beat that leftie at the club?  Search our community for players based on all sorts of skills - including their dominant hand - and make your practices count. Need some extra instruction?  The app is packed with thousands of dollars worth of online instruction ready to take your game to new heights. 




Compete 
Competition accelerates
improvements and whether you are looking for a match or a potential new team
member, you will “Find your Match” within the app.   If you want to set up a match at a specific time, on a court close to your location but don't know anyone - we've got you covered!  You can create a challenge match or practice and open it up to the community.  Next time you are on business, throw a racket in your suitcase and use the Tennis Central App to schedule an hour of fun even if you don't know anyone!



Socialize 
When you bring millions of people
together with a similar interest, you have officially created a community where
social interaction happens organically. 
Tennis is the platform and your interactions are your choices.



Network  
Tennis players are some of the most educated and successful individuals in the world because the game appeals to a highly driven segment of the population.  Why not mix tennis with networking?  In the app you will be able to find players also based on their profession. One hour of your time could be the professional opportunity of a lifetime. 



Track  
Tennis Central offers a state of the art improvement and tracking algorithm that you unleash by rating your skills, tracking your activity, accumulating points and watching your level improve faster than ever before. You can literally see your improvements mapped out and receive curated coaching videos to maximize performance.



Insane Value 
Let’s face it!  Tennis has an elitist reputation, and the
perception is that it is very expensive. 
Between the countless tennis lessons, the equipment and the court fees,
our fans are weary of the costs.  Tennis
Central has nipped this problem in the bud with customized complimentary instruction and affordable online lessons.  Additionally, we are currently negotiating partnerships with key manufacturers to bring you the most affordable pro shop on the market.  We only deliver Premium Quality content.


Courts 
There are actually more free places
to play in the US than any other sport, and you can easily find them with the
Tennis Central App.  Our GPS technology
tells you where they are and how to get there. You can easily see what is around you for convenience. 



ITunes Style Instruction  
Tennis Central has pre-loaded thousands of dollars of tennis courses and lessons that you can access for free or at a ridiculously
low price.  Because we use an Itunes style delivery, you can access the lessons you need and leave the rest for later.  We made your tennis
instruction mobile and CUSTOMIZED based on your skills to help you turn your flaws into
weapons. Care to watch a video during the change over to change the course of your match?   There is an app for that!  Moreover, we regularly add new
courses from some of the most reputable sources so you will never run out of
content and new challenges. 
Because you will continue to improve steadily, we also created a complimentary improvement feature that helps you set goals and prompts you to complete them.  You will now be able to track and visualize your progress.   Need to be ready for the company's annual tennis outing?  No problem! Let the Tennis Central App turn your serve into the highlight of the day!



Products  
Tennis Central is actively working
to secure the best products at the best market price.  We want you to be the best and to look your best
without breaking the bank.  The Tennis
Central Pro Shop will give you access to curated and tested products.  Tennis is also a fashionable sport and with our accessories, you will be sure to
stand out.
                                        
Tracking & Reporting
We have designed this platform to increase the speed of your improvement.  Tennis Central offers tracking tools, statistics, and charts that reflect your accomplishments standard with our App.  As soon as you start using the App and tracking your activities, you will start to see the commensurate improvement in your ranking.  You will no longer need to remember your annual record, because the App will do it for you.  Even pro players don’t have this type of luxury at their fingertips.



IPhone and Android Compatibility
The two market leaders in smart
phones define our lives today so we made Tennis Central compatible for both. We are also phone and tablet ready!




Consolidating a Fragmented Industry
The tennis industry is full of
service providers and products that range from exceptional to plain mediocre
and even dangerous.  Our responsibility
as tennis experts is to help our users access curated, reliable information so
that they can make intelligent decisions that will foster excellence and injury
free development. 
Some Interesting Facts
According to the Tennis Industry Association, the Tennis
Avatar is a 33 years old with a household income of $98,000 annually. Tennis is also the fastest growing traditional sport in the US since 2000.  You can be confident you will be in great company by joining the game. 


Meet the Team
We have assembled an impressive team of passionate experts
with combined experience, clout, and connection in the tennis, IT,
entertainment, and fashion industries.  
Yann Auzoux – CEO 
Yann Auzoux is a former Davis Cup player who has become a
leader in online tennis instruction.  His
instruction has been featured on the premier website Tennis.com and has
generated millions of views on You Tube. 
He was voted for the second year in a row as one of the most influential
tennis experts in the world by the Tennis Congress.  As a coach, Yann has been voted coach of the
year twice by the Washington Post and his expertise ranges from total beginner
to top 20 in the world.  He is one of the
most sought after tennis coaches worldwide and with his connection in the industry
you will be exposed to the best instruction in the world. His vision is to make tennis and its perks accessible to all. 



Jonathon Lunardi – CTO 
Jonathon is an Internet technology leader with over 20 years
of experience working in the education software, government contracting, and
the staffing industries. Jonathon has the ability to apply technology
entrepreneurship resourcefulness with pragmatic business principles he has
learned while building over 13 companies. Jonathon also held many strategic
positions at the public company Blackboard Inc. achieving over $500 Million in
annual revenues.  Jonathon is actively
involved in the lives of our Veterans raising money and creating opportunities
for their smooth reentry into the work force.



Olivia Ricchi – Branding 
Olivia Ricchi is a market leader in branding in the Mid Atlantic
area.  She has worked closely with
powerful professionals ranging from the White House to fortune 500
executives.  Her expertise in branding
ranges from fashion, health and wellness, athletics, and entertainment.  Her influence will be felt in the curated
experiences we are planning for our community.



Peter Lawler - Corporate Relations
Peter Lawler is a veteran in the Sports Management
industry.  He is one of the most
experienced Sports Agents in the world having managed John McEnroe's interests and some of
his likes.  Peter is so connected in the
Tennis world that you will soon be exposed to some really fun cameos and
instructional surprises. 
YOU!
You are the MVP in the organization.  You are the reason why we developed Tennis
Central and without your input and feedback, referrals, and support, this
community would not be as multi-dimensional. 
Contact us to suggest new features, and invite friends to join the fun!  We are grateful for your various contributions. 
Where We are in Development


The Beta Version of the Tennis Central App is finished and
ready for a spin.  We need your help and
support to add killer features that will make the experience even more
memorable for all players around the world.  The website is operational and ready for your involvement.  Check it out at www.tenniscentral.net. 
Why We Need Your Support


Developing a killer App requires not only resources, but a
lot of input and feedback. Your financial support and your feature requests are
both extremely important to help us shape the Tennis Central App final
iteration.  You will not just be a
contributor but a true founder.  Thank
you for your support. 
PERKS

We are grateful for your contribution and for your support we will give you the paid Tennis Central App that will activate your lifetime access to the App services. We will gift you the "Perfect Swing"course ($25 value) to help you master your game.

We could not do this without you! To show you how grateful we are, we’re throwing in the paid version of the App, three cans of our signature Blue™ tennis balls, a “Meet your Match” t-shirt, and our most downloaded tennis course -- The Serve Accelerator. ($25 extra for International shipping)

Your generosity does not go unnoticed, and no good deed should go unrewarded!  We believe in reciprocity and for your help, let us send you a case of our signature Blue™ tennis balls, one “Meet your Match” t-shirt, and lifetime access to the paid version of the Tennis Central App. ($50 extra for International shipping)

story:
Easbit develops the most granny proof Bitcoin wallet for Android smartphones

Introduction of ourselves

First of all we are obviously very strong believers and real enthusiasts of the Bitcoin. Due to the global crisis and a decreasing trust in the monetary financial systems we believe that the world is in urge of a new and transparent currency which cannot be interfered and/or be influenced by humans or central banks.

Our team has two Dutch co-founders. Our backgrounds lays in banking, IT and marketing. Because of our backgrounds we became truly passionate about Bitcoins. We have heard from the phenomenon Bitcoin since early 2010. We have seen close by how the financial crises emerged. In the news you still hear on a daily base that CEO’s get well overpaid and banks go bankrupt. That is exactly what we see as very unfair since the normal hard working tax payer has to work around the clock and pay eventually for the caused damage.

We have a clear vision about what we would like to achieve.

Our vision is: Make cryptocurrency accessible and easy for everybody by developing granny proof solutions.

Our mission is: Proof that we are the best not by saying we are the best, but by reaching top 5 for wallet providers in the world. We are ambitious.

Because of our individual skills we are an all-round team which is able to cover the fields from marketing to actual developing. All the required skills are in-house, together with our IT partner in India.

Who are the team members?


Linkedin: Junanto van der Veen: Core Skills: Project management, IT-developing, Networking, Banking and Philosopher

Linkedin: Patrick van Ek: Core Skills: Marketing, SEO, Networking, Designing and Philosopher

What is this about?

We are a startup in software development for cryptocurrency. A granny proof and high level security Bitcoin wallet for Android smartphones is the product. It is an Android application for smartphones which enables users to send and receive secured transactions in the cryptocurrency Bitcoin. We always keep in mind that the usability MUST be as easy as using cash. From our perspective this is the only way to get Bitcoin “mainstream”. It is nonsense to say that solely this app would achieve this. But we definitely try to contribute to this process. Summarizing, the usage of cryptocurrency needs to be granny proof and safe in order to go global it is as simple as that!

Why the Easbit App?

Granny proof:

Bitcoin nowadays still has the image of being not user friendly and that usage is only meant for IT people. We want to accomplish to get rid of this image for Bitcoin. Bitcoin is meant for everybody around the globe! One thing which really distinguished ourselves from the competition is that we found a very user friendly way to handle the user unfriendly long Bitcoin addresses. Therefore all that counts for us is developing a wallet which meets 100% the needs for all kind of users. Which means: keep it stupid simple! Our goal is everybody should be able to use our app. And by everybody we mean everybody who uses cash today. Granny proof so to speak.

Android smartphones

We have consciously decided to develop a wallet for Android based smartphones. We did this for a reason.  

First of all according to EMarketer.com a smartphone will become more and more globally an essential part of our daily lives, if it isn’t already. So for Bitcoin it will be extremely important to be easily spendable by a smartphone. Security again plays here also a major role. A penetration of more than 33% of the global population is estimated to have a smartphone by 2017.

On the other hand we have the operating systems (OS). Our aim is that we would like to make our app available for as much people as possible. But we always keep in mind that what we do execute as perfect as possible. We are taking it step by step. So we have chosen to start off with the OS Android. Simply because it has the largest market share, it is most widely used and its open source character. 

Mobile payments

Our choice is also based on the future of mobile payments.

Technology researcher Gartner forecasts that the worldwide mobile payment market will have over 450 million users and a transaction value of more than $721 billion in 2017. This represents compound annual growth rates of 18% and 35% respectively for the period 2012 to 2017.

Non-US based:

Privacy is a big issue. Terms like NSA, spying, malware are common headlines these days. Of course it is not a guarantee, but the majority of the Bitcoin firms are US-based and we are not. Only 10% is European based and 61% US based (source: Coindesk). It brings in some balance.

Security & privacy

We are on top of our game when it comes to security. All critical data such as keys and exchanged data is encrypted. We will provide easy use for (automatic) backup facilities. The safety of your Bitcoins is our highest priority.

Accenture did a study on mobile payments. When it comes to mobile payments there are 3 things which are important:

1. Security

2. Privacy

3. Convenience

(source: Accenture)

We have developed our Android mobile application based on these fundamentals.

Storage

We do not store your Bitcoins (in other words the keys) on a central location. The main principal of Bitcoin is decentralization. This is a matter we do not like to interfere in. So we do not store any Bitcoin related data on our servers. The Bitcoins are stored locally on your own smartphone, just like you carry your own cash in your own wallet. Which means you are ALWAYS really in charge of your Bitcoins. Such thing which happened at Mt Gox is simply not possible, because we do not store your Bitcoins, private keys, public keys, personal information or any kind of crucial data. We only provide secured transactions and we will be hosting user friendly services to make the usage of your wallet as easy and secure as possible.

Backup

Of course we have added reliable and secured backup features. As well as cold storage and easy restoring in case of losing you smartphone.

Developing

We develop our software according level 5 CMMI (Capability Maturity Model Integration) standards. We outsource the actual coding in India. The Indian company is a level 5 organization. Also many other Dutch leading companies are engaged with the same company. The company usually engages with larger companies/customers, but they were also impressed by our ideas for cryptocurrency and found it an interesting topic, that is the reason they have committed themselves to our startup.

Level 5 means: It is a characteristic of processes at this level that the focus is on continually improving process performance through both incremental and innovative technological changes/improvements. (source: Wikipedia)  

Working according the system does not guarantees anything of course. But it says something about the maturity level we develop.

It is also important to know is that we code native. The reason we do this is that people spend more and more time on their smartphones. Daily activities contain surfing the web, downloading apps, playing games and streaming videos. Simply said it is not possible to create the same rich and functional experiences as you would achieve with for e.g. HTML5.

What we need & what you get

We are currently already developing the application, and approaching final stage of development. We have funded the development in the initial phase so far by ourselves. In order to finish the application and fully test it we need an additional $25k.

We truly hope that you will be our supporter and contribute to our project. We genuinely think that we can contribute to the mainstream process of Bitcoin with our application. Of course we do not stop developing after the first release. In case of overfunding we will spend it on additional features. We have lots in mind as additional features!

Project accounting will be shown at our website: http://www.easbit.com/project-development.

The application will be released January.

The Impact

At a current status only 14% (source: Coindesk) of the companies involved in the Bitcoin ecosystem are wallet providers. We think there is still a lot to do to get Bitcoin mainstream. Especially when you think that a wallet is basically an essential need in order to spend your Bitcoins. So it is crucial part of the Bitcoin ecosystem. And especially this part of the ecosystem requires granny proof software.

A lot is said about Bitcoin. But there is one thing the majority agrees on there is a need for a “Killer-App”. We are convinced that our app can contribute to the mainstream process significantly. It is up to the crowd to decide whether it is a killer app or not. A granny proof and safe app is all that counts for us. Bitcoin is also described as money for nerds. Because of its open and transparent character it should be available for everybody with a smartphone. Processing a payment should be easier as swiping your card. That is what we try to accomplish. 

Technology is for everybody. Bitcoin may leapfrog credit cards. Due to lack of credit cards, approximately 65% and 35% (source: Coindesk) of all e-commerce in China and India respectively conducted with cash.

Another important feature of the Bitcoin is relatively cheap remittance transactions.

Remittance: Average global remittance fee of 8.14% per $200 ($16.28)

Bitcoin average transaction fee is $0.004

Remittance vs Bitcoin: Bitcoin is 4,070 times cheaper on a $200 transaction.

(Source: Coindesk)

By using the Easbit app people can send money globally almost instantly against very low fees comparing to traditional ways.

According to Wedbush Securities can (an award-winning research platform) Bitcoin become huge.

What is said about Bitcoin?

Bitcoin has also attracted the attention of some impressive people.

"[Bitcoin] is a techno tour de force." - Bill Gates, Founder of Microsoft

 “We have elected to put our money and faith in a mathematical framework that is free of politics and human error.” - Tyler Winklevoss, Co-creator of Facebook

"Bitcoin may be the TCP/IP of money." - Paul Buchheit, Creator of Gmail

“ I think the fact that within the bitcoin universe an algorithm replaces the functions of [the government] … is actually pretty cool. I am a big fan of Bitcoin” - Al Gore, 45th Vice President of the United States

 “I do think Bitcoin is the first [encrypted money] that has the potential to do something like change the world." - Peter Thiel, Co-Founder of Paypal

"Bitcoin is a remarkable cryptographic achievement and the ability to create something that is not duplicable in the digital world has enormous value" - Eric Schmidt, CEO of Google

Risk & Challenges

There is no project without risks. And so is ours. But we did our homework. Almost half a year of preparation, maturing our idea, writing a marketing and business plan, preparing the granny proof design, user friendly functionalities went by before we actually started coding. This was an essential part to get the best user experience there possibly is. So we are at least convinced that we did all we could within our powers. It is not only the developing that we focus on. We also have the proper skills when it comes to market the app. This part is at least as important to become successful. An awesome marketing plan is also part of the whole project. If people can’t find you, you can’t expect them to use your app!

A risk for projects in general is budgeting. Due to our preparations we are convinced we have defined our costs cautiously. As we said we are currently already developing and costs are lower than initially expected because of offshoring to India.

Because of the months of preparations we are absolutely sure when we meet our funding needs we can show the world the first release in January.

How to contribute to the Easbit Crowdfunding Campaign?

Step 1: Go to our campaign: http://igg.me/at/easbit or click the launch button in the email.

Step 2: In the upper right corner you will find the text: Select a contribution amount below. You can either choose here to contribute any desired amount or you can select any desired Perk which are shown right below.

Step 3: Click on the button: Contribute.

Step 4: Now you check your contribution. After checking you can click on: Continue to payment.

Step 5: You can choose here to contribute through either with credit card or PayPal.

When selected credit card please click: Submit payment.

When selected PayPal please click: Go to PayPal.

You are done. Again we thank you tremendously for contributing to our campaign! 

Other ways to help

If you are not able to contribute to this project don’t worry! You can still help us.

Please share our project through one of the tools on top of this page.

You can also contribute of course by sending us Bitcoins anonymously: 1GJAsnxTVf7hUs5T18t5DMokSDq9TcfEwL

Easbit develops the most granny proof Bitcoin
wallet for Android smartphones
Introduction of ourselves
First of all we are obviously very strong believers and real enthusiasts of
the Bitcoin. Due to the global crisis and a decreasing trust in the monetary financial
systems we believe that the world is in urge of a new and transparent currency
which cannot be interfered and/or be influenced by humans or central banks.
Our team has two Dutch co-founders. Our backgrounds lays in banking, IT and
marketing. Because of our backgrounds we became truly passionate about
Bitcoins. We have heard from the phenomenon Bitcoin since early 2010. We have
seen close by how the financial crises emerged. In the news you still hear on a
daily base that CEO’s get well overpaid and banks go bankrupt. That is exactly
what we see as very unfair since the normal hard working tax payer has to work
around the clock and pay eventually for the caused damage.
We have a clear vision about what we would like to achieve.
Our vision is: Make
cryptocurrency accessible and easy for everybody by developing granny proof
solutions.
Our mission is: Proof
that we are the best not by saying we are the best, but by reaching top 5 for
wallet providers in the world. We are ambitious.
Because of our individual skills we are an all-round team which is able to
cover the fields from marketing to actual developing. All the required skills
are in-house, together with our IT partner in India.
Who are the team members?

Linkedin: Junanto van der Veen: Core Skills: Project management, IT-developing, Networking, Banking
and Philosopher
Linkedin: Patrick van Ek: Core Skills: Marketing, SEO, Networking, Designing and Philosopher
What is this about?
We are a startup in software development for cryptocurrency. A granny proof
and high level security Bitcoin wallet for Android smartphones is the product.
It is an Android application for smartphones which enables users to send and
receive secured transactions in the cryptocurrency Bitcoin. We always keep in
mind that the usability MUST be as easy as using cash. From
our perspective this is the only way to get Bitcoin “mainstream”. It is
nonsense to say that solely this app would achieve this. But we definitely try
to contribute to this process. Summarizing, the usage of cryptocurrency needs
to be granny proof and safe in order to go global it is as simple as that!
Why the Easbit App?
Granny proof:
Bitcoin nowadays still has the image of being not user friendly and that
usage is only meant for IT people. We want to accomplish to get rid of this
image for Bitcoin. Bitcoin is meant for everybody around the globe! One thing
which really distinguished ourselves from the competition is that we found a
very user friendly way to handle the user unfriendly long Bitcoin addresses.
Therefore all that counts for us is developing a wallet which meets 100% the
needs for all kind of users. Which means: keep it stupid simple! Our goal is
everybody should be able to use our app. And by everybody we mean everybody who
uses cash today. Granny proof so to speak.
Android smartphones
We have consciously decided to develop a wallet for Android based
smartphones. We did this for a reason.  
First of all according to EMarketer.com a smartphone will become more and
more globally an essential part of our daily lives, if it isn’t already. So for
Bitcoin it will be extremely important to be easily spendable by a smartphone.
Security again plays here also a major role. A penetration of more than 33% of
the global population is estimated to have a smartphone by 2017.

On the other hand we have the operating systems (OS). Our aim is that we
would like to make our app available for as much people as possible. But we
always keep in mind that what we do execute as perfect as possible. We are
taking it step by step. So we have chosen to start off with the OS Android.
Simply because it has the largest market share, it is most widely used and its
open source character. 

Mobile payments
Our choice is also based on the future of mobile payments.
Technology researcher Gartner forecasts that the worldwide mobile payment
market will have over 450 million users and a transaction value of more than
$721 billion in 2017. This represents compound annual growth rates of 18% and
35% respectively for the period 2012 to 2017.
Non-US based:
Privacy is a big issue. Terms like NSA, spying, malware are common
headlines these days. Of course it is not a guarantee, but the majority of the
Bitcoin firms are US-based and we are not. Only 10% is European based and 61%
US based (source: Coindesk). It brings in some balance.
Security & privacy
We are on top of our game when it comes to security. All critical data such
as keys and exchanged data is encrypted. We will provide easy use for
(automatic) backup facilities. The safety of your Bitcoins is our highest
priority.
Accenture did a study on mobile payments. When it comes to mobile payments
there are 3 things which are important:
1. Security
2. Privacy
3. Convenience
(source: Accenture)
We have developed our Android mobile application based on these
fundamentals.
Storage
We do not store your Bitcoins (in other words the keys) on a central
location. The main principal of Bitcoin is decentralization. This is a matter
we do not like to interfere in. So we do not store any Bitcoin related data on
our servers. The Bitcoins are stored locally on your own smartphone, just like
you carry your own cash in your own wallet. Which means you are ALWAYS really
in charge of your Bitcoins. Such thing which happened at Mt Gox is simply not
possible, because we do not store your Bitcoins, private keys, public keys,
personal information or any kind of crucial data. We only provide secured
transactions and we will be hosting user friendly services to make the usage of
your wallet as easy and secure as possible.
Backup
Of course we have added reliable and secured backup features. As well as
cold storage and easy restoring in case of losing you smartphone.
Developing
We develop our software according level 5 CMMI (Capability Maturity Model
Integration) standards. We outsource the actual coding in India. The Indian
company is a level 5 organization. Also many other Dutch leading companies are
engaged with the same company. The company usually engages with larger
companies/customers, but they were also impressed by our ideas for
cryptocurrency and found it an interesting topic, that is the reason they have
committed themselves to our startup.
Level 5 means: It is a characteristic of processes at this level that the
focus is on continually improving process performance through both incremental
and innovative technological changes/improvements. (source: Wikipedia)  
Working according the system does not guarantees anything of course. But it
says something about the maturity level we develop.
It is also important to know is that we code native. The reason we do this
is that people spend more and more time on their smartphones. Daily activities
contain surfing the web, downloading apps, playing games and streaming videos.
Simply said it is not possible to create the same rich and functional
experiences as you would achieve with for e.g. HTML5.
What we need & what you get
We are currently already developing the application, and approaching final
stage of development. We have funded the development in the initial phase
so far by ourselves. In order to finish the application and fully test it we
need an additional $25k.
We truly hope that you will be our supporter and contribute to our project.
We genuinely think that we can contribute to the mainstream process of Bitcoin
with our application. Of course we do not stop developing after the first
release. In case of overfunding we will spend it on additional features. We
have lots in mind as additional features!
Project accounting will be shown at our website: http://www.easbit.com/project-development.
The application will be released January.The Impact
At a current status only 14% (source: Coindesk) of the companies involved
in the Bitcoin ecosystem are wallet providers. We think there is still a lot to
do to get Bitcoin mainstream. Especially when you think that a wallet is
basically an essential need in order to spend your Bitcoins. So it is crucial
part of the Bitcoin ecosystem. And especially this part of the ecosystem
requires granny proof software.
A lot is said about Bitcoin. But there is one thing the majority agrees on
there is a need for a “Killer-App”. We are convinced that our app can
contribute to the mainstream process significantly. It is up to the crowd to
decide whether it is a killer app or not. A granny proof and safe app is all
that counts for us. Bitcoin is also described as money for nerds. Because of
its open and transparent character it should be available for everybody with a
smartphone. Processing a payment should be easier as swiping your card. That is
what we try to accomplish. 
Technology is for everybody. Bitcoin may leapfrog credit cards. Due to lack
of credit cards, approximately 65% and 35% (source: Coindesk) of all e-commerce
in China and India respectively conducted with cash.
Another important feature of the Bitcoin is relatively cheap remittance
transactions.
Remittance: Average global remittance fee of 8.14% per $200 ($16.28)
Bitcoin average transaction fee is $0.004
Remittance vs Bitcoin: Bitcoin is 4,070 times cheaper on a $200
transaction.
(Source: Coindesk)
By using the Easbit app people can send money globally almost instantly
against very low fees comparing to traditional ways.
According to Wedbush Securities can (an award-winning research
platform) Bitcoin become huge.

What is said about Bitcoin?
Bitcoin has also attracted the attention of some impressive people.
"[Bitcoin] is a techno tour de force."
- Bill Gates, Founder of Microsoft
 “We have elected to put our money and
faith in a mathematical framework that is free of politics and human error.” -
Tyler Winklevoss, Co-creator of Facebook
"Bitcoin may be the TCP/IP of money."
- Paul Buchheit, Creator of Gmail
“ I think the fact that within the bitcoin
universe an algorithm replaces the functions of [the government] … is actually
pretty cool. I am a big fan of Bitcoin” - Al Gore, 45th Vice
President of the United States
 “I do think Bitcoin is the first
[encrypted money] that has the potential to do something like change the
world." - Peter Thiel, Co-Founder of Paypal
"Bitcoin is a remarkable cryptographic
achievement and the ability to create something that is not duplicable in the
digital world has enormous value" - Eric Schmidt, CEO of Google
Risk & Challenges
There is no project without risks. And so is ours. But we did our homework.
Almost half a year of preparation, maturing our idea, writing a marketing and
business plan, preparing the granny proof design, user friendly functionalities
went by before we actually started coding. This was an essential part to get
the best user experience there possibly is. So we are at least convinced that
we did all we could within our powers. It is not only the developing that we
focus on. We also have the proper skills when it comes to market the app. This
part is at least as important to become successful. An awesome marketing plan
is also part of the whole project. If people can’t find you, you can’t expect
them to use your app!
A risk for projects in general is budgeting. Due to our preparations we are
convinced we have defined our costs cautiously. As we said we are currently
already developing and costs are lower than initially expected because of
offshoring to India.
Because of the months of preparations we are absolutely sure when we meet
our funding needs we can show the world the first release in January.How to contribute to the Easbit Crowdfunding Campaign?Step 1: Go to our campaign: http://igg.me/at/easbit or click the launch button in the email.Step 2: In the upper right corner you will find the text: Select a contribution amount below. You can either choose here to contribute any desired amount or you can select any desired Perk which are shown right below.Step 3: Click on the button: Contribute.Step 4: Now you check your contribution. After checking you can click on: Continue to payment.Step 5: You can choose here to contribute through either with credit card or PayPal.When selected credit card please click: Submit payment.When selected PayPal please click: Go to PayPal.You are done. Again we thank you tremendously for contributing to our campaign! Other ways to helpIf you are not able to contribute to this project don’t worry! You can still help us.Please share our project through one of the tools on top of this page.You can also contribute of course by sending us Bitcoins anonymously: 1GJAsnxTVf7hUs5T18t5DMokSDq9TcfEwL

story:
Every sci-student can enter in an operating room by a smartphone, tablet or PC and learn surgery in real time. This is Surgery Academy.


Twitter: @Armando_Iandolo

Blog: http://armandoiandolo.com



What is Surgery Academy


Surgery Academy is the tool for learning surgery anywhere you are, through a smartphone, tablet or pc.

We are creating a MOOC (Massive Open Online Course) for students of medicine and surgery and for health professionals.

Students, surgeons, interns and healthcare professionals will finally be able to enter into a real operating room. They will be able to consult the anonymised medical records of patients under surgery, ask and reply to questions.




How does It work


A student or a health professional can join into a random operating room or choose the surgical intervention by his favourite discipline. 

Joined in the remote operating room, the student will see the three most important things: patient records, the surgical intervention in streaming in 1080p (with the patient's vital signs) and a notetaking platform that can works like a service of microblogging.

It allows to share surgical procedures, annotations and intervention's screenshot with other students.


As seen on


Update Press

http://motherboard.vice.com/blog/surgery-academy-is-the-surgery-class-for-google-glass

http://hackeducation.com/2014/01/25/hack-education-weekly-news-1-25-2014/

http://www.fastcolabs.com/3026021/teaching-surgery-with-google-glass-will-this-actually-work

http://www.downes.ca/post/61683

What?


Every day, all over the world, surgeons perform millions of surgeries, from appendectomies to heart transplants. 

However, students of Medicine and Surgery do not have a practical approach until the 5th year of study. On the other hand, a surgeon in a difficult phase can not receive some sort of suggestion by a third party. The operating room is like a secret society.


What students should see

  • The surgical operations in real time and in augmented reality
  • Blood pressure 
  • Heart rate
  • Respiratory rate
  • Body temperature
  • O2 saturation
  • Patients medical records, anonymised.



What students could do


  • Watching preferred surgical operations and save them on the cloud
  • Entering in the operating room of an hospital of Timbuktu 
  • Social Networking
  • Gamifying their studying
  • And many more features to come


For students


               

We know that until the 5th year of study, students of medicine and surgery can't have a practical approach with the scalpel. When they are interns, they only have little practical knowledge. 

The most important benefits are:

  1. Appropriate for any setting that has connectivity (Web or Wi-Fi)
  2. Any language or multiple languages
  3. Any online tools
  4. Escape time zones and physical boundaries
  5. Produce and deliver in short timeframe (e.g. for relief aid)
  6. Contextualized content can be shared by all
  7. Informal setting
  8. Peer-to-peer contact can trigger serendipitous learning
  9. Easier to cross disciplines and institutional barriers
  10. Lower barriers to student entry
  11. Enhance personal learning environment and/or network by participating
  12. Improve lifelong learning skills


For surgeons 


                     

Surgeons, universities, hospitals they can introduce Surgery Academy as program of study.

Surgery Academy can enter into the medical and educational establishment, and can be used as method of study and teaching from all the university of the world.


Yeah Science!


 

Beginning to share medical knowledge to who can't to access to surgical documentations, medical notions and surgical procedures, is a great and powerful thing.

For example, a surgeon of the John Hopkins Hospital can teach to a surgeon in Nigeria, in real time, how to do a reconstructive surgery or an organ transplantation.

The progress of science is to share with other minds all that you know.


Why we need You


As some of you may know, we already have some funding (meaning our project does what it says it does) and with our own savings we have managed to create working prototypes.

However, the magnitude of our dream is too large for just us, and we need you (and your funds), to accelerate development and to help us bring our machines into manufacture and into your homes.


Comparisons with other MOOCs


                                                       And it doesn't end here.


Why Massive Open Online Course


We know that many hospitals have surgery theaters, but these allow only a bunch of students to see a surgical intervention. Nevertheless, hospitals always need visibility to attract new customers. Hospitals will be eager to join our social health network as we increase our community of students and surgeons from all over the world.


Our current pipeline, more to come!





Where Surgery Academy works



Then, why Indiegogo?


1. Core development: the majority of the core is complete. We need to fine tune a couple of features and take the proper time to thoroughly test everything.

2. Native OS X: We need to round out some application support mechanisms such as updates and feedback.

3. Desktop version: We have been focused primarily on the OS X version, but we can easily port Surgery Academy over a desktop PC or Mac.

4. User support mechanisms: We will be deploying forums and developing a comprehensive help section.

5. Special features: We have a few unmentioned – and pretty awesome – features that we'd love to give you in version 1, which we'll be able to do it if we raise enough funding.



Why 6,000 $?

For a project like this $ 6,000 are essential to operate as a sparkle in engines.


Some numbers


We know that eLearning is a $56.2 Billion business and is likely to double within 2015. We also look at countries in the developing world who are hungry for information and safe medical knowledge. In fact, the fastest growing eLearning markets are Vietnam and Malaysia. 

There are the sacred cows of the eLearning

About the Team

Armando Iandolo, Founder

                                                      


Born in 1989,  Armando has came into contact with the internet in his early adolescence. He has studied a postgraduate course in Computer Science at Harvard University, where grasped the potential of e-learning and of the decay of the university as a temple of knowledge reserved for a few. Armando is a iOS and Web Developer with strong technical-scientific attitude, he sees himself as a visionary and innovative person.

                                            Andrea Madrigali, co-founder

                                                                       

                                                    


Born in 1985, Andrea has studied Medicine and Surgery at the University "La Sapienza", in Rome.

He is an aspiring heart surgeon because of the beauty and complexity of blood vessels and the coronary tree. In 2010 Intern at Aurora St. Luke's Hospital, Wisconsin, USA, in the Department of Gastroenterology and Digestive Endoscopy. Since January 2013, he has been the curator of the health section of the "Roma Nord Magazine".

                                      

                                     Floriano Bonfigli, Marketing Advisor                                


                                                 

 Born in 1974, Floriano has worked as Product Manager at Agfa Healthcare, been among the first in Italy to roll-out and see in action an Eletronich Health Record and acted as Healthcare IT consultant at Gerson Lehrman Group. He is currently researcher in Innovation Driven Entrepreneurship at Istituto Adriano Olivetti (ISTAO) business school and is launching his own startup into EHRs.

story:
You know, I developed certain Android Game 2 years ago. But that was modded by someone and that makes so many cheaters. It was made me very sad and stolen passion from me.

So I found solution for this.

http://dexprotector.com/

will protect my android game from cheater. I tried trial version dexprotector, that was very satisfied result.

But dexprotector solution need money. That is $600(include kickstarter fee and Korean currency). So I request this funding.

If you have interesting this, please help this fund. I want Digifes version keep clean game environment. If done this fund, I'll provide APK, fund done day.

But BANDAI tell me stop this application, I'll stop all develop about DU contents immediately.

Thanks.

story:
ComTalker

We need help to develop a software application for smartphones which break language communication barriers.

We are sure that everyone has ever had to deal with the difficulties of communication in different languages. So we came up and began to develop a special application for smartphones that will help us in everyday communication around the world. 

By ComTalker you can communicate with your friends and the language barriers will no longer be a problem for you. 

The main features of the application: 

- Online text messenger with automatic instant translation 

- Voice online messenger with automatic instant translation 

- Support for more than 5 languages 

- Availability (availability of a free version with basic functions) 

- Ease of Use


Thanks to your help, we hope that our world will be a little better. 

We are open to any suggestions and cooperation.

_____________________________________________________________________________

GOALS:

 10 000$ 

- Develop a webpage  

50 000$ 

- Rent a server.

 - Give free  beta version with one  any language  to choose. 

100 000$ 

- Version with 3 languages  (English, Spanish, French). 

200 000$ 

- Version with 5 languages (English, Spanish, French, Germany, Russian).

500 000$ 

- Version with Chinese and Arabic languages and other.

_____________________________________________________________________________

story:
Tim is a guy who needs a better phone. He's a first time dad and needs to be at his lovely wife, Ashley's beck and call. I mean...it's his duty. Tim moved to Kansas City a few years back. He's an incredible musician and loves music. He loves music so much that he has dedicated a good portion of his day (about 8 hours to be exact) to building/creating/designing and modifying guitar pedals. He's pretty awesome.
Here's the deal:
Tim needs money to purchase an iPhone. Said iPhone is going to be around $500 and some change, plus insurance and such. If everyone that Tim was friends with on Facebook wanted to give $5, we could easily meet the goal.
Most of you are wondering, "what's in it for me?!" Well, so much. Depending on how much you give you can actually hang out with Tim, get 2 texts a month (for 2 months) from Tim, be a part of a Google + Hangout with Tim and or a mega brownie made by Micah Rose (but only if you're in the Kansas City Metro Area). The pièce de résistance is THE autographed 3g iPhone that is probably better suited as a paper weight than a communication tool.
If Tim doesn't reach his goal, all funds raised will go towards getting a new phone, regardless.
This fundraising project means so much to Tim Shaefer. Why? Because it's you, helping him to be a productive part of society. It will insure that he has friends, can communicate with his co-workers and most importantly be on call when his wife goes into labor or needs his help once his daughter is born.
Look, this is a small amount to donate. It's the cost of a really great cup of coffee from your local coffee shop.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't give, but want to help here are some things that you can do:

1. Post this on Facebook, Twitter, and even Instagram. All social media is acceptable! Hashtag: #iPhone4Tim

2. Tell your friends to give. Text and email the link to people who may want to help this young guy out.

3. When you see Tim, give him a hug, a high-five, and/or a fist bump. It will encourage him to keep on keeping on during the 30 days that this campaign is running.



THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR CONSIDERATION. WE APPRECIATE IT!

story:
So let’s give you an idea of what this service does and gives you the ability to do.

Marketing calls from companies are big business but at who’s expense?

We’re living in a world where the internet has brought people together and made it easier to buy the things you want and join in with the things you like.

But how often do you need to leave you phone number with a company to make a purchase, book a taxi, order a takeaway, join a gym or even become a member of a popular organisation, either on the web or in store and out and about? The answer is more often than not, which then brings you to the task of getting out of these small print contracts allowing them to call or text you with a promotion.

The Solution

Use a virtual phone number…

This means no second phone, no flicking between SIM cards or worrying about keeping on top of it all.

Nope, a virtual phone number is a number that when called, diverts directly to your personal phone number, whether it be your land line or mobile it doesn't matter, virtual numbers can divert to any number from any country. The best part about it is that when you’re done or when the marketing calls become too much, you simply deactivate the number.

We built Disposable Digits as a customer friendly service, so we don’t require any personal information. In fact, you can get a virtual number within 2 clicks of a button.

No personal information required.  Endless unique virtual numbers are available to use for as long as you need and you can deactivate, reactivate and edit is as much as you like. Simple.

The service is available on our app or directly through our website.  

We have also recently added a business side to the website where people can use their virtual numbers yet further. You can edit what times of day and days a week the number is active, you can set up greeting messages and audios, call whisper, voicemail to email and many more great features.

Virtual Numbers Without Internet

We have also built a separate system that has allowed us to produce a product version of the service. 

We have trialled them in 100 stores throughout London with no additional advertisement and after 8 weeks 40% of the stock was cleared leaving the remaining stock with the retailers to enjoy what's left to sell.


 You can look and see exactly where we're up to!

                                   

Our website is www.disposabledigits.co.uk  

You can also download our app for a further sneak peak...

Disposable Digits Apple App

Disposable Digits Android App

Hopefully you will see how we have built the service to be an easy to use method of being in control of your phone number and more importantly keeping it private when you want to.

We want people to benefit from our services. We currently have around 1500 app downloads and a handful of people using and benefiting from our services already.

             

Short term, what we want to do…

Well quite simply, we want to get it known.

We want to roll out our 6 & 12 month campaigns to get people like you and me aware of the service and quickly benefiting from it when and where they find it necessary.

This will involve an independent social media campaign getting the word out to thousands of people who will find hundreds of uses for a virtual number they can keep and control.

PR, SEO and advertisement will be managed by an established firm who will be creating a tailored campaign reaching out to those who are looking for a service like this and even to the people who don’t even know it yet!

The fact is, virtual numbers have been used in business for a while by people who have already found many great ways to utilise the benefits in their day to day business.

After a 3 month research campaign we found that, in fact, business men and women are only a small proportion of people who would use and most importantly, relish the idea of being able to keep their phone number private whilst not being limited to use companies that don’t require personal information.

At some point in time, everybody needs to give out their phone number when they would really rather not and this gives you the ability to do exactly that; give out your number to receive calls, without giving out your phone number.


Long term, what’s the bigger picture…?

As a telecommunications provider we want to roll out our second, third and fourth stages of development.

Super Software

First and foremost we want to develop and build our super software.

We have excellent software in place that allows our virtual numbers to exist.  This is the central control zone where the numbers are organised and where customers can access and control their numbers in great detail.

We want to make it bigger, better, simpler and more accessible on your mobile.

This means a fresh new build to provide an ultra modern development that is keeping up with these fast moving times and gives customers the ability to manage everything from one place with simplicity at its heart.

This software will be at the centre of our future developments as all additional services released will be powered and run through our super software.


More Numbers!

We've started our journey with virtual numbers providing excellent benefits to people all over the UK.

There’s more! That’s right, phone numbers of all shapes and sizes are waiting for us to build and develop innovation where they can be used by the public for many reasons both business and personal.

Virtual numbers are the start of the big picture  There are numbers galore with their own unique benefits and ways to help people not just in the UK but all over the world.  Numbers that connect people from different countries whilst saving them money.  Numbers useful for all types of people and most importantly, all controllable through a simple system accessible as a simple app.

Free Worldwide Calls!

One of our developments includes a unique software system built into an app and website that allows people to call anybody worldwide totally free of charge with our Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) phoning system.

Simple and free registration allows you to call, video call, message, send files, interact and much more to anybody around the world free of charge and as simply as making a phone call.

As well as rolling out multiple business benefits including soft phone networks, conferencing and calls to mobile and phone numbers with lower than network rates. It will also provide a platform for the general public to benefit from many free features boosting the social atmosphere that we thrive on as a way to keep in touch on a daily basis.



Mobile, Landline, Broadband and TV…

Everyone hears about and has probably experienced,  problems with their providers.

Here comes the change; why is everything so complicated?

If you have a problem, you want it fixed.  You don’t want to add to your problems with stressful calls to these companies that get you nowhere and cost you money.

Our software will give the customer control. You want to make a change to your service? Well it couldn't be easier as the control is at your fingertips, This means that every service you CAN change, you can change yourself with a few simple steps and without the hassle of a lengthy phone call to an overseas call centre.

Simple, Reliable.


Campaign

Flexible Funding

With so much room for development and so many possibilities we can unlock, every little bit counts towards our short term and bigger picture.

Updates

Every bit of funding will achieve a step forward in development.  We will keep you updated with every step we take and keep you in the loop so you can watch the excitement build.

Every chance we will provide photos and proto types where you can comment and give your input on the style and uses for all services.

We want to know what you think!

We encourage feedback; both good and bad.  After all, we want to build our systems and platforms in a way that improves simplicity, attractiveness, and the overall feel that keeps people coming back.  Feedback helps us know that we’re getting there.  In each area.  In every way.

Other Ways to Contribute

If you have an idea that you think will make our aim that bit better or more appealing we would be pleased to know about it!

Even if you’re pretty nifty with graphics and want to contribute to our websites, apps or any of our advertisement campaigns, we are continuously looking for appealing imagery, video or moving ad banners to use and if you want to be involved with creating them, we would be over the moon to assess and potentially use what you have created within our development.

For the High Rollers who are keen on a share of the company…

The development possibilities are endless. If you'd like to be a part of the company as an investor and have your say in the concept, we welcome all offers and recommend that you contact us to discuss it further in more detail.

This is for investors looking at £100K+ investments.


Let us be heard!

One amazing way you can help our project is to share and share alike.

We have facebook and twitter which we would love you to join us with,

And if you find other ways to spread the word, that will be appreciated too!

Facebook.com/DisposableDigits

Twitter.com/followmenumbers


The Team

We are currently a small team dedicated to producing the highest standard of development and pushing the project to become a UK first of its kind appealing to millions of people who would benefit from our services.

 

Thanks!

Disposable Digits
