Stay focused on what's important and leave the nitty-gritty to us. Protective coating on the E Ink screen with 9H Harness TestWaterproof InkCase for seasons where you can read by the beach. Or even a hot tub!Waterproof InkCase i7 Plus to complement the iPhone 7 Plus. Certified with an IP67 rating means it is protected from water, dust, dirt, and sand.Drop-proof protection for iPhonePatented BubblePro technology absorbs shock impacts.Shock absorbing case for absolute protection on your iPhoneKinetic energy is absorbed by the patented BubblePro material. InkCase i7 Plus is among the best protective cases in the market offering military standard drop protection. Using the latest BubblePro Technology, thousands of Micro Weave locks together to reinforce the case rigidity. Energy from an impact is absorbed by the Micro Weaves and spread across the entire outer case. Giving you a complete peace of mind.Raised lips to prevent scratches on both screensSmart magnetic charging portEasy charging mechanism which is guided by the magnets. We sourced for super strong magnets to help you quickly attach the charging port. It is the little details that count.Completely redesigned to be waterproof and concealedThe making of InkCase i7 PlusThe InkCase i7 Plus is fully designed, conceptualized, tested and developed in-houseWe make sure to refine even the smallest detailWe source for the best materials in the world to construct the InkCase i7 Plus. We insist on using the Carta 1.2 E Ink screen because of its ultra high contrast level which gives you an even more paper-like reading experience. The screen comes equipped with 16 levels of gray scales to display the best photos on your iPhone case.Dedicated support team with regular firmware and software updatesWhen you purchase any of our InkCase, our top priority is to deliver a functional and practical product that you love. We have assembled a dedicated team that listens to your suggestions and quickly act to improve its usability. Rest assured that this is our business for you and we take it very seriously.  Manufacturing of InkCase i7 PlusThis is how we do it.Production line for InkCase i7 Plus. The very first batch for testing... and more testing...Precision machinery assembly Display all the important information on your iPhone caseCalendars, Task-lists, Weather and more. The Live Information Center combines multiple widgets to offer you a holistic view of live updates on events for the day. Organize and sync your To-Do lists straight from your iPhoneSyncs your iPhone Reminder app for your latest tasksPerfect use while at the grocery store!Organize your daily tasks by displaying them on the back of your iPhone. InkCase i7 will automatically sync your tasks from the iPhone. Easily sync calendar schedules from your iPhone via BluetoothChange between different widgets anytime on the InkCase i7 Plus. It displays all your calendars on a single screen, showing your schedule, time and tasks. Any changes made will be automatically synced across.Track your fitness activities on the goInkCase i7 Plus uses data from the iPhone Health app and displays it on the back of your iPhone.Get updated on your daily fitness accomplishmentsSync fitness and health data from your iPhone Health app. We aim to let InkCase encourage you to lead a healthier life by reinforcing your accomplishments for the day. Get better insights of yourself with the Health App integration.Fully customizable widgets to make the InkCase unique to yourselfCustomize your InkCase i7 Plus the way you want it. Switch between various beautifully designed clock interface. Save your iPhone's precious battery life as you no longer need to switch it on to see the time. Sync news from the browser or any news appChoose any articles from the browser or news app to be saved for offline reading.Save articles to the InkCase i7 Plus using Bluetooth. Because InkCase is so pocketable, we want to let you read your news on it. Therefore, we created the Read It Later function which seamlessly allows your curated articles and News can be synced automatically for offline reading. Self-learning algorithm that automatically pushes news to you based on your reading habits.Distraction-free reading experience by removing pesky advertisements. To make things even better, we are introducing a brand new function that automatically syncs your articles based on your favorite news genre. Removal of advertisements to eliminate distractions InkCase i7 Plus allows for an immersive reading experience. Our new function scans the article and removes all advertisements before it reaching your palm.InkCase i7 Plus vs othersThe only iPhone case you'll ever needIt is everything you need in the InkCase i7 Plus. By attaching to your iPhone, InkCase helps to declutter your daily life by minimizing the weight and the number of items you have to bring every day.For special promotions and updatesReward Fulfilment  All shipments will come with a complimentary registered shipping label to ensure accountability and trackability.Ships by September 2017Risks and challengesEvery project comes with its own unique risks and challenges but we try to do our very best to minimize them. As a business, it is our duty to produce products that our customers find useful. It is also our duty to ensure our customers receive the best service and timely delivery of your purchases. The Oaxis team has been in this business for several years now, every product innovation surpasses the previous with stronger and better designs.The InkCase i7 Plus product that is featured above are working products that came straight from our production factory. These were the first sample batch which we used for media samples and internal testing.

story:
Smartphones - they have become and integral part of our lives!

Gone are the days where we used a phone only for calling or texting. Taking pictures, reading the news, checking our emails or playing games - the more functions our phone gets the more we use it every day.

But the latest smartphones are becoming bigger and bigger and it is difficult to hold it comfortably in one hand, isn't it?

They also become heavier and using the smartphone all day can make your wrist hurt a lot.

And I am sure you tried to use your smartphone on a shaking bus or subway before, right?

-It's so dangerous and inconvenient!

And just imagine dropping your phone and breaking the screen because your hand gets too tired or someone runs into you on a busy day!

If you wonder: Isn't there a simple solution to all these problems?!

From now on enjoy a better grip and more comfortability when using your phone with Sinji Grip!

No matter when or where you can feel more secure - just slide your fingers under the soft elastic band and feel more comfortable right away.

You can also use the leather part of Sinji Grip as a phone stand to support your phone - simply fold the leather band and prop your phone up in a second!

Or use it to secure your phone while finding the best angle for your next selfie!

 

Sinji Grip for a Happy Wrist 

Using your smartphone often and for prolonged periods of time can strain and hurt your wrist.

Worst case scenario? Carpal tunnel syndrome! - leading to pain, numbness, and tingling in your fingers and thumb.

Let Sinji Grip help you to hold your phone more comfortable and prevent injury!

If you hold your phone with the Sinji Grip you can relax your wrist and fingers and reach the whole screen with your thumb! Make holding your phone with one hand easy again and give your wrist and hand a break.

 

High Quality in 4 colors 

Made of premium natural leather, Sinji Grip is soft to the touch and will not irritate your skin.

 

 

You can choose from four neutral colors - Navy, Black, Orange, Brown - to match your phone and your lifestyle!

 

Durability and excellent Adhesion 

The highly elastic band of Sinji Grip stretches easily (so your fingers won't hurt) but lets you hold your phone tight at the same time. It also goes back to its original shape and will not wear out over time!

Thanks to the 3M VHB™ tape we used, Sinji Grip sticks to the back of your phone or phone case and can withstand up to 3kg of force!

 

Anywhere and Anytime, Sinji Grip 

Don't wait any longer and use your new Sinji Grip anywhere and anytime! You don't only have to use it for your smartphone - stick it anywhere you want to make your life more comfortable. Let it be your assistant no matter where you go!

 

Specification 

 

 

Time Line

We started to develop Sinji Grip back in January 2018 and have been continuously working on finding the best materials to make Sinji Grip not only useful but also a design piece.

Since we have been producing smartphone accessories for almost 10 years now, we know the production process well and are familiar with the companies that produce them for us. And we have already started producing the first batch of our Sinji Grip!

Therefore we are confident that we can start packing and shipping at the end of June!

However, since we do not know exactly how many Sinji Grip we will need, we cannot guarantee when you will receive your own Sinji Grip yet. But once we ship it out, you will get it within two to three weeks!

 

 

FAQ's

Q. Can Sinji Grip be used with all smartphones?

A. In general, you can use Sinji Grip with all smart devices that do not have a curved back! If you have a smartphone with a back made out of glass (iPhone 8,8 plus, X or Samsung Galaxy S9/S9 plus) then the 3M tape might not stick well to the surface - that is why we included the additional adhesive film, so you can strengthen adhesiveness and use Sinji Grip without worries!

Q. What is the additional adhesive film and why do I need it?

A. As mentioned before, if you have a phone with a glass back (most flagship phones in 2018), then the 3M tape alone might not guarantee perfect adhesion. That is why we included an additional adhesive film to strengthen the adhesiveness and make sure you can feel comfortable when you use Sinji Grip! Simply put the additional adhesive film in between your phone and Sinji Grip and you are ready to go!

Q. Can I use Sinji Grip as a stand for my tablet PC as well?

A. You can use Sinji Grip as a smartphone stand but most tablet Pcs will be too big or heavy to stand up well with Sinji Grip. If your tablet PC is very small and light it might work but we recommend to use that function only for your smartphone!

 

Who we are 

Sinjimoru - Smart gadgets with simple design

We keep it smart and simple - creating innovative mobile accessories since 2008 that captivate with their sophisticated design while providing fun, satisfaction, and trust to our customers!

Sinjimoru makes mobile accessories with smart and simple design. We strive to be a company that meets the needs of our customers and makes products that can be trusted and resolve problems everyone faces in their daily lives!

With that goal in mind, we continue to create ideas, develop technology, and manage production quality. We are also committed to providing useful information and convenient customer service that will help consumers to enjoy our products for a long time. In the lives of IT users, we will ensure fun, satisfaction, and trust through our products. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Since we have been making smartphone accessories for a long time, we know how the process from coming up with a new idea to producing and shipping the finished product has to be managed.

This time we decided to find a solution for everyone who has a hurting wrist while using their smartphone or who worries about dropping the phone - so we came up with the idea for Sinji Grip but we wanted to make it a bit more special and gave it the function of a phone stand as well.

All developing and prototyping processes are already finished and production is running right now.

We hope that we can introduce our ideas to a bigger audience from all over the world through indiegogo and that we can start communicating with our backers more! We are looking forward to honest feedback and constructive criticism from our backers so that we can get to know more about what our international customers want and like.

story:
The SlimTester campaign is finished! Now accepting pre-orders at http://www.slimtester.com

 

 

                               

 

It’s so thin & flexible
just like a plastic sheet !

 

 * Latest design for industrialization process

 

 

WHAT IS VIVAINNOVA'S SlimTester?

SlimTester is a new worldwide product: It is a tester for most of the batteries mounted in cars, bikes, boats, trucks, etc.

SLIM. Built with state-of-the-art technology, on a flexible plastic foil, easy to use and very low cost.

Allows battery owners to check their battery level, without having to resort to experts, or buying devices designed for professionals.

Includes a flexible and clearly visible electrochromic display with the same accuracy as a battery tester worth hundreds of dollars

 

KEY FEATURES

* State of Charge (SoC) gauge for batteries (automotive, vessels, uninterruptible power supplies known as UPS's, ...)

* Slim format: Flexible and completely flat

* For everyone: Very simple to use. No previous knowledge required

* Low cost: The new technology used reduces manufacturing costs

* Ecological: Most of the materials used can be recycled contributing to the environment

* Waterproof

 

WHAT CAN I DO WITH A SlimTester?

It lets to determine when to change the battery before it is completely useless, or to determine if the problem comes from the alternator.

It improves security and saves tow track cost and hassles.

Enjoy boating? Make sure your battery works properly before leaving the dock, helping you avoid dangerous situations.

In various situations, identifying if your battery works well can be very helpful.

 

HOW IS VIVAINNOVA'S SlimTester DIFFERENT?

SlimTester is REVOLUTIONARY

The battery tester is a crystal clear example of a new electronic devices generation that will revolutionize our daily lives.

Printed Electronic Technology makes sophisticated devices accessible to everyone, and it takes beyond the classic electronics industry.

 

PRINTED ELECTRONIC

TECHNOLOGY

Printed & organic electronics is a novel technique for designing and manufacturing electronic devices. Making use of graphic techniques, functional inks (nanoparticles based inks) are deposited on flexible materials such as plastic, paper or tissue.

The technology developed by Vivainnova allows soldering electronic components on a plastic sheet joining the advantages of both technologies: Printing on the one hand (roll-to-roll, flexible, flatness, ...), and soldering high performance conventional components (microprocessors, diodes, ...) on the other hand.

The result is a cutting edge technology that you shouldn´t miss out on. Through SlimTester funding campaign, you can get a unique device that opens a new electronic age.

 

ECOLOGICAL

SlimTester sets to parallel the expected trends in the coming decades: Electric vehicles, clean energy and renewable power sources.

Printed electronics is more ecological technology than the conventional one, as it uses less aggressive materials to reduce the impact on the environment.

 

 

HOW DOES VIVAINNOVA'S SlimTester WORK?

Fully manageable and very easy to use by any user, without any previous technical experience.

User instructions:

1) Extend the product. Hold the device by the both ends.

2) Place the product on the battery and press on the terminals.

3) The battery level will be shown in the display.

 

WHY DOES SOMEONE NEED A SlimTester?

One of the most common causes of car’s breakdowns is battery flat or fault. The key to avoid a breakdown is good and regular maintenance. Many can be fixed at the roadside, but most can be avoided with the correct preventive care.

«SlimTester can be carried in the glove compartment with very little wasted space. When electrical problems in the vehicle are detected, or simply the battery status wants to be checked ahead of a possible replacement due to age or deterioration, SlimTester comes in an useful instrument in preventing surprises and unpleasant incidents to the driver»

 

"EVERYONE SHOULD CARRY ONE

IN THE GLOVE COMPARTMENT"

Also for use in marine environments where corrosion is a common problem. With SlimTester any vessel is not endangered miles offshore for not checking the battery before sailing. 

 

HELPING DEVELOPING COUNTRIES

Transportation is vital in all economies but especially in the developing countries ones. Old vehicles or badly maintained vehicles are usually seen on the roadsides in these countries, assuming a serious setback for the development of their economy and the right to personal mobility.

In rural areas where electrical grids don’t reach, homes usually use small solar panels off-grid plants where batteries are key parts. A SlimTester could be very useful device for the correct maintenance of these critical home systems.

SlimTester manufactured in high volume is as affordable as a very few dollars each.

 

SlimTester MODELS

SlimTester 12V for lead-acid batteries is the first model going to market, with 9.84 inches between terminals.

In the near future other models will follow:

- Various voltages (24v, 36v, 48v, ...)

- Other sizes and shapes (greater distances between terminals, ...)

- For other battery technologies (lithium-ion, ...)

- This module will be encapsulated and embedded into the battery case, including the assembly into the manufacture process of the battery

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

* Battery Tester for Lead-Acid batteries (12V / 30-100 Ah)

* Estimate the State of Charge from 0% to 100% (±2.5%)

* Dual functionality:

1) Check the State of Charge (SoC): Shows the percentage on the screen. (If a faulty electric contact takes place the device will show the letter “FO” of “Fault Operation”, and the user will have to connect the device again, paying special attention to a correct contact.)

2) If the measure takes place with the car started, the device verifies the correct operation of the vehicle's alternator or charger: it shows letter "C" of “Charging” on the screen.

* No external power required. Energy provided by the battery to be measured even if the battery charge status is 0%.

* Max. distance between terminals: 9.84 inches (25 centimetres)

* Size: 11.24 x 2.13 x 0.06 inches (285.5 x 54 x 1.5 mm)

* Operating temperature: -4ºF to 176ºF (-20ºC to 80ºC)

* Minimum power consumption during reading (0.3 W)

* Electrochromic display. View angle 180º

* Waterproof

 

USE OF FUNDS

Funds raised with this campaign will be used for:

- Finishing industrialization process

- Obtaining product certifications

- Non-recurring engineering costs

 

PROJECT TIMELINE

We currently have fully functional pre-production units.

APRIL

- Pre-production run of 100 samples.

- Product testing: We will start an extensive 30 day product testing. Product will be tested by 4 different kinds of uses (car, garage, boat & UPS manteinance)

MAY

- Early May product will be submitted to FCC & EU certification. Certification is about conformity assessment (testing and certification) in order to declare compliance with international regulatory requirements.

- Final adjustment of electronic design, pending certification results.

- Certification completed for SlimTester.

- Start Mass production

JUNE

- Distribution - Backers get their SlimTester.

 

LAB PHOTO STORY

 

OUR START-UP COMPANY

Our organization is the first Spanish company in organic & printed electronics.

Our team consists of a group of interdisciplinary experts with a wide variety of backgrounds, experiences, and skill sets.

Vivainnova has been developing its technology along three last years. Hard work and efforts by the entire team overcomes the toughest stages of research and development, including complicated events in this area of Spain as an earthquake and flooding.

But thanks to the strength and team effort we got here first, introducing the first product entirely based on this technology (UFPC - Ultra Flexible Printed Circuits).

Now we hope you will support us to value the effort and enthusiasm of a team of dreamers. Thank you backers.

 

FAQ's

Does SlimTester use internal batteries?

How long will SlimTester last?

Do I need to know what the pole (negative or positive) is for using SlimTester?

What about SlimTester´s manteinance?

How robust is SlimTester?

 

Q: SlimTester use internal batteries?

A: No. SlimTester uses power from the battery itself that it is testing for operation.

Back to TOP

Q: How long will SlimTester last?

A: Legal warranty is about 2 years, but SlimTester can be used several years more like other electronic appliances if it's used correctly.

Back to TOP

Q: Do I need to know what the pole (negative or positive) is for using SlimTester?

A: No, not at all. SlimTester can be used in any way. It has been designed for changing poles without a problem.

Back to TOP

Q: What about SlimTester´s manteinance?

A: SlimTester doesn´t require maintenance. If dirty it can be easily cleaned with a degreaser.

Back to TOP

Q: How robust is SlimTester?

A: SlimTester is more resisistant to impacts and vibrations than conventional battery testers and other electronic products in general.

Back to TOP

 

CONVENIENT FOR USERS

It doesn´t matter if you are preparing for the winter season, long distance travel or simply for preventive maintenance, or for overall safety.

 

CONVENIENT FOR COMPANIES

Used as promotional material it can serve to enhance your brand, increase sales, or in the case of insurance agencies to prevent incidents and save on expenses.

 

*** The final design could be changed during industrialization process

 

We invite all our friends and customers to join us on Facebook & Twitter, where you can preview some of the amazing projects we've been working on.

 

Contact us at: info@vivainnova.es

Thank you backers, Technical Team (Jose, David), Support Team (Inma, Asensio, Francis & Sofia), and specially to Pablo.

* Estimate the State of Charge from 0% to 100% (±2.5%)
* Dual functionality:
1) Check the State of Charge (SoC): Shows the percentage on the screen. (If a faulty electric contact takes place the device will show the letter “FO” of “Fault Operation”, and the user will have to connect the device again, paying special attention to a correct contact.)
2) If the measure takes place with the car started, the device verifies the correct operation of the vehicle's alternator or charger: it shows letter "C" of “Charging” on the screen.
* No external power required. Energy provided by the battery to be measured even if the battery charge status is 0%.
* Max. distance between terminals: 9.84 inches (25 centimetres)
* Size: 11.24 x 2.13 x 0.06 inches (285.5 x 54 x 1.5 mm)
* Operating temperature: -4ºF to 176ºF (-20ºC to 80ºC)
* Minimum power consumption during reading (0.3 W)
* Electrochromic display. View angle 180º
* Waterproof
 
USE OF FUNDS
Funds raised with this campaign will be used for:
- Finishing industrialization process
- Obtaining product certifications
- Non-recurring engineering costs
 
PROJECT TIMELINE
We currently have fully functional pre-production units.
APRIL
- Pre-production run of 100 samples.
- Product testing: We will start an extensive 30 day product testing. Product will be tested by 4 different kinds of uses (car, garage, boat & UPS manteinance)
MAY
- Early May product will be submitted to FCC & EU certification. Certification is about conformity assessment (testing and certification) in order to declare compliance with international regulatory requirements.
- Final adjustment of electronic design, pending certification results.
- Certification completed for SlimTester.
- Start Mass production
JUNE
- Distribution - Backers get their SlimTester.
 
LAB PHOTO STORY

 
OUR START-UP COMPANY
Our organization is the first Spanish company in organic & printed electronics.
Our team consists of a group of interdisciplinary experts with a wide variety of backgrounds, experiences, and skill sets.
Vivainnova has been developing its technology along three last years. Hard work and efforts by the entire team overcomes the toughest stages of research and development, including complicated events in this area of Spain as an earthquake and flooding.But thanks to the strength and team effort we got here first, introducing the first product entirely based on this technology (UFPC - Ultra Flexible Printed Circuits).Now we hope you will support us to value the effort and enthusiasm of a team of dreamers. Thank you backers.

 
FAQ's
Does SlimTester use internal batteries?
How long will SlimTester last?
Do I need to know what the pole (negative or positive) is for using SlimTester?
What about SlimTester´s manteinance?
How robust is SlimTester?
 

Q: SlimTester use internal batteries?
A: No. SlimTester uses power from the battery itself that it is testing for operation.
Back to TOP

Q: How long will SlimTester last?
A: Legal warranty is about 2 years, but SlimTester can be used several years more like other electronic appliances if it's used correctly.
Back to TOP

Q: Do I need to know what the pole (negative or positive) is for using SlimTester?
A: No, not at all. SlimTester can be used in any way. It has been designed for changing poles without a problem.
Back to TOP

Q: What about SlimTester´s manteinance?
A: SlimTester doesn´t require maintenance. If dirty it can be easily cleaned with a degreaser.
Back to TOP

Q: How robust is SlimTester?
A: SlimTester is more resisistant to impacts and vibrations than conventional battery testers and other electronic products in general.
Back to TOP
 
CONVENIENT FOR USERS
It doesn´t matter if you are preparing for the winter season, long distance travel or simply for preventive maintenance, or for overall safety.
 
CONVENIENT FOR COMPANIES
Used as promotional material it can serve to enhance your brand, increase sales, or in the case of insurance agencies to prevent incidents and save on expenses.
 
*** The final design could be changed during industrialization process
 
We invite all our friends and customers to join us on Facebook & Twitter, where you can preview some of the amazing projects we've been working on.
 
Contact us at: info@vivainnova.es
Thank you backers, Technical Team (Jose, David), Support Team (Inma, Asensio, Francis & Sofia), and specially to Pablo.

story:
Version Francaise: http://on.fb.me/18nmONf

Being a superhero with Glass

We believe Glass is a game changer. It's all about making technology fit in our daily lives and enhance our experiences, not get in the way. We want to make technology useful and provide real life benefits. For Glass, the user experience and interaction with Glass is clearly a challenge. If we get it right, Glass will provide superhero powers. Tiki’Labs is committed to bring its own piece of magic to the Google Glass experience.

Of course, like anyone else, we are not sure how Glass will evolve or even if it will truly live up to the expectations. But we do have a vision of how we could contribute to making it magic and make people feel like superheroes. Your contribution will enable us to build Glass products that people will love.

The challenge

 ... But what if the magic breaks ? In many situations, interacting with Glass can be either confusing, embarrassing, or simply not practical. Glass is activated by tapping the Google Mirror on the side of Glass with one finger. Slide the finger to select content on the timeline, or activate Glass by saying “Ok Glass”.

Voice interactions are limitating and could be confusing : 

  • when you can't speak
  • Glass could be activated and controlled by anyone
  • finding the info is not easy, especially in buisy/noisy environments

Designing a perfect user experience requires an interface that provides seemless connection with the technology. Tiki'Labs patented an interface solution that we believe can be the best way to activate and use Google Glass. 

 

The 6 key Tiki'pad solution

We have developed a technology that would change the Glass experience. It consists of a small 6 digit keyboard that gives direct access to 36 contents.

After years of R&D, building prototypes and products on mobile platforms including with famous French  school of engineering ESME SUDRIA (ARITT n°09-062), we achieved the user experience we wanted on text entry, content navigation, instant geolocalisation. Our aim is now to bring this user experience to Glass.

 

 

 

How does it work?

The 6 key Tiki'pad works on any touch surface of any dimensions, down to the size of a coin. The chord keyboard feature, allows direct access to 36 results, each with a single gesture.

The Tiki'pad requires half the size of traditional keypads, advantageously replacing Qwerty, optimizing the size of any mobile device touch screen.

 

Since the keys are large, this entry method is very reliable: visual feedback can be displayed into Glass. The rate of error is reduced from traditional keyboards, even at high speed texting.

We will propose various options to interact with Glass:

 

 

The Tiki'pad app on Glass

 

 

A free app will run on any smartphone with Bluetooth connexion to Glass (first versions will be developed on android) – the app will turn the screen into an active touch pad to interact with Glass. A small keyboard will be added in the vision field that replicates the finger moves over the touch surface of the smartphone. 

They will maintain a Bluetooth connexion with Glass and serve as remote keypad. This provides added benefits such as the ability to carry additional battery, physical buttons that can be programmed to facilitate  actions, and storage abilities. The most advanced will have a sim (so that you can use them without any smartphone), nfc chipset, and a magnetic side so that you can clip them anywhere.

 

  

The benefits are:

  • multi task (text entry, navigation, command)
  • very fast, easy and reliable input
  • works on very small surface like Mirror
  • no need to see the keyboard (or any visual feedback)
  • discreet interaction

Our technology is best applied in constrained contexts where users don’t have big screen or need to have their hands free. Chord keyboard provides real interaction capabilities like short discussion, multi-level navigation, filtering information or archiving for later use. 

Designing the most efficient interface allows us to bring value to Glass and help keep the magic of technology alive. 

 

Use cases

The 6 keys Tiki'pad will allow Glass users to:

  • discreetly answer short messages, launch complex commands, search through directories 
  • reducing the number of steps to get to the desired content
  • customize the interface with preferred sequences 

 

 

 

Beyond Glass and other models of connected glasses, the Tiki'pad remote will connect to your digital environment and bring new benefits in many situations :

  • to bring augmented reality experience and rich interaction to any connected device with camera (within a car, on a sport cam, security cam, military flight helmet, binoculars..)
  • to navigate rich contents on a connected TV 
  • enabling users to control “the internet of things” 

Acting as a real universal wallet, the Tiki'pad wil also take care of wireless payments via NFC

 

 

Timeline of the Tiki'pad project

Thanks to your support, we will build innovative and reliable technology.

-       first step : application to interact with Glass through a phone. Based on our existing tiki6keys engine and compliant with Glass OS.  15000€ and four months are  needed. Note that even if you don't have a Glass (like almost everyody on earth at this time), you can use the photo camera of your smartphone to simulate them and get the same options as you will get with Glass (like Google Goggles).

-       second step : open API for third party developers that will take advantage of the 6 key interaction for their own services. We will provide support to this community of developers who want to rock the Glass world! 20000€ and 2 additional months are needed.

-       third step : prototype of physical keypads. Our goal is to produce a small pad with a sim, sd card for storage and a magnetic side to clip it. Additional fundings will allow us to build the first working prototypes for early 2014 and expect to launch first before Q2 2014.

 

 

 

-       In the meantime and thanks to your initial support we will be happy to partner and work with designers, manufacturers, distributors.

 

What is in there for you

Most of all, you will be part of an exciting project: giving a new ability to human beings and helping them feel like superheroes in their daily life !

And when we say you will be part of, we mean that we really want you to contribute, from the beginning and all the way along. You will: 

  • be given access to alpha and beta versions 
  • be able to share your new superpowers in social media channel 
  • have access to a community of enthusiastic developers and users 

 

Our Team

Find out about our team  : 

 

Xavier Paulik
Tiki'Labs - CEO

Polytechnique School 

Xavier Paulik, our CEO, is the "brain" behind the scenes who orchestrates the developments of all our applications and solutions. 

 

www.tikimee.com/xavierpaulik
Mouhamed SEYE
Tiki'Labs - CTO

High Skilled Engineer


He masters the skills and knowledge needed in Symphony, Android, iOS, HTML5,  to churn out our applications bug free and regularly.. 


team.tikilabs.com/mouhamed-seye

Sandrine Mourao
Tiki'Labs - CMO

She is in charge of all marketing and most importantly making sure that we consistently exceed our customers expectations.

 team.tikilabs.com/sandrine-mourao

Nicolas Zumino
Tiki'Labs - International Biz Development

Warwick Business School+Political Sciences BA at IEP Aix-en-Provence


He finds new clients, innovative uses for our technology and make projects happen, in France and elsewhere..

 team.tikilabs.com/nicolas-zumino

story:
What is Royole-X? 


In short, Royole-X is the world's first foldable smart mobile theatre device. It offers the unprecedented theatrical experience that follows you everywhere, either you are in a college dorm, at home, or on a flight. 

From the very beginning, our goal is to address mismatch between large-screen, mind-blowing visual/sound effects and portability. Through a number of groundbreaking technologies, a remarkable industrial design and countless tailored details, we want to offer the ultimate long-time video watching and game playing experience without sacrifice. 

Built upon such philosophy, Royole-X is different from anybody else starting from its gene. It is not just yet another headset. It was designed to serve as a wearable PC, a foldable mobile theatre and a portable ultra-high pixel density display audio/video station. While we look at Royole-X today, this is what makes it unique from inside out. 

Achieving the target is never easy. From the inception of the idea, to the 6th version of prototypes, to manufacturing on our production line, today we are very excited that Royole-X has successfully made it.

We are proud to announce that with your help, Royole-X will be ready to be shipped in large volume to the United States in January 2016 and later to the world. 

Here we present Royole-X. See what you never saw.


Key Features


  • 3300 PPI - the world's finest display.

    Royole-X adopts groundbreaking display technology to enable the world's highest resolution display, with a pixel density of 3300 ppi, ~ 10X higher than advanced smartphone displays. There has never been a more clear and detailed screen on any consumer electronics products. A combination of high contrast ratio > 10000:1, wide color gamut, micro-second level response speed and 24-bit RGB color mode, makes every single frame absolutely stunning.

  •  Exceptional viewing experience. Finely personalized.

    We understand that the perfect viewing experience is more than just developing the world‘s most sophisticated wearable display. In creating Royole-X, our team of optical and human factor experts dedicated countless hours to creating the most eye-pleasing mobile cinema ever. 

  • Active noise-cancelling. Activate alternate reality.

    Royole-X’s first-class active noise control technology can achieve a noise reduction rating of up to 22dB, and the sound system and circuitry enables near-perfect audio fidelity with less than 1% sound distortion. Put on Royole-X, load up your favorite movies, music or games, and get ready for a truly out-of-this-world experience. 

  • Heavy-duty. Lightweight. Human-centric.

    To create the ultimate mobile theatre experience, every aspect of the Royole-X unit was designed with the user experience in mind. Our industrial designers went through numerous prototypes until we have finally arrived at the Royole-X in its current form: a lightweight All-in-One marvel crafted from materials of the highest quality and durability.

  • Touch wheel control at your fingertips.

    Royole-X OS is the most powerful operating system ever created for the mobile theatre. Take control of the world you are in with the intuitive touch wheel control at your fingertips.

  • Five sources. Infinite possibilities.

    Royole-X supports five video input connections, including HDMI, wireless streaming, Wi-Fi sharing, USB OTG, and a 16GB internal storage.

Display Technology


  • 3300 PPI ultra-high pixel density display.

    Inside Royole-X, the AMOLED display adopts a groundbreaking technology that brings a pixel density ~10X higher than leading-edge smartphone displays.There has never been a clearer, more detailed screen.

  • Stunning contrast > 10000:1.

    For each single frame, Royole-X renders splendid images of excellent quality in terms of contrast, brightness and color balance.

  • Micro-second level response speed.

    High performance image processing capability offers ultra-short response time, 1000X faster than traditional LCD display, resulting in completely blur-free video playback.

  • 24-bit RGB color mode.

    Royole-X preserves the color depth in every image with high bitrate data connection.

Viewing Experience


  • Ideal match to your vision.

    We want to share the joy of Royole-X with as many people as possible. Therefore, we engineered it to be adjustable for diopter and pupillary distance. Freed from the confines of corrective lenses, the world through Royole-X is an incredible beauty to behold.

  • Natural view. Strain-free.

    The human eye is at its most natural position when viewing -10° below the horizontal, and that is exactly how we have designed the Royole-X display to be. Now you can enjoy Royole-X all-day without ever needing to take a break.

  • Your mobile theatre. Your style.

    The silicone-sponge eye cover is customizable and can be replaced with one of the colors and shapes of your choice. It fits comfortably around your eyes, completely shielding you from the outside world.

Ergonomics


  • All-in-ONE. All comfort.

    To revolutionize the wearable display industry requires something that is both innovative and impeccably designed. The Royole-X is an artful unison of mobile display and noise-cancelling headset, with its entire weight distributed solely throughout the headband. This, by design, removes any discomfort from your nasal bridge while Royole-X is mounted.

  • All-axial ear cups for a more intimate fit.

    Over the Ear     Large ear cup fully encircles the entire ear without applying any excess pressure to the ear, ensuring maximum comfort throughout the day.

    Free Movement     All-axial ear cups provide a snug fit to your head and prevent any sound leakage.

    Replaceable Earpads     The cushion earpads are fully customizable and can be replaced with one of various sizes, shapes (circular, oval) and colors.

  • Premium leatherette. Premium touch.

    Putting on Royole-X for the first time, you will barely notice the earcup cushion pads as they sit comfortably on top of your skin. Made from the finest synthetic leatherette, the cushions convey minimal distractions to the viewing experience.
  • Ambience lighting.

    Ambience lighting on both sides of the earpiece comes to life the moment you turn Royole-X on, announcing its dominating presence to those left behind in the real world.
  • Radically innovative.

    From the very beginning, Royole’s goal has been to revolutionize the smart display industry, and this requires something unlike any others. What we have achieved in Royole-X, is one incredible experience that is at the convergence of the highest technical specifications and the most human-centric designs. This is evident in the hundreds of intellectual properties (including patents and knowhows) we have accumulated throughout the design and development process.

Royole-X OS


  • Royole-X OS and touch wheel control.

    Royole-X OS is invented and tailored to create a consistent and smooth software interface for mobile theatre while the touch wheel delivers the natural control of the hardware.

  • Fresh yet intuitive interface.

    With an easy to use menu and handsome graphical interface, the Royole-X OS makes the foundation for Royole-X. Unleash all the power built in the hardware with spontaneous control.

  • Take control with your fingertips.

    High precision touch sensing panel replaces any buttons. With just a rise of your hand, the touch wheel controller is simply by your side, on the right ear cup.
  •  6000 mAh high capacity battery.

    Paired with the ultra-high resolution and fast-response display, Royole-X owns a large 6000 mAh standalone battery. With a dynamic, optimized power management solution, Royole-X offers 5-7 hours of video playback.

When Will Royole-X Arrive


The idea of building a unique smart mobile theatre device first came to us two years ago. There have been a number of iterations before Royole-X is in its current form. We hope when we present it to the public, it would be absolutely stunning. On Sept 15th, 2015, we first announced Royole-X to the public. People's interests and excitement have been exploding ever since. Now we feel Royole-X is just one step away from reaching its consumers worldwide, and for that we need your help.

All the models shown in the videos, on the webpages were manufactured on our production line. At this point, we are ramping up the production volume. Here we share with you, how Royole-X is going to make its way from our factory to your home in January 2016.

We certainly would like to offer choices. Besides the classic white, Royole-X will also be coming in red and black. Here is a sneak peak of their real looks.

This is how Royole-X looks in real life. We are collecting feedback from early users of Royole-X everyday. Here we sincerely invite you to be part of it.

Pictures taken at our sold-out event in NYC October 13, 2015


Why We Launch This Campaign


People on Indiegogo from the globe are the people who scout for new experiences. We look forward to sharing Royole-X with you, see how you think of and use Royole-X. We are confident in the technology and design built into Royole-X, but we would like to hear from you what are your wishes. When you back us, you will be the first ones to receive Royole-X in just a few weeks and you will help it reach many others globally. It is happening, join us and we will be proud of having you on our side.


Rewards


Join us and we need your help to bring Royole-X to the world. Your support can be of different ways. Here is a list of rewards we offer.

You can pre-order Royole-X right away. It will arrive beginning from January 2016. Regular retail price of Royole-X will be at $699. 

Ok, so what is the Royole-X equation? It is a game of numbers about Royole-X. We have our geeky side after all. Accept the challenge to solve it? Join the community and share your answer. Or you can also get equation T-shirt, the answer sheet will be there.

Specifications


Royole-X's specifications are listed below. Let us know what you want to know more about Royole-X. We will certainly share with you.

About Us


Royole was founded with the mission to define the future of information display. Royole develops novel display technologies and related electronic products, and provides IP licenses, services and solutions to various industries associated with display applications.

In September 2015, Royole announced the world’s first foldable smart mobile theatre, an artful unison of world’s highest resolution mobile displays (3300ppi) and noise-cancelling headphone. 

In July 2015, Royole started mass production of flexible display modules and the proprietary flexible touch panels on Royole’s own production lines in Shenzhen. 

In August 2014, Royole introduced the world’s thinnest full-color flexible displays with a thickness of 0.01 mm and a bending radius of 1 mm.


Royole's products displayed on Time Square's billboard in NYC

The Company is led by a team of experienced technology experts and professionals from Stanford, Tsinghua and many other leading research institutions and Fortune Global 500 high-tech companies around the globe.

Royole operates in several major high-tech regions globally: Silicon Valley, US, Hong Kong and Shenzhen, China. Royole is backed by several of the world’s premier VC firms and investors since its inception.

The Top 10 US-China Most Innovative Entrepreneurs - by Forbes
Royole Corporation in press


Our Vision



Man-kind has been wishing for the power to create intangible illusion or display of objects since ancient times. Recently, technology was advancing at such a speed that we transitioned from the traditional CRT, to LCD, the popular 3D display, novel head mounted display, and further move towards holographic display, transparent display, and flexible display, etc. Each revolution along the way is a reflection of our wisdom and creativity. It is also a proof that people’s innovation is always beyond their imagination. Technology, by its definition, should bring convenience and experiences to people without the sacrifice of becoming difficult or complicated. In the field of display, one question has raised to the top: how do we balance the need for high-definition, large-screen viewing experience with the need for ultimate mobility? This is the mission for Royole-X, as well as our rollable flexible display and touch technologies, to break such trade-off, to serve this part of human nature.

At Royole, we do not predict the future, we invent the future!


Our Promises


All the models shown in the videos, on the webpages were manufactured on our production line. At this point, we are ready to meet the estimated delivery schedule to customers in United States, and are currently ramping up the production volume every day to let Royole-X reach users worldwide as soon as possible. We will put all of our efforts to forecast demand and keep up with production plan and we will keep our supporters updated on any development of our production.

Over the past two years, we have assembled an experienced product team and established a reliable supply chain. However, unexpected shortages and delays of components can negatively affect our shipping schedule. On the slim chance that this happens, we will keep our supporters informed and work to quickly solve any issue.

Royole-X coming out from our production line.


Frequently Asked Questions


  • Can I connect Royole-X to my game console?

    Yes, you sure can. Royole-X supports HDMI so you can connect it easily with XBOX, PS4 or any other game console and play your favorite games on it.

  • Can I connect Royole-X to my smartphone?

    Yes and Royole-X supports a number of ways to connect. One is with HDMI cable. What you will need is a connector for iOS or Android device to connect through HDMI. Another way, for both iOS and Android devices, is by wireless casting, which allows you push videos from your phone to Royole-X as long as they are under the same Wi-Fi network. Android devices also have native support for wireless screen-mirroring and multi-screen interaction, that works with Royole-X.
    Wireless file sharing is another option too.

  • What is the resolution of video that Royole-X can support?

    Royole-X is compatible with playing HD, FHD and UHD videos in Royole-X OS. 

  • Can I use Royole-X as headphones and turn off the displays?

    Yes. In music mode, the displays can either show the lyrics for the songs or be turned off.

  • Can people wearing prescription eyeglasses use Royole-X without getting contact lenses?

    Yes. We designed the optics to make sure Royole-X can adjust for nearsightedness and farsightedness independently for each eye. It also comes with interpupillary distance (IPD) adjustment to deliver the optimal visual experience.

  • How much is Royole-X?

    The retail price for Royole-X will be at $699. Now it is available on Indiegogo for $599.

  • When will Royole-X be available?

    We have already started mass production and sales since September 2015 in China. We will start to ship Royole-X to customers in January 2016.

  • How do I select color when I put the order?

    When it is close to shipment, we will send out emails to get more detailed shipping information. As a contributor, you will be able to specify the color for the device, and make other necessary change to the shipping information then.
story_txt:
What is Royole-X? In short, Royole-X is the world's first foldable smart mobile theatre device. It offers the unprecedented theatrical experience that follows you everywhere, either you are in a college dorm, at home, or on a flight. From the very beginning, our goal is to address mismatch between large-screen, mind-blowing visual/sound effects and portability. Through a number of groundbreaking technologies, a remarkable industrial design and countless tailored details, we want to offer the ultimate long-time video watching and game playing experience without sacrifice. Built upon such philosophy, Royole-X is different from anybody else starting from its gene. It is not just yet another headset. It was designed to serve as a wearable PC, a foldable mobile theatre and a portable ultra-high pixel density display audio/video station. While we look at Royole-X today, this is what makes it unique from inside out. Achieving the target is never easy. From the inception of the idea, to the 6th version of prototypes, to manufacturing on our production line, today we are very excited that Royole-X has successfully made it.We are proud to announce that with your help, Royole-X will be ready to be shipped in large volume to the United States in January 2016 and later to the world. Here we present Royole-X. See what you never saw.Key Features
3300 PPI - the world's finest display.Royole-X adopts groundbreaking display technology to enable the world's highest resolution display, with a pixel density of 3300 ppi, ~ 10X higher than advanced smartphone displays. There has never been a more clear and detailed screen on any consumer electronics products. A combination of high contrast ratio > 10000:1, wide color gamut, micro-second level response speed and 24-bit RGB color mode, makes every single frame absolutely stunning.
 Exceptional viewing experience. Finely personalized.We understand that the perfect viewing experience is more than just developing the world‘s most sophisticated wearable display. In creating Royole-X, our team of optical and human factor experts dedicated countless hours to creating the most eye-pleasing mobile cinema ever. 

Active noise-cancelling. Activate alternate reality.Royole-X’s first-class active noise control technology can achieve a noise reduction rating of up to 22dB, and the sound system and circuitry enables near-perfect audio fidelity with less than 1% sound distortion. Put on Royole-X, load up your favorite movies, music or games, and get ready for a truly out-of-this-world experience. 

Heavy-duty. Lightweight. Human-centric.To create the ultimate mobile theatre experience, every aspect of the Royole-X unit was designed with the user experience in mind. Our industrial designers went through numerous prototypes until we have finally arrived at the Royole-X in its current form: a lightweight All-in-One marvel crafted from materials of the highest quality and durability.

Touch wheel control at your fingertips.Royole-X OS is the most powerful operating system ever created for the mobile theatre. Take control of the world you are in with the intuitive touch wheel control at your fingertips.

Five sources. Infinite possibilities.Royole-X supports five video input connections, including HDMI, wireless streaming, Wi-Fi sharing, USB OTG, and a 16GB internal storage.
Display Technology
3300 PPI ultra-high pixel density display.Inside Royole-X, the AMOLED display adopts a groundbreaking technology that brings a pixel density ~10X higher than leading-edge smartphone displays.There has never been a clearer, more detailed screen.

Stunning contrast > 10000:1.For each single frame, Royole-X renders splendid images of excellent quality in terms of contrast, brightness and color balance.

Micro-second level response speed.High performance image processing capability offers ultra-short response time, 1000X faster than traditional LCD display, resulting in completely blur-free video playback.

24-bit RGB color mode.Royole-X preserves the color depth in every image with high bitrate data connection.
Viewing Experience
Ideal match to your vision.We want to share the joy of Royole-X with as many people as possible. Therefore, we engineered it to be adjustable for diopter and pupillary distance. Freed from the confines of corrective lenses, the world through Royole-X is an incredible beauty to behold.

Natural view. Strain-free.The human eye is at its most natural position when viewing -10° below the horizontal, and that is exactly how we have designed the Royole-X display to be. Now you can enjoy Royole-X all-day without ever needing to take a break.

Your mobile theatre. Your style.The silicone-sponge eye cover is customizable and can be replaced with one of the colors and shapes of your choice. It fits comfortably around your eyes, completely shielding you from the outside world.
Ergonomics
All-in-ONE. All comfort.To revolutionize the wearable display industry requires something that is both innovative and impeccably designed. The Royole-X is an artful unison of mobile display and noise-cancelling headset, with its entire weight distributed solely throughout the headband. This, by design, removes any discomfort from your nasal bridge while Royole-X is mounted.

All-axial ear cups for a more intimate fit.Over the Ear Large ear cup fully encircles the entire ear without applying any excess pressure to the ear, ensuring maximum comfort throughout the day.Free Movement All-axial ear cups provide a snug fit to your head and prevent any sound leakage.Replaceable Earpads The cushion earpads are fully customizable and can be replaced with one of various sizes, shapes (circular, oval) and colors.


Premium leatherette. Premium touch.Putting on Royole-X for the first time, you will barely notice the earcup cushion pads as they sit comfortably on top of your skin. Made from the finest synthetic leatherette, the cushions convey minimal distractions to the viewing experience.
Ambience lighting.Ambience lighting on both sides of the earpiece comes to life the moment you turn Royole-X on, announcing its dominating presence to those left behind in the real world.
Radically innovative.From the very beginning, Royole’s goal has been to revolutionize the smart display industry, and this requires something unlike any others. What we have achieved in Royole-X, is one incredible experience that is at the convergence of the highest technical specifications and the most human-centric designs. This is evident in the hundreds of intellectual properties (including patents and knowhows) we have accumulated throughout the design and development process.

Royole-X OS

Royole-X OS and touch wheel control.Royole-X OS is invented and tailored to create a consistent and smooth software interface for mobile theatre while the touch wheel delivers the natural control of the hardware.

Fresh yet intuitive interface.With an easy to use menu and handsome graphical interface, the Royole-X OS makes the foundation for Royole-X. Unleash all the power built in the hardware with spontaneous control.

Take control with your fingertips.High precision touch sensing panel replaces any buttons. With just a rise of your hand, the touch wheel controller is simply by your side, on the right ear cup. 6000 mAh high capacity battery.Paired with the ultra-high resolution and fast-response display, Royole-X owns a large 6000 mAh standalone battery. With a dynamic, optimized power management solution, Royole-X offers 5-7 hours of video playback.

When Will Royole-X ArriveThe idea of building a unique smart mobile theatre device first came to us two years ago. There have been a number of iterations before Royole-X is in its current form. We hope when we present it to the public, it would be absolutely stunning. On Sept 15th, 2015, we first announced Royole-X to the public. People's interests and excitement have been exploding ever since. Now we feel Royole-X is just one step away from reaching its consumers worldwide, and for that we need your help.
Press conference for the announcement of Royole-XAll the models shown in the videos, on the webpages were manufactured on our production line. At this point, we are ramping up the production volume. Here we share with you, how Royole-X is going to make its way from our factory to your home in January 2016.
Royole-X in white, from factory to your homeWe certainly would like to offer choices. Besides the classic white, Royole-X will also be coming in red and black. Here is a sneak peak of their real looks.
Royole-X in black
Royole-X in redThis is how Royole-X looks in real life. We are collecting feedback from early users of Royole-X everyday. Here we sincerely invite you to be part of it.
Testing Royole-X
Royole-X in real lifePictures taken at our sold-out event in NYC October 13, 2015Why We Launch This CampaignPeople on Indiegogo from the globe are the people who scout for new experiences. We look forward to sharing Royole-X with you, see how you think of and use Royole-X. We are confident in the technology and design built into Royole-X, but we would like to hear from you what are your wishes. When you back us, you will be the first ones to receive Royole-X in just a few weeks and you will help it reach many others globally. It is happening, join us and we will be proud of having you on our side.RewardsJoin us and we need your help to bring Royole-X to the world. Your support can be of different ways. Here is a list of rewards we offer.You can pre-order Royole-X right away. It will arrive beginning from January 2016. Regular retail price of Royole-X will be at $699. 



Ok, so what is the Royole-X equation? It is a game of numbers about Royole-X. We have our geeky side after all. Accept the challenge to solve it? Join the community and share your answer. Or you can also get equation T-shirt, the answer sheet will be there.
SpecificationsRoyole-X's specifications are listed below. Let us know what you want to know more about Royole-X. We will certainly share with you.



About Us
Royole was founded with the mission to define the future of information display. Royole develops novel display technologies and related electronic products, and provides IP licenses, services and solutions to various industries associated with display applications.
In September 2015, Royole announced the world’s first foldable smart mobile theatre, an artful unison of world’s highest resolution mobile displays (3300ppi) and noise-cancelling headphone. 
In July 2015, Royole started mass production of flexible display modules and the proprietary flexible touch panels on Royole’s own production lines in Shenzhen. 
In August 2014, Royole introduced the world’s thinnest full-color flexible displays with a thickness of 0.01 mm and a bending radius of 1 mm.



Royole's products displayed on Time Square's billboard in NYC
The Company is led by a team of experienced technology experts and professionals from Stanford, Tsinghua and many other leading research institutions and Fortune Global 500 high-tech companies around the globe.
Royole operates in several major high-tech regions globally: Silicon Valley, US, Hong Kong and Shenzhen, China. Royole is backed by several of the world’s premier VC firms and investors since its inception.


The Top 10 US-China Most Innovative Entrepreneurs - by Forbes
Royole Corporation in press

Our Vision


Man-kind has been wishing for the power to create intangible illusion or display of objects since ancient times. Recently, technology was advancing at such a speed that we transitioned from the traditional CRT, to LCD, the popular 3D display, novel head mounted display, and further move towards holographic display, transparent display, and flexible display, etc. Each revolution along the way is a reflection of our wisdom and creativity. It is also a proof that people’s innovation is always beyond their imagination. Technology, by its definition, should bring convenience and experiences to people without the sacrifice of becoming difficult or complicated. In the field of display, one question has raised to the top: how do we balance the need for high-definition, large-screen viewing experience with the need for ultimate mobility? This is the mission for Royole-X, as well as our rollable flexible display and touch technologies, to break such trade-off, to serve this part of human nature.
At Royole, we do not predict the future, we invent the future!

Our Promises


All the models shown in the videos, on the webpages were manufactured on our production line. At this point, we are ready to meet the estimated delivery schedule to customers in United States, and are currently ramping up the production volume every day to let Royole-X reach users worldwide as soon as possible. We will put all of our efforts to forecast demand and keep up with production plan and we will keep our supporters updated on any development of our production.
Over the past two years, we have assembled an experienced product team and established a reliable supply chain. However, unexpected shortages and delays of components can negatively affect our shipping schedule. On the slim chance that this happens, we will keep our supporters informed and work to quickly solve any issue.


Royole-X coming out from our production line.

Frequently Asked Questions




Can I connect Royole-X to my game console?Yes, you sure can. Royole-X supports HDMI so you can connect it easily with
XBOX, PS4 or any other game console and play your favorite games on it.



Can I connect Royole-X to my smartphone?Yes and Royole-X supports a number of ways to connect. One is with HDMI cable.
What you will need is a connector for iOS or Android device to connect through
HDMI. Another way, for both iOS and Android devices, is by wireless casting,
which allows you push videos from your phone to Royole-X as long as they are
under the same Wi-Fi network. Android devices also have native support for
wireless screen-mirroring and multi-screen interaction, that works with
Royole-X.Wireless file sharing is another option too.



What is the resolution of video that Royole-X can support?Royole-X is compatible with playing HD, FHD and UHD videos in Royole-X OS. 



Can I use Royole-X as headphones and turn off the displays?Yes. In music mode, the displays can either show the lyrics for the songs or be
turned off.



Can people wearing prescription eyeglasses use Royole-X without getting contact
lenses?Yes. We designed the optics to make sure Royole-X can adjust for
nearsightedness and farsightedness independently for each eye. It also comes
with interpupillary distance (IPD) adjustment to deliver the optimal visual
experience.



How much is Royole-X?The retail price for Royole-X will be at $699. Now it is available on Indiegogo
for $599.



When will Royole-X be available?We have already started mass production and sales since September 2015 in China. We will start to ship Royole-X to customers in January 2016.



How do I select color when I put the order?When it is close to shipment, we will send out emails to get more detailed
shipping information. As a contributor, you will be able to specify the color
for the device, and make other necessary change to the shipping information
then.

story:
The only backpack that can bring your next-generation laptop from dead to full and then some. Leave your wall charger at home and stay charged on the go.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

TSA friendly laptop compartment - open the backpack to 180 degrees and leave your laptop in your backpack at TSA checkpoints.

Convenient Trolley Pocket for you to slide your bag on your suitcase.

 

 

 

Water resistant polyester throughout entire backpack. Keep your belongings dry in the rain.

Protect-Pocket keeps your glasses and phone extra safe, and provides RFID fraud protection.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Any time a new project is developed, there are inherent risks and challenges in the process. With our expertise in portable power, and the success of our first generation backpack, the TYLT team is confident in this product and will work to ensure that the product lives up to all our expectations and is delivered to you in a timely manner.

We will continue to keep our backers in the loop with frequent updates on the development of our product throughout the entire campaign process, and provide you with unique insights into the development, production testing and fulfillment process.

story:
FAQ

Product

What is it?
Fancy is the smallest, lightest, and the most stylish camera stabilizer for smartphones. It also has a built-in powerbank to charge your devices on the go.

Is it 1-axis, 2-axis or 3-axis gimbal?
Fancy is a 1-axis gimbal, sure to meet your day to day needs.

Why do you have a sticker mount on some promo photos and videos?

The sticker mount was part of our early prototypes. We received feedback that the sticker mount is not a good solution, and so we decided not to move forward with it. We want to create products that people will love and use and we believe that the phone clip mount is the best solution for mounting Fancy on different smartphones. 

Where can we buy it?
We are currently taking pre-orders right here on Indiegogo. Pre-order yours today to be one of the first people to get Fancy!

What colors do you offer?
Fancy is available in Rose Gold, Sky Gray, Jade Green, Moonlight Silver, and Black Ink. You can select the color you want at check out.

What are the dimensions and weight?
Fancy is 113mm x 43.5mm x 23mm and weighs only 180 grams.

What is the battery life? Hours of continuous use? How to charge?
The battery capacity is 2600mAh. Fancy comes with a micro USB cord for charging. Plug it in a power source and get a full charge in just 2 hours. A full charge can last up to 8 hours of continuous use.

Why is Fancy so unique?
Unlike our competitors, Fancy is slim and not bulky. It also comes in nice and stylish colors.

How do I charge my devices with it?
The USB port is located on the side. Simply plug in a USB charging cable with your device.

 

Shipping

When does shipping begin?
Shipping will begin on April 2017.

Where does it ship?
We ship worldwide, and shipping costs are automatically calculated when you pre-order.

What are the risks and challenges of getting Fancy today?
While the technology behind Fancy is developed and tested, there are risks with production at every step of the way. We have done a lot of hard work in getting the product through the tooling process and getting ready for scale. As we go through the logistics of manufacturing in large scale, there is always a possibility of unforeseen events that could impact our timeline. If an issue arises, we will continue to be transparent to you - our loyal supporters, and honor the quality and expectations set for Fancy.

 

Customer Service

Is there a warranty?
We offer a 1-year warranty for any defective devices. Just send your Fancy back to us and we'll replace your unit, free of charge.

What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign?
During the Indiegogo campaign, you can process the refund at any time. See these steps on How to Request a Refund.

At some point when the campaign ends, we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.

How do I get more than one perk?
To get more than one perk, simply make a new contribution for each perk. Currently, there is no option on Indiegogo to combine perks.

How can I check the status of my pre-order?
Log in to your Indiegogo account and look under My Contributions.

How can I reach out to your team?
You can email us at crowdfund@wewowgimbal.com if you have any questions, or you can post a comment here.

Why are you crowdfunding?
Fancy is fully functional and ready for market. We are asking for your contribution to manufacture the device in large scale, and get them into your hands, our early adopters, sooner!

story:
SMART COFFEE FIRST MOBILE DEVICE TO PREPARE COFFEE

DRINK COFFEE EVERYWHERE

SMART COFFEE the only device in the world for your smartphone or tablet that prepares you hot coffee ready in a few seconds everywhere, moreover it's also a social network!

REVOLUTIONARY PATENTED MAKING COFFEE!!!
    ITALIAN PATENT   

     


                                          

What can SMART COFFEE  do?

1) prepare a hot coffee whenever and wherever you want;

2) two different kind of coffee: espresso or black coffee.

3) with the included SMART COFFEE social network in the app you can chat with friends and share video, audio, photos, messages .....

4)  it is also a cover and protects your smartphone or tablet;

5)  it is also a battery charger case for your smartphone or tablet.             


HOW DOES SMART COFFEE WORK?

- enter the coffee capsule in the device and leave it there!

- when you need coffee dose you must start the app!

- click on the button"PREPARE COFFEE" and after about 90 seconds, a very hot coffee will be ready.

- extract the capsule, remove the protection lid and you can drink your SMART COFFEE.

- now if you can invite friends to drink coffee, with the social network included in the app, besides you can chat with them, and certainly   we will be in a lot!


                                       

                                                                                                                                                                  

                 

The coffee is produced by a big italian Trade of coffee and distribuited with the SMART COFFEE name, worldwide. 


CONNECTABLE DEVICES

   

As seen on:

           

WHY HAVE WE ADD THIS IDEA?

We thought about the two things to which man would never give up, that are: coffee and smartphone!

We wanted to make coffee more SMART and the smartphone HEALTHIER FOR THE BODY.

We have combined the physical, psychic need of coffee and the relationship with the social network; in this way has SMART COFFEE born.....

The first device in the world that prepares you a coffee and makes you communicate.

Our team has worked hard for a whole year, and with great difficulty, it has not been easy but WE SUCCEEDED IN IT!!!!!


                 WHERE CAN YOU USE IT?                 


                        



WHAT IS THERE IN THE BOX?

- 1 device SMART COFFEE for your smartphone or tablet;

- 1 battery charger;

- 100 complimentary coffees;

(the app SMART COFFEE you can download free from  "App store"  at the end of campaign)                        

                                                             

     COMPATIBILITY

   iOS

                                                                  

      CONNECTIVITY

                


ADVANTAGES

- you can make coffee everywhere;

- you can communicate with friends;

- it is exclusive;

- it is cool;

- with one charge do you prepare about 30 coffee;

- it has also an inside battery to charge your smartphone or tablet;

- it is pocket;

- it is easy to use;

- the coffee cost half the one of a coffee shop, and they will always be good;

- it is   

- it is safe and of high quality;

- it will be available for various smartphones and tablets.


PROTOTYPES

We have already several patents and trademarks registered. We have real working prototypes,  with which we are already preparing the coffees and, besides, we are improving the social network.

This campaign is based on SMART COFFEE, our already real, invention it exists, it is real !

The first device in the world that prepares you a coffee today exists and it can be yours !!!!!

SMART COFFEE comply with the safety standards and certifications.


FUTURE PLANS

The next project is the one to prepare other coffee tastes like vanilla coffee, chocolate coffee, ginseng coffee, and coffee whit a dash of liqueur and we are studying to create other types of drinks.

START PRODUCTION

We need your help to start mass production, SMART COFFEE project  is ready !

We planned to deliver the first SMART COFFEE devices by Christmas 2014, but there is not enough time to do it, so the first shipments will take place in 2015; in the way, at last you can present your selves or other people the first smartphone device in the world to prepare the coffee everywhere.

The price of a coffee made by a SMART COFFEE will be about half the one of a coffee shop, they will be sold in individual or multiple units and we will find them for sale in various shops from the hi-tech to the grocery shop and of course ON-LINE !


   SHIPPING

THANKS

A lot of  thanks to everyone right now that will help us and will advertise our device by word of mouth to be more and more in many.

HOW TO PARTICIPATE IN OUR PROJECT

Get the SMART COFFEE device, download the app and begin to prepare the coffee and communicate with your friends with the social network.

You can  choose the model and color of all your SMART COFFEE at the end of the campaign Indiegogo, we will send out an opinion survey to our backers.

TECH SPECS

- shell in plastic material of the highest quality;

- internal battery;

- connectivity via bluetooth and cable;

- capsule coffee inserter;

- Compact and lightweight.

QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS

1)  Where can i pre order the SMART COFFEE?

 The SMART COFFEE can be pre order on Indiegogo and on our website WWW.SMARTCOFFEE.IT

2)  It is real?

 It is real, finally the smartphone that can also prepare you the coffee!

3)  The coffee is really hot?

 Yes it is very hot!

4)  Is it available on my smartphone/tablet?

 Yes it will be product for  smartphones and tablets.

5)  Will i receive my SMART COFFEE device?

    All of you will receive your SMART COFFEE device, OTHERWISE YOU WILL BE REFUNDED !!!!!

                                       

THANKS YOU

What can SMART COFFEE  do?

different kind of coffee: espresso or black coffee.

included SMART COFFEE social network in the app you can chat with
friends and share video, audio, photos, messages .....

also a cover and protects your smartphone or tablet;

CONNECTABLE DEVICES

WHY HAVE WE ADD
THIS IDEA?

about the two things to which man would never give up, that are: coffee and
smartphone!

combined the physical, psychic need of coffee and the relationship with the
social network; in this way has SMART COFFEE born.....
The first device
in the world that prepares you a coffee and makes you communicate.Our
team has worked hard for a whole year, and with great difficulty, it has not
been easy but WE SUCCEEDED IN IT!!!!!                 WHERE CAN YOU USE IT?                                         WHAT IS THERE
IN THE BOX?
- 1 device SMART COFFEE for your
smartphone or tablet;

- 100 complimentary coffees;
(the app SMART COFFEE you can
download free from  "App store"  at the end of campaign)                                                                                           COMPATIBILITY
   iOS

ADVANTAGES

friends;

prepare about 30 coffee;

charge your smartphone or tablet;

- the coffee cost half the one of
a coffee shop, and they will always be good;
- it is

smartphones and tablets.


PROTOTYPES
We have already
several patents and trademarks registered. We have real
working prototypes,  with which we are already preparing the coffees and,
besides, we are improving the social network.
This campaign
is based on SMART COFFEE, our already real, invention it exists, it is real !
The first device
in the world that prepares you a coffee today exists and it can be yours !!!!!
SMART COFFEE comply with the safety standards and
certifications.




FUTURE PLANS
The next
project is the one to prepare other coffee tastes like vanilla coffee,
chocolate coffee, ginseng coffee, and coffee whit a dash of liqueur and we are
studying to create other types of drinks.
START
PRODUCTION
We need your
help to start mass production, SMART COFFEE project  is ready !


We planned to
deliver the first SMART COFFEE devices by Christmas 2014, but there is not
enough time to do it, so the first shipments will take place in 2015; in the
way, at last you can present your selves or other people the first smartphone
device in the world to prepare the coffee everywhere.
The price of a coffee made by a SMART COFFEE will be about half the one of a coffee shop, they will be sold in individual or multiple units and we will find them for sale in various shops from the hi-tech to the grocery shop and of course ON-LINE !

THANKS


A lot of  thanks to everyone right now that will help us and will
advertise our device by word of mouth to be more and more in many.
HOW TO
PARTICIPATE IN OUR PROJECT

COFFEE device, download the app and begin to prepare the coffee and
communicate with your friends with the social network.
You can 
choose the model and color of all your SMART COFFEE at the end of the campaign
Indiegogo, we will send out an opinion survey to our backers.
TECH SPECS

quality;
- internal battery;

- capsule coffee inserter;
- Compact and lightweight.
QUESTIONS AND
ANSWERS

on Indiegogo and on our website WWW.SMARTCOFFEE.IT

real?

coffee is really hot?
