available on my smartphone/tablet?
 Yes it will be product for  smartphones and tablets.
5)  Will i
receive my SMART COFFEE device?
    All of you will receive your SMART COFFEE device, OTHERWISE YOU WILL BE REFUNDED !!!!!

                                       
THANKS YOU

story:
LYNQ is a 6-in-1 no-nonsense wireless charging hub that combines: 

  • A Qi wireless charger eliminating chords and their inconveniences.
  • A 2 x 3.5W built-in Bluetooth speaker with volume controls and a signature sound profile ensuring all audio sounds great.
  • A built-in omnidirectional microphone with a three-meter radius for hands-free calls and noise-cancelling technology letting all parties hear and be heard.
  • A four-port USB 3.0 Hub with 6.2A capacity and USB-C compatibility providing a plethora of connections to laptops or desktops through just one port, allowing easy charging and data transfers.
  • A cable-concealer with grooves beneath the device managing unsightly cables and preventing chord tangles.
  • A writing utensil holder providing for quick note-taking and drawing.

Our team has logged a lot of hours at their desks. They knew from experience a device six-car pileup on your desk is tolerable in the short-term, tiring to navigate around for hours on end. 

Modern, multitasking life requires a lot of equipment: USB hubs, USB C converters, USB cables, chargers, speakers, speakerphones, pen holders etc. Everyone wants to be prepared without being bogged down. 

We created LYNQ out of our own need to simply and elegantly consolidate our tech lives into one device we could rely on throughout the day.

It’s made our desks cleaner, our gadget load lighter and our lives easier. We think it will do the same for you. 

 

 As a subsidiary of Labmade Limited, BCXLAB has an in-house department with more than 30 years of experience in electronics conception, development and production management.

BCXLAB was founded in October 2016 as an independent business unit to create and commercialize products that enhance the way you live with your tech.

After a successful trade show in October 2016 at the Hong Kong Global Sources Electronic Show Startup Launchpad, we received a lot of press coverage of our concept LYNQ. 

We're off to a flying start in 2017, making LYNQ a reality and aiming for mass production through our first Kickstarter project.

We are a young company but we aim for the future!

Risks and challenges

We pride ourselves on our manufacturing expertise and technical know-how due to our co-founders’ 20 years of experience in this area. We have tested our initial batch and are working with a manufacturing partner that we trust and have worked with in the past. We are confident that we can deliver LYNQ to you on time - if we experience delays, or any surprises happen, we’ll be sure to keep our backers up to date.

story:
(Early view of login screen)
Introducing IMPACT - The Next generation OS

Do you wish you had an Operating system that was better than Windows 7 or 8? Do you wish you had the option to actually talk to your computer and tell it what to do and what to type, instead of having to type those 1,000 word essays on your keyboard or read a very long eBook but you would rather it be read to you? The answer is finally here: IMPACT

IMPACT is the world most intelligent, advanced, and also the worlds first talking operating system! It also learns as you talk and use it. For example: If John wakes up every day at 8 A.M. for work and checks his email and the news before he goes, the computer will boot up and open up his online email or email client as well as his favorite news website, all before his alarm even goes off. The IMPACT system knows to do all of this because it taught itself that John does this every morning. This results in a great amount of time saved in John's morning.

The above example was just one of the literally millions and millions of tasks and procedures that the IMPACT system can do on a computer. The possibilities are virtually endless!


What's Under The Hood

Familiar Setup:

Whether your coming from Windows or from a Mac, IMPACT will be familiar to you. A Start-like menu is used that you will recognize immediately, and our state of the art searching feature is closely identical to Apple's Spotlight search function. We're very excited on how easy it will be to switch from a Windows or a Mac, to the IMPACT system.

Say Goodbye To Antivirus Software: 

Because IMPACT's backbone is Linux, this means that you never have to worry about getting a virus again! In fact, you don't even need anti-spyware or anti-virus software!

Fully Customizable:

We have made an Operating System that will revolutionize the way we do work and play. Not only does it have all the customization options of a Mac and of Windows, but it has much more. Such as the ability to talk to it and learn from your previous behavior. Also, every single thing, including the little things, are customizable. From the cursor, to the way IMPACT boots up, and everything between and beyond your imagination, is customizable. 


    Absolutely 100% Free

    The IMPACT Operating System is free. There are no hidden fees, blocked features, or trial period (and also no terrible trial software that comes with OS's like Windows). The software, optional updates, and necessary bug fixes are 100% free!

    Free Apps:

    The IMPACT system if free, and so are the apps! Every app you could possibly think of is available through the IMPACT system's app store, and a vast majority of them are free! New apps are being developed daily so there is no shortage of apps, and no limit to creativity!


      Where The Idea Came From

      The idea came when one day were were sitting at our computers, agitated at Windows 8. It wasn't built for desktops in our opinion, but for tablets. And even though we love Windows 7, we needed something more. Something smarter, something that knows your next move, something very interactive. And so, IMPACT was born.

      We chose to have IMPACT's backbone as linux because it offers a tremendous amount of customization options, as well as great compatibility with users existing hardware. We look forward to continuously give back to the Linux Community to constantly say thank you.


        Looking Towards The Future & Beyond (Planned Features)

        Some of the work we plan for the future involves improvement of the IMPACT system and it's features. But we are most excited about our powerful line of Compact Desktops and Notebooks. These computers will have the highest quality components, and be made out of the highest quality materials.

        We plan to release many more innovative and new products in the coming years, so stay tuned!

story:
we do have working prototype 

please watch video of prototype to know how it works

or you can listen our interview on podcast 

This idea started six months back at our college library  . There are 50 PCs, all of them with wireless mouse  and one or the other mouse's battery surely dies in between exams, presentations or any important work . 

So i started a project with two of my students to make a mouse which generates energy and charges itself. The mechanism for that is pretty simple. Inside the mouse we put a magnet ( one like on your fridge ) between a coil of copper wire . Whenever the mouse moves that magnet moves between the coil, it produces small amount of electricity which charges the internal battery. We made our first prototype with our electrical engineering department and we are working very hard on our final design 

Making these 55 mouse was easy as it takes 2 hours to make one and we had help from our students but now we want to produce them in large numbers. To decrease the R&D cost per unit, we need to produce minimum 1000 mouse.

final product which we will be shipping will be available in five colors . ( At end of campaign we will be sending email survey to all of funders to decide which color they want . )


 Other important Features:

  • Super thin 2.4GHz wireless Mouse
  • Smooth surface and somatological design
  • 16 wireless working channels, automatic frequency jumping
  • The dongle can be stored inside the mouse when not in use. and it no need driver plug and play
  • With On/Off power switch
  • Frequency:2405MHZ-2475MHZ
  • Max rate: 28inch/s
  • Adjustable DIP: 800/1200/1600
Thanks for taking intrest . We wellcome all the sugetions. 

Do share and tell your friends about this campaign .

story:
Check out the latest review of the LithiumCard PRO by AppleTechSpot


LITHIUMCARD PRO IN THE PRESS:


Over 500 contributors in 3 days!
Thank You for your continued support. 

---



1-2-3 CHALLENGE.

LinearFlux's product philosophy is that form follows function. But most importantly, we place a high emphasis on the SPEED of charge. Our Engineers were faced with a design principle that was coined the 1-2-3 challenge. At the time it seemed impossible. After countless hours of intensive development we succeeded.

Our Unparalleled R&D Efforts Resulted In:

1  Full charge on an iPhone 6
2 Times the thickness of the original LithiumCard but 3 times the capacity
3 Amps of class-leading power. It's equivalent to the combined speed of 3 Apple iPhone wall chargers. It means less time waiting, up to a third of the wait for a full charge!

——— 


EVOLUTION.

Presenting the evolution of the HyperCharger. The LithiumCard Pro. It still has all the cables you need, but now with 3 Amps of Power. 3000mAh of capacity. Plus sharing and sync capabilities. 


See how it works below:


——— 


TURNED UP TO "11".

Our latest HyperFET Gen2 technology has pushed the envelope of what's possible today. Nothing in its class, or size, can deliver up to 3 Amps of power. The PRO has been future proofed to meet the ever increasing power demand of smartphones today and tomorrow.

For example, the Apple iPhone 6 PLUS can actually demand over double the power (2 Amps) than the 1 Amp charger it comes with. The LithiumCard PRO can deliver up to 3 Amps of total power. As future generations of smartphones require more power, the PRO is more than ready to handle higher power demands with ease. 


See how the PRO outperforms below:




——— 


HYPERPORT.

Specifically developed to be compatible with the new Apple Watch!

The PRO's exclusive HyperPort feature enables you to charge another USB equipped device. Just plug your own USB charging cable (not included) into the PRO's additional USB port to share HyperCharging with your friends.

——— 


CHARGE AHEAD.

HyperFET Gen2 circuitry is capable of charging your smartphone over 1% per minute compared to the original LithiumCard. For example, if the LithiumCard PRO is left to charge your smartphone for 15 minutes, expect up to 15% of more in additional battery capacity.

Advanced HyperCharging battery management algorithm extends the battery capacity beyond its 3000mAh rating. Meaning, you get more capacity than typical 3000mAh battery chargers.

——— 


BUILT IN.

The LithiumCard PRO has all the cables you'll ever need. Use the full size USB to charge the internal battery. Pull-out the microUSB, or Apple Lightning (sold separately), to charge your Apple iOS, or Android devices. As with the original LithiumCard, the cables for the PRO can be hidden away when not in use.

——— 


STAY CONNECTED.

LithiumCard PRO is available in either Apple Lightning, or microUSB, connectors. The microUSB connector works with many Android smartphones available today. The Apple Lightning connector works with all Apple iOS devices requiring a Lightning connector to charge. 

*Apple Lightning and microUSB versions are sold separately

——— 


Backing up your smartphone's data to your computer has never been easier. There's no need to carry another separate cable for syncing data to your computer ever again. The PRO does it all.

——— 


SIMULTANEOUS CHARGING.

If both your phone and the LithiumCard are out of charge, we have a unique bypass charging system, which allows you to simultaneously charge a smartphone and the LithiumCard's internal battery.

——— 

CHARGE EVERYTHING.

LithiumCard charges most popular smartphones and electronic devices available today, such as Beats Wireless headphones or Jawbone Jambox. It has an Apple Lightning connector for your iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 PLUS, or a microUSB connector, for your Android phone.

———

 

NANOSTIK.

Without using adhesives, NanoStik, utlizing nanosuction technology keeps the LithiumCard virtually stuck to your device. Over time, the NanoStik may get dirty, simply rinse with warm water to keep it at its maximum "stickyness".

——— 


POWER LEVEL.

Pressing the power button also indicates LithiumCard's power level. The precision nano-refractive lens display will say it all.

White: Over 90% charged
Blue: Over 10% charged
Red: Less than 10% charged.

——— 

BEST IN CLASS.


——— 


WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

We are nearly complete with the development of the LithiumCard PRO. We are all very excited to be about 5 weeks away from going into full production. With your support we can make sure that production, compliance certifications, packaging schedules and production order quantities are all aligned. The LinearFlux team would like to thank all of our contributors and supporters for making the LithiumCard PRO happen. Be part of the Evolution of the HyperCharger today! 



FAQ


What is the extra charge for shipping?

We will be using FedEX for order outside of the USA or Hong Kong and that costs money. For this reason, we will need to charge a small additional shipping fee for international orders.

Can the new HyperPort charge the Apple Watch?

Yes, during our R&D stages, the LithiumCard PRO's (with the Apple Lightning connector), HyperPort was exclusively designed to HyperCharge the new Apple Watch. However, the HyperPort also has the HyperFET Gen 2 circuitry to HyperCharge virtually any mobile device in the market as well.

Can the LithiumCard PRO charge my iPhone and other Apple iOS devices?

Yes, the LithiumCard PRO with Lightning connector can charge iPhone 5, iPhone 5C, iPhone 5S, iPhone 6, and iPhone 6 PLUS. It can also charge iPod Touch 5th Generation, iPad AIR, iPad AIR 2, iPad mini, iPad mini Retina

Can the LithiumCard charge my Android phone?

Yes, the LithiumCard PRO with microUSB connector can charge most Android phones available today such as the Samsung Galaxy Series, Motorola Droid, etc

How much extra capacity can I expect to achieve when using a fully charged LithiumCard PRO to add to my mobile device?

Using the simple formula below, you can approximate the amount of additional capacity to the device you are charging. For example, using an iPhone 6 with its 1,810mAh internal battery, the results will be:

Extra capacity = [2310/(your device battery capacity)] x 100%

iPhone 6 extra capacity = [2310/1810] x 100 = 127% extra capacity

How efficient is the LithiumCard PRO?

The Engineers at LinearFlux have further advanced the efficiency technology. Typical accepted industry efficiency for premium portable chargers is about 70%. However, with our latest Gen 2 HyperFET charging circuitry, we have pushed the envelope to deliver up to 80-85% efficiency!

How long does it take to recharge the LithiumCard PRO?

The LithiumCard PRO will charge faster with stronger powered USB ports. For example, the PRO using an Apple 1A (5W) charger will take about 3 hours to charge. However, using an Apple 2.4A (12W) charger will take considerably less than 90 minutes. For best charging results, charge the LithiumCard PRO with the LinearFlux HyperCharging Hub for even faster charging times.

What is the estimated delivery date?

Barring any type of production issues. We expect the delivery of the LithiumCard PRO to start late April through early May 2015.

Once I order can I change the connector type or color of LithiumCard PRO?

Yes, you will need to contact us directly at orders@linearflux.com However, please expect some delays as these will need to be changed manually by our staff.

Why can't you offer both Lightning and microUSB option for the LithiumCard PRO?

Initially our R&D team we pursued this idea but with various charging profiles for Apple and Android we wanted to make certain that our HyperCharging Gen2 circuitry was tuned for each application. In addition, there's not one bit of extra real estate inside the PRO circuitry to allow for extra features. Every square inch has been maximized. For this reason, we created a HyperPort, just in case a user wanted to charge a device different from the native connector.

HyperFET Gen2 circuitry is capable of charging your smartphone over 1% per minute compared to the original LithiumCard. For example, if the LithiumCard PRO is left to charge your smartphone for 15 minutes, expect up to 15% of more in additional battery capacity.Advanced HyperCharging battery management algorithm extends the battery capacity beyond its 3000mAh rating. Meaning, you get more capacity than typical 3000mAh battery chargers.——— 

BUILT IN.

The LithiumCard PRO has all the cables you'll ever need. Use the full size USB to charge the internal battery. Pull-out the microUSB, or Apple Lightning (sold separately), to charge your Apple iOS, or Android devices. As with the original LithiumCard, the cables for the PRO can be hidden away when not in use.——— 
STAY CONNECTED.

LithiumCard PRO is available in either Apple Lightning, or microUSB, connectors. The microUSB connector works with many Android smartphones available today. The Apple Lightning connector works with all Apple iOS devices requiring a Lightning connector to charge. *Apple Lightning and microUSB versions are sold separately——— Backing up your smartphone's data to your computer has never been easier. There's no need to carry another separate cable for syncing data to your computer ever again. The PRO does it all.——— 




SIMULTANEOUS CHARGING.

If both your phone and the LithiumCard are out of charge, we have a unique bypass charging system, which allows you to simultaneously charge a smartphone and the LithiumCard's internal battery.——— 

CHARGE EVERYTHING.

LithiumCard charges most popular smartphones and electronic devices available today, such as Beats Wireless headphones or Jawbone Jambox. It has an Apple Lightning connector for your iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 PLUS, or a microUSB connector, for your Android phone.——— 

NANOSTIK.

Without using adhesives, NanoStik, utlizing nanosuction technology keeps the LithiumCard virtually stuck to your device. Over time, the NanoStik may get dirty, simply rinse with warm water to keep it at its maximum "stickyness".——— 
POWER LEVEL.
Pressing the power button also indicates LithiumCard's power level. The precision nano-refractive lens display will say it all.White: Over 90% chargedBlue: Over 10% chargedRed: Less than 10% charged.
——— 
BEST IN CLASS.

FAQ

What is the
extra charge for shipping?
We will be
using FedEX for order outside of the USA or Hong Kong and that costs money. For
this reason, we will need to charge a small additional shipping fee for
international orders.
Can the new
HyperPort charge the Apple Watch?
Yes, during our R&D stages, the LithiumCard PRO's (with the Apple Lightning connector), HyperPort was exclusively designed to HyperCharge the new Apple Watch. However, the HyperPort also has the HyperFET Gen 2 circuitry to HyperCharge virtually any mobile device in the market as well.
Can the LithiumCard
PRO charge my iPhone and other Apple iOS devices?
Yes, the
LithiumCard PRO with Lightning connector can charge iPhone 5, iPhone 5C, iPhone
5S, iPhone 6, and iPhone 6 PLUS. It can also charge iPod Touch 5th
Generation, iPad AIR, iPad AIR 2, iPad mini, iPad mini Retina
Can the
LithiumCard charge my Android phone?
Yes, the
LithiumCard PRO with microUSB connector can charge most Android phones
available today such as the Samsung Galaxy Series, Motorola Droid, etc
How much
extra capacity can I expect to achieve when using a fully charged LithiumCard
PRO to add to my mobile device?
Using the
simple formula below, you can approximate the amount of additional capacity to
the device you are charging. For example, using an iPhone 6 with its 1,810mAh
internal battery, the results will be:
Extra
capacity = [2310/(your device battery capacity)] x 100%
iPhone 6
extra capacity = [2310/1810] x 100 = 127% extra capacity 
How
efficient is the LithiumCard PRO?
The
Engineers at LinearFlux have further advanced the efficiency technology.
Typical accepted industry efficiency for premium portable chargers is about
70%. However, with our latest Gen 2 HyperFET charging circuitry, we have pushed
the envelope to deliver up to 80-85% efficiency!
How long
does it take to recharge the LithiumCard PRO?
The
LithiumCard PRO will charge faster with stronger powered USB ports. For
example, the PRO using an Apple 1A (5W) charger will take about 3 hours to
charge. However, using an Apple 2.4A (12W) charger will take considerably less
than 90 minutes. For best charging results, charge the LithiumCard PRO with the
LinearFlux HyperCharging Hub for even faster charging times.
What is the
estimated delivery date?
Barring any
type of production issues. We expect the delivery of the LithiumCard PRO to
start late April through early May 2015.
Once I order
can I change the connector type or color of LithiumCard PRO?
Yes, you
will need to contact us directly at orders@linearflux.com However, please expect some delays as these will need to be changed
manually by our staff.
Why can't you offer both Lightning and microUSB option for the LithiumCard PRO?
Initially our R&D team we pursued this idea but with various charging profiles for Apple and Android we wanted to make certain that our HyperCharging Gen2 circuitry was tuned for each application. In addition, there's not one bit of extra real estate inside the PRO circuitry to allow for extra features. Every square inch has been maximized. For this reason, we created a HyperPort, just in case a user wanted to charge a device different from the native connector.
